Mayiga annyonyodde nti obwakabaka buli mu nteekateeka yakubaga nnamutaayika mulala Obuganda kwebulina okutambulira ng’ ebirowoozo byabantu ba Buganda abawangaalira e Bulaaya nabyo babyetaaga. Okusinziira ku nteekateeka ezaakoleddwa, Katikkiro Mayiga ajja kusisinkana abavubuka abawangaalira mu bitundu bino wakati mu kubaako entanda gyabawa n’ensonga lwaki tebasaanye kwerabira nsibuko yabwe. Omu ku bavubuka abasuubirwa okwaniriza Katikkiro ebunaayira era eyaliko Nnalulungi wa Uganda mu Bungereza, Jan Nakitende Mukiibi asabye obwakabaka okubateerewo engeri gyebayinza okwongera okumanya obuwangwa bwabwe. Olugendo luno Mukuumaddamula agenda kulumako wiiki 3 nnamba.

headline: Owek. Kyewalabye asabye ebitongole okunoonya ssente ezinaavujirira emirimu
text: Minisita w’ Obuwangwa, Ennono, Obulambuzi, Olulimi n’ Ebyokwerinda mu Buganda, Owek. David Kyewalabye Male asabye ebitongole ebiggwa mu minisitule gyatwala okunoonya ensimbi bisobole okuvujirira emirimu gyabyo mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi omuggya. Okusaba kuno Owek. Kyewalabye akukoze alabiseeko mu kakiiko k’ebyobuwangwa, ennono, embiri ebyobulambuzi n’ebyokwerinda akakulirwa Owek. Kironde Kisuule ng’ alambulula ku bituukiddwako awamu n’ebigenda okukolebwa mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi ogwa 2021/2022. Minisita Kyewalabye abuulidde akakiiko kano nga bwebataddewo enkola ekulaakulanya eby’obulambuzi mu mwaka gw’ebyensimbi oguwedde ogwa 2021/2022 omuli; okuddaabiriza Amasiro, embiri z’Omutanda, Okunyikiza ensonga z’ Ebika, okubbulula empisa y’okwabya ennyimbe, emikolo gy’okwanjula awamu n’enkozesa y’ olulimi Oluganda. Owek. Male ategeezezza akakiiko kano nti baliko n’ettaka lyebaawa Abataka b’Ebika era kati Minisitule kyeri mu kukola kwekulaba nti ebikolebwako bimatiza kuba bakizudde ng’ettaka ekika kino limaririza litundiddwa abayima nekikosa enkulaakulana. Ono abuulidde akakiiko kano ng’ ennyumba ya Muzibuazaalampanga esangibwa mu masiro e Kasubi bwegenda okumalirizibwa mu mwezi gw’e 12 omwaka guno era nakakasa nti omulimu ogukoleddwa gwa mutindo ogutuukana n’ekitiibwa kyaayo. Mu birala ebikoleddwa, Owek. Kyewalabye agamba mulimu okuzimba embiri omuli olwe Nkoni n’endala, okuzimba Bujjabukula, okussa ebibumbe by’ Ebika ku luguudo Kabakanjagala era wano wasabidde ebika ebitanaba kuteekako bibumbe okukikola mu bwangu. Owek. Kyewalabye akakasizza akakiiko kano ng’ebitundu 70 ku buli 100 ku katala eryaweebwa Minisitule ye bwebikoleddwa era akakasa nti ebitundu 30 ku buli 100 ebibulayo bigenda kukolwako omwaka guno. Kinajjukirwa nti mu nteekateeka y’okwongera okunnyikiza emirimu nga buyita mu mbalirira y’omwaka gw’ebyensimbi 2022/ 2023, obukiiko bw’olukiiko obw’enjawulo bwatandika okutunula mu mirimu gya Minisitule ez’enjawulo okwekeneenya ebikoleddwa, ebisuubirwa okukolebwa awamu n’empenda n’ebirowoozo eby’enjawulo ebinaayamba okutuukiriza bino.

headline: Minisita Kyewalabye Male asabye gavumenti eyongere ssente mu by’Obulambuzi
text: Minisita w’Obuwangwa, Obulambuzi n’Embiri, Oweek. David Kyewalabye Male, asabye gavumenti eyongere ssente mukutumbula eby’obulambuzi kubanga byebimu ku biwaniridde eggwanika ly’ eggwanga. Okusaba kuno Owek. Kyewalabye akukoledde ku kabaga akaategekeddwa ekitongole ky’Obwakabaka eky’Ebyobulambuzi (BHTB), nga bali wamu ne Miss Tourism Uganda, okuyozaayoza Nnalulungi w’Ebyobulambuzi mu ggwanga, Sydney Nabulya Kavuma olw’okuwangula obukulu buno ku biyiriro bye Kalagala mu Bugerere. Owek. Male yeebazizza nnyo Nabulya olwa kaweefube gwe yateekamu okutuuka ku buwanguzi era n’amukuutira okukuuma omutindo, akiikirire bulungi Obwakabaka mu mpaka z’ensi yonna zaagenda okwetabamu. Minisita Kyewalabye yeebazizza nnyo ne Maama Nnaabagereka olwa kaweefube gw’atadde ku nkulaakulana y’omwana omuwala mu Buganda. Ye Nnalulungi Nabulya Sydney Kavuma, yeebazizza nnyo Gavumenti ya Beene, ekitongole eky’obulambuzi ne Obuganda bwonna olw’obuwagizi obw’omuggundu. Yasuubizza okukiirira bulungi Buganda ne Uganda mu mpaka z’ensi yonna z’agendamu ssabbiiti ejja e Malaysia. Akabaga keetabiddwako Mugerere, Oweek. James Ssempigga, Omumyuka we Hajj Bashir Ziraba, Abaami ba Ssaabasajja ku mitendera egy’enjawulo, Omuk. Busuulwa Farooq eyakiikiridde Ssentebe wa BHTB, Ssenkulu wa BHTB Omuk. Victoria Kayaga Kiggundu, Omw. Luggya owa Miss Tourism Uganda.

headline: Ebbula ly’amafuta: Gavumenti yaakweddiza amatekero g’amafuta agasangibwa mu Jinja
text: Gavumenti erangiridde nga bw’egenda okwezza emirimu gyonna egikwatana ku materekero g’amafuta agali mu kibuga Jinja okusobola okutaasa eggwanga mu kaseera k’aatyabaga. Alangiridde kino ye muteesiteesi omukulu mu minisitule y’ebyamasannyalaze n’obugagga obw’omu ttaka, Eng. Irene Pauline Batebe leero ku Lwokusatu bw’abadde awayaamu ne bannamawulire ku kizibu ky’ebbula ly’amasannyalaze ekiriwo. Okusinziira ku Batebe, amatekero gano agasangibwa ku Mutiibwa Road mu disitulikiti y’e Jinja galina obusobozi okuterekamu liita z’amafuta obukadde 30 agasobola okuwanirira eggwanga okumala ssabbiiti bbiri nnamba singa wabaawo ebbula ly’amafuta mu ggwanga. Wakati ng’eggwanga lituuyana n’ebbula ly’amafuta, bino bibadde bikalu ekiraze obwetaavu eri gavumenti okuddamu okutereka amafuta mu ttanka zino kuba kkampuni ya ‘One Petroleum Limited’ eyali yaweebwa omulimu guno gulabika nga gugiremeredde. “ Kkampuni y’eggwanga eya Uganda National Oil Company (UNOC) ekoze entegeka ez’okuddamu okutereka amafuta mu ttanka zino awamu n’okuzirabirira era okusooka baakwetaaga obukadde bwa ddoola 12 okulabirira obukadde bwa liita 12 ez’amafuta.” Batebe bw’annyonnyodde. Kinajjukirwa ntimu Desemba w’omwaka oguwedde ng’amafuta gatandiikiriza okubula, abakulira kkampuni ya UNOC baategeeza ababaka abatuula ku kakiiko k’ebyensimbi mu Palamenti nga ttanka zino bwe zitaliimu wadde ettondo ly’amafuta, kati kwe kusalawo okweddiza omulimu guno kitaase eggwanga ku bbula ly’amafuta.

headline: Buganda yakubangula abavubuka ku bugagga obw’ensibo
text: Minisita w’abavubuka, ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe atongozza akakiiko akagenda okusomesa abavubuka okwetooloola Obwakabaka bwa Buganda. Minisita Ssekabembe nga akwasa Mw. Damascus Ssali ekimu ku biwandiiko  “Omuvubuka bwe tumutandikira ku myaka 13 ng’ayingira Ssekendule.” Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, entegeka zino zitandikidde ku myaka 13 wadde ng’omuvubuka mu Buganda atwalibwa okuba ng’ali mu myaka 18. Owek. Ssekabembe atongozza akakiiko akagenda okukola ebbago erinaalung’amya emikolo gy’ebyoto mu Buganda. Akakiiko kakulirwa Mw. Ssali Damascus, amyukibwa Owek. Nantumbwe Rose. Abalala abali ku kakiiko; Ddamba Andrew, Namazzi Windfred Birabwa ne Masembe Edward. Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti abasomeseza ku byoto basomesa bye basanze naddala ebyobufumbo mu kisenge ate nga nabyo tebabituukiridde bulungi. Eyaweereddwa obuvunaanyizibwa okulira akakiiko kano, Ssali Damascus yeeyamye ku lwa banne okukola kyonna ekisoboka okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa buno era neyeebaza Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okubalengera. Akakiiko kaweereddwa omwezi gumu okumaliriza ebbago oluvannyuma Minisita w’Abavubuka, Emizannyo n’Okwewummuza, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu alyanjule mu Lukiiko lwa Buganda likubaganyizibweko ebirowoozo.

headline: KCCA esattuludde obukulembeze bw’obutale
text: Kampala Minisita wa Kampala n’emiriraano, asazizzaamu obukulembeze bw’obutale ne Lufula bwonna mu kibuga Kampala obuli wansi w’ekitongole kya Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA). Minisita Amongi nga ayogerako eri bannamawulire Ekiragiro kino kiweereddwa Minisita wa Kampala, Betty Amongi, leero ku Mmande, bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire. Okusinziira ku Minisita Amongi kino bakikoze okuteeka mu nkola ekiragiro kya Pulezidenti Museveni kye yafulumya nga 25/09/2020, mwe yalagira obukulembeze bw’obutale bwonna okusuulibwa ku bigambibwa nti buno bwali bubba abasuubuzi. Yalagira era wategekebwewo okulonda okuggya mu butale bwonna obwa gavumenti obuli mu Kampala. Minisita Amongi agambye nti kino kyaddirira abasuubuzi abakolera mu butale ne Lufula okwekubira enduulu ewa Pulezidenti nga bagamba nti ensimbi ezaali zibasoloozebwako zaali nnyingi, ekintu ekibafiiriza n’okubaleetera okukolera mu mabanja kuba basasula amasannyalaze, eza kaabuyonjo wamu n’ensimbi endala. “Obukulembeze bw’ebibiina ebyenjawulo bwawamba obukulembeze bw’obutale nebutandika okunyigiriza abasuubuzi ate ng’obutale buno bwaweebwa abasuubuzi bonna mu butale buno.” Minisita Amongi bw’ategeezezza. Obukulembeze bw’abasuubuzi obukadde bugambibwa okunyunyunta abasuubuzi wamu n’okulemwa okutegeka okulonda okw’amazima. Minisita Amongi agasseeko nti bataddewo akakiiko akataba minisitule ez’enjawulo okuli; Minisitule y’ebyobusuubuzi, Minisitule ya Kampala, ne Minisitule ya gavumenti ez’ebitundu, okulaba nga balung’amya obukulembeze bw’obutale. Mu kiragiro ekipya, KCCA yeddiza obukulembeze bw’obutale era ng’egenda kuteekayo ttiimu ezigenda okuddukanya obutale buno. Ttiimu zino zigenda kubeera n’enkalala z’abasuubuzi bonna abakolera mu butale ne Lufula era basasule ensimbi z’amazzi n’amasannyalaze awamu ne Kasasiro abasuubuzi, basobole okweyagalira mu butale bwabwe. Bano era baweereddwa omulimu okukung’aanya ssente ezaateekebwawo mu mateeka abasuubuzi ze bateekeddwa okusasula.

headline: Abalimi basabiddwa okwettanira ennima ey’omulembe
text: Katikkiro w’ebyalo bya Ssaabasajja Kabaka, Omuk. Moses Luutu asabye abalimi bulijjo okwettanira ennima ey’omulembe kuba kizuuliddwa nti yesobola okubayamba okuganyulwa mu bulimi awamu n’okugatta omutindo kwebyo byebakola. Okusaba kuno Omuk. Luutu akukoledde mu Lubiri lwa Kabaka e Mmengo bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu Bannabuddu leero ku Lwokusatu. Luutu annyonnyodde nti kye kiseera bannayuganda okuva ku nnima eyedda nga lwebajja okusobola okufunamu ensimbi okuzigatta ku ky’okufuna eky’okulya basobole okulaakulana n’okukyuusa obulamu embeera zabwe ez’obulamu.  Bannabuddu bano abavudde mu ggombolola ya Mutuba 18 Kibinge ne Musaale Butenga bategeezezza nti babadde balina okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe buno okusobola okulaba nti mu mbiri z’Omutanda temuggwamu byakulya nga enkola bweyabeeranga. Mu bugenyi buno bano babadde bakulembeddwamu kansala Isaac Lwanga asabye abantu ba Ssaabasajja okuba abakozi beegobeko obwavu era nawera okuwagira enteekateeka zonna ez’Obwakabaka. Mu bintu ebireeteddwa embuga mubaddemu; Ente, emmere ey’ebika eby’enjawulo , ebibala , nebintu ebirala.

headline: Ab’e Mawogola balambudde Pulojekiti z’essaza ne bakubiriza abantu okukola ennyo
text: Ssembabule Abakulira essaza lya Beene erya Mawogola n’Omumyuka wa Muteesa, Suzan Namukwaya, balambudde pulojekiti ez’enjawulo ezikolebwa ku ttaka ly’essaza okukuba ttooci we zituuse wamu n’okusoomoozebwa okuboolekedde. Amyuka Muteesa Suzan Namukwaya ne Noordin Ssesanga Bano abaakedde okulambula Pulojekiti zino wamu n’okuziteesaako ssabbiiti ewedde ku kitebe ky’essaza, baalaze okusoomoozebwa olw’abantu aboogera okwesenza ku ttaka lino n’okwonoona ezimu ku pulojekiti ze balinako. Omumyuka wa Muteesa, Suzan Namukwaya, yannyonnyodde nti ekizibu ky’abeesenza ku ttaka lino kinene era nga bayise abeesenzaako okulaba engeri gye bagonjoola ekizibu kino nga bali wamu. Oluvannyuma lw’okulambula pulojekiti zino, Namukwaya yagambye nti batunuulidde okwongera ku pulojekiti ze balina nga balima kasooli wamu n’ebijanjaalo, kibayambe okwongeza ku nnyingiza y’essaza. Alabirira pulojekiti z’essaza, Mutumba Deogratius yalaze ng’olusuku lwa yiika 15 lwe balina bwe luyambye era nga bafunamu ssente eza buli mwezi. Ono yagasseeko nti kuno baali bagasseeko emmwanyi wabula nezikosebwa omusana era nga bategeka kusimbamu ndala sizoni ejja. Mutumba yategeezezza nti olusuku luno luyambye nnyo abantu mu Ssembabule nga abasinga mwe bagula emmere awatali kugenda walala naye ng’ekizibu kye balina akadde kano bwe bubbi bw’emmere obuyitiridde mu kitundu kino. Ayabadde omukubiriza w’olukiiko luno, Ssesanga Noordin, yalaze obwetaavu bw’okwongera ku pulojekiti z’essaza. Mu birala bye bagenda okukola mulimu okulunda ente n’embuzi, kisobozese okugaziya ennyingiza y’essaza era kiyambe okuyimirizaawo ttiimu y’omupiira ey’essaza n’emirimu emirala.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atongozza eng’oma Ggwangamujje okulwanyisa COVID-19
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayigaatongozzaeng’oma Ggwangamujje egenda okukubwa Abaami ba Kabakamu nteekateeka y’okukunga abantu ba Beene wonna mu Buganda okusitukiramu balwanyise ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era n’asaba Abaami okukulemberamu olutalo luno. Enteekateeka eno ebadde mu Bulange- Mmengo ku Lwokusatu era Mukuumaddamula asinzidde wano n’asaba abantu okumanya akabi akali mu bulwadde buno obwa Lumiimamawuggwe. “Kambabuulire empologoma eyatulumba ye Lumiimamawuggwe, etusensera, etulya tetulaba era tetutegedde kuba ffenna abali wano tusobola okuba nga tulina obulwadde nga tetumanyi, ayinza okuba mu ngalo, leka kwekwata mu nnyindo, mu maaso, mu mimwa. Akabi kajja tulina okutegeeza ensi nti empologoma ezze naye bwe weerwanako ogiwona naye bwe weekwata ku maaso ekulya.” Kamalabyonna Mayiga agamba nti mu buli mbeera, eggwanga lirina okusoosowaza ebyobulamu era n’asaba Abaami ba Kabaka okukulemberamu olutalo ku Lumiimamawuggwe nga Beene bwe yalagira. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, ekisinga okutta bantu mu bulwadde buno kwe kuba nti obulwadde buno bwetooloddwa obutamanya era abantu n’ebintu ebyandibayambye babyesammula nga balowooza nti birimu akabi. Mayiga asiimye aba Dreamline Products olw’obuyiiya mu kusaasaanya amawulire agakwata ku Sennyiga Corona kuba okuva edda obuyiiya bw’eng’oma omwali Saagalaagalamidde, Ggwangamujje n’endala, zaayambanga nnyo okutumbula embeera z’abantu n’okubakuuma. “Mu Mirembe egyayita abalya ensi baali abo abalina ffeeza ne zzaabu, ekiseera ne kijja ng’abalina amatwale nga Bungereza. Ekiseera ne kituuka nga abalina amafuta be baliwo naye batugamba nti, oyo agenda okulya ensi mu biseera eby’omu maaso y’oyo ategedde ebyempuliziganya era atambula n’okumanya.” Owek. Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Mu ngeri yeemu ku mukolo guno, Obwakabaka buyingidde mu ndagaano n’aba Dreamline Products nga ku lwa Buganda, Owek.Hajji Amisi Kakomo y’ataddeko omukono ate Kenneth Mulondo n’assaako ku lwa Dreamline Products. Minisita omubeeziow’ebyamawulire ne tekinologiya mu gavumenti eyaawakati,Owek.Joyce Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo asinzidde wano n’asaba abasomesa beegemese kisobozese okwanguyizagavumenti okukola enteekateeka z’okuggulawo amasomeroera n’asaba abantu okwekuuma ekirwadde kino. Omukungu wa Dreamline Products,Mw. Kenneth Mulondoategeezezza nti basinzidde ku bukulu bw’eng’oma ne bakkiriza nti esobola okukunga abantu okusobola okulwanyisa Ssenyiga Corona. Mu nteekateeka eno, eng’oma eno yaakukubibwa okukubiriza abantu okukola, okuteeka mu nkola ebiragiro by’abasawo ku kulwanyisa Ssenyiga coronanga mu binokuliko; okunaaba mu ngalo, okwambala obukookolo, okwewa amabanga n’ebirala.

headline: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okwetangira endwadde
text: Bannayuganda basabiddwa okufaayo okwetangira endwadde ezitali zimu bweba baagala okulaakulana n’okukyuusa embeera yabwe olwo Buganda edde ku ntikko. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Omulangira Felix Muteesa bw’abadde atikkula Amakula okuva mu bannassingo mu lubiri e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri. Bano Muteesa abasabye okwewala endwadde zinamutta basobole okubeera abalamu kuba abantu abalamu bokka be basobola okulaakulanya ensi Buganda. Omulangira era abakubiriza okuba abakozi nga lwebagya okusoboola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe . Katikkiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka Omuk.Moses Luutu asabye abazadde okwongera okugumiza obuvunqnnyizibwa bwabwe eri abaana okuteekateeka eggwanga eryenkya erituukiridde. Ye Omwami wa Kabaka amulamulirako eggombolola ya mumyuka Busimbi David Ssendikadiwa agamba nti basoomozebwa enjala kyokka nakakasa nti olw’obukulembeze obulungi ebisoomozo bagezezaako okubirinya ku nfeete. Mukwenda eyawummula era omukiise wa Ssingo mu lukiiko lwa Buganda owek. Stanley Kijjambu yeebaziza banassingo olw’okufaayo okutuukiriza ennono yabwe nga lino ryerimu ku makubo ag’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko Amakula gano gavudde mu ggombolola ya Mumyuka Busimbi okuva mu ssaza lye Ssingo.

headline: Bannabuddu beefumiitirizza ku Mukenenya
text: Bya Muwuluzi Yusuf  Abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka mu ssaza ly’e Buddu basisinkanye okwefumiitiriza ku ngeri ekirwadde kya Mukenenya gye kikosezzaamu abantu naddala abaliko obulemu. Ppookino n’abamu ku baliko obulemu Bino byabaddewo eggulo ku lunaku lw’ensi yonna olw’ekirwadde kino era ng’ensisinkano eno yabaddemu ab’ekitongole kya MADIPHA ekiyambako abaliko obulemu naye nga mu kiseera kye kimu bawangaala n’ekirwadde kino n’okulaba bwe basobola okubulwanyisa. Ku mukolo ogwabadde ku ssaza nga gwabaddemu ebikonge by’Obwakabaka, abakulembeze mu Masaka, bannaddiini n’abakulembeze babaliko obulemu mu kitundu kino. Mu bubaka bwe obwamusomeddwa Ppookino Jude Muleke, Minisita wa gavumenti z’ebitundu mu Buganda, Owek.Joseph Kawuki yategeezezza nti abantu amaanyi babadde bagamalidde ku Ssennyiga Corona ne beerabira Mukenenya. Minisita yagasseeko nti Obwakabaka busaale nnyo mu kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Ssiriimu era n’akubiriza abantu okwekuuma. “Tusaana tutaase abaliko obulemu obutasaabaana kawuka ka Mukenenya.” Bw’atyo Owek. Kawuuki bwe yayongeddeko era ne yeebaza essaza Buddu n’ekitongole kya MADIPHA. Ye Ppookino mu bubaka bwe yavumiridde nnyo ebikolwa eby’ekko ebyetobese mu kalulu kano naddala ebyo ebikolebwa abakuumaddembe. Wabula ono yasabye abavubuka okwewala ebikolwa eby’effujjo olwo lwe banaateekebwamu obwesige. Ssenkulu w’ekibiina kya MADIPHA, Musisi Richard, yannyonnyodde nti ng’abaliko obulemu basanga okusoomoozebwa okuwangaala n’ekirwadde kino. Rev. Fr. Aloysius Kalwowa nga ye yakiikiridde omusumba w’ssaza ly’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, ku lwa bannaddiini yasabye wabeewo okunoonyereza ku bintu ebiremesa abantu okuvaayo okwatula mu lwatu nti balina Siriimu nga n’abamu eddagala balimirira mu nkukutu. Oluvannyuma woofiisi ya Ppookino yawaddeyo ebimu ku bikozesebwa abantu abaliko obulemu.

headline: Abasawo b’e Mulago bayambako okubbayo abalwadde – Minisitule y’ebyobulamu
text: Kampala Abamu ku basawo b’eddwaliro ekkulu e Mulago basongeddwamu okubeera emabega w’omuzze gw’okubba abalwadde mu ddwaliro lino nebabatwala mu malwaliro g’obwannanyini. Kino kibotoddwa akulira eddwaliro lino  Dr Baterena Byarugaba  eggulo ku Lwokuna bweyabadde n’abakungu ba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu nga boogerako eri bannamawulire. Dr. Baterena agamba nti byebakazuulawo biraga nti waliwo bakayungirizi abalinda abalwadde mu bifo awasimba emmotoka  ku ddwaliro lino wamu n’abasawo ababuzaabuza abalwadde nebabatwala mu malwaliro agaliraanye Mulago. Ono yalaajanidde abakulu mu Minisitule okubaako kyebakolawo kuba omuzze guno gutadde obulamu bwa bannayuganda mu matigga. Dr. Baterena yawadde eky’okulabirako ky’omwana eyagyibwa e Mulago natwalibwa mu ddwaliro ly’obwannanyini kyokka nalongoosebwa bub inga kati ensonga ziri mu kkooti ekitatanye ekifananyi ky’eddwaliro lino. Bino webijidde nga Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulamu Robinah Nabbanja yatandikawo okulambula eddwaliro lino buli Lwakuna okusobola okutereeza emirimu wamu n’okutumbula obuweereza nga alwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi. Kinajjukirwa nti mu mwaka 2019, Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yalagira amalwaliro agatunda eddwaliro naddala mu ddwaliro lino okuggalawo nga agamba nti bano bali bawandikira abalwadde eddagala eriri mu malwaliro gaabwe olwo nebabasindikayo okuligula.

headline: Katikkiro Akuutidde Bannayuganda Obutassa Mukono Kukulwanyisa Kirwadde Kya Coronavirus
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abantu ba Uganda obutasuula nnanga mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya coronavirus. Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga mu maka g’obwakatikkiro, mu Butikkiro e Mmengo, Mayiga agambye nti abantu bangi kati beerabidde nti tebalina kukwata bantu mungalo, obuteekwata mu nnyindo, akamwa n’amaaso, okwambala obukookolo wamu n’okussa mu nkola enkola ya tonsemberera. Oweek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti ssenyiga kolona tannafuna ddagala. “Ng’ojjeeko ennambika etuweebwa ab’ebyobulamu tulina okusigala nga tutambulira ku nnambika etuweebwa gavumenti; tulina okubitambulirako; era ekimu ku bbyo kwekusigala ewaka eri abo abatalina nnyo nsonga ebajjayo. Abaana mubakuumire awaka ate abazadde mufube okulaba nga beewala emize,” Mayiga bwagambye. Asabye abaana okufuba okusomera awaka era n’abazadde okufuba okulaba ng’abaana bagoberera byebalaba ku terefaayina. Mu birala, Mayiga asabye abantu okukomya okukungaana ku mikolo egy’enjawulo kubanga gyebakoma okukungaana abangi, gyebakomya okutambuza akawuka kolona. “Ensi tejja kusaanawo nga tokoze mukolo naye bwekiba kyakufa nakuwona, mu kikole nga mu kungaana batono. Ebiragiro bino byonna bikaluubiriza naye bitaasa bulamu bwaffe kubanga kyekyokulwanyisa kyokka kyetulinawo,” Mayiga bwagambye. Agasseeko nti Pulezidenti Museveni bweyatoowolokosa ku mateeka g’omuggalo abantu abamu baalowooza kolona aweddeyo. “Twagala abantu bakole basobole okweyimirizaawo, balabirire abantu baabwe, bakulaakulane badde ku ntikko, twagala Buganda ngeri ku ntikko mu byenfuna ne mu mbeera z’abantu naye twagala abantu basooke bataase obulamu,” Mayiga bwagambye. Woosomera bino ng’omuwendo gw’abantu abaakazuulwamu kolona guweze 724 mu Uganda.

headline: Abapoliisi bakutendekebwa ku nkwata y’abasibe abalina COVID-19
text: Kampala Oluvanyuma lw’abantu abakwatibwa ekirwadde ki ssennyiga Corona mu makomera n’obuduukulu bwa poliisi okweyongera, poliisi mu Kampala etandise okutendeka basajja baayo ku ngeri gyebalina okukwata n’okuggaliramu abasibe abalina ekirwadde kino. Abamu ku bapoliisi abali mu Kampala Kino kiddiridde okuggalwa kwa poliisi ye Kawempe ng’entabwe yava ku mulenzi ow’emyaka 15 eyali aggaliddwa ku misango egyekuusa ku kusobya ku mwana ow’emyaka 3 wabula oluvanyuma nazuulibwa nti yalina n’ekirwadde ki COVID-19. Poliisi egamba nti era kino kyabazibula amaaso ku bifo ebikuumirwamu abaana abataweza myaka 18 ababeera bazizza emisango. Omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emirilaano Patrick Onyango, yategeezezza nga bwe batawanyizibwa ekizibu ky’okujjuzo mu buduukulu bwabwe naye nakakasa nti bakola kyonna okulaba nga abasibe bagoberera amateeka agatangira COVID-19. Onyango yanyonyodde nga poliisi bwetadddewo emitendera egy’enjawulo okulaba nga baziyiza ekirwadde kino okusaasaana. “Ekitongole kyaffe ekikola ku by’obulamu kyatuwadde dda ebintu ebyeyambisibwa okwetangira ekirwadde kino. Nga ne poliisi zonna zamaze dda okuweebwa ‘Sanitizers’ wamu ne ttanka z’amazzi okusobola okuyambako okutangira ekirwadde kino,” Onyango bweyategeezezza. Egimu ku mitendera egiteereddwawo okutangira ekirwadde kino okusaasaana mulimu; okuyimiriza abagenyi mu bifo ebikuumirwamu abaana abato, okusala ku muwendo gw’abantu abagenda ku poliisi wamu n’engeri endala eziwerako. Onyango yasabye abantu okugondera ebiragiro bya Minisitule y’ebyobulamu kiyambe okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino.

headline: Abawangaala ne  Mukenenya basiimye Kabaka olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde
text: Masaka – Buddu Abantu ba Kabaka mu Buddu basiimbye Omuteregga olw’okubeera omusaale mu kulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya  mu Uganda ne Africa yonna, ekintu ekiyambye ku mbeera. Abamu ku bano nga balina akawuka ssaako abatalina, okwogera bino basinzidde mu musomo ogw’okubabangula ku bika by’obuwuka obulwaza Mukenenya obuliwo ensangi zino wamu n’okubanjulira alipoota ekwatagana  ku kuvumbula eddagala erinaawonya ssaako n’okutangira Mukenenya ku Maple leaf Hotel esangibwa mu kibuga. Omusomo guno gwetabiddwamu abantu okuva mu biti ebyenjawulo omuli; Bannaddiini, abasawo, Bannamawulire, abakulembeze ku mitendera egyenjawulo, abakulira ebitongole by’obwannakyewa, ssaako n’abo abalina akawuka ka Mukenenya, n’abantu abaze batambulirwako okunoonyereza kuno. Abantu abalina akawuka bategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka okuvaayo n’abakubiriza okumira eddagala, okwekebeza, ssaako okubagumya,  ekibayambye okusigala nga balamu era ne bamwagaliza amazaalibwa amalungi. “Tusaba Katonda awangaaze Ssaabasajja Kabaka wa Buganda kubanga atubeereddewo nnyo ffe abantu abalina akawuka ka Mukenenya ng’atuwa obubaka n’ebigambo ebirungi ebutugumya, ebituzzaamu amaanyi kubanga twali twaggwaamu essuubi era singa si ye singa  abamu twafa dda.” Abamu ku bantu abalina akawuka bwe bategeezezza. Mu ngeri y’emu Rev. Fr. Emmanuel Katabazi  nga y’akulira eby’obulamu mu ssaza ly’Eklezia Katolika ery’e Masaka, ategeezezza nti omusomo guno  gubayambye  okubabangula ku bikwatagana n’akawuka ka Mukenenya ebipya bye babadde tebamanyi. Ate ye Dr.  Sheila  Balinda nga kakensa mu kunoonyereza ku kawuka ka Mukenenya  okuva mu kitongole kya Medical Research Council, agambye  nti babadde balina okutegeka omusomo guno okusobola okutegeeza Bannabuddu ebivudde mu kunoonyereza olw’okuba nti beewaddeyo nnyo  mu nteekateeka ey’okulaba ng’olutalo lw’okulwanyisa akawuka kano luggusibwa. Dr Balinda agambye nti mu kunoonyereza okupya okwakatuukibwako, bavumbudde  nti obuwuka bwanjawulo era nga si bwonna obubeera mu mubiri gw’omuntu afunye Siriimu nti, buviirako omulala okulwala Siriimu. Ono asinzidde wano n’agumya bannauganda nti eggwanga Uganda lirina abakugu abakenkuse ennyo mu kuketta n’okutegeera enneeyisa endya ne nneebaka ya kawuka kano nga we batuuse batandise okukataayiza. Ono alabudde abo bonna abatannakafuna obutalyaguzibwa  kyokka beekuume akawuka kano.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abantu okuwaayo omusaayi kitaase obulamu
text: Bulange Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abantu bonna bafeeyo okugaba omusaayi kiyambeko okutaasa obulamu bw’abo abagwetaaga kubanga beeyongera buli kadde. Katikkiro Mayiga nga atongoza Empenduzo y’omusaayi Okusaba kuno Katikkiro Mayiga akukoledde mu Bulange Mmengo olwaleero ku Lwokubiri ng’atongoza kaweefube w’okugaba omusaayi agenda okumala ennaku nnya nnambirira. “Tutaase obulamu ekisookerwako nga tufa kukugaba n’omusaayi ogunaatumala, bwe tunaamala okutaasa obulamu, ebirala binaatwogerwako.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’asabye. Katikkiro Mayiga asinzidde wano n’atongoza empenduzo (App) eya tekinologiya w’omutimbagano eyakoleddwa ekibiina ekigatta abayindi ekya Indian Association, ng’eno yaakuyamba okumanya ekika ky’omusaayi, agwetaaga n’eddwaliro w’asobola okugufuna mu bwangu. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti obulamu ky’ebyobugagga Katonda kye yawa abantu ekisinga ebirala byonna era n’abasaba okubulabirira obulungi nga balya bulungi n’okwejjanjabya nga balwadde awamu n’okwetangira endwadde ezisoboka nga Siriimu ne Corona. Ono agambye nti wadde bino bisobola okukolebwa naye waliwo ebintu ng’omusaayi abantu bye batalinaako buyinza ate nga bagwetaaga okusigala nga balamu nga gutambuza emmere n’ebirungo omubiri bye guba gwetaaga. Katikkiro abasabye okuyamba abantu ababeera bagwetaaga omuli; abakyala abazaala, abagudde ku bubenje, abalwadde abalina endwadde nga Nnalubiri, Kkookolo awamu n’embeera endala ezeetaaga okuteekebwako omusaayi. Kamalabyonna asabye ebitongole ebyenjawulo mu ggwanga okuvaayo okudduukirira kaweefube ono nga bakwatagana n’ekitongole kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omukungu Kaggwa Ndagala, ategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwegatta ku Uganda Red Cross okusobola okuziba eddibu eririwo ku bbula ly’omusaayi ate ng’abagwetaaga bangi era ng’enteekateeka eno yaakumala ennaku nnya (4). Dr. Nazziwa Byabazaire asiimye Obwakabaka olw’okubawa omukisa mu kaseera kano aka Ssennyiga Corona kubanga abantu abagwetaaga buli kadde beeyongera ate nga teriiyo kkolero likola musaayi okuggyako okweyambisa abantu abasobola okugugaba. Kaweefube ono awomeddwamu omutwe ab’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation nga bayambibwako aba Indian Association, Mengo Hospital, Uganda Blood Bank ne Uganda Red cross.

headline: Buganda yakutta omukago naba National Drug Authority
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti Buganda yakukola omukago n’ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kulondoola eddagala mu ggwanga ki National Drug Authority okwongera okuteereza ensonga z’ebyobulamu mu Buganda ne Uganda. Ekirangiriro kino Owek. Mayiga akikoledde mu Bulange Mmengo bw’abadde asisinkanye abakungu ba National Drug Authority abakulembeddwa Dr. David Nahamya nagamba nti ekiseera kituuse abakola eddagala ly’obutonde bakwatagane n’ekitongole kino okusobola okutambulira mu bulambulukufu. Owek. Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Obwakabaka bufaayo nnyo ku bantu babwo era bukola buli kimu okulaba nti abantu babwo babeera balamu okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Mayiga ategeezezza nti eddagala ly’obutonde lisobola okukola bulungi naye walina okubaawo enkolagana n’okuwuliziganya wakati w’ekitongole ki NDA awamu n’abantu ab’enjawulo abanoonyereza ku ddagala ly’ ekinnansi n’obutonde. Ono agasseeko nti kati Buganda egenda kukwatagana n’ekitongole kino okulaba engeri abasawo abali mu ddagala ly’obutonde gyebasobola okulambikibwa wakati mu kugoberera ebbago eririwo ku nsonga eno. Ye Minisita w’Ekikula kyabantu, ebyobulamu, ebyenjigiriza era avunaanyizibwa ku woofiisi ya Nnabagereka, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu, ategeezezza nti Buganda erina enteekateeka ez’enjawulo okutumbula eby’obulamu kuba Kabaka ayagala abantu be nga balamu. Ekitongole kino kyatandika mu 1993 era nga kivunanyizibwa okulaba ng’abantu bafuna eddagala etuufu ery’omutindo ate nga sirabuseere. Akulira ekitongole kino, Dr. David Nahamya agambye asanyukidde eky’okukwatagana ne Buganda era nategeeza nti baliko kaweefube gwebatandise okulaba nti balwanyisa okukozesa ebiragalalagala mu baana abato okusobola okutaasa ebiseera byabwe eby’omu maaso.

headline: Abakkiriza ensanvu buli kusinza si bwenkanya – Kazimba Mugalu
text: Namirembe Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stephen Kazimba Mugala asabye Pulezidenti Museveni akyuseemu ku biragiro ebipya bye yawedde bwe yabadde aggulawo amasinzizo, nga ayogerako eri eggwanga ku mbeera y’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ku lunaku lwa Ssande. Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba Mugalu Museveni yaddirizza ku muggalo gw’ebifo ebimu bwe yalagidde amasinzizo okuggulawo oluvannyuma lw’okumala emyezi mukaaga nga gaggaddwa wabula n’alagira bano bafube okukuuma ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona. Yalagidde abakkiriza bawulwemu ebibinja bya bantu nsanvu kiyambeko obutasaasaanya kirwadde kino. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Lutikko e Namirembe ku Mmande, Kazimba yasabye Pulezidenti Museveni akkirize omuwendo ku bantu abalina okusaba gutuukane n’obunene bw’esinzizo. “Lutikko yaffe ku Ssande emu ebeeramu abantu abawera 4000 mu kusaba okw’enjawulo, bw’ogamba bano tubateeke mu bibinja by’abantu 70 tuba tugenda kwetaaga okusaba kwa mirundu 57 okusbola okubamalawo. Kino tekikolerako ddala,” Kazimba bwe yategeezezza. Kazimba yasabye gavumenti ekkirize okusinza okwawamu kuba ebifo bino bisobola bulungi okugoberera ebiragiro bya COVID-19. Ssaabalabirizi yakubirizza abakkiriza okusigala nga basabira ku leediyo, ttivvi, be ku mitimbagano kibayambeko okwekuumira ku Katonda. Ono yasabye amasomero agali ku musingi gw’ekkanisa ya Uganda okukolagana ne minisitule y’ebyenjigiriza basobole okuteekerateekera abayizi abagenda okukola ebibuuzo byabwe ebyakamalirizo. Yasuubizza ng’ekitongole ky’ekkanisa eky’ebyenjigiriza bwe kyetegese okubakwasizaako. Kazimba yasiimye ekitongole ekirondoola eby’enjigiriza ebyawaggulu olw’okukkiriza ssettendekero wa Uganda Christian University (UCU) okusomesa abayizi ku Yintaneeti.

headline: Museveni agadde amasinzizo n’amasomero lwa Coronavirus
text: Museveni ku kkono   Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni olwaleero alagidde amasinzizo n’amasomero gonna okuggalawo okwetangira ekirwadde kya Coronavirus.  Bwabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga eggulo lyaleero Museveni agambye nti amasomero gonna okuva ku nasale okutuuka ku mattendekero galina okuggalwa obutasukka saawa mukaaga ku lwokutaano.  Pulezidneti era aragidde n’ebifo ebisinzibwamu byonna okwetooloola eggwanga okuggalawo mbagirawo okumala omwezi gumu.  Museveni era agambye nti n’abafu bonna balina okuziikibwa ba nganda zaabwe bokka. Ekirwadde kya Coronavirus kizinzeeko ensi yonna nga kati kyakatta abantu abagenda mu 8000 ng’ate abalala 180,000 kyamaze dda okubayoola.

headline: Bakutte akulira okugema Corona lwa kutunda kkaadi z’abagemeddwa
text: Aboobuyinza mu Ssembabule bakutte akulira okugema ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ku Ntuusi Healthy Centre IV nga kigambibwa nti ono abadde atunda kkaadi eziraga nti omuntu baamugema, ekintu ekitadde obulamu bw’abantu mu matigga. Omukwate ye musawo Kalemba Emmanuel ow’emyaka 35 nga y’akulira enteekateeka z’okugema ku ddwaliro lya Ntuusi era nga yakwatiddwa ku biragiro by’omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Ssembabule, Walugembe Ramathan. Kigambibwa nti Kalemba kkaadi zino abadde ezitunda wakati w’emitwalo 8 ne 10 era kino abadde akikoledde akaseera. Mu kaseera kano ono akuumirwa mu kaduukulu ka poliisi y’e Ssembabule. Oluvannyuma lw’okukunyizibwa RDC Walugembe, Kalembe omusango yagukkiriza era ne yeetondera RDC. Kalembe annyonnyodde nga bwe yatuukirirwa omusajja Mwebaze Coleb n’amuwa kkaadi eno asobole okugenda e Kibaale okumwanjula kuba yali tasobola kutambula nga tagirina era oluvannyuma bakkiriziganya emitwalo 8 wadde yali tasoose kumusaba ssente. “Kituufu naguza Mwebaze Coleb kkaadi eraga nti bamugema Covid-19 ate nga yali simugeme naye mu kusooka saasooka kumusaba ssente wabula oluvannyuma twatuuka ne tukkiriziganya era emitwalo munaana (80000).” Bw’atyo Kalemba Emmanuel bw’annyonnyodde mu maziga. Okusinziira ku RDC Walugembe, baafuna okwemulugunya mu bantu nga waliwo abakola ebikolwa bino era naye kwe kusuula enkessi era bw’atyo n’akwata omusawo ono. Walugembe agamba nti kino kya bulabe nti era y’ensonga lwaki eng’ambo zibungeesebwa nti abagemwa bafa Covid so ng’abakola ebikolwa ng’ebyo be b’onoonye enteekateeka zino, n’awera okulwanyisa ebikolwa bino e Ssembabule. Ayongeddeko nti omusawo ono asobola n’okuwandiikira abantu kkaadi eziraga nti tebalina Siriimu ate ng’amuyina era ng’ebikolwa bino bigootaanya olutalo gavumenti lw’eriko olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona, n’alabula bonna abakikola okukikomya.

headline: Omulangira Daudi Chwa alabudde abantu ku Mukenenya
text: Omulangira Daudi Chwa asabye abantu ba Kabaka bulijjo okwewala endwadde naddala Mukenenya obusobola okubazza emabega era bafube okukuza abaana babwe obulungi. Bino Omulangira Daudi Chwa abyogeredde mu lubiri lwa Ssaabasajja e Mengo bwabadde atikkula Bannabusiro Amakula. Omulangira Chwa agambye nti wadde ebirwadde ebyenjawulo nga Ebola ne COVID-19 webiri mu ggwanga naye abantu amaaso tebalina kugaggya ku Mukenenya kuba ekirwadde kino kisobola bulungi okwewalika. Omwami wa Kabaka amulamulirako eggombolola ya Mutuba IV Entebbe Lunnyo, Dennis Mpanga akulembeddemu abantu abakiise embuga mu nteekateeka y’okujjuza embiri za Ssaabasajja zibeeremu emmere. Omwami w’eggombolola eno, Dennis Mpanga annyonyodde nti basoomozebwa banakigwannyizi abagufudde omugano okunnyaga ettaka ly’Obwakabaka nga nebifo eby’obuwangwa tebabitaliza kwossa nettaka lyabantu Ye Omulangira Jonathan Muteesa yeebaziza Bannabusiro olw’okumannya obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe ate nebafaayo okubutuukiriza. Katikiro w’Ebyalo bya Kabaka Omuk.Moses Luutu asabye abagoba bebiduka okuvuga nobuvunannyizibwa okutaasa obulamu bwabantu naddala mu ggandaalo lino erisembedde. Omumyuka ow’okubiri owa Ssebwana Vicent Kayongo asibiridde abantu ba kabaka entanda okwongera amaanyi mukunnyikiza enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka mu bantu Buganda eyongere okuyitimuka.

headline: Ekiseera kituuse okukomya okuzaala abaana abalina Nalubiri- Nankindu
text: Oweek. Nankindu ng’abuuza ku Muwanga ku Bulange   Minisita avunanyizibwa ku nkulaakulana y’abantu Oweek. Dr Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma agambye nti ekiseera kituuse okukomya abaana abazaalibwa n’obulwadde bwa Sicklecells [Nalubiri] mu Uganda. Mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’akulira ekitongole kya Holly Foundation ekikola ku kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Nalubiri, Mable Nakato Muwanga, Nankindu ategeezezza nti obulwadde buno buviiriddeko amaka mangi okutabanguka. “Tetusobola kwongera kuzaala baana abalina sickle cells olw’ebizibu ebingi bwebuleese omuli obwavu kubanga abazadde tebava mu malwaliro. Tetwagala muwendo gw’abaana abalina sickel cell kweyongera olwo lwetunaasobola okulwanyisa obulwadde buno,” Nankindu bwategeezezza. Ku lulwe, Muwanga ategeezezza nti okutandika Holly Foundation kyali kirooto kya muwalawe Holly eyaffa ekirwadde kya Nalubiri ng’alina emyaka 17. “Yali mu ddwaliro e Bungereza nagamba tusobola tutya okuyamba abantu, nemugamba tusooke tufe kuggwe tulyoke tufe ku bantu ba Uganda. Mu ddwaliro yamalayo emyezi esatu naye nga tanafa yatandika okusonda essente ayambe abantu abalina obulwadde buno. Yasiiga nga abantu enjala nga bamuwa pound emu era sente ezo nga aziweereza okuyamba abaana,” Muwanga bwagambye. Ekibiina kino kyatandika n’abaana musanvu. “Bweyafa nengamba nkole ntya, sisobola kusiiga enjala nga bwabadde akola. Naye bwennawulira nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka ayamba abantu abalina sicklecells nasanyuka nnyo. Namanya nti waliwo asobola okunkwatirako,” Muwanga bwagambye. Wetwogerera nga kati ekibiina kirabirira abantu abasukka mu 1000 mu bitundu bye Bamunaanika wamu ne Adjumani mu West Nile. Muwanga asabye abo bonna abasobola okubadduukirira babadduukirire basobole okugenda mu maaso n’okuyamba abantu bano.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka aweereddwa engule emusiima okulwanyisa Siriimu
text: Ekitongole ekirwanyisa mukenenya mu nsi yonna ki UNAIDS kiwadde Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, engule emwebaza olw’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino mu Uganda ne Afirika nga ayita mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo zateekawo okumanyisa abantu ku kirwadde kino. Engule eno Omutanda emukwasiddwa akulira ekitongole kino mu nsi yonna, Winne Byanyima ku mukolo gw’emisinde gy’okujjukira amazaalibwa ga Kabaka ag’omwaka 2022 oguyindidde mu Lubiri e Mmengo ku Ssande. Bw’abadde awaayo engule eno, Byanyima yeebazizza Obwakabaka bwa Buganda olw’okutumbula eby’obulamu awamu n’okukola ennyo okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino nga buyita mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo.  “Kulwa UNAIDS njagala okwebaza Kabaka n’Obwakabaka obukulemberwa Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okuwaayo emisinde gino kati emyaka 3 eri okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya era twebaza aba Airtel olw’okuvujjirira emisinde egyeetabamu abantu enkumu bwebati,” Byanyima bw’ategeezezza. Emisinde gino gitambulidde wansi w’omulamwa, “Abaami tube basaale okulwanyisa Mukenenya, tutaase abaana ab’obuwala, ‘ era mu nteekateeka eno Omutanda ayagala omwaka 2022 wegunatuukira nga obulwadde buno bufuuse lufumo.  Kinajjukirwa nti Omuteregga yalondebwa ekitongole kino era nasiima okukulemberamu olutabaalo ku mukenenya ng’ emunyeenye ya Afirika yonna ku nsonga eno.

headline: Minisitule y’ebyobulamu erabudde ku kubalukawo kw’ekirwadde kya Polio
text: Minisitule y’ebyobulamu erabudde bannayuganda ku kubalukawo kw’ekirwadde kya Polio mu ggwanga oluvannyuma lw’okwekebejja kwe baakoze mu makeberero ag’enjawulo mu Kampala n’ekizuulibwa ng’akawuka kano weekali mu Kampala. Okusinziira ku Dayirekita w’ebyobulamu mu Minisitule, Dr. Henry G. Mwebesa, ebyakebeddwa byaggyiddwa mu bifo ebisengejja kazambi okuli Bulogoobi ne Lubigi. Ebifo bino okuli; Bugoloobi ne Lubigi bye bimu ku bisinga okukung’aaniramu obucaafu okuva mu Kampala ekikakasa okubeerawo kw’akawuka kano mu Kampala. “Ebyavudde mu kunoonyereza okwakoleddwa abaUganda Virus Research Institute (UVRI) byakakasizza nga bwe waliwo akawuka ka polio ekika kya ‘Polio Virus type 2(cVDPV2). Akawuka kano akaazuuliddwa, kalina akakwate n’ekika kyacVDP2 ekyazuuliddwa e Sudan.”Mwebesa bwe yagambye. Ono yagasseeko nti kati bali bulindaala era banoonya mu malwaliro ag’enjawulo okulaba oba waliwo omulwadde wa polio era beeteegereza abaana bonna abali wansi w’emyaka 15 abalina akabonero akalaga okunafuwa mu mikono gyabwe n’amagulu. Dr. Mwebesa agamba ntu Uganda ne Afirika yonna yali yakakasibwa ekitongole ky’ebyobulamu mu nsi yonna ekyaWorld Health Organisation (WHO) nga tekyalina kirwadde kya Polio mu August 2020. Naye ate ekirwadde kino kyazzeemu okuzuulibwa mu mawanga ageetoolodde Uganda okuli;Kenya, South Sudan ne DRC. Okusinziira ku Dr. Mwebesa, okubalukawo kw’ekirwadde kino kuvudde ku bantu butajjumbira kugemesa baana mu ggwanga olw’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 ekyateeka eggwanga ku muggalo. Ekirwadde kya Polio kitambuzibwa okuva ku muntu omu kudda ku mulala nga kiyita mu kazambi, amazzi oba emmere ebiteekebwa mu lubuto nga birimu obubi.

headline: Gavumenti erabudde abanaagingirira sitiika z’emmotoka
text: Gen Katumba-Wamala Minisita avunanyibwa ku by’enguudo n’entambula Gen Edward Katumba Wamala alabudde abantu bonna banaagezaako okujingirira sitiika z’emotoka ezaagabiddwa abantu n’ebitongole eby’enjawulo abakkiriziddwa okusigala nga bazikozesa.  Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Museveni kuntandikwa ya ssabbiiti eno, yawera emmotoka zonna okutambula mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa ensaasaana y’ekirwadde kya COVID-19.  Wamala yagambye nti sitiika zaabwe baazitaddemu ebintu ebikizibuwaza okuzijingirira.  “Oyo yenna gwetunaakwata ne sitiika enjigirire, emmotokaye tugenda kugiwamba ppaka ennaku pulezidenti zeyateekawo okulwanyisa COVID nga ziweddeyo ate oluvanyuma tubatwale mu kkooti,” Katumba bweyagambye.  Yagasseeko nti abo abaweereddwa sitiika  tebakkirizibwa kufuluma bitundu bya Kampala n’emirirwano ng’oyo yenna ayagala okufuluma Kampala n’emirirwano, ateekeddwa okusaba olukusa okuva eri minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’entambula. Uganda woosomera bino ng’erimu abalwadde ba COVID-19 44.

headline: Bakutte abalongoosa n’abasawo ku by’okubba eddagala mu ddwaliro ly’e Kawempe
text: Kampala Akakiiko akalwanyisa obulyi bw’enguzi mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti, akawungeezi k’eggulo baliko abasawo 3 n’abalongoosa 2, be baakutte ku by’okubba eddagala eririna okuweebwa abalwadde ku bwereere mu ddwaliro lino. Kino kiddiridde abalwadde abawerako okwemulugunyiza akulira eddwaliro lino nga bwetafuna ddagala. Ku ddagala bano lye baabakutte nalyo kuliko erikkakkanya ku bulumi wamu n’eddagala eriyisibwa mu mpiso nga lino lirwanyisa obuwuka era lino lyonna lisinga kukozesebwa ku balwadde ababeera balongooseddwa. Eddagala lino libaddeko obulambe obulaga nti lya gavumenti ya Uganda era nti teririna kutundibwa naye ate bano babadde balibbayo ne baliguza abantu mu bulwaliro obutonotono. Okusinziira ku bakungu b’akakiiko abaakutte abantu bano bagamba nti abalwadde babadde babasindika mu bulwaliro obuliraanyeewo okugula eddagala lino ku nsimbi ennyingi era ng’obulwaliro buno obusinga bw’abasawo ba gavumenti. Omu ku baddukanya eddwaliro lino, Grace Lubaale, ategeezezza nti okwemulugunya kubadde kususse era n’asuubiza okukola buli kimu okulaba ng’embeera eno teddamu kubaawo. Lubaale agamba nti abasawo basatu n’abalongoosa babiri be babadde mu kikolwa kino era eddagala babadde balitereka mu bisenge gye bakyusiza wamu ne mu kaabuyonjo, ekintu ekyongera okuteeka obulamu bw’abantu mu matigga. Oluvannyuma lw’okulondoola ensonga eno, Poliisi n’akakiiko k’amaka g’Obwapulezidenti, abasawo bano yabakutte era n’esobolaokununula eddagala lino lyonna.

headline: Nnamungi w’omuntu yeeyiye mu Bulange okwegemesa
text: Nnamungi w’omuntu yakedde kweyiwa ku mbuga enkulu e Bulange e Mmengo okwegemesa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ku bwereere mu nteekateeka ewagiddwa Obwakabaka awamu ne bannamikago okuli Uganda Breweries, PSFU n’abalala. Bano baasimbye ennyiriri okuva ku Wankaaki okutuukira ddala ku mulyango oguyingira mu kizimbe kya Masengere wabula eky’enjawulo zino zibadde zitambula wakati mu kukuuma ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona era ekitongole kya Red Cross kibadde kiyambako okulung’amya abantu okusobola okwegemesa mu budde. Akulira bakitunzi mu kkampuni ya Uganda Breweries, Jackie Tahakanizibwa yategeezezza ng’abantu bwe baawulidde ekiragiro kya Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga zaagenze okuwera essaawa 7 ez’emisana ng’abantu abawera 3500 be bamaze okugemebwa. Ate ye akulira okwegemesa ekirwadde kino mu ggwanga, Dr. Daniel Kyabayinze yasinzidde wano n’asiima Obwakabaka ne bannamikago olw’okukunga abantu mu bungi ate ne bajja kuba kino kyongedde ku muwendo gw’abantu abagemeddwa.  Wabula Dr. Kyabayinze omukwanaganya w’okugema Covid 19 mu kitongole ky’ebyobulamu mu gavumenti eyaawakati yalabudde abagemeddwa omulundi gwabwe ogusooka okwekenneenya eddagala lye babakubye kibayambe mu kufuna akayiso akookubiri obutatabiikiriza kika kya ddagala. Kinajjukirwa nti Minisitule y’ebyobulamu ezze esiitaana n’okukunga abantu okwegemesa wabula okuva Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi ne Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga lwe basitukiramu, embeera eno egenze ekyukamu naddala wano mu Buganda. Abamu ku baganyuddwa mu nteekateeka eno bategeezezza nti bulijjo balinze ekiva embuga okusobola okwettanira enteekateeka eno era ne basaba Omutanda asiimye okugema kuno kutwalibwe mu masaza ga Buganda kuba bangi ku baliyo tebannaba kugemebwa.

headline: Ssaabasajja asimbudde emisinde gya ‘Birthday Run’ okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka, Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II yasiimye n’asimbula abaddusi mu misinde gya ‘Kabaka Birthday Run’ ez’omwaka 2021 okujjukira amazaalibwa ge ag’emyaka 66.  Ku mulundi guno abaddusi 200 bokka be bakkiriziddwa mu misinde gya Ssande egyayindidde mu Lubiri e Mmengo wansi w’omulamwa, “Abaami tulwanyise Mukenenya, tutaase abaana aboobuwala.”  Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga yategeezezza Obuganda nti emisinde gino gyalina kuddukibwa mu mwezi gwa Apuli wabula olw’ebiragiro bya gavumenti ebitangira Corona, basazeewo n’egyomwaka guno bagidduke mu ngeri ya Ssaayansi olw’ensonga nti abantu tebasobola kukung’aana bangi era gwe mulundi ogwokubiri ng’omulamwa gwekuusa ku Mukenenya. Kino kyaddirira Kabaka okusiima n’alondebwa okubeera Omumuli gw’ekitongole ky’ensi yonna ekya United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDs (UNAIDS)  mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya ku Ssemazinga Afirika.  Mu kwogera kwe, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yategeezezza nti Obwakabaka bwakukola buli kimu okulaba ng’omwaka gwa 2030 we gutuukira nga Siriimu afuuse lufumo.  “Leero tukung’aanye ne Kabaka waffe okujaguza amazaalibwa ge. Ssaabasajja Kabaka yaweza emyaka 66 mu mwezi gwa Apuli w’omwaka guno era singa si kirwadde kya Corona. Twandidduse mu Ssande etutuusa ku mazaalibwa ge. Naye olw’ensonga eyo, twasalawo amazaalibwa ge okugakuza olwaleero era y’ensonga lwaki tuli wano.” Owek. Mayiga bwe yagambye. Obwakabaka buzze butegeka emisinde gino okumala emyaka munaana wansi w’emiramwa egy’enjawulo. Okusooka omulamwa gwali ku kirwadde kya kikulukuto mu bakyala (Fistula) ne kuddako ekirwadde kya Nnalubiri (Sickle Cells) olwo Mukenenya naddako.  Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, ssente ezigenda okuva mu misinde gino zigenda kweyambisibwa okulwanyisa Mukenenya mu Buganda ne Uganda kuba ensi tesobola kukulaakulana ng’abantu baayo si balamu bulungi.  “Bakabaka ba Buganda ebbanga lyonna babadde ku mwanjo okutumbula ebyobulamu. Tujja kugenda mu maaso okulwanyisa Mukenenya ng’abasajja ffe tukulembeddemu okutaasa abaana aboobuwala.” Mayiga bwe yannyonnyodde.  Abantu bangi abawerako baalabiddwako nga bakung’aanye ku Wankaaki w’Olubiri lw’e Mmengo, Oluguudo lwa Nnantawetwa awamu n’ekizimbe kya Bulange era bano we baddukidde n’okukuza amazaalibwa g’Omutanda era bano Beene yasiimye n’ava mu mmotoka ye okubabuuzaako.  Abalala baddukidde ku bitebe by’amasaza gaabwe awamu n’eggombolola wakati mu kugoberera ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona.  Minisita w’ensonga z’amawulire mu Buganda, Owek. Noah Kiyimba yasabye abantu obutakoma kwegemesa kirwadde kya COVID-19 kuba ensi n’Obwakabaka okugenda mu maaso, abantu balina kubeera balamu.  Owek. Kiyimba era yajjukizza abantu ekirwadde kya Mukenenya engeri gye kikwatamu n’abasaba okukyerinda.  Abeetabye mu misinde gino badduse embiro okuli eza; 5km, 10km, 21km ne  42km.  Byo ebibalo okuva mu kitongole kya UNAIDS biraga nti abantu akakadde kamu n’emitwalo 40 (1.4m) be balina akawuka ka Mukenenya mu Uganda.

headline: Ssaabaminisita wa Bungereza senyiga wa kolona amuyodde
text: Ssaabaminisita wa Bungereza Boris Johnson  Ssaabaminisita w’eggwanga lya Bungereza Boris Johnson olwaleero ategeezezza ensi nti naye senyiga omukambwe owa Coronavirus amanyiddwa ennyo nga COVID-19 naye yabadde amuyodde.  Olwaleero, Johnson agambye nti eggulo yabadde ayokerera wamu n’okuba ne senyiga ekyareetedde omusawo we okumulagira yeekebeze.  Wabula ebyavudde mu kwekeebeza byalaze nti on yabadde ayooloddwa.  “Yadde nfunye ekirwadde kino, ngenda genda mumaaso nga nkulira gavumenti mu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa Coronavirus,” Johnson bweyagmbye. Ono wakubeera mu maka gw’obwa Ssabaminita ku 10 Downing Street mu kibuga ekikulu London nga ajjanjjabwa era singa kino kigaana, minisita avunanyizibwa ku nsonga z’amawanga amalala Dominic Raab, etteeka gwerikkiriza okuddira Jonson mu bigere.  Johnson si ye munene mu ggwanga lya Bungereza yekka asoose okuzuulibwa n’akawuka kano.  Ku ntandikwa ya wiiki eno, amawulire gaategeeza nti omulangira alindiridde okutwala entebe ya Bungereza, Charles naye alina kolona.  Ono naye abeera waka wajjamjjabibwa.

headline: Minisita Mayanja Nkalubo akunze abantu okwongera okugaba omusaayi
text: Minisita avunanyizibwa ku by’obulimi ne Bulungibwansi mu Buganda, Owek Hajjati Mayanja Nkalubo akubirizza bannayuganda okwenyigira mukugaba Omusaayi era kino bakikola mu nkola eya Bulungibwansi. Okwogera bino, Minisita Nkalubo abadde ku muzikiti e Wandegeya mu Kyaddondo mu nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi ku Lwokutaano. “Omulimu gw’okugaba omusaayi gwa Bulungibwansi era olwa leero ekyongedde okunywera mu bwongo bwaffe kwekutambulira awamu nokufaayo ku munno. Obubenje bwokka si bwebwetaaga omusaayi naye endwadde zonna kasita zinyinyitira mu mubiri zimalamu omusaayi,” Owek. Mayanja bw’ ategeezezza. Ono asabye abantu bulijjo okukwatira awamu ku nsonga eno kuba mu nsi yonna teriiyo kkolero lya musaayi kyokka nga buli lukya waliwo agwetaaga.  Minisita Nkalubo agamba nti singa abantu banavaayo okugaba omusaayi mu bungi ekizibu ky’okugutunda nakyo kisobola okukendeera. Amyuka Supreme Mufti wa Uganda Sheikh Ibrahim Itanda nga yabadde omugabi omukulu yeebazizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi olw’okusitula embeera y’ebyobulamu mu ggwanga. Ono agambye nti ekikolwa eky’okugaba Omusaayi kya bwa Katonda kubanga nemu biwandiiko ebitukuvu kyawandikibwako. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako abakulembeze abenjawulo era Olunaku olwenkya abavuuzi ba takisi mu ppaaka zonna eziri mu Kampala bebajja okugaba Omusaayi.

headline: Obwakabaka butongozza empaka z’okugaba omusaayi
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga buyita mu kitongole kya Kabaka Foundation butegese empaka z’okugaba omusaayi okwetooloola amasaza gonna aga Buganda okulwanyisa ebbula ly’omusaayi eriri mu ggwanga. Empaka zino zaatongozeddwa ku Lwokuna era zigenda kutandikira mu ssaza Buddu okuva nga 6 okutuusa nga 10 omwezi ogwa September. Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndagala agamba nti emiwendo gy’abeetaaga omusaayi mu malwaliro giri waggulu kyokka nga tebalaba we guva. “Blood Bank essaawa eno bw’otuukayo ng’oyagala musaayi, ekyamazima Katonda wa kutwalira kubanga tewali musaayi, tumaze ebbanga ng’abantu bali ku muggalo nga tewali agaba musaayi era kati embeera nzibu nnyo.” Omuk. Ndagala bw’ategeezezza. Okusinziira ku OmukunguNdagala, bamaze dda okusomesa abaami b’amasaza nga bayambibwako ekitongole kya Red Cross ne Uganda Blood Transfussion Services ne babalaga obukulu bw’okugaba omusaayi era mu Buddu bajja kumalayo ennaku ttaano era n’ebifo awagabira omusaayi bijja kubeera bitaano. Akwanaganya okugaba omusaayi mu kitongole kya Red Cross Namayanja Esther ategeezezza nga bwe basomeseza abaami banoku bantu abakkirizibwa okugaba omusaayiera ne balagirwa okuddayo mu bitundu byabwe basomese abantu be batwala ku nsonga eno. “Mu mulimu guno ogw’okukunga abantu ba Kabaka mu Buganda wonna, tulina bye tuteekwa okumanya n’okussaako essira, nti omuntu anaagaba omusaayi yafaanana atya.” Namayanja bw’agasseeko. Omumyuka wa Ppookino asooka Nalubowa Rose agambye nti abantu bangi abeetaaga omusaayi era n’akunga bannabuddu okujjumbira empaka zino, basobole okuzetikka.

headline: Obwakabaka bulaze ebibalo ku Mukenenya  mu Buganda
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bulaze ekitundu kino wekiyimiridde ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya nga kino kyeyongedde okweriisa enkuuli bwogerageranya nekiseera ekiyise. Ebiriwo biraga nti Mukenenya mu Buganda yeeyongedde n’obutundutundu 8.9, ku buli 100, so ng’ate abalwadde abali ku ddagala erya ARVs bawerera ddala 500,000. Okulambulula kuno kukoleddwa Minista w’Olukiiko; Amawulire; Kabineeti; Abagenyi, era Omwogezi w’Obwakabaka, Owek. Noah Kiyimba ku Lwokusatu mu lukungaana lwa Bannamawulire, olubadde ku Bulange. Minisita alaze a engeri obulwadde buno gye butawaanyizaamu ekitundu kya Buganda eby’enjawulo, ne bugootanya enkulaakulana n’okusaanyawo amaka mu mwaka ogwa 2021. Ebiriwo biraga nti Kalangala y’esinga okubamu abalwadde ba mukenenya n’obutundutundu 16% ku balwadde abali mu Buganda, nga baafuna abalwadde abapya 240 omwaka oguwedde. Kyotera y’eddirira n’obutundutundu 13%, nga yafuna abalwadde abapya 680; Masaka y’eddako awo n’obutundutundu 9.8%, nga baafuna abalwadde abapya 680; Kalungu n’eddako n’obutundutundu 9.7%, nga baafuna abalwadde abapya 310. Wakiso y’eddako n’obutundutundu 8.5, nga baafuna abalwadde abapya 6720; Lyantonde erina obutundutundu 8.2% nga yafuna abalwadde abapya 190. Kampala erina obutundutundu 8%, nga yafuna abapya 4170. Buikwe erina 7.8% n’abapya 840; Mitayana 7.4% n’abapya 570; Mpigi 7.3% n’abapya 420. Bukomansimbi 7.0% n’abapya 180; Kayunga 7% n’abapya 620; Luweero 6.6% n’abapya 810; Kiboga 6.6% n’abapya 250; Butambala 6.2% n’abapya 130; Ssembabule 5.8% n’abapya 340, so nga Rakai 5.5% n’abapya 300. Omuwendo gw’abalwadde okuba waggulu mu Buganda kivudde ku nsonga eziwerako omuli; okuba nga mwe musangibwa ekibuga ky’eggwanga ekikulu, Kampala, ekirimu abantu abasukka mu obukadde 12, ssaako n’ebibuga ebirala nga nabyo birimu abantu nkumu. Buganda y’ensingamu emirimu egy’enjawulo egikungaanya abantu abangi, so ng’ate era y’esinza ebizinga abavubi gye beegiriisiza n’okusaasaanya akawuka. Ensonga endala ezilinnyisizza omuwendo gw’abalwadde kuliko; obwavu; obutabanguko mu maka; obwenzi; obutaagala kukozesa bupiira; omuggalo gwa COVID; okunywa ebiragalalagala awamu n’omwenge. Obwakabaka bukubiriza abantu okwongera amaanyi mu kwekebeza mukenenya; okwewala okwegadanga mu bavubuka; okwekuumira ku babeezi bammwe; okukozesa obupiira; abakyala okujjumbira amalwaliro nga bali mbuto; okujjumbira eddala eriziyiza akawuka okusaasaana; abaami okutayirirwa ate n’abalwadde okujjumbira okukozesa eddala mu butuufu bw’alyo. Mu ngeri yeemu, Obwakabaka bukubiriza abantu okubudaabuda abalwadde baddemu essuubi; so nga n’abalabirira abaana abalina akawuka basaana okubaagala ennyo n’okubakuumira mu masomero.

headline: Byanyima ye mugenyi ow’enjawulo ku Misinde gy’Amazaalibwa ga Kabaka
text: Akulira ekitongole ekirwanyisa Siriimu mu nsi yonna era munnayuganda Winnie Byanyima, y’agenda okubeera omugenyi omukulu nga Beene asimbula emisinde gy’okujjukira amazaalibwa ge ag’omwaka 2020. Akakiiko akalondeddwa okutegeka emisinde gy’omulundi guno Ekyama kino kibikuddwa Omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro, Owek. Prof. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo, bw’abadde ayanjulira bannamawulire akakiiko akategesi ak’emisinde gino, leero ku Lwokuna mu Bulange e Mmengo. Owek. Kaawaase agambye nti, “Tuli mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya era ekibiina ky’ensi yonna ekya UNAIDS akikulira oba ssenkulu waakyo era Munnayuganda Winnie Byanyima, y’agenda okuba omugenyi omukulu.” Ono asabye abantu okujjumbira emisinde gino bwe banaabeera basobole, okwaniriza Ssenkulu wa UNAIDS, Byanyima mu kitiibwa ekisaanidde. Kaawaase annyonnyodde nti emisinde gy’omulundi guno, Omutanda yasiimye giddukirwe wansi w’omulamwa ‘Abaami tubeere abasaale mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya tutaase abaana ab’obuwala’ Olukiiko olulangiriddwa lukulira Owek. Kaawaase nga ye ssentebe waalwo, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe ye mumyuka ate Minisita Noah Kiyimba mukiise. Abalala kuliko; Omuk. Josephine Nankindu, Omuk. Zzaake, Omuk. Kawaddwa awamu n’abalala. Prof. Kaawaase agambye nti Beene yasalawo okusoosowaza ebyobulamu mu Uganda ne Buganda, y’ensonga lwaki Obwakabaka bwafunye engule ya ‘Heroes in Health Award 2020.’ Olw’okusukkuluma mu kulwanirira ebyobulamu. Agasseeko nti ku lunaku lwennyini abanaayingira mu Lubiri tebajja kusukka bantu 200 era nga bano bagenda kuweebwa ebbaluwa ezibayita okutandika n’olunaku lwa Mmande ya wiiki ejja. Ono asabye abantu okugula akajoozi ga 2020 basobole okwetaba mu misinde gino egigenda okuddukibwa mu ngeri ya Ssaayansi. Kinajjukirwa nti emisinde gino gyali gwakubaawo ku lunaku 13/ 04/ 2020 olw’amazaalibwa, naye ne kitasoboka olw’embeera y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona era ne kisalibwawo emisinde gino okuddukibwa mu ngeri ya Ssaayansi.

headline: Abayizi 3855 be bafunye embuto mu muggalo e Luweero
text: Luweero Abayizi 3855 be baakafuna embuto mu ttundutundu ly’e Luweero okuva Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni lwe yaggala amasomero ng’agezaako okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyali kitandise okulonda mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo.  Ettundutundu lya Luweero litwalira disitulikiti okuli; Luweero, Nakaseke ne Nakasongola naye ng’eno yonna abakugu bagamba nti omuze guno gususse.Ebibalo biraga nti abawala 3855 abali mu myaka egisoma, abasajja basedduvuto babafunyisa embuto mu bbanga ly’emyezi omukaaga gye babadde ku muggalo. Abatwala eby’abaana mu kitundu kino bategeezezza nti Luweero ekyakutte kisooka mu kubeeramu abayizi abafunye embuto ng’erina abawala 2082, Nakasongola erina 922 ate Nakaseke neddako n’abayizi 851.Kino kireeseewo obweraliikirivu nti wakati ng’abayizi abamalako emitendera egy’enjawulo baddamu okusoma, abamu mu kitundu kino bandiremwa okudda ku ssomero okutuukiriza ebirooto byabwe olw’okutya okusekererwa olw’okufuna embuto wamu n’abazadde okugaana okubazzaayo. Omuwandiisi w’akakiiko k’ebyenjigiriza mu Luweero, Zenar Nasur agambye nti bakizudde nti basedduvutto bakozesa akaseera abaana bano we balekebwa awaka bokka okubasendasenda nebabafunyisa embuto. Nasur agasseeko nti bye baazuula biraga ng’abaana abasinze okukosebwa beebo ababeera ne bajjajja awamu n’abeng’anda nga bano babawa eddembe erisusse. Abamu ku baana bano o be yasanze ku malwaliro ag’enjawulo nga banywa eddagala, baagaanye okubaako kye boogera ku nsonga eno wabula omu ku batuuze Joseph Mugabe alumiriza obuzibu okuva ku muze gw’okuganza abaana abataneetuuka ogususse mu kitundu kino. Akulira ebyenjigiriza mu disitulikiti y’e Nakaseke, Stephen Batanudde, asabye abayizi okudda ku ssomero bamalirize emisomo ne yeeyama nti gavumenti ejja kusobola okubawa obukuumi wabula n’alaga obweraliikirivu olw’okuba nti abamu ku baana bano baayingidde dda obufumbo. Omwaka oguwedde, abayizi 123 baalemererwa okutuula ebibuuzo ebimalako P.7 oluvannyuma lw’okufuna embuto mu kitundu kino era ng’akulira ensonga z’abaana e Nakasongola, Irene Ssanyu, alumiriza aba Boodabooda n’eng’anda okuvaako kalunsambulira ono. Maama Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda bwe yali ayogerako eri eggwanga ku lunaku lw’omwana omuwala, yasaba abantu bonna okusitukiramu bayambe ku baana abawala okutuukiriza ebirooto byabwe.  Nnaabagereka yalabula abasajja okukomya okuganza abayizi bano n’okubafiiriza ebiseera byabwe eby’omu maaso. Alipoota y’ekitongole ky’ebigezo mu ggwanga ekya Uganda National Examination Board (UNEB) eraga nti abayizi abawera obukadde 5 be baakalemererwa okumalako ekibiina kya P.7 mu myaka 20 agayise, ng’entabwe eva ku kufuna mbuto.

headline: Abamerika basiimye Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’engule
text: Ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa ku kukung’aanya omusaayi mu ggwanga lya Amerika ki International Divisions of America’s Blood Centre, kiwadde Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, engule olw’okulwanirira obulamu bw’abantu nga ayita mu kubakunga n’okukung’aanya omusaayi mu masaza ge ag’enjawulo. Engule eno ekwasiddwa Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndagala ku mukolo ogubadde mu ssaza lya Arizona mu Amerika eggulo ku Lwokusatu. Omuk. Kaggwa Ndagala yasinzidde wano neyeebaza Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okuvaayo n’enteekateeka ez’enjawulo eziyambye okutumbula eby’obulamu mu Buganda ne Uganda. Ono era asiimye bannamikago ab’enjawulo abayambyeko okuteeka ekiragiro kya Kabaka mu nkola era nawera nti Amasaza ga Nnyinimu gonna bakugatuukamu akadde konna. Ate abaami ba Kabaka abakulembera abaganda mu kitundu kino ekya Arizona nga bakulembeddwamu Owek. Samuel Kalulu ne batendereza Beene olw’okubeera omukulembeze alumirirwa abantu be. Mukiseera kino kawefube w’okugaba omusaayi yakatalaaga amasaza mukaaga okuli Kyadondo,Busiro,Kyagwe,Ssingo,Bulemeezi,Buddu era Yuniti z’omusaayi ezisoba mu 9 zakungaanyizibwa. Okusobola okutumbula enteekateeka eno, Omutanda yasiima essaza eribeera lisinze okukung’aanya omusaayi buli mwaka okuweebwa ekirabo ky’eddwaliro awamu n’engabo. Enteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi ekyataaga amasaza gono agakola obwakabaka bwa buganda okutaasa abantu bakabaka abaffa olw’ebbula ly’omusaayi.

headline: Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo akunze bavubuka okulwanyisa Mukenenya
text: Kampala Ssentebe w’olukiiko lw’abavubuka mu Buganda olwa Buganda Youth Council, Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo akunze abavubuka okuteeka ekiragiro kya Kabaka mu nkola eky’okubeera abasaale mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya. Ono agambye nti wadde ng’abavubuka basanyuka nnyo olwa Ssaabasajja okubakwasa omulembe gwe n’abasosoowaza ne mu kulwanyisa obulwadde bwa Mukenenya ng’abeetoololezaako omulamwa, singa abavubuka tebeenyigiramu mulimu gwabaweebwa, Omutanda ajja kuba nga yamenyekera bwereere. Bino Omuk. Ssejjengo abyogeredde mu Masengere nga alambulula ku nteekateeka z’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka ag’emyaka 66.  “Nsaba abavubuka bonna mu Buganda ne Uganda yonna okutwaliza awamu era n’abantu bonna okuba abasaale mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya kubanga ffenna kitukakatako.” Omuk. Ssejjengo bwe yategeezezza. Omuk. Ssejjengo era yakikkaatirizza nti singa abantu bajjumbira ekola z’okulwanyisa Mukenenya essatu omuli; okuba abeesimbu eri abaagalwa baabwe, okwekuuma naddala abo abatannaba kwetuuka wamu n’okukozesa obupiira, okufuna abalwadde ba Mukenenya abapya okusukka omwaka gwa 2030 kisobola okufuuka olufumo ng’ekigendererwa ky’ekitongole ky’ensi yonna bwekiri. Omuk. Baker Ssejjengo nga y’omu ku batuula ku kakiiko akategeka amazaalibwa ga Nnamunswa ag’omulundi guno, akubirizza abantu okwenyigira mu bikujjuko by’amazaalibwa ga  Kabaka ebyakulemberwamu okusabira Ccuucu mu masinzizo ag’enjawulo. Ku Lwomukaaga luno wagenda kubaawo okusaba mu Abadiventi wamu n’ebyoto mu masaza gonna okwetoloola Buganda. Okusinziira Ku mukungu Ssejjengo, ebyoto by’omulundi guno bigenda kukolebwa misana wakati w’essaawa 8 ne 12 okusobola okukuuma ekiragiro kya kafyu ekyateekebwawo omukulembeze w’eggwanga. Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi yasiima okubeera emmunyeenye y’ekitongole ky’amawanga amagatte mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya mu Africa era omulamwa gw’amazaalibwa ge ag’omulundi guno ogw’enkaaga mu omukaaga gugamba nti, “Abavubula tube basaale mu kulwanyisa Mukenenya.”

headline: Gavumenti esabiddwa okutereeza eby’obulamu eggwanga likulaakulane
text: Abakulira ekitongole ki Kabaka Foundation basabye gavumenti eyawakati okutereeza eby’obulamu mu ggwanga kiyambeko okukyuusa endowooza z’abantu ku kugaba omusaayi. Bino byogeddwa Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kino, Omuk. Eddy Kaggwa Ndagala bw’abadde akuliddemu okukung’aanya omusaayi mu ssaza lye Butambala mu ggombolola ya Musaale Budde. “Uganda tukyalina ebizibu bingi naye ebitutawaanya tetunakola nguudo, tetunakola ki naye embalirira yaffe esinga obunene egende nnyo mu by’obulamu kuba abantu bwebanaaba abalamu n’enkulaakulana ejja kwanguwa,” Omuk. Ndagala bw’agambye. Abantu bagijumbidde okuyambako ku bantu abagwetaaga nga enteekateeka eno ebadde ekulembeddwamu akulira ezikkiriza ya balokole mu Mpigi omusumba Godfrey kabugo akiikiriddwa Lwakatale Isaac. Omusumba Lwakatale yebaziiza obwakabaka olw’okuwoma omutwe mu nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi era n’akubiriza abantu okugaba omusaayi n’okwagala olwo lwebanafuna nabo obuyambi bwebaliba batuuse okugwetaaga. Akiikiridde Katambala Hajj Sulaiman Magala ye mumyuka wa Katambala Haji Lubega Manooti agambye nti okugaba musaayi kiba Kya bulungi bwabuli omu era n’asaba abantu okukitwala ng’e kikulu nnyo. Omukungu okuva mu kitongole ki Red Cross, Sarah Muteegombwa, yeebazizza abantu ba Kabaka abajjumbidde enteekateeka eno era nawera okumalawo ekizibu kino nga akolera wamu ne Buganda. Enteekateeka eno ekuliddwamu ekitongole ki Kabaka Foundation ne bannamikago okuli Uganda Red Cross Society awamu naba Uganda Blood Bank.

headline: Minisita Musenero bamutaddeko akakiiko kamunoonyerezeeko
text: Palamaenti etaddewo akakiikko ak’enjawulo okunoonyereza ku Minsita wa Ssaayansi ne Tekinologiya kanoonyereze ku Minisita Monica Musenero ku ngeri gavumenti gy’ezze emuwaamu ensimbi ez’okukola eddagala erigema Ssennyiga Corona mu bukyamu so nga tewali kyamaanyi kyakoleddwa. Kinajjukirwa nti okuva Ssennyiga corona lwe yalumba eggwanga,omukulembeze w’eggwanga azze ajuliza bannassaayansi ba kuno nga bwe bagenda okutandika okukola eddagala erigema Ssennyiga Corona n’ebirwadde ebirala, Uganda ekomye okulindanga abazungu. Ensimbi Pulezidenti Museveni yaziyisa mu kitongole kya ‘Presidential Initiative on Science and Innovation’ ekikulirwa Dr. Musenero era nga kiteereddwamu ensimbi ezisoba mu buwumbi 30 era nga gye buvuddeko bayongerwa obuwumbi 50 kyokka tewali kyamaanyi kye baali bakoze. Omubaka wa Ntungamo yategeezezza Palamenti nti wadde abakulu abakulirwa Dr. Musenero bafunye ssente z’omuwi w’omusolo eziwera, naye kirabika balya ndye kuba eggwanga teririna kye lyali lirabye. Musinguzi yannyonnyodde Palamenti nti Ssaababalirizi w’ebitabo bya gavumenti yatuuka n’okusaba Dr. Musenero ne ttiimu ye ensaasaanya ya ssente zino, naye tebaagimuwa kyokka nga bw’otunuulira n’obuyigirize bw’omuntu eyakwasibwa okukulemberamu omulimu guno, bwa munguuba. Embeera eno yawalirizza omumyuka wa Sipiika abadde mu mitambo gy’olukiiko luno okussaawo akakiiko ak’enjawulo okunoonyereza ku Dr. Musenero okulaba w’atuuse ku nteekateeka eno. Ababaka okuli; owa Bukoto Central, Richard Ssebamala n’owa Mawogola South, Gorreth Namugga baategeezezza nti enteekateeka nga zino zizze ziteekebwawo Pulezidenti Museveni naye ne zimaliriza nga zikoze kimu kya kulya ssente za bannayuganda nga tewali kikoleddwa.

headline: Omuloodi Lukwago akomyewo n’asaba gavumenti eyongere ssente mu by’obulamu
text: Kampala Omuloodi wa Kampala, Erias Lukwago, akomyewo mu ggwanga okuva mu ddwaliro lya Aga Khan mu kibuga Nairobi gya yali yagenda okujjanjabibwa. Omuloodi Lukwago nga ayanirizibwa Lukwago yatwalibwa e Nairobi omwezi oguwedde oluvannyuma lw’okujjanjabibwa ekirwadde kya Alaje omukambwe. Ono yatuuse mu maka ge e Wakaliga mu ttuntu lya leero era ne balomba edduwa olw’obulamu bwe. “Mpulira essanyu ninga azuukidde, kino kyongera kuva ku ntobo y’omutima gwange.” Lukwago alabise nga munafu bw’agambye. Lukwago annyonnyodde ebyo byayiseemu oluvannyuma lw’okukeberwa mu ddwaliro e Lubaga era ng’abadde awulira obuzibu mu kussa. Ono yakyalira abakugu mu by’okussa aba Ear Nose and Throat (ENT) era nga bano baamutegeeza nti ekizibu kya Aleja kino kiva ku kalifuuwa n’eddagala erinaabibwa mu ngalo okutta akawuka ka Ssennyiga Corona. Omuloodi Lukwago agamba nti oluvannyuma yatuukirira Dr. Kizza Besigye eyakolaganira awamu ne badokita abalala abaamulagirira omukugu w’amawuggwe gwe yalina okulaba. Embeera ya Lukwago yeeyongera okubeera obubi era n’atwalibwa mu ddwaliro lya Aga Khan era n’ateekebwa ku byuma okusobola okujjanjabwa era nga mu kiseera kino yali awulira bubi era ng’atya nti ayinza okufiirwa obulamu. Bwe yabadde e Aga Khan, Lukwago yajjanjabiddwa abakugu abakuliddwamu munnayuganda Prof. Godfrey Lule, ono ne banne baazudde nti emisuwa gya Lukwago gyabadde ginafuye era nga yabuzeeko katono omusaayi gwe okwetukuta. Lukwago yasinzidde ku bye yayiseemu n’asaba gavumenti eyongere okuteeka ssente mu by’obulamu kubanga ensonga lwaki abakugu tebaamulagirira kujjanjabwa wano lwa nsonga nti ebikozesebwa tebiriiwo. ono Kati ayagala gavumenti esse ekitiibwa mu ndagaano ya Abuja Declaration eragira ensi ez’enjawulo okuteeka waakiri ebitundu 15 ku buli 100 eby’embalirira mu by’obulamu. Ku butaka Lukwago ayaniriziddwa mmeeya wa Rubaga, Owek. Nabbosa Ssebuggwawo, omubaka Allan Ssewanyana, Omubaka Moses Kasibante, Omubaka Kato Lubwama n’abalala. Lukwago we yalwalira yali yaakamala okuyimiriza okunoonya akalulu k’Obwaloodimmeeya oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa kwa munnakibiina kya NUP, Robert Kyagulanyi era ng’ono yadde akomyewo nga tannaba kulangirira kuddamu kunoonya kalulu.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga atenderezza aba Wells of Life olw’okubunyisa amazzi amayonjo
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga atendereza ekitongole ki Wells of Life olw’okutuusa amazzi amayonjo ku bantu ba Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga bayita mu nteekateeka y’okusima Nayikondo. Okwebaza kuno, Owek. Mayiga akukoledde mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’ab’ekibiina ki ‘Wells Of Life’ ku Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri nebateesa ku ngeri ez’enjawulo gyebasobola okwongera okutumbula enkolagana wakati w’ekitongole n’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda . Owek. Mayiga agamba nti wadde Uganda erina ennyanja n’emigga bingi abantu mwebasobola okuggya amazzi amayonjo naye batawaanyizibwa nnyo n’ekizibu ky’okubunyisa amazzi kino bwatyo neyeebaza bannamikago bano olw’obuyambi buno. “Abagenyi bano bava mu kitongole ki Wells of Life naye omulimu gwabwe gwakunoonya nsimbi nebasima Nayikondo mu bitundu eby’enjawulo era mu Buganda twakasima Nayikondo eziwera 628 nga omwaka guno twakasima 21, oguwedde twasima 91 ate emabega ko 42, 2019Nayikondo 105 ate 2018 75,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza. Akuliddemu aba Wells of Life, Charlie Hedges, ategeezezza nti baasalawo okukolagana ne Buganda olw’obulambulukufu era nategeeza nti omwaka guno bagenda kusima Nayikondo 820 era baddaabirize Nayikondo 180 nga awamu ze Nayikondo lukumi lulamba mu Buganda okutuusa ku bantu ba Kabaka amazzi amayonjo. Hedges annyonnyodde nti amazzi kirabo ekyaweebwayo Katonda nga bo kyebakola kwekugezaako okugatuusa ku bantu abagetaaga era nakakasa nti bakwongera okutumbula obuyonjo mu bantu ba Kabaka nga bayita mu nteekateeka ez’enjawulo. Kinajjukirwa nti aba Wells of Life, batta omukago n’Obwakabaka okubunyisa amazzi mu byalo mu masaza ga Buganda 18 era wetwogerera kati enzizi za Nayikondo 628 zezaakasimibwa okwetoloola Buganda.

headline: Minisita Aceng asabye ab’ebyokwerinda okwongera amaanyi mu kukwasisa ebiragiro bya COVID-19
text: Minisita w’ebyobulamu, Dr. Jane Ruth Aceng, asabye ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda mu ggwanga okunyweza ebiragiro ebitangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Okusaba kuno, Minisita Aceng akukoze ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Lwokubiri wano mu Kampala. “Okukwasisa ebiragiro kulina okugobererwa obukiiko bwa disitulikiti obulwanyisa COVID-19. Bannansi basabiddwa okwambala obukookolo akadde konna nga bali mu lukale, bafube okulaba nga waliwo ebifo we banaabira engalo.” Aceng bw’annyonnyodde. Dr. Aceng ayagala ab’ebyokwerinda bakwatagane n’obukiiko obwateekebwawo okulwanyisa Ssennyiga Corona ku disitulikiti ez’enjawulo balabe ng’abantu bagobererera ebiragiro okuli okwambala masiki, okunaaba mu ngalo awamu n’okwewala okukung’aana. Ono agamba nti eno y’engeri yokka, bannansi gye basobola okulwanyisaamu ekirwadde kino ne bava ku muggalo. Minisita Aceng asabye bannabyabufuzi bakomye okukung’aanya abantu nga babagabira emmere kuba wadde emmere bagyetaaga naye ate kisobola okuvaako okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Aceng era ategeezezza nti gavumenti yalagidde ebitebe byayo mu mawanga g’ebweru okutandika okunoonya eddagala erisobola okugema ekirwadde kino, kiyambeko okwanguya kaweefube gavumenti gw’eriko ow’okulaba nga bannansi bagemebwa. Mu ngeri yeemu, Aceng ayambalidde abantu abaasudde ssanduuke y’abafu nga beemulugunya ku muteesiteesi omukulu owa Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, Dr. Diana Atwine, gwe bagamba nti akutte bubi ssente z’okulwanyisa ekirwadde kino ne zitakola kyaziweesaayo. Bano Aceng abasabye nti bwe baba baagala mbalirira n’ensaasaanya ya ssente ze baaweebwa, bagisabe mu kifo ky’okusuula ssanduuke z’abafu n’okusaba Atwine alekulire, kuba ebikolwa byabwe tebirina gwe bigenda kutiisatiisa. Bino we bijjidde ng’eggwanga lirindirira okwogera kwa Pulezidenti Museveni ku Lwomukaaga okulaba oba eggwanga linaggulwawo oluvannyuma lw’omuggalo ogw’ennaku 42 ogwalangirirwa gye buvuddeko.

headline: Owek. Lukwago asabye abayizi okwewala Mukenenya
text: Abayizi mu masomero ag’enjawulo basabiddwa okwekuuma ennyo ekirwadde ki Mukenenya ekisimbye ennyo amakanda mu bavubuka ensangi zino basobole okukuuma Obwakabaka. Okusaba kuno kukoleddwa Omukiise w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda, Owek. Rashid Lukwago bw’abadde yeetabye ku mukolo bannankobazambogo ku ssomero lya Kasule Memorial College e Wakiso kwebakyusiriza obukulembeze. Owek. Lukwago asabye ategeezezza abayizi bano nti bebayimiriddeko Buganda ey’enkya nga basaanye okutwala ensonga z’obulamu bwabwe nga nkulu nnyo okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Ono abakuutidde okukozesa obulungi ekibiina kya Nkobazambogo nga bakola emikwano emirungi eginaabayamba mu biseera byabwe eby’omumaaso. Ye Omukwanaganya wa Nkobazambogo muggwanga lyonna, Lubyayi Ibrahim Adrian ategeezeza nga okukyusa obukulembeze mu mirembe bwekiwa omukisa abalala nabo okuwereza eggwanga lyabwe era bw’atyo n’asaba bannazambogo bulijjo okutambulira mu kkubo lino. Ssentebe w’eggombolola ye Kakiri, Jackson Tebandeke ssentebe akubiriza abayizi okufaayo ennyo nga basoma ebitabo kubanga eno y’engeri yokka mwebayinza okuyita okulaba nga baza buganda ku ntikko. Ye ssentebe avuddeko Sitalon Mulunga asabye abalondeddwa okukola obuteebalira nga bawereeza kabaka waabwe n’abasaba obutakulembeza ssente Ku mukolo guno bannazambogo basanyusiza abagenyi baabwe nga bayita mu kutontoma n’okubibyamu. Oluvanyuma abakulembeze abagya bakubye ebirayiro nebakwasiibwa ebiwandiiko ebikakasa obukulembeze bwabwe wamu ne yafeesi mwebagenda okutandika okuwerereza

headline: Ab’e Kira batandise okulwanyisa Corona ku mikolo gy’okuziika
text: Kampala  Abakulembeze mu Munisipaali y’e Kira, batandise kaweefube w’okwongera okutangira ensaasaana y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona naddalaku mikolo egikung’aanya abantu abangi omuli okuziika. Omu ku batuula ku kakiiko akalwanyisa Corona mu Kira, Lubega Hussein, ategeezezza nti ekiseera kituuse abantu bafunirwe ebyambalo ebikozesebwa okuziika abafudde Corona, kiyambe okutangira obulwadde buno era n’okukendeeza ku ssente obulindo ezisasulwa kkampuni eziziika ababeera bafudde Corona. Okwogera bino Lubega asinzidde ku Kampala bw’abadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire ku kituufu ekirina okukolebwa okwewala ekirwadde kino. “Tulina eggombolola 3 mu Kira era twagala buli ggombolola efune ebyambalo by’okuziika 10 bannannyini bafu batandike okweziikira abantu. Kino kijja kuluma aba kkampuni eziziika naye tewali kyakukola kubanga abantu baffe abasinga tebalina busobozi bwa ssente zisabibwa okuziika abaagalwa baabwe abafudde Corona olwo abaavu ne basalawookubakweka ne babeezikira.” Lubega bw’agambye. Lubega annyonnyola nti ebyambalo bino bisobola bulungi okwozebwa mu ddagala nga Jik buli lwe bimala okwozebwa era n’asaba ababaka ba Palamenti okwenyigira mu nteekateeka eno, bayambeko abatuuze baabwe. Ono asabye bassentebe b’ebyalo bafeeyo mu kutumbula enteekateeka y’ebyambalo nga bazuula abafudde Corona ate ne bakakasa nti okuziika kugoberera emitendera emituufu. Lubega agamba nti basazeewo okulwanyisa Corona nga basomesa abantu ku byalo ebyenjawulo ku ngeri gye bayinza okwetangira ekirwadde kino n’engeri gye basobola okulwanyisaamu obulwadde buno.

headline: Emisinde gya Kabaka 2020 gitongozeddwa n’omulamwa gwa kulwanyisa siriimu
text: Emisinde mubuna byalo, egitegekebwa buli mwaka okujaguza amazaalibwa ga Ssabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi, gitongozeddwa olwaleero mu Bulange. Omulamwa gw’emisinde gino guli, “Abasajja tulwanyise mukenenya tutaase abaana ab’obuwala”. Ng’atongoza emisinde gino ku Mbuga enkulu e Bulange Mmengo, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yagambye nti Kabaka afaayo nnyo kubulamu bw’abantube, kyava akola buli kisaanidde okulaba nga babeera balamu. “Bwetwatandika emisinde gino twali mu lutalo lwa kulwanyisa okuttonya mu bakyala (Fistula) naddala abawala abato abataneetuuka. Kaweefube twamumalako emyaka esatu ppaka 2016, era twawaayo obukadde 270. Mu 2017 obwanga twabutunuuliza Nalubiri era obukadde 550 twabuwaayo okumala emyaka esatu,”Mayiga bweyagambye. Ku mulundi guno, Kamalabyonna yagambye Ssabasajja yasiimye essira lissibwe ku mukenenya kubanga okunoonyereza kulaga nti akyegiriisa nnyo naddala wano mu Buganda. Abantu 1000 bakwatibwa ate abalala 500 bafa siriimu buli wiiki mu Uganda yonna. Ssabasajja yalondebwa okukwata omumuli gw’okulwanyisa siriimu naddala mubaami ku lukalu lwa Africa. Katikkiro yategeezezza nti emirundi egisinga obungi, abasajja beebasinga okusasanya akuwuka. “Mwemukwana abawala, naye ekyo bwekiggwa, bwemutuuka mukisenge ebintu bitambulira mumikono gyammwe. N’olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abasajja okutaasa obulamu bwa bakyala bammwe n’abaana,” Mayiga bweyakubirizza. Mu kukuza amazaalibwa ga Ssabasajja, Mayiga yagambye nti guno gwegumu kumikolo emikulu ennyo mu Buganda kubanga obulamu katonda bwawa Kabaka bunyweza ennono n’obuwangwa bwa Baganda. “Kabaka kyekitikkiro ky’ebyo ebitufuula eggwanga erimu. Buli mwaka oguyitawo, Ssabasajja Kabaka tumukulisa ng’omuntu ate n’Obuganda bujaguza kubanga ng’omulembe Omutebi gubeera gwongera okugundiira,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Yagaseeko nti emisinde mubuna byalo yeemu kungeri Obuganda gyebujaguzaamu olw’obulamu Katonda bwaba awadde Kabaka. “Twagala emitwalo mukaaga omwaka guno era twagala gibeere emisinde egisinga okudddukibwa ku lukalu lwa Africa,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Ate yye, akulira ekitongole kya UNAIDS mu Uganda Dr Karusa Kiragu yategeezezza nti Kabaka akoze omulimu gwamanyi nga ambasada w’okulwanyisa siriimu. “Tulina abantu bangi omuli ba pulezidenti n’ebakyala baabwe, abayimbi n’abantu abalala bangi naye Kabaka wa Buganda bonna abakubya ssubi mukukuliramu kaweefube w’okulwanyisa siriimu,” Kiragu bweyagambye. Yasanyukidde omukago gwebagenzeemu ne Airtel nagamba nti alina essuubi nti siriimu wakutuulwa ku nfeete. Kululwe, VG Somasekhar, akulira Airtel mu Uganda yagambye nti tebali muggwanga kuweereza bantu mubyampuliziganya kyokka, wabula n’okuyamba abantu okumanyagana n’okutumbula eby’obuwangwa byabwe. “Ebyempuliziganya tubyetaaga okutumbula embeera z’abantu. Tulina okufuba okulaba nti nga bwetutumbula tekinologiya, tetuteekeddwa kusanyawo mpisa n’abulombolombo bw’abantu,” Somasekharbweyagambye.

headline: Ssennyiga Corona : Ekitebe kya poliisi e Naguru kiggaddwa
text: Kampala Ekitebe kya poliisi mu ggwanga ne ‘ National Security Command Centre’ e Naguru biggaddwa olw’ekirwadde ki COVID-19. Ekitebe kya Poliisi e Naguru ekiggaddwa olwa COVID-19 Omwogezi wa Poliisi mu Ggwanga Fred Ennanga, yategeezezza nti wofiisi zino zonna ziggadwa olw’okweyongera kw’ekirwadde ki COVID-19 mu Kampala n’emirilaano nga n’omuwendo gw’ abaakafa gweyongedde. “Ekitebe tukiggaddewo okumala ennaku ssatu. Tukikoze okusobozesa okufuuyira ekifo kino, okusala ku muwendo gw’abantu wamu n’okukebera abakozi bonna,” Ennanga bweyagambye. Ennanga yanyonyodde nga kaweefube ono bwatandise ku Mmande era nti bakukebera abapoliisi bonna ku kitebe n’abakugu abakola ku kkamera za CCTV. Ku ky’okukebera abapoliisi bonna mu Ggwanga, Enanga yagambye nti bakolaganira wamu ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu okugenda maaso n’okukebera abamu ku bapoliiisi bano. Ennanga yakakasizza nga abapoliisi abasinga naddala abakolera mu kitundu kya Kampala n’emirilaano wamu naabo abali e Isingiro, Jinja ne Masindi. Kitegeerekese nti waliwo enteekateeka y’okufuuyira poliisi zonna 1600 eziri mu Ggwanga n’eddagala eritta akawuka . Kino Ennanga agamba nti bakyakyetegereza kubanga kyetaaga ssente nnyingi.

headline: Katikkiro atongozza Ebitabo
text: Katikkiro nga akutte Ekitabo Omuzadde n’Omwana ekimu ku bitabo ebyattongozeddwa. Katikkiro atongozza ebitabo “Omuzadde n’Omwana, ne “Raising Great Children”, ebyawandiikibwa Afande Emiliano Kayima era nga ono yaliko Omwogezi wa Police ya Uganda.
