Katikkiro asabye abazadde okulambika abaana byebasaanye okukola awamu n’ebyo byebatasaanye kukola, bwebasobya babonerezebwe ate bwebakola obulungi babayozeyoze. Era wano Katikkiro asabye abazadde okukuza abaana n’obuntubulamu kibasobozese okufuuka aboomugaso eri eggwanga.  Omusumba Jjumba ow’e Masaka naye abaddako ku mukolo. Ebitabo bino bitongozeddwa wali ku woteri ya Africana mu Kampala.

headline: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda butegese okugaba omusaayi
text: Abantu bajjumbidde okugaba omusaayi ku Bulange Abamu ku bantu abenyigidde mu kugaba omusaayi mu bimuli bya Bulange Okugaba omusaayi kuno kwategekeddwa Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga buyita mu kitongole kyabwo ekya Kabaka Foundation nga bakolera wamu ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu mu bwa Kabaka bwa Buganda era nga kwakumala enaku bbiri.  Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka era Minisita w’eby’emirimu n’obuyiiya, Prof Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, wamu n’omulangira Cryspin Jjunju Kiwewa, bakulembeddemu abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka okugaba omusaayi mu nteekateeka egenda mu maaso ku Bulange eyennaku ebbiri. Omumyuka wa Katikkiro asooka Hajji Twaha Kawaase nga agaba omusaayi.Omulangira Cryspin Jjunju Kiweewa nga agaba omusaayi. Owek Kaawaase asabye abantu ba Kabaka awamu ne banna Ugnanda bonna okujjumbira enteekateeka eno kubanga endwadde nnyingi eziruma abantu nga neezimu kwezo zetaaga omusaayi oguwerako. Omulangira Cryspin Jjunju ategeezezza nti buvunaanyizibwa bwa buli muntu okufaayo okulwanirira obulamu bwabo abali  mu bwetaavu naddala abalwadde. Okusinziira ku ba National Blood Bank, eggwanga lyetaaga unit z’omusaayi ezisukka mu mitwalo asatu mwetaano (350,000), n’olwekyo obwetaavu bw’omusaayi bwamaanyi okusobola okutaasa obulamu bw’abantu.

headline: Nnaabagereka akunze abantu  okugaba omusaayi kitaase obulamu
text: Nnaabagereka wa Buganda,Maama Sylvia Nagginda, akunze abantu okuwaayo omusaayi kiyambeko okutaasa obulamu bw’abo abagwetaaga mu kiseera kino ng’eggwanga lyakava ku muggalo. Okusaba kuno Nnaabagereka akukoledde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atongoza enteekateeka y’empaka z’okukung’aanyaomusaayi okuva mu masaza ga Buganda okwang’anga ebbula ly’omusaayi eriri mu ggwanga. “Obwakabaka bwa Buganda nga buyita mu Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, tugenda kukuba ensiisira mu masaza ga Buganda ag’enjawulo tusobole okukung’aanya omusaayi okudduukirira bannaffe abagwetaaga. Nga tukoledde wamu tusobola okukung’aanya omusaayi ebitundu 80 ku buli 100 eby’omusaayi ogwetaagibwa. Obwetaavu bw’omusaayi mu malwaliro weebuli bwamaanyi wadde ng’omusaayi gubadde gukung’aanyizibwa aba Kabaka Foundation nga beegasse wamu n’abaRedcross wamu n’ebitongole ebirala.” Nnaabagereka Nagginda bw’ategeezezza. Nnaabagereka Nagginda agambye nti wadde ebitongole bino bibadde bikola omulimu guno emirundi egiwera naye obwetaavu bukyali bwamaanyi. Ono asabye abantu ssekinnoomu okujjumbira enteekateeka eno kuba enkya basobola okubeera abamu ku bagwetaaga okutaasa obulamu. Okusinziira ku Nnaabagereka enteekateeka eno ejja kuyamba nnyo okukendeeza ku bungi bw’omusaayi obwetaagibwa era ekendeeze n’omuwendo gw’abantu abafa olw’ebbula ly’omusaayi. Nnaabagereka asabye abantu bonna gye bali okwegatta mu nteekateeka eno era ne yeebaza ebitongole eby’enjawulo okuli; Redcross, Mengo Hospital ne Kabaka Foundation olw’omulimu amakula gwe bakola okukung’aanya omusaayi. Mu ngeri yeemu asabye abantu okusigala ku bwerinde ku kirwadde kya ssennyiga Corona ekikyalemedde mu bantu n’abasaba okwongera okufaayo ku biragiro ebitangira ekirwadde kino. Abakuutidde okusigala nga balya bulungi naddala nga bettanira emmere nnasangwa kuba eno ejja kubakuuma nga balamu era ebongere okufuna omusaayi. Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation, Omukungu Kaggwa Ndagala ategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima n’abasindika mu lutabaalo luno okusobola okutaasa bamaama abafiira mu malwaliro nga bazaala. Omuk. Ndagala agamba nti okusingaomusaayi babadde baguggya mu baana b’amasomero naye kati giweze emyaka 2 nga tebafuna musaayi guno olw’ensonga nti abaana bano baasindikibwa awaka oluvannyuma lw’amasomero okuggalwa olw’ekirwadde kya ssennyiga Corona. Omwogezi w’ekitongole kya Red Cross Irene Nakasiita, ategeezezza nti bakwatagana n’ekitongole kya Kabaka Foundation ne banoonya omusaayi nga bakikola emirundi 2 buli mwaka. Ono era agamba nti enteekateeka y’okugenda mu masaza etuukidde mu kiseera kituufu kuba eggwanga libadde ku muggalo.

headline: KITALO! Nanyini MTK Francis Kitaka afudde ﻿
text: Kampala Musajja wa Kabaka era Munnamakolero Francis Xavier Kitaka afudde. Francis  Xavier Kitaka                        Ono ye mutandisi wa kkampuni ya MTK ekola eddagala ly’ebisolo  ku Nasser Road era awamu ne Quality Chemicals Limited ekola eddagala eriwewezza ku kawuka akaleeta Mukenenya n’eddagala eddala. Kitegeerekese nga Kitaka afiiridde mu ddwaliro e Mulago gyeyabadde atwaliddwa okujjanjabwa, era waviridde mu bulamu bwensi nga aweza emyaka 85. Kitaka abadde munnasayansi omukugu mukutabula eddagala ely’ebisolo wamu nelya bantu era nga yomu ku bannayuganda abatono abasooka okufuna obukugu buno. Abantu ne Kkampuni mu biti eby’enjawulo okuli; Victory University ne Ekeleziya ya Kiwamirembe Martyrs Shrine e Kajjansi baweereza obubaka obusaasira ab’enju y’omugenzi. Mu budde buno ab’enju tebanaba kufulumya mawulire matongole ku nfa n’enteekateeka y’okukungubagira omugenzi. Ebisingawo ku ggulire lino tubireeta  Gutusinze nnyo Ayi Ssaabasajja Kabaka

headline: Katikkiro Asiimye Abaweereza Wakati Mu Kirwadde Kya Coronavirus
text: Ng’eggwanga likyagenda mu maaso okuba ku muggalo olw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus, Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asiimye abakozi abakyaweereza wakati mu kusoomoozebwa kuno. Mu bubakabwe eri abaweereza mu Bwakabaka ku lunaku ensi yonna lwejaguza olunaku lw’abakozi, Mayiga agambye nti newankubadde kyetaagisa okusiima buli mukozi, naye abo abakyali ku mirimu banywedde mu banne akendo. “Neebaza nnyo abaweereza b’Obwabakabaka; abaami ku mitendera gyonna, ba Ssenkulu ne Bannankulu b’ebitongole, wamu n’amakapuni ga Buganda wamu n’abakozi ku mitendera egy’enjawulo abafaayo ennyo okulaba nga Buganda edda ku ntikko,” Mayiga bweyagambye. “Neebazaamu akeensusso abakozi baffe abali ku mirimu mukaaseera ka senyiga wa colona omuli abaweereza ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka mu mbiri, ab’ebyokwerinda, abagoba b’ebidduka, bannamawulire, n’abalala abataweddemu ssuubi mu kabi kano ketulimu,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Yabasabye bonna okwekuuma obulungi basobole okusigaza obulamu obulungi wamu n’abantu baabwe basobole okudda ku mirimu egizimba eggwanga Buganda ne Uganda. Ekirwadde kya senyiga wa coronavirus bw’osomera bino nga kyakawata bantu 81 mu Uganda kyokka nga ku bano abawonye bali 47. Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni asuubirwa okwogerako eri eggwanga ssabbiiti ejja mwanaweera ebiragiro ebipya ku butya eggwanga bwerigend mu maaso.

headline: Katikkiro akyalidddeko aba Joint Clinical Research Center.
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda alambudde amaka amaggya aga Joint Clinical research center e Lubowa. Alambudde laboratory wamu n’ebyuma eby’enjawulo ebikozesebwa mu kukebera obulwadde bwa Nalubiri ne mukenenya. Katikkiro Mayiga nga ali n’abasawo ba Joint Clicinal Research Center. Mu kwogera kwe, agambye nti “obulwadde bwa mukenenya bwazza nnyo Uganda emabega era yeebazizza JCRC ekoze omulimu mu kunoonyereza n’okulwanyisa akawuka ka mukenenya, ebizuuliddwa mu kunoonyereza JCRC kwekoze bikoze kinene nnyo mu kutaasa obulamu bwabantu mu Uganda ne mu nsi yonna.  Agasseeko nti JCRC nkulu nnyo mu Uganda kumpi buli muntu akoseddwa akawuka ka mukenenya, oba afiiriddwa abantu be, alwazizza abantu be, oba ye yennyini ye mulwadde. N’olwekyo abakola mu kunoonyereza ku kawuka ka mukenenya bebazira baffe betulinawo betusaana okutendereza kubanga omuntu afa ku bulamu bwo abeera mukwano gwo asooka.” Minisita w’Obwakabaka ow’enkulaakulana y’abantu era avunaanyizibwa ku by’obulamu, Dr. Prosperous Nankindu ategeezezza nti obwakabaka nga buyita mu Ssaabasajja Kabaka bukyagenda mu maaso okukubiriza abantu naddala abaami okwekebeza akawuka ka mukenenya nga ne ku mulundi guno ku mpaka z’amasaza ez’akamalirizo mu kisaawe e Namboole wajja kubeerawo enteekateeka ey’enjawulo okutuusa obubaka eri bannabyamizannyo abanaaba bazze okuwagira Amasaza gaabwe.  Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako; omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda Owek Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule, Minisita webyobulamu eyawummula, Dr. Ben Mukwaya, Kaggo, n’abaami ba Kabaka ku mitendera egy’enjawulo era nga gubadde mu maka ga Joint Clinical Research Center amaggya e Lubowa ku luguudo lw’Entebbe.

headline: COVID-19: Museveni aweze entambula y’olukale
text: Omukulembeze eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni   Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni aweze entambula y’olukale yonna mu ggwanga okusobola okulemesa okusaasaana kw’ekirwadde kya COVID-19.  Museveni abadde ayogerako eri eggwanga agambye nti entambula y’okukale omuli takisi, baasi, boda boda eggali y’omukka byabulabe nnyo eri abantu kubanga bigatta abantu abatemanyi.  Museveni agambye anti emmotoka zokka ezigenda okukirizibwa zeezo ezitambuza emmere, ebyamaguzi, emmotoka ezitwala abalwadde, emmotoka z’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda wamu nezimu ku mmotoka za gavumenti. “Emmotoka zokka ezikkirizibwa zeezo ez’obwannayini naye nga nazo teziteekeddwa kusussa bantu basatu okuli ne dereeva,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Mu birala era Museveni agambye okuva nereero, abasuubuzi mu butale abatatunda byakulya nabo bawereddwa. Museveni agambye newankubadde ng’obutale bubadde bugezezzaako okukuuma obuyonjo n’gokunaaba mungalo bulina abantu bangi. “Musigale ewaka mmwe abatatunda mmere kubanga twagala kukeendeeza mujjuzo mu butale,” Museveni bweyagambye. Omukulembeze w’eggwanga era yategeezezza nti woofiisi za gavumenti zonna eziteetaagisa nnyo nazo zaakuggalwa okujjako abantu abo bokka abeetaagisa ennyo. Mu baayogeddeko kuliko ekitongole ekiwooza ky’emisolo ekya Uganda Revenue Authority. “Ebyamaguzi bikyajja mu Uganda twagala abantu abanaakola ku bantu bano wamu n’okukungaanya emisolo,” Museveni bweyagambye.  Olwaleero abantu abalala bataano balangiriddwa nti bakwatiddwa ekiradde kya Coronavirus.  Abataano bawezezza omuwendo gw’abantu 14 kati abalina COVID-19.

headline: Sipiika asabye abakiise okubunyisa enjiri y’okwetangiramu Ekirwadde kya COVID-19
text: Omukubiriza w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda asabye abakiise b’olukiiko okusaasaanya engiri ku kwetangira Coronavirus eri abantu ba Kabaka. Oweek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule agambye abakiise b’olukiiko balina okugamba abantu biki byebalina okukola okwetangira ekirwadde kya Coronavirus. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka ayagala abantu abalamu kubanga amanyi g’eggwanga gabeera mu bantu abalamu,” Mugumbule bweyagambye. Agambye nti buvunaanyizibwa bw’abaami ba Kabaka okubeera abasaale mu kulwanyisa ekirwadde kino okusobola okukuuma abantu ba Beene nga balamu. Asabye abakiise okwekuuma era beewale okukyala wamu n’okukyaza abantu kubanga kino kiyinza okuviirako okusika obulwadde buno engeri gyebusaasaanyizibwa mu mpewo. Agasseeko nti Olukiiko lwa Buganda olwayimiriziddwa lubadde lwa njawulo kubanga obukiiko bw’olukiiko obw’enjawulo bubadde bugenda kwanjula enteekateeka zaabwo. Mu ngeri yeemu, Oweek Mugumbule akubirizza abazadde okufaayo ennyo ku Baana baabwe obutatambulatambula era bwekiba kisoboka babafunire ebintu ebiyinza okubakuumira awaka baleme kuwuubaala.

headline: Obwakabaka buzzeemu okugema abantu COVID-19
text: Obwakabaka buzzeemu okugema abantu ekirwadde kya  Ssennyiga Corona okusobola okukuuma abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II nga balamu ng’enteekateeka eno eyindidde mu bimuli bya Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokutaano nga yaakumala ennaku bbiri nnamba.  Enteekateeka eno etongezeddwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga agemeddwa akayiso ke akookusatu nga kano ke kongera obukuumi mu mubiri eri abo abagemebwa emirundi ebiri ate nga bali waggulu w’emyaka 50.  Mukuumaddamula Mayiga asinzidde wano n’akunga abantu  okusoosowazanga ebyobulamu nga bettanira buli nteekateeka ezireetebwa  basobole okwekuuma nga balamu olwo basobole okutumbula embeera zaabwe era bakulaakulane.  “Tulina  enjawulo nnene nnyo wakati w’omuntu n’ekisolo. Ekisolo ky’okutale kiri ku bwakatonda ffe abantu tulina okutegeera ekituufu ekituyamba okutereeza obulamu bwaffe. Era nze ndowooza omuntu bwalagajjala nafa Katonda ajja kumubuuza. Lwaki mugendera ku bibooziboozi nga Ssaabasajja asise omukono gw’ekkanzu ne bamukuba empiso nga mulaba, Nnaabagereka ne Katikkiro ne bakola kye kimu ggwe n’olowooza nti b’onywa nabo amalwa be basinga okutegeera!” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’abuuzizza.  Katikkiro era awadde bannayuganda amagezi okukomya okutwalibwa amawulire amafu ku by’obulamu wabula beebuuze abasawo abakugu okunnyonnyoka.  Minisita w’ebyobulamu mu Buganda, Owek. Dr. Prosperous Nankindu Kavuma ategeezezza nti abantu ba Kabaka bazze mu bungi nga tewali abawaliriza era ne yeebaza Obwakabaka olw’enteekateeka eno.  Ye akulira emirimu ku ddwaliro e Mmengo Godfrey Ssemanda  akkaatirizza obukulu bw’okwegemesa era n’alambika ku ddoozi ya ‘Booster’ egemebwa eri abantu abakuze mu myaka era n’akakasa nti eddagala lino teririna bulabe nga bwe byogerwa.  Ate ye akulira ebyobulamu mu kitongole KCCA mu divizoni, Dr. Dennis Buluma  yeebazizza Obwakabaka olw’amaanyi n’etoffaali bwe liteeka mu kutumbula ebyobulamu by’abantu era n’asaba abantu okwenyigira mu nteekateeka zino kubanga zaakubayamba.  Abamu ku bagemeddwa beebazizza Ssaabasajja okufaayo ku bantu ba bulijjo era ne bakubiriza n’abantu abalala okukozesa omukisa oguleeteddwa bakuume obulamu.  Okugema Ssennyiga corona wano mu bulange  kwakumala ennaku bbiri nga kutandise leero olwo kukomekkerezebwe enkya ku Lwomukaaga.

headline: Biibino ebiragiro ebikambwe Museveni bye yayisizza ku Corona
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ayisizza ebiragiro ebikambwe era n’abaako ebintu ebyenjawulo by’aggadde okusobola okutangira ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Bino we bijjidde ng’omuwendo gy’abafudde Ssennyiga Corona gulinnya buli lunaku. Eggulo ku Ssande abakwatiddwa ekirwadde kino batuuse ku bantu 1,200 be bafunise ng’abasinga ku bano bavubuka. Kino kyawalirizza Pulezidenti Museveni okunyweza mu biragiro ng’agamba nti bannayuganda basusse obutafaayo n’okulagajjalira ekirwadde kino ekikambwe. Mu kwogerako eri eggwanga olunaku lw’eggulo, Pulezidenti Tibuhaburwa Museveni yalagidde amasomero gonna gaggalewo ku mitendera gyonna okutuuka ku yunivaasite. Amasomero n’amatendekero aga waggulu gagenda kuggalwa okumala ennaku 42, era bwe ganaaba gakuddamu abasomesa bonna baakusooka kugemebwa. Museveni alabudde abo bonna abaneesisigiriza ne bagaana okugemebwa nti tebajja kukkirizibwa kulinnya mu kibiina. Bino we bijjidde ng’abayizi abamu babadde bagenda kuddayo buzzi okuli abali mu bibiina ebya wansi okuli aba P1 okutuuka mu P3. Ono era alagidde abayizi batandike okuggyibwa ku masomero nga bano era okusobozesa kino takisi zikkirizibwa okubatambuza okutuuka nga June 10. Oluvannyuma zijja kukolera munda mu disitulikiti zino awatali kusala kugenda mu ndala. Kino nakyo kigenda kukola okumala ennaku 42, ate nga mu mbeera yeemu n’amasinzizo gaggadde. Emmotoka ezisaabaza ebyamaguzi zigenda kusigala nga zikola, wabula ziteekeddwa okubeeramu abantu 2 bokka era zo zaakukkirizibwa okutambula okuva mu disitulikiti emu okudda mu ndala. Omukulembeze era ayongedde okukakasa nti bagenda kulwanyisa obumenyi bw’amateeka bwonna. Museveni okunyweza kino agamba nti abapoliisi ba tulafiki balina okuweebwa emmundu okusobola okukwata obulungi abanaamenya ebiragiro. Kino wabula tayogedde kigenda kutandika ddi okukola. Kati mu ngeri yeemu, alagidde akulira ekitongole kya bambega, Grace Akullo, okunnyonnyola eggwanga okunoonyereza kwabwe we kutuuse ku butemu obwenjawulo obuzze bukolebwa ku bantu abagundiivu mu ggwanga. Mu birala, enkung’aana zonna okuli emikolo, embaga n’ebirala byakugenda mu maaso wabula nga kuliko abantu 20 bokka era nakino kyakumala ennaku 42. Ate amasiga ga gavumenti, gaakusigala nga gakola nga muno mulimu; olukiiko lwa baminisita, Palamenti n’essiga eddamuzi. Bwo obudde bwa kafyu busigadde ku ssaawa 3 ez’ekiro okutuukira ddala ku 11 n’ekitundu ng’obudde bukya ate nga boodabooda ziteekeddwa okukoma okukola ku ssaawa 12, ez’akawungeezi. Okusinziira ku biragiro, obutale bw’omubuulo buyimiriziddwa wabula bwo obw’emmere bwakusigala nga bukola, alabudde nti abanaamenya ebiragiro baakuwa engassi. Ebiragiro ebiyisiddwa; 1.Amasomero gaggaddwa ennaku 42 2. Amasinzizo gaggaddwa ennaku 42 3. Embaga zikkiriziddwako abantu 20 bokka. 4. Okuziika kukkiriziddwako abantu 20 5. Obutale bw’omubuulo buggaddwa 6. Entambula z’olukale zigaaniddwa okusala mu disitulikiti. 7. Entambula ezikkiriziddwa za munda mu disitulikiti mwokka. 8. Emmotoka ez’obuyonjo zikkiriziddwamu abantu 3. 9. Entambula ezisala mu disitulikiti ziwereddwa. 10. Ebizimbe by’obusuubuzi birabuddwa. 11. Ebbaala zisigadde ku muggalo. 12. Amakolero gakkiriziddwa okusigala nga gakola. 13. Abazimbi bakkiriziddwa okusigala nga bakola. 14. Aba boodabooda bakkiriziddwa okusaabaza omuntu omu 15. Abamenya ebiragiro bagenda kutaanzibwa ssente.

headline: Ebola : Abamakomera baweze eby’okukyaalira abasibe
text: Akulira ekitongole ky’ Amakomera mu ggwanga, Johnson Byabashaija ayimirizza mbagirawo abagenyi okukyalira abasibe mu makomera ng’omu ku kaweefube w’okwewala okusaasaanya ekirwadde kya Ebola ekitadde eggwanga ku bunkenke. Mu kiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa olwa eri abakulira amakomera wonna mu ggwanga agamba nti mukiseera kino okukkiriza abagenyi okukyalira abasibe kibeera kyabulabe nga bwekityo balina okulindako okutuusa ng’ embeera eteredde. Byabashaija ategeezezza nti abasibe bonna kati bakujanjabirwa mu malwaliro g’amakomera gokka okutuusa ng’ Ebola aweddewo mu ggwanga. Ono era alagidde abasirikale b’amakomera okubeera nga bambadde masiki obudde bwonna. Okusinziira ku Byabashaija bagenda kuteekawo ekifo eky’enjawulo, abasirikale n’abasibe abakomawo okuva mu kkooti webalina okusooka okufuuyirwa eddagala eritta akawuka ka Ebola nga tebanakkirizibwa kuyingira munda mu makomera. Ekiwandiiko ekiriko omukono gw’ omwogezi w’ekitongole kino, Frank Baine, kiraga nti ebiragiro bya Kamisona Genero bitandikiddewo, nga bigendereredde okuziyiza Ebola okusaasaana mu makomera. Bino webijjidde nga ekitundu kya Masaka kyafunye omuntu asookedde ddala okufa ekirwadde ky’Ebola era abakulu mukitundu kino nebalabula abantu okusigala okulindaala ku kirwadde kino. Mu kiseera kino aba Minisitule y’ebyobulamu ekyekennenya embeera bweyimiridde, okusalawo ekiddako ku muggalo gwe nnaku 21, President Museveni gweyateeka e Mubende ne Kassanda ewasookera Ebola.

headline: Eddwaliro lye Mmengo lisiimye Obwakabaka olw’okuliyambako okutumbula empeereza
text: Eddwaliro lya Mengo Hospital lisiimye Obwakabaka bwa Buganda awamu n’ebitongole byabwo olw’okuliyambako okutuusa empeereza y’obujjanjabi egwanidde ku bantu. Abakulira eddwaliro lino bawaddeyo ejjinja ery’omuwendo eri Obwakabaka nga babusiima olw’okukola enteekateeka y’okuleeta kuno eddiini awamu n’okuwaayo ettaka okwazimbibwa eddwaliro lino era nebasiima ne Terefayina y’Obwakabaka eya BBS olw’enkolagana ennungi. Bino byonna bibadde ku mukolo oguyindidde ku Hotel Africana ku Lwokutaano nga guno gwegukomekkereza ebijjaguzo by’emyaka 125 bukya eddwaliro lino litandikibwawo.  Ejjinja lino liweereddwa Minisitaw’Abavubuka, emizannyo, n’okwewummuza Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu kulwa Buganda era aba Mengo Hospital nebasiima okwolesebwa kwa Ssekabaka Muteesa I kweyalina nga ayita abazungu okujja basomese abantu be. Kinajjukirwa nti Obwakabaka era bwali busaale mukuwaayo ettaka era Dr. Sr. Albert Ruskin Cook kweyazimba eddwaliro ly’e Mengo, neriggulwawo mu 1897. Mu bubaka bwe, Oweek. Sekabembe ategeezeza nti eddwaliro ly’e Mengo libadde ssaale nnyo mu kuwagira enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka, n’anokolayo okugaba omusaayi; okuleeta Oluwalo, n’okugema obulwadde bwa COVID. Abadde omugenyi omukulu ku mukolo guno, Omuk. Emmanuel Katongole yeebazizza nnyo Obwakabaka okuwayo ettaka okwazimbibwa eddwaliro, erijjanjabye abantu okumala emyaka 125 ate n’okukuuma omutindo gw’obujjanjabi. Agambye nti eddwaliro ly’atandikawo n’ettendekero ly’abasawo ab’omutindo mu Afirika, terisosola mu ddini, nga bajjanjaba abantu, okukola emikaggo egizimba n’anokolayo ogwa Rotary Uganda ogwavamu etterekero ly’omusaayi ku ddwaliro lino.  Oluvannyuma Omuk. Katongole, atongooza enteekateeka Nnamutayiika ey’eddwaliro, era neyeeyama okuwongera okubakwasizaako mu by’ensimbi. Akulira eddwaliro lino, Dr. Rose Mutumba, awadde Omuk. Emmanuel Katongole ebbaluwa emusiima olw’obuwagizi bwe eri enteekateeka zonna ez’eddwaliro lino. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako; Omuk. Patrick Ssembajjo – Ssenkulu wa BBS Terefayina, abakiise ku lukiiko olufuzi olwa Mengo Hospital, abasaawo, n’abaweereza mu bitongole by’Obwakabaka eby’enjawulo.

headline: Basabye Palamenti erowooze ku nsimbi eziteekebwa mu by’obulamu
text: Abantu ab’enjawulo abeetabye mu nteekateeka y’okugaba omusaayi eyindira mu ssaza lye Bulemeezi mu ggombolola ye Butuntumula, Mumyukansege, Katikamu n’awalala basabye ababaka mu lukiiko lw’eggwanga olukulu okufaayo ku nsimbi eziteekebwa mu by’obulamu okusobola okubitereeza. Bano nga bakulembeddwamu Ssenkulu wa Kabaka Foundation, Omuk. Eddie Kaggwa Ndagala bategeezezza nti ensimbi eziyisibwa mu mbalirira y’eggwanga zikyali ntono era tezirina kyamanyi kyezisobola kukola kutereeza byabulamu.  “Bajeti bwetuuka nebagamba nti Minisitule y’ebyobulamu bagisaze ssente, ey’ebyenjigiriza bagisaze, ey’ebyobulamu n’ebyobulimi bagisaze, wabula ey’ebyokwerinda bagyongedde ssente n’enguudo zetutalaba zikolebwa. Obukuumi tubwetaaga naye onakuuma otya abantu abatali balamu,” Omuk. Ndagala bwe yategeezezza Eyakuliddemu okugaba omusaayi e Bulemeezi, Msgr Francis Xavier Mpanga akuuma entebe y’ ow’essaza lya Ekleziya erya Kasana Luweero yeebazizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi olw’okulengera ewala natandika enteekateeka eno okusobola okutaasa abantu be. Enteekateeka eno, yajjumbiddwa ababaka ab’enjawulo okuli omukyala ow’ekitundu kino Brenda Nabukenya, owa Katikamu North Dennis Ssekabira nowa Bamunaanika Robert Ssekitoleko.  Bano bategeezezza nti bagenda nti bakukunga bannabwe okulaba nti ensimbi eziteekebwa mu by’obulamu zongerwako. Omwami wa Kabaka atwala e Ssaza Bulemeezi Kkangaawo Omulangira Ronald Mulondo yasinzidde wano nasaba Bannabulemeezi okuvaayo mu bungi bawagira enteekateeka eno bateekewo okuvuganya okwamanyi okusobola okunywa mu mu masaza amalala akendo. Omukungu okuva mu kitongole kya Uganda Blood Transfusion Services, Samuel Wante ne Sarah Mutegombwa owa Red Cross baweze okutwala enteekateeka eno mu maaso. Enteekateeka eno yakayindira mu masaza 5 okuli; Buddu, Busiro, Singo, Kyaddondo ne Kyaggwe nga yakutambula okutuuka ku Lwokutaano lwa sabiiti eno nga 25 April.

headline: Mulonde abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda – Owek. Mayiga
text: Bulange- Mmengo Kamalabyonna wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, asabye abalonzi okulonda abakulembeze abafaayo ku byenfuna, eddembe ly’obuntu wamu n’Obulamu bw’abantu be bakulembera mu kalulu kano aka 2021. Owek. Mayiga nga akwasa Ssentebe wa Masaka, Jude Mbabali omujoozi gweyaguze Okwogera bino Kamalabyonna abadde atikkula Oluwalo olw’obukadde obusobye mu 40 okuva mu Busiro wamu ne bannabyabufuzi abakyadde embuga olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokubiri mu bimuli bya Bulange. Mu Luwalo lwaleero, eggombolola ya Nsangi y’enywedde akendo n’eddirirwa ab’e Kikandwa. “Mulonde abantu abo abalina emiramwa egitugasa nga Buganda, mulonde abo abalina emiramwa egikomyawo ekitiibwa kya Uganda okuyitibwa ekkula lya Africa.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Ow’eggombola nga afuna ekiwandiiko okuva ewa Katikkiro Mayiga Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti Buganda erina omugabo munene mu Uganda era n’alabula abakola obuzannyo ku masaza agali mu Buganda nga baagala okugawula nti, tebajja kubakkiriza. Ono agambye nti kasita omuntu assa ekitiibwa mu nnono ya Buganda tebabeera na nsonga lwaki tebatambula naye. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti kikyamu okulowooza nti ebyobufuzi kazannyo kuba tebisobola kubeera kazannyo ne bizza Buganda ku ntikko wadde okukuza Uganda, kubanga kino kirina kuva mu bukulembeze. Asabye abantu okwerinda ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kuba gyekiri era baleme kubuzaabuzibwa byabufuzi, wabula n’avumirira ekya gavumenti okutta abantu ng’erwanyisa Ssennyiga Corona. Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti enkola y’Oluwalo eyamba okutaba Oluganda kubanga Buganda erimu amawanga mangi era n’ebiti by’abantu bingi era ng’okuva edda Buganda erimu ebintu ebirimu ebibaawula. Minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu era Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Christopher Bwanika, ategeezezza nti Oluwalo nkola ya nnono era ne yeebaza abaluleese. Ono era y’ayanjudde omugenyi wa Katikkiro ow’enjawulo, Omulangira Namuyonjo okuva e Bugerere ng’ono yazze ne ttiimu gy’akola nayo era nga bano baguze emijoozi okusobola okwetaba mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gya Kabaka. Ssebwana Kiberu Charles Kisiriiza, asiimye obuwulize bw’abaami b’amasaza n’amagombolola. Ono era yeebazizza bannabyabufuzi abakiise embuga olw’okukkiriza okukyala embuga. Omubaka Medard Ssegona ategeezezza nti ekyabatwala mu Palamenti kwe kukendeeza ku bifunfugu ebikasukirwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’Obuganda, okulaba nti babikwata. Ono asabye Mukuumaddamula abagambire ku balina emmundu bakomye okutugumbula abantu kubanga kiyitiridde. Mmeeya wa ttawuni y’e Nsangi, Hajji Abdul Kiyimba, asiimye Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okukolerera Obuganda era n’amusaba amuwaddeko eddusu asobole okuwangula akalulu. Abalala abeetabye ku mukolo guno kubaddeko Minisita w’ebyettaka era ng’omugenyi ow’enjawulo abadde Omulangira Namuyonjo aguze emijoozi okwenyigira mu nteekateeka y’emisinde gy’Amazaalibwa.

headline: Kkooti egobye ogwa People Power obutabeera mpandiise
text: Kampala Kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka mu Kampala egobye omusango ogwali guwakanya ekisinde kya People Power ekikulirwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine, okukolera mu ggwanga nga si kiwandiise mu mateeka agafuga ebibiina by’ebyobufuzi. Leero ku Lwokubiri, abalamuzi 4 aba kkooti eno okuli; omumyuka wa Ssaabalamuzi Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru, Catherine Bamugemereire ne Irene Mulyagonja, bategeezezza nti kkooti eno terina buyinza kuwulira musango nga guno era bwebatyo ne bagugoba. “Omuwaabi teyeesigama ku nnyingo 50 ng’aleeta omusango gwe era ne mu mpaaba ye tagisiinyaako. Noolwekyo mu ndaba yange omusango guno gwalina kuwaabwa omuntu ng’agoberera ennyingo eyo era gwalina kutwalibwa mu kkooti enkulu si wano.” Omulamuzi Mulyagonja bw’asomye ensala ye. Abalamuzi abalala okuli; Richard Buteera, Kenneth Kakuru ne Catherine Bamugemereire nabo bakkaanyiza ne Mulyagonja wadde ng’omuwaabi tebamulagidde kuliyirira bawawaabirwa. Wabula Omulamuzi Christopher Mandrama ayawukanye ku banne n’agamba nti kyali kikyamu Kyagulanyi okutambuliza emirimu gye mu People Power omwali n’okuvujjirira abantu okuvuganya ate ng’ekibiina kino si kiwandiise mu mateeka. Mu mwaka gwa 2019 munnayuganda Aden Rutaro Ntare, yatwala Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine mu kkooti awamu n’eyali Pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change (FDC),  ng’abavunaana okukulembera ebisinde bino ebitali biwandiise mu mateeka. Rutaro yagamba nti Kyagulanyi y’akulira People Power ng’olumu beeyita ‘People Power-Uganda’ oba ‘People Power’ n’ekigendererwa ky’okuwa abantu akadaala basobole okuvuganya mu bifo ebyenjawulo. Ate ye Dr. Besigye, Rutaro yamuvunaana kutondawo People’s Government’ eyeefaananyiriza gavumenti eri mu buyinza, ekintu ky’agamba nti kikkirizibwa bibiina byabufuzi ebiwandiise mu mateeka.

headline: Amuriat akakasiddwa n’atabukira abapoliisi
text: Kampala Akwatidde ekibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) bbendera, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, avumiridde enneeyisa y’abeebyokwerinda n’engeri gye bamukuttemu bw’abadde agenda okwewandiisa ku kisaawe e Kyambogo. Oboi Amuriat nga atuusiddwa e  Kyambogo Amuriat ab’ebyokwerinda okubadde amagye ne poliisi bamukutte ne bamuteeka mu mmotoka yaabwe olwo ne bamutwala ku kisaawe e Kyambogo we babadde beewandiisiza. Ono atuuse talina ngatto mu bigere. “Leero nzize okwewandiisa ng’omusibe, oluvannyuma lw’okuwambibwa nga ngezaako okufuna ebiwandiiko byange okuva ku woofiisi yange e Najjanankumbi, mpambiddwa ab’ebyokwerinda nebanteeka mu mmotoka kika kya Saluuni era bampisizza ddala bubi.” Amuriat bw’agambye Ono ng’addiridde Kyagulanyi mu kwewandiisa, ategeezezza ssentebe w’akakiiko kano, Omulamuzi Byabakama, nga bw’aleeteddwa ng’omuwambe. Oboi ategeezezza bannamawulire nga bwe yawambiddwa poliisi wakati ng’agenda ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Najjanankumbi okufuna empapula ze wamu n’okwegatta ku bantu b’abadde alina okugenda nabo. Amuriat atuukidde mu bigere, agambye nti abadde afa kimu kumukakasa nga kati ebikolwa bya poliisi nga bino tebigenda kumulemesa kunoonya kalulu. Oboi alaze abantu by’asuubira okutandikirako ng’alondeddwa era nga mu bifo mulimu okutwala mu maaso enkola ya ‘Defiance’ eyatandikibwa Dr. Kizza Besigye. Asuubizza okuyamba bamufunampola okusitula embeera zaabwe basobole okweyagalirira mu ggwanga lyabwe. We tukoledde eggulire lino nga poliisi tennavaayo mu butongole kunnyonnyola nsonga zaakwasizza Amuriat.

headline: Balabudde UPDF ku kweyingiza mu by’obufuzi ebyekubiira
text: Kampala Ebibiina by’obwannakyewa ebiruubirira okunnyikiza demokulaasiya mu Uganda, birabudde abajaasi ba UPDF ne Poliisi, okukomya okweyingiza mu by’obufuzi wamu n’okufulumya ebigambo ebisobola okutabangula emirembe naddala mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Senkulu wa FHRI, Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana Ssenkulu w’ekitongole kya Foundation for Human Rights Initiative (FHRI), Dr. Livingstone Ssewanyana, yategeezezza omukutu gwa URN mu mboozi eyakafubo nti, ebigambo bya bannamagye ebigamba nti, “Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye,” tebisaanidde mu kaseera kano ak’okulonda. Kino kiddiridde omuduumizi w’enkambi y’amagye e Kasajjagirwa mu Masaka, Brig. Deus Sande, okusinziira ku mukolo ogwali gutegekeddwa bannakibiina kya NRM okusiima emirimu gy’ amajje nategeeza nti nga amajje tebasobola kuwaayo buyinza eri omuntu atali munnamagye. Mu ngeri y’emu ne Nnampala wa gavumenti, Ruth Nankabirwa, yalabikidde ku katambi ng’agamba abantu b’e Kiboga nga Pulezidenti Museveni bw’atasobola kuwaayo buyinza kulekawo mafuta ge. Bano Dr. Ssewanyana abalabudde nti balina okumanya nti obuyinza bw’abantu ate nga be balonzi era nga singa basalawo ne balonda omuntu omulala yenna, amagye galina kukola kimu kya kugondera biragiro bye. Omukwanaganya w’ekitongole ekirondoola ensonga z’okulonda ‘Citizens Coalition on Electoral Democracy’ -CCEDU, Charity Ahimbisibwe, yannyonnyodde nti Minisita asobola okusonyiyibwa ku bigambo ‘Tetusobola kuwaayo buyinza,’ naye si baduumizi b’amagye abaalayira okuweereza bannayuganda. Ahimbisibwe yagasseeko nti munnamagye oba omupoliisi eyagoera ebigambo ebiweebuula enteekateeka y’okulonda, agezaako kukuma mu bantu muliro era n’asaba bano bavunaanibwe mu bwangu, abalala babalabireko. Omutunuulizi w’ensonga z’ebyokwerinda, Fred Egesa, agamba nti ebigambo bino bigenderere ng’ababyogera bagezaako kumalamu bavuganya gavumenti maanyi. Ono alabudde nti singa abantu banaggwaamu essuubi ly’okukozesa akalulu okukyusa obuyinza, bayinza okwagala okukozesa amakubo amalala.

headline: Kasule Lumumba :  Bobi Wine okuggyayo omusango yakikoze kwonoona kifaananyi kya kkooti
text: Kampala Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Justine Kasule Lumumba, alabudde bannabyabufuzi okukomya okweyagaliza n’ebigendererwa ebikyamu mu kifo ky’okwonoona ekifaananyi kya kkooti z’eggwanga. Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Kasule Lumumba  Kino kiddiridde munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) era Pulezidenti waakyo Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine okulagira bannamateeka be okuggyayo omusango mw’abadde awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Museveni ng’agamba nti kkooti yazeefuga. Lumumba yalumirizza Kyagulanyi nti okusooka yali agaanye okugenda mu kkooti kyokka n’amala ne yeekyusa, ekiraga nti yalina ebigendererwa bye. “Ensonga ya Mw. Kyagulanyi okugamba nti Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo n’Omulamuzi Mike Chibita okuva mu musango olw’okuba baakolaganako ne Museveni ky’abadde kyakwekwasa.” Lumumba bwe yagambye. Okusinziira Ku Lumumba, Pulezidenti Museveni abadde mu by’obufuzi n’obukulembeze okumala emyaka 50 nga kizibu okusanga omuntu atakolaganyeeko naye mu banene abali mu ggwanga. Lumumba yeewuunyizza lwaki Kyagulanyi yakyukidde ekitongole ekiramuzi ate nga mu 2020 omulamuzi Ssekaana yawa ensala ye, Kyagulanyi n’awangula omusango ku kuwandiisibwa kw’ekibiina kye. “Mw. Kyagulanyi ne banne baali basanyufu nga bawangudde omusango naye kati olw’okuba kkooti ensukkulumu yagaanye okubakkiriza okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba yaabwe era ne baweebwa amagezi ku kye balina okukola naye kati kkooti azivumirira.” Lumumba bwe yakkaatiriza. Lumumba yasabye Kyagulanyi okutawa bawagizi be ssuubi litaliiwo era bakomye okukkiririza mu bulimba obutambulira ku mutimbagano omuli n’emmeeri ya Amerika eyagobye e Mombasa.

headline: Bobi Wine alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku kuwagira okutulugunya bannansi
text: Kyaggwe Akwatidde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu(Bobi Wine), alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku bigambo bye yayogedde ng’avumirira abeekalakaasa n’okubalabula obutakiddira. Bobi Wine nga atabaala Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bw’abadde anoonya akalulu mu bitundu by’e Mukono ku Mmande, agambye nti aba NRM bapangisa abavubuka ne babagatta mu bawagizi baabwe okukola effujjo ku poliisi n’amagye okubavumaganya. Kino kiddiridde Pulezidenti Museveni eggulo bwe yabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga, okulabula abeekalakaasi abakuba abapoliisi okukikomya era n’awagira ekya bakuumaddembe abakuba amasasi mu okwetaasa oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Kyagulanyi eyali e Luuka mu Busoga ng’anoonya akalulu. “Museveni yabadde ku ttivvi jjo n’agamba nti agenda kusasula abantu be battidde abantu baabwe naye abantu b’e Nakifuma ka mbabuuze, omuntu ayinza kusasula ssente mmeka okukuttira owuwo.” Kyagulanyi bw’abuuzizza abawagizi be. Kyagulanyi ategeezezza ab’e Nakifuma okunyweza obumu nga tebafudde ku mawanga g’abantu kubanga bonna ebibaluma bye bimu. Ab’eno Kyagulanyi abagambye nti olutalo lw’okuggya Museveni ku buyinza lugenda kubaamu okufiirwa n’okwelekereza era n’abakunga obutakomya kubanja ddembe lyabwe. Kyagulanyi yayaniriziddwa ebikumi n’ebikumi by’abantu e Nakifuma, yavuddewo bubi n’abakuumaddembe obwedda abamugaana okukozesa enguudo zimwasa njala nga bagamba nti kijja kuleetawo akalipaggano k’ebidduka mu kitundu kino. Abamu ku balonzi e Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bamusabye olutuuka mu ntebe asooke abakolerere ku by’obulamu, ebyenguudo wamu n’okubagobako obwavu obuyitiridde mu byalo byabwe.

headline: Omubaka Sseggirinya alayidde, agamba ssente z’emmotoka agenda kuzigabira abalonzi
text: Kampala Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Muhammad Sseggirinya alayiziddwa ku bubaka bwa Kawempe North mu Palamenti y’e 11 era ono olumaze okukuba ebirayiro n’ategeeza nti ssente obukadde 200 ezigenda okumuweebwa okugula emmotoka ajja zigabira abalonzi. Sseggirinya eyavudde ebweru w’eggwanga n’adda okulayira ku katuuti, agenze bamukwatiridde era bw’abadde ayogerako eri abannamawulire agambye nti agenda kufuba okulaba nti buli maka mu  Kawempe bafuna ku buwoomi bwa ssente z’emmotoka zino. Ono agamba nti kino akikoze okulaba ng’addiza ku bantu be abaamwesiga ne bamusindika mu Palamenti eno. Era kuno agenda kwogerezaako enteekateeka ya Segibox nga muno agenda kuba awa buli maka amanaku mu Kawempe emitwalo 10 buli mwezi. “Sigenda kugula mmotoka mpya ng’enda kusigala nga nkozesa eno, ssente z’emmotoka ng’enda kuziwa bannakawempe.” Sseggirinya bw’ategeezezza. Ono awadde eky’okulabirako ekyali e Bufalansa mu 1789  olw’okwejalabya kwa Kabaka waayo, Louis XVI n’omukyala Marie Antoinette, abaali mu bulamu obulungi ate nga bannansi baavu lunkupe.  “Bali mu kugula mmotoka za bbeeyi ng’abalonzi baabwe babonaabona olw’ebyobulamu ebibi, ebyenjigiriza bifu n’ebizibu ebirala. Nze saagala kubeera bwetyo y’ensonga lwaki obukadde 200 ez’emmotoka nziwadde bannakawempe.” Sseggirinya bw’akiggumiza. Buli mubaka asuubirwa okuweebwa ssente obukadde 200 basobole okugulamu emmotoka ezinaabayamba okutambulizaamu emirimu mu kisanja kino eky’emyaka ettaano. Sseggirinya agamba akyali mulwadde olw’ebyo ebyamutuusibwako mu kkomera e Kitalya era ng’asuubira okuddayo e Nairobi gy’amaze omwezi omulamba ng’ajjanjabwa ekibumba n’amatu.

headline: Bobi Wine, Amuriat, Muntu basabye abantu balonde  bakuume akalulu
text: Kampala Abeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti okuli; Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), Patrick Oboi Amuriat ne Mugisha Muntu, basabye bannayuganda okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe oluvannyuma lw’okulonda ku Lwokuna. Mugisha Muntu, Oboi Amuriat ne Bobi Wine Bano okusaba kuno bakukoledde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe batuuzizza ku Hotel Africana olwaleero ku Lwokubiri. Kyagulanyi ne banne basabye bannayuganda okukuuma akalulu k’omulundi guno nga tebafuddeyo ku kibiina kya byabufuzi oli mw’ali naye balwanirire obuwanguzi bwa bannayuganda. Bino we bijjidde ng’ebbula ennaku bbiri zokka eggwanga ligenda mu kulonda era ng’abooludda oluvuganya baluubirira okuwangula Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni, amaze emyaka 35 mu ntebe. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, alina kkaadi ya FDC, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, ategeezezza nti omulimu omunene gusigalidde kakiiko ka byakulonda okulaba ng’okulonda kubeera kw’amazima kuba bo beegasse okwanika ebirumira ebinaakubeeramu. “Njagala okutegeeza akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nti bwe baba tebasobola kutegeka kalulu kalimu mazima n’obwenkanya, babeera tebalina mugaso ng’ekitongole.” Amuriat bw’agambye. Ate ye alina bbendera ya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT), Mugisha Muntu, agambye nti bo ng’abavuganya omulimu gwabwe bagukoze nga kati kiri eri bannayuganda okumaliriza ekkatala lino. Muntu agambye nti bannayuganda abawerako balaze nga bwe batagenda kulonda olw’emivuyo egibadde mu kunoonya akalulu. Wabula ono abasabye okuvaayo balonde, olutalo lusobole okuwangulwa. Ye Kyagulanyi Ssentamu nga yeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya NUP, yennyamidde olw’okutulugunyizibwa ab’ebyokwerinda era nga bano baamutandikirawo nga yaakamala okwewandiisa. Bobi Wine annyonnyodde nti mu Uganda gwafuuka musango okuvuganya Pulezidenti Museveni. Kyagulanyi asabye bannayuganda okuvaayo okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe era baleme kugendera ku bigambo bya ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda,Simon Byabakama, eyabalagidde okudda eka. “ Temugendera ku bigambo bya Byabakama kubanga bimenya amateeka, temulina tteeka lyonna lye mubeera mumenye okusigala ku bifo awalonderwa okukuuma akalulu kammwe.” Bobi Wine bw’agambye. Ono asabye abantu okukozesa essimu zaabwe okukwata buvidiyo n’ebifaananyi singa balaba ebitagenda bulungi mu kalulu era beeyambise omutimbagano ku Uvote. Mu nsisinkano eno, eyavuganyako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kiiza Besigye, yeewuunyizza ku butabanguko obubadde mu kkampeyini z’omulundi guno nga wadde yavuganyako emirundi egisoba mu ena, naye tabulabangako.

headline: Bobi Wine agamba eby’okukuza Muhoozi bamusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti
text: Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) agamba ekya Museveni okukuza mutabani we Lt Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba namutuusa ku ddaala lya Genero omujjuvu kigendereddwamu kumusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti. Bino Kyagulanyi yabyogedde wakayita ssaawa busaawa nga Pulezidenti Museveni agobye mutabani we ku kifo ky’omudduumizi w’eggye ly’okuttaka wabula ate namukuza okufuuka Genero. Kainerugaba, Museveni yamusikizza Lt Gen Kayanja Muhanga. Bweyabadde ayogera ku nkyukakyuka zino, Kyagulanyi yagambye nti, “Oluvannyuma lw’okuteeka obubaka obw’ekiralu ku Twitter natiisatiisa Kenya ku Mmande, Pulezidenti Museveni asazeewo awe mutabani we ekirabo kya Genero. Ono mu bwangu agenda kuwummuzibwa akakatibwe ku bannansi nga Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, abo bonna abaagaliza Uganda ebirungi kino balina okukigaana.” Kyagulanyi agamba nti Museveni ne mutabani we bebali emabega w’okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu era nga bebasinga okukifunamu kuba Uganda baagala gitambuza nga bwebagala. Ono asabye amawanga g’abazungu okukomya okuteeka ssente mu gavumenti ya Museveni kuba tezigasa bannansi wabula gavumenti ezikozesa kubatulugunya nga kino kirina okukoma okutaasa ebiseera bya Uganda eby’omu maaso. Enkyukakyuka zino ezaakoleddwa zavudde ku Muhoozi okusinziira ku mutimbagano gwe ogwa Twitter nategeeza nti ye n’abajaasi be beetaaga wiiki 2 zokka nga bamaze okuwamba ekibuga ekikulu ekya Kenya ki Nairobi. Kino kyatabudde abantu abawerako era nga bangi basoose kulowooza nti waliwo abayingidde mu kibanja kye wabula oluvannyuma yakakasizza nti obubaka buno yeyabutaddeyo naye yabadde asaaga.

headline: Eby’okuwamba abantu mubiggyeemu eby’obufuzi, mubayimbule – Kkangaawo Mulondo
text: Bya Ssemakula Bulemeezi Omwami wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka atwala essaza Bulemeezi, Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo, asabye gavumenti okuggya eby’obufuzi mu nsonga z’abantu abawambibwa wasobole okubaawo obwenkanya eri abantu bano. Abamu ku bakulembeze abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno Kkangaawo Mulondo ayagala abakwate basimbibwe mu kkooti eziragirwa mu mateeka mu kifo ky’okubakuumira mu bifo ebitamanyiddwa ekirinnyirira eddembe lyabwe. “Tetuwakanya muntu mumenyi w’amateeka kukwatibwa naye tugamba nti omuntu bwakwatibwa ng’alina etteeka ly’amenya, atwalibwe avunaanibwe mu kifo ekimanyiddwa obulungi era aweebwe ekibonerezo ng’amateeka bwegalagira.” Kkangaawo Mulondo bwe yasabye. Kkangaawo yagasseeko nti akadde katuuse bakolere wamu nga bannabulemeezi era babeeko ekintu eky’enkizo kye bamanyibwako, okusobola okutwala essaza lino mu maaso. Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo Okusinziira ku Kkangaawo Mulondo, mu nsisinkano eno bakubaganyizza ebirowoozo ku by’obulamu, ebyenjigiriza n’ensonga endala zonna n’ekigendererwa ky’okukyusa embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka mu kitundu kino. Ono yabasabye okwegattira awamu awatali kusososola mu nzikiriza za byabufuzi, basobole okukyusa ekitundu kyabwe era bakkaatirize eddoboozi eryawamu. Bo abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno okuli; Omubaka Ssekabira Dennis owa Katikamu North n’owa Katikamu South Hassan Kirumira, bagambye nti ebikolobero bingi ebigenda maaso mu ggwanga nga byonna byetaaga okulwanyisibwa awatali kubiyingizaamu byabufuzi. Ate ye omubaka omulonde owa Nakaseke Central, Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya, yategeezezza nti ekiseera kino kyakusitula abantu b’e Bulemeezi abasembayo wansi awatali kusosola. Abakulembeze bano era baasiimye Kkangaawo olw’ensisinkano eno bwebatyo ne beeyama okutwala Bulemeezi ku ntikko.

headline: Jacob Oulanyah bamututte mu kkooti ku by’okuwangula ekifo kya Sipiika
text: Kampala Munnamateeka Hassan Male Mabirizi addukidde mu kkooti ya East Africa elafubanira obwenkanya nawakanya okulondebwa kwa Jacob Oulanyah nga Sipiika omuggya owa Palamenti y’e 11 gwagamba nti yalondeddwa mu bukyamu. Okusinziira ku biwandiiko Mabirizi byatutte mu woofiisi za kkooti eno e Kololo, Mabirizi agamba nti obululu obwalangiriddwa bwabadde bungi okusinga ku muwendo gw’ababaka ababaddewo ku lunaku lw’okulonda ekintu ekimenya amateeka. Mu musango guno, Mabirizi era awakanya ekya Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo okukulemberamu okulondesa kuno ate nga Oulanyah mukwano gwe era nga yamuteeka ku biwandiiko bye ebimwogerako nga abamu ku bantu abasobola okumuweera obujulizi ku bimukwatako. Kati Mabirizi ayagala kkooti ya ‘East African Court of Justice’ erangirire nti okulondebwa kwa Oulanyah kwali kukyamu era eragire wategekebwewo okulonda okuggya okusobola okulonda Sipiika omutuufu. Ono ayagala n’okulonda kwa Sipiika kw’omumyuka wa Sipiika nakwo kuddibwemu kubanga Oulanyah eyali akukubiriza yali mukyamu kuba naye okulondebwa kwe nakwo kwali kukyamu era kulina okuddibwamu. Ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba oba kkooti eno enagenda mu maaso n’okuwulira omusango guno era oba kinaasoboka okulondebwa kuno okuddamu okutegekebwa. Kinajjukirwa nti wiiki ewedde ababaka bakungaanira e Kololo okulonda Sipiika n’omumyuka we era nga olwokaano lwalimu bannakibiina kya NRM babiri okuli Rebecca Kadaga ne Jacob Oulanyah awamu ne Ssemujju Nganda owa FDC. Gyebyagweredde nga Oulanyah awangudde obwa Sipiika ate ekifo ky’omumyuka wa Sipiika nekiwangulwa Anita Among eyawangudde Muhammad Nsereko ne Yusufu Nsibambi.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni alagidde akalulu ka mmeeya w’ e Ntebe kaddemu okubalibwa
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’eggwanga, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, ayingidde mu nsonga z’akalulu k’e Ntebe akaaviiriddeko omujaasi w’eggye erikuuma Pulezidenti erya ‘Special Forces Commabd (SFC), okukuba omuwagizi essasi eryamusse ate abalala babiri ne bagendera ku bisago. Abamu ku bawagizi nga beekalakaasa Eggulo ku Lwokubiri, Maj. Anthony Mbaziira okuva mu SFC yategeezezza abaabadde beekalakaasa nti Pulezidenti Museveni agenda kusisinkana abeesimbyewo aba NRM wamu n’owa Democratic Party (DP), abagamba nti babbiddwako obuwanguzi bwabwe. “Pulezidenti Museveni ayagala akalulu kaddemu okubalibwa era oyo yenna anaasangibwa nga ye yawangudde akalulu kano, y’agenda okulangirirwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda. Agenda kusisinkana abaabadde beesimbyewo bonna, abasaba musigale nga muli bakkakkamu.” Maj. Mbaziira bwe yagambye. Akulira ebyokulonda mu Wakiso, ku Lwokubiri yalangiridde Fabrice Rulinda atalina kibiina nga mmeeya wa Munisipaali y’e Ntebe omulonde, ekintu ekyatabudde abawagizi ba NRM ne DP. Olwokaano luno lwabaddemu abeesimbyewo 6 okuli; Vincent Kayanja Depaul owa DP, Mohammad Kawuma atalina kibiina, Fabrice Rulinda atalina kibiina, Micheal Mutebi owa NRM ne Kenneth Ssimbwa owa ANT. Oluvannyuma lw’okulangirira Rulinda nti y’awangudde, abawagizi ba NRM ne DP batabuse nga bagamba nti tekisoboka kuba Rulinda yabadde akutte ekifo kyakusatu era wano baatandise okwekalakaasa amagye agakuuma omukulembeze w’eggwanga ne galeetebwa okukakkanya embeera. Wakati ng’abapoliisi bagobagana n’abeebyokwerinda, amasasi gaakutte ssentebe wa NRM owa Kitubulu – Katabi, Eric Kyeyune era n’afiirawo ate n’abalala babiri ne batwalibwa mu malwaliro nga bali bubi.

headline: Beti Kamya : Ndeeta bukodyo bupya okulwanyisa enguzi
text: Kampala Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti omuggya, Beti Olive Namisango Kamya, ategeezezza nti alina obukodyo obupya bw’aleese okulwanyisa enguzi mu ggwanga era akakase abo abakyamubuusabuusa ku busobozi bwe mu kifo kino. Pulezidenti Museveni yalonda Beti Kamya okubeera Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti ng’adda mu bigere by’Omulamuzi Irene Mulyagonja. Wano abamu ku batunuulizi b’ensonga baamukubyemu ebituli nga bagamba nti si ye muntu omutuufu alina okutuula mu woofiisi eno. Kino kyaddiridde ekisanja kya Irene Mulyagonja okuggwaako nga July 5, 2020 wabula omwaka gwonna gwaggwaako nga Museveni talondeddemu muntu. Eggulo ku Ssande, Beti Kamya yatuuzizza olukung’aana lwa bannamawulire n’ategeeza nti okusoomooza okumwolekedde nga Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti akumanyi bulungi. Kamya agamba nti mu bukodyo bw’atandika nabwo kwe kuyigiriza abantu obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe mu kulwanyisa enguzi nga bakwatagana naye. Ono yagasseeko nti yeetegese ekimala era n’asaba bannayuganda okumwegattako basobole okulwanyisa enguzi ekyalemesezza ensi okukulaakulana. “Nneebaza Pulezidenti olw’okunneesiga n’anyongera obuvunaanyizibwa. Nze muntu omutuufu era nkakasa nja kubutuukiriza kuba ebisaanyizo mbirina. Abo abanjogerera mbakwatibwa ekisa kuba ng’enda kubaswaza.” Beti Kamya bwe yagambye. Kamya yannyonnyodde nti Ssemateeka n’etteeka eriteekawo woofiisi ya Kaliisoliiso, bimuwa obuyinza okukola emirimu gye awatali kuyingirirwa muntu yenna era asuubira okutumbula woofiisi eno. Ono agamba nti amaanyi ge gagenda kuba mu kukunga bannayuganda n’abakozi ba gavumenti basobole okumuwa obuwagizi asobole okulwanyisa enguzi mu ggwanga nga. Kinajjukirwa nti mu 2018, Pulezidenti Museveni yatabukira eyali Kaliisoliiso Irene Mulyagonja olw’okulemwa okulwanyisa enguzi mu woofiisi za gavumenti era gye byaggweera ng’ataddewo akakiiko mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti okulwanyisa enguzi era kano kakulirwa Lt. Col. Edith Nakalema. Wabula wadde yakatondawo, enguzi ekyalemeddewo ekiraga nti omulimu ogwolekedde Beti Kamya munene okusinga bw’alowooza.

headline: Tujja kukolagana n’omuntu yenna bannakenya gwe banalonda – Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveniategeezezza nti Uganda nneetegefu okukolagana n’omukulembeze yenna bannakenya gwe banaalonda ku bwapulezidenti .”Yenna anaayitamu okubeera Pulezidenti w’e Kenya. Tujja kukolagana naye kasita anaabeera ng’alondeddwa bannansi.” Museveni bw’annyonnyodde. Akalulu mu ggwanga lya Kenya kasembedde nga kagenda kubibwa nga August 9, 2022 lwe bagenda okulondera ababaka mu lukiiko lw’e ggwanga, n’olukiiko oluddako awamu n’abakulembeze omuli ba Gavana awamu n’enkiiko eza wansi. BinoMuseveni yabyogedde asiibula abadde omubaka wa Kenya mu ggwanga, AmbasadaKiema Kilonzo. Kilonzo abadde amaze emyaka 3 mu kifo kino nga yasazeewo okuddayo mu Kenya asobole okuvuganya ku kifo kya Gavana we Kitui. Okusinziira ku Museveniomukwano wakati w’amawanga gano gombi gwe gusinga amakulu nga si nsonga ani abeera awangudde obwapulezidenti enkolagana ebeera erina okugenda mu maaso. AmbasadaKilonzo yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’okumuteerawo embeera ennungi mu myaka 3 gy’amaze mu kifo ng’esobozesezza ebyensubulagana wakati Uganda ne Kenya wadde wabaddewo ekirwadde kya Corona. Ono era yeebazizza gavumenti ne bannayuganda olw’omukwano gwe bamulaze ekisobozesezza enkolagana wakati w’amawanga gombi okugenda mu maaso. “Nga nsiibula okuva wano, njagala okukiddamu nti bannayuganda bandaze omukwano era wano wafuuse waffe.” Kilonzo bw’agambye. Kilonzo yalondebwa Pulezidenti Uhuru Kenyatta mu 2018 in 2018, okubeera Ambasada wa Kenya e Uganda.

headline: Kaliisoliiso Beti Kamya avudde mu by’okunoonyereza ku bukadde 40 ezaweebwa ababaka
text: Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti, Beti Kamya ategeezezza nga bwavudde mu kunoonyereza ku nsimbi obukadde 40 ezigambibwa okuweebwa buli mubaka wa Palamenti nga agamba nti abatwalayo omusango baguggyeeyo. Bino Kaliisoliiso Kamya abyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olutudde mu Kampala bw’abadde alambulula ku nteekateeka z’okukuza olunaku lw’okukaza abakozi bagavumenti okuwa abantu empeereza egwanidde. Kamya annyonnyodde nti nga Kaliisoliiso talina buyinza kusigala nga anoonyereza ku nsonga eno ate nga bannanyini yo abagitwalayo bagiggyeeyo era neyetonda mu lukiiko lwe ggwanga olukulu. Ono agasseeko nti bannayuganda balina okufuna empeereza esinga okuva mu bakozi ba gavumenti era tebakkiriza okubuzibwabuzibwa awamu n’okumalirwa obudde okuva mu bunafu n’enkola y’emirimu ey’ekibogwe okuva mu bakozi ba gavumenti. “Enguzi tekoma ku kulyanguzi oba okuwa emirimu abantu abatalina bisaanyizo oba okubulankanya ssente naye n’omuntu alemwa okukola kyateekeddwa okukola nga ate asasulwa abeera alidde enguzi,” Beti Kamya bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti enkola y’okumala gakola mu bakozi bagavumenti efiiriza gavumenti ssente nnyingi era esobola okugoba bamusigansimbi nga batya okuteeka kuno ensimbi zabwe nga abantu emirimu bagikola mu ngeri ya neemalidde. Kamya asabye bannamawulire n’abantu ba bulijjo okuyambako okwanika abo bonna abakola ebikolwa by’obuli bw’enguzi nga batuuka ekikeerezi awamu n’okwebulankanya ku mirimu. Okusinziira ku alipoota ya kalisoliiso, wofiisi ezisinze okutunulirwa mwemuli woofisi z’ebyettaka, abakozi ba gavumenti mu gavumenti ezebitundu saako abasawo n’ebitongole ebirala. Ekitongole kino kigamba nti kifunye emisango 320 okuva mu July omwaka oguwedde era egisinga gitandise okulondolwa. Ye akulira okukung’aanya emisango gino, Justus Kareebe ategeezezza nti emisango egisinga gyekuusa nyo ku bulyazamanya abakozi ba gavumenti, obutakanya mu bakozi saako emivuyo mu bukiiko obugaba emirimu gya gavumenti. Abakulu bano era balabudde ebitongole byonna ebya gavumenti ku kwerimbika mu woofiisi esembayo waggulu okusobola okukola ebitali ku mateeka nti bubakeeredde kuba amateeka gaba obuyinza okunoonyereza ku woofiisi zonna mu ggwanga nga oggyeeko eya Pulezidenti.

headline: Kafeero Ssekitoleko : Okweyagaliza kwa banene mu kibiina kwe kutusudde
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Nakifuma Abadde omubaka w’essaza lya Nakifuma mu Palamenti, Robert Kafeero Ssekitoleko, akkiriza nga bwe yawanguddwa mu kalulu wabula ng’okugwa kwe akutadde ku banene mu kibiina b’agamba nti basussizza okweyagaliza. Hon Kafeero Ssekitoleko nga ayozaayoza Fred Ssimbwa eyawangudde ekya Nakifuma  Kafeero alaze okutya nti ekibiina kye ekya National Resistance Movement NRM kiri mu buzibu singa abakikulembera tebateekawo mpuliziganya n’omuntu wa wansi asembayo ku kyalo. Ssekitoleko alumirizza nti ebintu ebirina okuyamba abantu ebiva waggulu mu kibiina bikoma mu banene era ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki abantu babasuddeyo ng’akabonero akooleka obusungu abantu bwe babalinako. Ono asuubizza nga bwe bagenda okuddayo batuule n’abakulu mu kibiina basobole okugonjoola ekizibu kino era n’asaba abantu b’e Nakifuma okwegatta bave mu ntalo z’ebyobufuzi. Kafeero agambye nti tagenda kuwanika era nga 2026 agenda kudda yeddize ekifo kye kuba akyali muto mu myaka. Wabula ye Ssaabakunzi wa NRM mu ttundutundu lya Mukono omuli; Kayunga, Buikwe, Buvuma ne Mukono, Patric Mubiru akukkulumidde abalonzi olwokuva mu NRM ne balonda NUP ky’agamba nti kigenda kuzza ekitundu kino emabega. Mubiru annyonnyodde nti emu ku nsonga lwaki Pulezidenti Museveni naye yawanguddwa mu kitundu kino lwakuba akalulu kanoonyezebwa mu ngeri ya ssaayansi ssaako n’abavubuka abaalonda mu bungi mu kitundu kino. Wadde ekibiina kya NRM kyakoze bubi mu kitundu kino, naye bannakibiina bayisizza ebivvulu oluvannyuma lw’omuntu waabwe okuwangula Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi ku bwapulezidenti. Kinajjukirwa nti, ababaka bonna abaabadde ne kkaadi ya NRM mu kitundu kino, kumpi bonna baasuuliddwa nga ku bano kuliko; Johnson Muyanja Ssenyonga yawanguddwa Fred Kayondo owa DP, Hon. Ronald Kibuule yawanguddwa Munnamateeka Abdullah Kiwanuka, Hon Robert Kafeero Ssekitoleko yawaguddwa Fred Ssimbwa, Abbasi Ssozi yawaguddwa Hon Bakireke Betty Nambooze abaddeyo, ate ow’abakyala Margaret Nakavubu n’awangulwa Hanifah Nabukeera nga bonna ba kibiina kya NUP.

headline: Omuloodi waali: Erias Lukwago akulembeddemu banne ku bwaloodimmeeya
text: Kampala Omuloodi wa Kampala Erias Lukwago ayolekedde okulangirirwa nga Loodimmeeya omulonde ow’ekibuga Kampala nga mu lwokaano addirirwa Nabilah Naggayi Ssempala ow’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP). Omuloodi Erias Lukwago nga akuba akalulu Ebiva mukulonda biraga nti ku bifo eby’enjawulo awalonderwa Erias Lukwago akubidde waggulu mubitundu nga Lubaga, Makindye, Kawempe awamu n’awalala. Ono banne abalala bwebavuganya okuli Daniel Kazibwe amanyiddwa nga Ragga Dee ne Joseph Mayanja amanyiddwa nga Jose Chameleone, olwokaano terubatambulidde bulungi. Oluvannyuma lw’okulonda okukomekerezebwa era obululu nebutandika okubalibwa, abawagizi ba Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago batandise okujaganya olw’ omuntu waabwe okulembera olwokaano luno. Bano okuli; abavuzi batakisi, ababoodabooda, abatembeeyi n’abantu abalala abagamba nti Lukwago abadde abalwanirira balabiddwako ku nguudo za Kampala nga bajaganya olw’obuwanguzi buno. E Nateete mu Mackay Zzooni, abawagizi ba Lukwago balabiddwako nga batambula n’empapula wamu ne kkalaamu nga bawandika obululu bwa Lukwago mubifo eby’enjawulo awalonderwa. Ku kifo awalonderwa ekya Njovu mu zzooni ya Lubya, Erias Lukwago afunye obululu 433 naddirirwa Nabilah n’obululu 161. Daniel Kazibwe nafuna obululu 42 ate Chameleone nafuna obululu 36 so nga Charles James Ssenkubuge afunyewo akalulu 06. Nakivubo Blue, Lukwago afunye obululu 305 ate Nabilah Naggayi afunye obululu 53, Kazinwe afunye 22, Joseph Mayanja 12 ate Charles Ssenkubuge owa DP nafuna akalulu 1 ate nga abalala tebafunyewo. Ekisinze okucamula bannakampala kwekuba nti nekifo kyenyini Nabilah walondera ku Katuuso Church of Uganda Lukwago awangulidde waggulu battunka nabo. Wano, Charles afunye 3, Nabillah Naggayi 95, Omuloodi Erias Lukwago afunye 414, Daniel Kazibwe 20 ate Joseph Mayanja nafuna 23.

headline: Ab’Emmamba abaawangula basisinkanye omutaka Gabunga
text: Bazukkulu ba Gabunga abaawangula ebifo ebyenjawulo mu kalulu akaawedde aka 2021, eggulo baakedde kusisinkana Omutaka omukulu Owaakasolya k’Emmamba, Jjajja Gabunga Mubiru Zziikwa, okuwoza olutabaalo. Mu bano mulimu abaawangula obwakkansala, bammeeya, n’ababaka ba Palamenti awamu n’abalala. Abamu ku bayitamu nga bawa Jjajja Gabunga ettu Mu bakulembeze abazze kwe kwabadde Mmeeya wa munisipaali y’e Kira Julius Mutebi, omubaka w’ekibuga Lugazi omulonde, Stephen Sserubula n’abalala nga bano balombojjedde jjajja bwe embeera gye bayitamu. Omubaka omulonde owa Munisipaali y’e Lugazi, Stephen Sserubula, yategeezezza nti baakutunuulira obusobozi obwa buli Mutuba mu kika ky’Emmamba, okulaba ogusinga okukola obulungi. Ate ye mmeeya wa Kira, Julius Mutebi yagambye nti, “Jjajja twagala okukwebaza weebale kukuuma kika kyaffe ne bonna abakukwatirako era tujja kusanyuka nnyo nga tuyitibwa okuwa ebirowoozo byaffe ku ebyo bye tulowooza ebisobola okutumbula ekika kyaffe.” Omubaka Sserubula bwe yagambye. Jjajja w’ekika ky’mmamba, Omutaka Mubiru Zziikwa ng’aliwamu ne bakulembeze banne, b’ozaayozezza bazukkulu baabwe olwokutuuka ku kkula ly’obululembeze kyokka ne babasaba obuteerabira kika kyabwe. “Nga bwe mwalidde obwami temuddeyo kudigida budigizi ate mu kung’aanye abazzukulu era mweweeyo okukikulaakulanya,” Omutaka Mubiru Zziikwa bwe yategeezezza. Ate Ssaabawandiisi w’ekika ky’Emmamba, Andrew Benon Kibuuka, yabasabye mu buli kye bakola bakulembeze ekika kyabwe era bafube okukiweereza awamu n’okukiyiyiza, kisobole okukulaakulana.

headline: AKALULU 2021: Ebyokwerinda binywezeddwa nga Bobi Wine ne Amuriat beewandiisa
text: Kampala Poliisi n’amagye biyiiriddwa mu bungi ku nguudo ezigenda okukozesebwa munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ne Munnakibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), nga bagenda okwewandiisa e Kyambogo. Robert Kyagulanyi ne mukyala we Barbie Kyagulanyi Ab’ebyokwerinda balabiddwako e Magere, Kisaasi, Nakawa n’emu bitundu bya Kampala nga; Nateete, Kibuye, Najjankumbi, Kamwokya, ewa Kisekka wamu n’ebifo ebirala. Poliisi yawandiikidde Bobi Wine ng’emulaga amakubo g’alina okukozesa era n’emusaba aganywerereko kimusobozese okutuuka mu budde. Bano baakakasizza bwe bagenda okuwerekera Kyagulanyi okuva ewaka we okutuuka w’alina okwewandiisiza n’abantu abo abakkiriziddwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okumuwerekera. Bobi Wine agenda kuyita; Magere, Kumbuzi, Kisaasi, Ntinda Stretcher, Spear Motors, ku Masang’anzira ga Kyambogo University okutuuka ku kisaawe ky’e Kyambogo w’agenda okwewandiisiza. Poliisi ekkakkanya obujagalalo eyiiriddwa mu bungi mu bitundu bya Kampala ebyenjawulo nga Makindye nga kigambibwa nti eno abawagizi ba People Power babadde baatandise okukung’aana. Bobi Wine asimbudde e Magere okwolekera e Kyambogo era ng’awerekeddwako mukyala we, Barbie Kyagulanyi wamu ne bannakibiina abalala.

headline: Omubaka wa Busiro North omulonde avunaaniddwa okubba essimu
text: Omubaka omulonde owa Busiro North era munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Paul Nsubuga, asimbiddwa mu kkooti n’avunaanibwa omusango gw’okubba essimu ebalirirwamu emitwalo 8 egya Ssiringi. Omubaka Nsubuga nga ali mu kaguli Nsubuga ow’emyaka 29 asimbiddwa mu kkooti ya Buganda Road ey’eddaala erisooka, Doreen kalungi n’avunaanibwa. Wabula ono emisango agyegaanye. Kino kiddiridde poliisi okutegeeza nti yabadde ekutte omubaka Nsubuga oluvannyuma lw’obutambi okusaasaanira omutimbagano obulaga omubaka ono ng’abba essimu ku bamu ku bawala abaali mu dduuka mu Kampala. Oludda oluwaabi lulumiriza nti nga 3/06/2020 Nsubuga omutuuze w’e Nansana mu Wakiso disitulikiti bwe yali e Nakasero ku Ssemaduuka wa Shoprite, yabba essimu y’ekika kya Itel ebalirirwamu emitwalo 8 eyali eya Nicholas Karuhanga. Kkooti era etegeezeddwa nti ku nnaku z’omwezi ze zimu era e Nakasero, Nsubuga yabba ssente obukadde 4 n’ekitundu okuva ku Nicholas Karuhanga. Ono ayimbuddwa ku kakalu ka kkooti ka mitwalo 4 ez’obuliwo ate abamweyimiridde okuli ne Jjajja we, Charles Kasozi ow’emyaka 72, Mmeeya wa Kakiri Town Council ne maama we omuto Santrina Namuli buli omu n’asabibwa akakadde ka ssente ezitali zabuliwo. Ono alagiddwa okudda mu kkooti nga 29/03/2021 okuddamu okuwulira omusango gwe era nga kisuubirwa nti poliisi ejja kuba emalirizza okunnoonyereza ku nsonga ye. .

headline: Omuwagizi wa Sodo bamukubidde essasi mu bbaala
text: Ssembabule Omuwagizi wa munnabyabufuzi e Mawogola, Sodo Aine Kaguta ng’ono muganda wa Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yakubiddwa essasi mu kugulu n’addusibwa mu ddwaliro ng’apooca n’ebisago. Kashieza eyakubiddwa essasi Eyakubiddwa essasi ye Hannington Kasheiza ow’emyaka 28 nga mutuuze w’e Lugusuulu mu Ssembabule era nga kigambibwa nti ono yakubiddwa Ninsiima Robert gwe yabadde naye mu bbaala ya Mercy nga banywamu. Okusinziira ku beerabiddeko, zaabadde ssaawa nga ttaano ez’ekiro bano ne batandika okukaayana ku by’obufuzi wakati w’abantu bano abaabadde mu bbaala era nga nannyini bbaala, poliisi yamukutte dda agiyambeko mu kunoonyereza. Kino kiwalirizza abawagizi ba Sodo mu kitundu kino ekya Mawogola North, George William, Tumuzigu enock, Namale Gorret, Robert Tumuhairwe n’abalala, okutuuza olukiiko lwa bannamawulire ne bavumirira effujjo eribakolebwako ne basaba Pulezidenti Museveni ayingire mu nsonga eno. Bano bategeezezza nti bawadde poliisi nsalessale wa nnaku 2 okubaawo ekikolebwa kubanga balina obukakafu bw’abantu baabwe abazze batulugunyizibwa oba si ekyo bagenda kwekalakaasa. Owooluganda lwa Kasheiza, Mesach Katana annyonnyodde nti mu kiseera kino basobeddwa kubanga ne muganda waabwe eyakubiddwa essasi tebamanyi w’ali kubanga yabuziddwawo. Aba kkampu ya Sodo bagamba nti bazze batiisibwatiisibwa era kati bali mu kutya nga tebamanyi kiddako. Akulira okunoonyereza ku buzzi bw’emisango ku poliisi e Ssembabule, Tindyebwa Peter, yakakasizza okukubwa kw’omuntu essasi wabula n’ategeeza ng’ensonga eno bw’etabaddemu byabufuzi newankubadde babadde babinyumyako. Tindyebwa yagambye nti bano bubakeeredde kubanga essaawa ze baalwaniddemu zaabadde za Kafyu era n’ategeeza nti baliko be bakutte era ng’oluvannyuma lw’okunoonyereza bagenda kutwalibwa mu kkooti babitebye.

headline: Bobi Wine asannyalazza Arua, abasuubizza okuzzaawo ettutumu ly’ekitundu kyabwe
text: Arua Akwatidde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) kkaadi ku bwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), asannyalazza ekibuga Arua okumalira ddala akaseera bw’abadde anoonya akalulu mu kitundu kino. Bobi Wine nga ayingira mu kibuga kye Arua Wadde nga Kyagulanyi lwe yasemba okugenda mu Arua, amasasi gaavuga awamu n’okuyiwa omusaayi, leero libadde ssanyu jjereere ng’ono anoonya akalulu mu bitundu bya West Nile. Kyagulanyi atandikidde mu disitulikiri y’e Pakwach, Nebbi n’amalira mu Arua obwedda buli w’ayita ng’asanga abantu bakwatiridde ku makubo okumuwuubirako. Bw’abadde anaatera okuyingira mu kibuga Arua, kiyitiridde era wadde enkuba ebadde etonnya, abawagizi be tebalemye kumuwerekera era naye n’afuluma wakati mu kire ky’enkuba okubawuubirako. Kyagulanyi asinzidde mu bitundu bino n’atabukira poliisi gy’agambye nti yagaanye bannannyini wooteeri mu kitundu ky’e Pakwach okubasuza, n’ategeeza nti kino tekijja kubagaana kunoonya na kuwangula kalulu kano. Obwedda enkumi n’enkumi z’abantu ziyimba kimu “Bobi Bobi” wakati mu ssanyu. Bw’abadde e Nebbi, Bobi Wine agambye nti ekitundu kya West Nile ky’ekimu ku bisingamu ebitone eby’enjawulo, naye Pulezidenti Museveni ne gavumenti ye tebalina kye bakoze ku bitumbula. Kyagulanyi bano abagumizza nti mu Uganda empya, baakulaba ng’ekitundu kya West Nile kiddamu okufuna ettutumu n’ekitiibwa nga bwe gwali. “Mu kitundu kino kivaamu ebitone eby’enjawulo, wano we wava Docus Inzikuru era ye wavudde n’abawangudde engule ez’enjawulo mu nsi yonna. Naye tewali kitone kissibwamu kitiibwa kubanga Pulezidenti Museveni talina kitone kyonna.” Kyagulanyi bw’agambye. Ono ategeezezza abantu mu West Nile nti waakulaba ng’abaddiza ebyo bye bafiiriddwa era babizimbireko, okuteekawo enkulaakulana empya. Bobi Wine abantu mu kitundu kino abasabye baveeyo mu bungi balonde akabonero ka Manvuuli era bakuume akalulu kaabwe nga beekolamu obubinja bw’abantu 20, kubanga bakimanyi mu lwatu nti obululu Pulezidenti Museveni azze abukwatamu. Abasabye obutamuganya ku mulundi guno. Okusinziira ku pulogulaamu y’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, Kyagulanyi addako kugenda Kitgum, Pader ne Gulu mu nnaku za wiiki eno ezisigaddeyo.

headline: Kamalabyona Mayiga asabye abakulembeze okutambulira ku mateeka
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, asabyeabakulembeze bulijjo okugoberera enfuga y’amateeka bw’eba baagala abantu okubeesiga era kiyambe n’ensi okukulaakulana. Bino Kamalabyonna Mayiga abyogeredde mu nsisinkano gy’abaddemu n’omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Kampala, Hudu Hussein awamu n’abamyuka be mu divizoni y’e Lubaga, Makindye ne Kawempe ku Lwokusatu mu Bulange e Mmengo. Owek. Mayiga abasabye babeere benkanya eri abantu bonna be bakoleramu awatali kusosola mu ddiini, mawanga oba ekibiina ky’ebyobufuzikubanga ebyobufuzi byanguwa nnyo okutabangula abantu. Abakulu bano, Katikkiro Mayiga abasabye okusitula obukugu bw’abasirikale batandike emirimu okugikola mu bukugu, kiyambe okutereeza enkolagana yaabwe n’abantu kuba bano be bakolereramu ebbanga lyonna era kino kyakuyamba okunyweza obutebekevu mu ggwanga. Ono era alaze ng’Obwakabaka bwe bwetegese okukola enteekateeka etwaliramu abavubuka abali ku nguudo bafunirwe eky’okukola, baleme kufuuka bamutawaana olw’okubulwa kye bakola kuba kizuuliddwa nga bano basinga mu bitundu bya Buganda. Mu kwogera kwe,RCC wa Kampala, Hudu Hussein asabye Obwakabaka okubaako enteekateeka z’enkulaakulana okukumaakuma abavubuka naddala abo abatalina mirimu kiyambeko okukendeeza ku bikolwa by’obumenyi bw’amateeka. Ate ye RCC wa Lubaga, AndersonBulola ategeezezza nti nga gavumenti yaawakati beetefuteefu okukulaganira wamu n’Obwakabaka mu buli nteekateeka era wano asabye abakulembeze mu gavumenti ya Beene okukolaganira wamu nabo okulaba nga Buganda edda ku ntikko n’eggwanga okutwaliza awamu. Abakulembezeabalala abakiise embuga beebazizza Obwakabaka olw’enteekateeka ze buteekawo okutumbula embeera z’abantu okuli ebyobulamu ebyenjigiriza n’ebintu ebirala. Ensisinkano yeetabiddwamu Ssaabawolereza w’Obwakabaka, Owek. Christopher Bwanika.

headline: Abaali bawambibwa bazuuliddwa mu bibira e Masaka
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Abavubuka bataano abagambibwa okuwambibwa emyezi ebiri emabega ng’eggwanga ligenda okulonda bamaze ne bazuulibwa nga babasudde mu bibira by’e Masaka. Kino kiddiridde ab’enganda z’abavubuka abawera 15 okutandika okwekalakaasa nga babanja abavubuka bano. Abamu ku bavubuka nga bannyonnyola ebyabatuusiddwako  Bano kuliko; Kiberu Julius‚ Kagimu Twaha ddereeva wa taxi e Kabembe‚ Mukasa Juma ne Naheru Mohamed era bano bonna tubasanze ku kyalo Kabembe mu ggombolola y’e Kyampisi mu Mukono.  Abavubuka bano balumiriza okukwatibwa abasajja abaalina emmundu era nga bano babalagira okulinnya emmotoka era bwe batyo ne batwalibwa mu bifo bye tamanyi wakati mu kutulugunyizibwa n’okubwa emiggo. Ye Kiberu Julius agamba tagenda kwerabira engeri gy’abadde aliira ku muguwa ng’embuzi nga kw’otadde n’omusiba akakookolo okumala emyezi ebiri. Ono agamba nti wakati mu kutulugunyizibwa yafuna n’olubale ku mutwe era awulira obulumi bungi. Balumiriza nti waliwo ekizimbe mwe babadde bakuumirwa era mulimu n’abantu abalala abasoba mu ana (40) era ng’ekifo kino kitiisa olw’emiranga egikwaniriza ng’otuuseeyo. Bano bagamba nti baabavuze mu kiro ku ssaawa nga 8 ez’ekiro ne babasuula mu bibira ebyenjawulo mu Masaka era bwe batyo baatandise okutambula ekiwalazima okutuusa lwe bafunye ababayamba. Ssentebe w’ekyalo Kisowera, Abbey Bitwaalo, agamba nti abavubuka bangi baawambibwa olw’enjawukana mu ndowooza z’ebyobufuzi nga kino kyalabikira nnyo mu kitundu kya Mukono North era naye yafuna abaamutiisatiisa. Ono asabye abali ku gw’okuwamba abantu bwe baba baliko omusango gwe bazza, batwalibwe mu kkooti oba si kyo bayimbulwe kuba eggwanga lyonna balitadde ku bunkenke.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM : Museveni alabudde  abawagizi n’abeesimbyewo ku kubba akalulu
text: Kampala Ssentebe w’ekibiina ki NRM, Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni alabudde abeesimbyewo, abawagizi babwe wamu n’abantu abeetegese okubba akalulu mu kamyufu k’ekibiina ku Lwokutaano luno nti tagenda kubaganya. Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni Kino kiddiridde poliisi okunokolayo ebifo 15 omusuubirwa okubeera obuvuyo n’efujjo mu kalulu, mubino kuliko; Ssembabule, Kassanda, Kazo, Bundibugyo, Sironko, Sheema, Mbale, Hoima, Koboko, Adjumani, Kashongi, Kampala, Wakiso ne Hoima mu kalulu akagenda okukubwa enkya ku Lwokutaano. Bino Museveni yabitadde mukiwandiiko kye yafulumizza ku Lwokuna nategeeza nti obutabanguko wamu n’obuvuyo tekirina gwekiyamba. Museveni yagambye nti, “NRM bweyatwala obuyinza mu 1986, twakomya okuyingirira eddembe ly’abantu okwesalirawo ku ggwe baagala okubakiikirira. Twakomya enguzi, obuvuyo, obusososoze mu mawanga, okukozesa olulimi olukyamu wamu n’okukyusa ebiva mu kalulu, ekimu ku bino kiba kiraga nga akalulu akatali ka bwenkanya.” Olw’ebikolwa bino Museveni agamba abantu bagyibwako eddembe ly’okufuna abakulembeze be baagala kubanga baweebwe bebatalonze era nga emirundi egisinga abafunye obuyinza mu ngeri eno bakola ku bigendererwa byabwe so ssi bizibu bya bantu. “Abantu abaagala okufuna wofiisi zino nga bayitira mu makubo gemenye waggulu, balabe ba Uganda era beetaaga kuwangula,” Museveni bweyanyonyodde. Museveni yagasseeko nti ye yagaana eby’okukozesa okutiisatiisa n’obuvuyo ku bannayuganda kubanga ssi baddu. Museveni agamba nti tasobola kukwata mitwalo 30 nagiwa mulonzi kubanga tekirina wekimuyambira okujjako okumukuumira mu bwavu. Ono yalagidde ab’ebyokwerinda okukwata abo bonna abagulirira abantu wamu n’okuleetawo obutabanguko. Awadde amagezi abeesimbye mu kamyufu okukomya mbagirawo obuvuyo era nalagira ababaka ba Pulezidenti mubitundu byonna (RDC) awamu nabakulira ebyokwerinda okuyingira mu nsonga eno mu bwangu. Bano nabo Museveni yabalabudde nti singa embeera ebaleremerera ajja kwefunira amawulire okuva wansi mu bantu era nabo abeekolereko olw’okulemwa okukola omulimu gwabwe.

headline: Mayambala asabye kkooti ekkirize yeddize omusango gwa Bobi Wine
text: Kampala Eyavuganyizza ku ntebe y’Obwapulezidenti mu kalulu ka 2021 Willy Mayambala, awandiikidde kkooti Ensukkulumu ng’awakanya ekya Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu okuggyayo omusango guno era bw’atyo, n’asaba akkirizibwe okweddiza omusango guno. Willy Mayambala nga ali ku kkooti Kyagulanyi ku Lwokusatu yawandiikidde kkooti Ensukkulumu mu butongole ng’aggyayo omusango olw’ebigambibwa nti abalamuzi abalina okuwulira omusango gwe baalina kyekubiira. Ebintu enkya ya leero bikyuse, Willy Mayambala bw’andikidde kkooti ebbaluwa ng’agitegeeza nga bw’ayagala kkooti emuyise mu mitendera gy’alina okugoberera okusobola okweddiza omusango guno era oba kisoboka okuleeta obujulizi obupya mu musango guno. “Njagala okukakasa nti nze nga Willy Mayambala eyavuganyaako ku bwapulezidenti kwatibwako ku musango guno era njagala okumanyisibwa ku kye nnina okukola okutwala omusango guno.” Mayambala bw’asabye. Bwe yabadde asaba okuggyayo omusango guno, Kyagulanyi yagambye nti yaguggyeeyo kubanga embeera kkooti gy’esizzaawo tesobozesa musango gwe kuwulirwa mu bwenkanya. “Abajulizi b’omuwaabi baakwatibwa ne batulugunyizbwa wamu n’okutiisibwatiisibwa ab’ebyokwerinda ku biragiro bya bawawaabirwa okuli Museveni ne Ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti. Ebitongole okuli; poliiisi ne NIRA bikozesebwa okuketta abawagizi b’omuwaabi n’okubamalako eddembe lyabwe.” Okusaba kwa Kyagulanyi bwe kw’alambise. Kyagulanyi eyakwata ekyokubiri mu kalulu ka January 14, agamba nti amateeka agafuga omusango gw’okulondebwa kwa Pulezidenti gateekeddwa mu nkola mu ngeri emunyigiriza olw’ensonga y’obudde era nga kkooti kino kye yeekwasa okumugaana okwongera ku bujulizi bw’alina. Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo, eggulo yategeezezza nti kkooti egenda kutuula mu bwangu okusalawo ku kusaba kwa Kyagulanyi era ono yasabiddwa asooke ayite mu mitendera okuli n’okufulumya okusaba kwe mu kyapa kya gavumenti. Akawaayiro nnamba 61 ak’etteeka erirung’amya okulonda kwa Pulezidenti erya 2005, ligamba nti omusango tegusobola kuggyibwayo okuggyako nga kkooti ekkiriza oluvannyuma lw’okugutunulamu. “Oluvannyuma lw’okuwulira okusaba kw’okuggyayo omusango, eyavuganya yenna ng’asobola okufuuka omuwaabi waagwo, asobola okusaba kkooti n’adda mu kifo ky’omuwaabi ayagala okuggyayo omusango guno.” Bwerityo etteeka lino bwe lirambika.

headline: Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Poliisi baakusisinkana Bobi Wine enkya
text: Omwogezi w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda Jotham Taremwa URN Akakiiko k’ebyokulonda akakulirwa omulamuzi Simon Byabakama enkya ku ssaawa ttaano kaakusisinkana munnakisinde ky’ebyobufuzi ekya People Power era omubaka wa Kyaddondo ey’obuvanjuba Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu amanyiddwa ennyo nga Bobi Wine. Ng’ayogerako ne URN, omwogezi w’akakiiko kano Jotham Taremwa yategeezezza nti bakizudde nti waliwo obwetaavu okusisinkana Bobi Wine nga bali wamu ne Poliisi basobole okukkanya ku nkiiko za Bobi Wine ez’okwebuuza ku bantu ku nteekateekaye ey’okwesimbawo okuvuganya ku ntebe y’omukulembeze w’eggwanga mu kulonda kwabonna okunaabaawo omwaka ogujja. Poliisi nga yeesigama ku nsonga ez’enjawulo, ennaku ssatu eziyise eremesezza Bobi Wine okukuba enkungaanaze ng’egamba nti yabadde tagoberedde buwaayiro bonna obuli mu tteeka erifuga enkugaana erya Public Order Management Act. Olukungaana lwe olwasooka yalina okulukuba e Gayaza wabula Poliisi yalusattulula era n’emuggalira wamu nebanne abaawerako mu buduukulu bwayo e Kasangati ne Naggalama. Eggulo Bobi Wine yasazizzamu olukungaana lwe e Gulu wamu ne Lira olw’ensonga ezeekuusa kukulemesebwa Poliisi. Taremwa yagambye olukiiko era lwakwetabwamu abaagala okwesimbawo kubwa pulezidenti abalala basatu okuli Nkwagabwa John Herbert, Mwesigye Fred ne Mwambazi Joseph.

headline: Mao wakuddamu okuzimba DP
text: Balintuma Ssenkaggale w’ekibiina ki ‘Democratic Party (DP)’ Nobert Mao, ategeezezza nga ekibiina bwekyakosebwa olw’ ababaka 11 kwabo 15 bekirina okusala eddiiro nebadda mu kibiina ki ‘National unity Platform (NUP)’ wabula bakola buli kimu bano okubazzaawo. Mao nga alayiza abamu ku bakulembeze abaggya Bwabadde ku kitebe ky’ekibiina e Balintuma – Mmengo mu Kampala ku Lwokubiri, Mao agambye nti agenda kukozesa amaanyi gonna galina okuddamu okuzimba DP. “Nze ndi mukuumi wa kibiina sinze nanyini kyo, bagambye omusota bwegubeera nga gweyubula gubeera mukambwe era bwe bukambwe bwemulaba ensangi zino,” Mao bwanyonyodde. Mao bwabadde ku mukolo gw’okulayiza abakulembeze b’ekibiina mu Wakiso ne Kampala agasseeko nti, bangi bakyaggya abantu mu DP kubanga nnyanja ate nga NUP yo eringa ekidiba. Bino byabadde bikyagenda mu maaso newabaawo ekibinja ky’abavubuka abateeberezebwa okubeera aba NUP abasazeeko ekifo kyonna nga bwebayimba ennyimba eziwaana Bobi Wine. Ate ye pulezidenti wa Uganda Young Democrats. Christopher Okidi asekeredde aba NUP abajaganya okufuna ababaka okuva mu DP nti tebalina kyebagasseeko kubanga bano era babadde mu Opozisoni nga tewali kyebagatta ku lutalo lwa kuwangula Pulezidenti Museveni. Eyali omubaka wa Kawempe North Ssebuliba Mutumba agumizza bannakibiina okunywera kubanga kino si bino DP ezze ebiyitamu.

headline: Museveni ayise ababaka e Ntebe bateese ku by’okufiirwa ebifo mu Buganda
text: Kampala Pulezident Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ayise ababaka b’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM) mu maka g’obwapulezidenti, bateese ku byava mu kalulu ka 2021 naddala mu Buganda. Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni Okusinziira ku bubaka obuweerezeddwa Nnampala wa gavumenti eri ababaka bano era bwe tulabyeko, ababaka bano bagenda kusooka kukeberwa kirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ku buwaze okukkirizibwa mu nsisinkano eno. “Mbalamusizza bannange. Nsabiddwa okubategeeza nti tugenda kusisinkana Pulezidenti Museveni ng’akabondo ka NRM enkya ku Lwokuna nga 28th mu maka g’ obwapulezidenti Entebbe. Okukeberwa ekirwadde kya Corona eri abo abayitiddwa kutandika olwaleero ku Lwokusatu ku Palamenti.” Obumu ku bubaka buno obwateereddwa ku Whatsapp bwe busomye. Abamu ku babaka bano bannyonnyodde nti ebimu ku bintu ebiri ku lukalala lwe bye bagenda okuteesaako kwe kukola obubi mu Buganda ne Busoga, ekibiina gye kibadde ekiganzi. Kino kiddiridde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform ekikulirwa Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu okuwangula ebifo ebisinga obungi mu Buganda ne Busoga okuva ku mutendera gw’obwapulezidenti okutuuka wansi. Oluvannyuma lw’ebintu okubeera bwe biti, Pulezidenti Museveni yavaayo n’ategeeza ng’ekitundu kya Buganda bwe kirimu okusosola abatali Baganda. Ono Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yamuwa amagezi asooke akole ku bizibu by’abantu mu Buganda okuli; ebyenjigiriza, obwavu, ebyobulamu awamu ne Federo, kuba buno bwabadde bubaka abantu bwe babadde basindika ku bibaluma so si kusosola mu mawanga.

headline: Museveni bamuwere okuddamu okwesimbawo – Bobi Wine
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, agamba nti kkooti mu ggwanga ziri ku kigezo era ayagala ewere Mwami Museveni obutaddamu kwesimbawo kuba aludde ng’abba akalulu. Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu “Kkooti esazeemu okulonda kuno ne Mwami Museveni bamuwere okwesimbawo bw’ebanga kkooti esala mazima.” Kyagulanyi bw’ategeezezza bannakibiina abaawangulwa mu kalulu ka 2021 b’agamba nti abamu babbibwa. Kyagulanyi agamba nti kkooti eri ku kigezo nga bwe kyali ku kakiiko k’ebyokulonda akakulirwa Omulamuzi Simon Mugenyi Byabakama, kuba bannayuganda bagoberera buli kimu. “Kkooti eri ku kigezo okulaga nti oba ekolera bannayuganda oba esala mazima n’obwenkanya,” Kyagulanyi bw’agasseeko. Ono annyonnyodde nti balina obujulizi bwonna kkooti kw’erina okuyimirira okusazaamu okulonda kuno bw’eba ng’egoberera mazima nga bwe kirina okubeera. Kyagulanyi yeekokkodde ekiwenda kya ‘Pandagaali’ ng’abawagizi baabwe ab’enjawulo bakwatibwa ne basibibwa mu makomera ag’enjawulo gye bali mukutulugunyizibwa ate waliwo n’abaawambibwa n’okutuusa kati nga tewali amanyi gye bali. Ku by’okulumba ogumu ku mikutu gy’amawulire, Kyagulanyi agamba nti bakikoze wakati mu mukwano okulaga obutali bumativu era takyejjusa. Era alowooza nti buli kitongole kyonna ekibeera kikoze ensobi kirina okugambibwako kuba tewali bali waggulu w’amateeka. Ate Ssaabawandiisi wa NUP, Lewis Lubongoya agambye nti bannayuganda balina okusigala n’essuubi kuba kkooti esobola okusala amazima. Lubongoya ategeezezza nti abawagizi baabwe abasoba mu 3000 baawambibwa ate n’abalala tebamanyise wa gye bali nga n’abakulu mu kibiina bali mu kutiisibwatiisibwa. Bano bataddewo ennamba abantu abaawambibwako abaabwe kwe balina okukuba ne babawa ebibakwatako.

headline: Gen. Tumukunde yeetonze ku nsobi ze yakola ng’akyali mu gavumenti
text: Rukungiri Eyeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti, Lt. Gen Henry Tumukunde, yeetondedde bannayuganda ku nsobi ze yakola ng’akyali mu gavumenti, n’asaba bamusonyiwe era bamwesige. Gen. Henry Tumukunde Okwetonda kuno, Gen. Tumukunde, yakukoledde Rukungiri ku Lwokubiri n’annyonnyola nti mwetegefu okukolagana n’omuntu yenna ayagala okuleeta enkyukakyuka mu Uganda, singa abeera aweereddwa omukisa okufuuka Pulezidenti wa Uganda. “Kano ke kaseera ke tulina okukyusizaamu eggwanga lyaffe Uganda. Ndi mwetegefu okukola n’abantu abamaze mu Opozisoni emyaka 10 ate nabo abaakagiyingira ku lw’obulungi bwa Uganda.” Tumukunde bwe yagambye. Tumukunde yannyonnyodde nti enteekateeka y’okufuna avuganya omu ku bwapulezidenti ekyagenda mu maaso, era n’abasaba okuwagira omuntu yenna anaaba alondeddwa. Ono yasabye abantu okuvaayo mu bungi balonde ku lw’enkyukakyuka era bafube okulaba nga bakuuma obululu bwabwe, buleme okubbibwa. Okusooka waabaddewo okuwanyisiganya ebisongovu oluvannyuma lwa poliisi okukuba mu bawagizi ba Tumukunde ttiyaggaasi, bwe baabadde bakung’aanidde mu kifo ewaabadde walina okubeera olukung’aana luno.
