Poliisi yategeezezza nti bano baabadde bajeemedde ebiragiro by’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu Wabula Tumukunde yagambye nti ennamba y’abantu be yabadde nabo yabadde ntono ddala nga tewaabadde nsonga lwaki poliisi yabadde etabangula emirembe gyabwe. Tumukunde yasuubizza okutereeza ebyenjigiriza wamu n’ebyobulamu mu disitulikiti eno ng’abazimbira Ssettendekero n’eddwaliro eddene mu Rukungiri.

headline: Kkooti ejulirwamu egobye okusaba kwa Ssegiriinya ne Ssewanyana okweyimirirwa, Bannamateeka babwe ensonga bazitutte mu kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka
text: Kkooti ejulirwamu egobye okusaba okwassibwayo ababaka Muhammad Ssegirinya owa Kawempe North ne Allan Ssewanyana owa Makindye West, nga bawakanya ensala yómulamuzi wa kooti enkulu e Masaka, Lawrence Tweyanze, eyagaana okubayimbula ku kakalu ka kkooti. Omulamuzi Tweyanze yali yategeeza nti emisango egibavunaanibwa gya Nnaggomola era nga ababaka bano basobola okubaako engeri gyebataataaganya okunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso ku misango gino singa bayimbulwa. Abalamuzi ba kkooti ejulirwamu nga bakulembeddwamu Cheborion Barishaki bategeezezza nti abasibe bano tebaalina ddembe lya kujulira ku kugaanibwa okweyimirirwa wabula baalina kuddayo mu kkooti eyabama okweyimirirwa nebalaba oba bakkirizibwa so si kugenda mu kkooti ejulirwamu kuba tewali musango gwonna gwali gusaliddwa. Abalamuzi bano basabye oludda oluwaabi okwanguya okunnoonyereza mu musango guno bano basobole okutandika okwewozaako. Munnamateeka wa bano, Samuel Muyizzi ategeezezza nti tebagenda kupondooka okutuusa nga amateeka gateekeddwamu ekitiibwa negakola ekyo kyennyini ekyagateekesaawo kuba abali mu gavumenti bakozesa kkooti okulinyirira Ssemateeka. “Tulabye kkooti nga zikozesa amateeka agakolebwa Palamenti n’amateeka amalala okukugira eddembe ly’obuntu ery’obwebange kyokka nga lino lyamuwendo okwenkana obulamu bw’omuntu bwennyini awamu n’eddembe ly’okuwozesebwa mu bwangu era mu bwenkanya nga Ssemateeka bw’alagira,” Munnamateeka Muyizzi bw’agambye. Muyizzi ategeezezza nti kati bakuddukira mu kkooti etaputa Ssemateeka basobole okutaasa ennyingo 23 ne 28 eziwa abantu eddembe lyabwe kuba kkooti zitandise okuwuliriza bannabyabufuzi. Munnamateeka Muyizzi annyonnyodde nti ensala ya kkooti ejulirwamu gyekoze olwa leero eraze nti kiri mu mateeka era kkooti zikkirizibwa okukuumira abantu mu makomera ebbanga lyeyagala ku biragiro bya gavumenti era nawera nti kino bakukiwakanya era balage kkooti ekituufu. Ono agamba nti kati kkooti erina obuyinza okuggyako abantu eddembe lyabwe okweyimirirwa kyagamba nti si kyekyali ekigendererwa kya abantu ababaga Ssemateeka era nategeeza nti buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe okulaba nti abasibe bano abagenda okuweza omwaka mu nkomyo bafuna eddembe lyabwe eribaweebwa Ssemateeka. Mu ngeri yeemu kkooti ewozesa Bakalintalo e Kololo egaanye okukkiriza okusaba kwabwe okweyimirirwa mu mateeka oluvannyuma lw’okuddamu okukwatibwa nga bayimbuddwa, kkooti eno etegeezezza nti wadde bakwatibwa bubi naye ate mu kkomera baliyo mu mateeka.

headline: Sisobola kutwala kifo kya Mumyuka wa Pulezidenti – Kadaga
text: Kampala Sipiika wa Palamenti, Rebecca Kadaga, ategeezezza nti tajja kulekayo kifo kya Sipiika, atwala eky’Omumyuka wa Pulezidenti ng’abamu bwe babadde batandise okumwogereza.  Sipiika Rebecca Kadaga nga awera okweddiza ekifo kye Kadaga ali ku mbiranye n’omumyuka we, Jacob Oulanyah, ayagala okumusuuza ekifo kya Sipiika kw’abadde okuva mu 2011 nga by’ebisanja bibiri. Embiranye ya Kadaga ne Oulanyah etemyemu Palamenti nga buli ludda lwatandise dda okwogereza obubondo n’obubiina obwenjawulo okusobola okuluwagira. Bino we bijjidde ng’ekibiina kya NRM kitegeka okugenda mu lusirika e Kyankwanzi okusalawo anaakwatira ekibiina kkaadi ku Bwasipiika okukubiriza Palamenti y’e 11 etandika mu Gwokutaano.  Sipiika Kadaga alumiriza nga bwe waliwo abantu mu kibiina abamutuukiridde ne bamusaba atwale ekifo ky’Omumyuka wa Pulezidenti wadde ye agamba nti takyagala kuba tekirina buyinza. Kadaga okugaana ekifo ky’Omumyuka wa Pulezidenti yabadde asisinkanye ababaka abava mu Busoga eggulo ku Africana mu Kampala wakati ng’anoonya akalulu. Omubaka wa Munisipaali y’e Iganga mu Palamenti, Peter Mugema Panado n’owa Luuka South, Stephen Kisa, bategeezezza nti nga bo abava e Busoga tebagenda kulonda muntu mulala yenna ku kifo kino okuggyako Kadaga. Abalala abaagala ekifo kino kuliko; munnaFDC, Ibrahim Ssemujju Nganda n’Omubaka Richard Ssebamala. Kadaga era yawakanyizza ebyogerwa nti ab’e Busoga tebawagira gavumenti nga tebasaana kifo kino kuba tebaalonda Pulezidenti Museveni. Ono alaze nti ebbanga lyonna, Busoga ebadde ewagira Museveni wadde ate mu mambuka Museveni abadde akola bubi nnyo naye nga abantu baayo balina agafo mu gavumenti. Kadaga agamba nti ku mulundi guno gwokka NRM lwe yakoze obubi mu Busoga.

headline: Buganda ettukizza okubanja Federo – Minisita Mpanga
text: Masengere Obwakabaka bwa Buganda buzzeemu nate okubanja enfuga ey’enkola ya Federo erudde ng’eyaayaanirwa wabula nga mpaawo kituukibwako, busobole okuyambako gavumenti ku mugugu gwe yeetisse ogw’okulabirira n’okulaakulanya abantu. Minisita wa Buganda ow’ensonga ez’enkizo, Daudi Mpanga y’abotodde ekyama kino bw’abadde mu Masengere olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokusatu. Owek. David Mpanga agambye nti ku luno essira balitadde ku kusomesa bannayuganda ebirungi ebiri mu nfuga eya Federo era bakimanye nti si ya Buganda yokka wabula ya Uganda yonna, era ng’akkiriza nga kino kijja kuyambako okugibanja mu bwangu. “Tugenda kumanyisa era twagazise abantu enkola eno eruubirirwamu okugabana obuyinza, bo bagibanje bannabyabufuzi.” Owek. Mpanga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Owek. Mpanga, ensonga eno tesobola kwawulwa ku byabufuzi kubanga obuyinza kwe butambulira. Ku biriwo, Owek. Mpanga agamba nti enkola ya Federo y’engeri yokka esobola okukkiriza abantu okukola emirimu awatali kwesojja nga bonna balulunkanira obuyinza obwawamu. Ono alaze nti abantu basaanye okukimanya nti Federo etumbula obumu n’enkulaakulana esobola okukuza ebitundu kubanga buli kitundu kya ggwanga kiba kiganyulwa mu bugagga bwakyo.  “Uganda okutebenkera n’okufuna emirembe gye tunoonya twetaaga Federo,” Bw’atyo bw’akkaatirizza. Kinajjukirwa nti Obwakabaka bwa Buganda buludde nga busaba enkola ey’okugabana obuyinza  era ng’ensonga eno yeemu ku biri mu nteekateeka Nnamutayiika y’Obwakabaka ezimanyiddwa nga Ssemasonga ettaano. Era okunnoonyereza okwasemba okukolebwa omulamuzi Benjamin Odoki, kwalaga nti abantu ebitundu 65 ku buli 100 mu bitundu bya Uganda bayaayaanira enfuga eno, wadde tekimanyiddwa lwaki n’okutuuka kati eno teweebwanga bannansi.

headline: Ssentebe w’abavubuka e Ssembabule asattira lwa ssente za Museveni
text: Ssembabule Ssentebe w’abavubuka mu disitulikiti y’e Ssembabule atuuyana zikala, olw’ebigambibwa nti aliko ssente ze yabulankanya nga zino zaali zaakuweebwa bavubuka ku byalo okusobola okunoonyeza Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta akalulu.  Ssentebe w’abavubuka mu Ssembabule Bill Clinton Ssente ezireese leenya ziwera obukade asatu mu kamu mu emitwalo nsavu mu etaano mu enkumi biri (3175200) nga zino zaali zaakuweebwa ebyalo ebiwera 504 ebiri mu Ssembabule. Buli kyalo kyali kyakufuna emitwalo 5, ekintu kye bagamba nti tekyakolebwa.  “Twafuna okwemulugunya nga ssentebe w’abavubuka yafuna obukadde bw’ensimbi 3175200/= nga zaali zaakugenda ku byalo 504 mu Ssembabule era buli kyalo kyalina okufuna 50,000 okunoonyeza Museveni obuwagizi mu kalulu akawede, kyoKka twakizuula nga tezaatuukayo mu bavubuka era kye kimu ku kyaviirako n’omuntu waffe okukola obubi mu kitundu kino.” Omu ku bavubuka Rameka Masiko bwe yagambye. Omwogezi w’abavubuka mu disitulikiti eno, Kamya Kibudiya yategeezezza nti tajja kukkiriza muntu omu kwezibika ssente z’abavubuka era ajja kukola kyonna okusobola okuteekawo obwenkanya. Abavubuka bano balumiriza nti ssentebe waabwe yajingirira ebiwandiiko ebiraga ensaasaanya ya ssente zino era bwe baagezezzaako okuzuula obukakafu bw’ekiwandiiko kino, baakivudde nga zino zaaliibwa bantu ab’olubatu. Ate ye Ssentebe w’abavubuka mu kitundu kino gwe balumiriza, Bill Clinton, akkirizza nti ssente yazifuna wabula zaamuweebwa kikeerezi ne kivaako obutazigaba mu budde era bwe yasalawo okuziwa bassentebe b’eggombolola okuzigabira abavubuka wabula nabo tebaazituusaayo, ekintu ekimwonoonedde erinnya. Yayongeddeko nti abataafuna ssente batuufu okwemulugunya wabula ye alina embalirira entuufu ku nsaasaanya ya ssente zino.

headline: Obwakabaka butangaazizza ku bukadde ebisatu Museveni bweyawa Katikkiro
text: Museveni ng’akwasa Katikkiro kyeke ey’obukadde ebisatu   Obwakabaka Bwa Buganda nga buyitira mu minisita avunaanyizibwa ku Lukiiko, Abagenyi n’Amawulire, Owek. Noah Kiyimba butangaazizza ku bukadde ebisatu, omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni bweyakwasa Katikkiro wiiki ewedde. Mukiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa Owek Kiyimba, kitegeezezza, anti okwawukana kubibadde bibungeesebwa ku mitimbagano egy’enjawulo, essente zino zaaweebwayo mu kaweefube w’okuzzaawo amasiro g’e Kasubi agayokebwa mu 2013.  “Gavumenti ya Uganda ng’egoberera ekiteeso kya kabineeti nayo yawaayo obuwumbi bubiri n’esuubiza nti singa Obwakabaka bunaagiwa embalirira ya ssente zino, baali baakubwongera ssente endala. Kyaddala, enkozesa y’obuwumbi obubiri yabaweebwa era olw’okugisiima, gavumenti yakiriza okwongera Obwakabaka obuwumbi obulala bubiri, ng’akubuno Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ku Mmande nga 18/11/2019 yatuwaddeko obukadde bisatu,” ekiwandiiko bwekyategeezezza.  Ekiwandiiko Mubujjuvu  Mu March 2016, nabbambula w’omuliro yakwata era nasaanyaawo amasiro g’e Kasubi nga gano mwemuterekeddwa ba Ssekabaka ba Buganda bana omuli Muteesa I, Daniel Mwanga, Daudi Chwa ne Edward Muteesa II. Amasiro gano gaalondebwa ekitongole ky’amawanga amagatte ekya Unesco ng’ekimu kubifo ebyenkizo ennyo munsi yonna. Obwakabaka Bwa Buganda bwabakana n’eddimu ly’okugazzaawo okuva mu 2013 oluvanyuma lw’okulondebwa kwa Charles Peter Mayiga kubwa Katikkiro.  Nga buyita munteekateeka ez’enjawulo nga Ettoffaali, Obwakabaka bwakasaasaanya Shs 6, 064,347,329 kuzaawo amasiro gano. Ku buwumbi obuna Obwakabaka bwebwakakunganya, Shs2, 594,879,605 zaakozesebwa mukuzimba bbugwe okwetooloola amasiro gano agawaza yiika 64 okusobola okutangira ababbi n’abasenze okusaalimbira kuttaka lino. Era essente zino zaakozesebwa n’okuddaabiriza Bulinnya, ennyumba entongole Naalinnya w’amasiro mwasula saako n’amayumba amalala abalabirira amasiro mwebasula. Sente zino era zeeyambisibwa mukussa amasanyalaze g’enjuba okwetoolola ekikomera kyonna saako n’amazzi. Gavumenti ya Uganda ng’egoberera ekiteeso kya kabineeti nayo yawaayo obuwumbi bubiri n’esuubiza nti singa Obwakabaka bunaagiwa embalirira ya ssente zino, baali baakubwongera ssente endala. Kyaddala, enkozesa y’obuwumbi obubiri yabaweebwa era olw’okugisiima, gavumenti yakiriza okwongera Obwakabaka obuwumbi obulala bubiri, ng’akubuno Omukulembeze w’eggwanga Yoweri Kaguta Museveni ku Mmande nga 18/11/2019 yatuwaddeko 300,000,000 [obukadde bisatu.]  Omulimu gw’okuzimba Muzibwazaalampanga ng’eno y’ennyumba enkulu kyenkana guwedde. Nga n’akasolya akasinga obuzibu ebitundu kyenda kubuli kikumi kawedde okussibwamu Ddaali [ceiling]. Langi yasiigibwa ku byuma ebiwaniridde akasolya olw’okubitangira okutalagga at era langi eno eyaggyibwa mu Bugirimaani teggya muliro. Gavumenti ya Japan ng’eyita mukitongole kya UNESCO, yasuubiza emitwalo gya doola 500,000 nga zakugula ebyuma ebizikiriza omulro era bino byakuteekebwa mumasiro ng’omulimu gusemberedde okuggwa. Obwakabaka bukola kyonna ekisoboka okulaba ng’amasiro gamalirizibwa kyokka nga buli muzizo saako obulombolombo bwonna mumulimu guno bugobereddwa.  Twebaza buli muntu yenna alina kyeyawaayo omuli essente, ebizimbisibwa saako n’abo abawaddeyo amaanyi gaabwe okulaba ng’amasiro gazimbibwa. Twagala okukakasa abantu ba Buganda nti buli ekirina okukolebwa kiggya kkolebwa okulaba ng’amasiro g’e Kasubi gaddizibwawo kumutindo gwegaaliko kubanga eno y’entabiro y’obuwangwa bwaffe.

headline: Poliisi : Bobi Wine tumutwala Magere
text: Kampala Poliisi evuddeyo n’esaba abantu ab’enjawulo obutagendera ku mawulire gatambuzibwa ku mutimbagano agalaga nga eyeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine bwakwatiddwa e Kalangala gy’abadde anoonya akalulu. Ennyonyi egambibwa okuggya Kyagulanyi ku kizinga okumuzza e Kampala “Twagala okutangaaza nti eyeesimbyewo ono agaaniddwa kwongera kukuba nkung’aana olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyeyongedde awamu n’okujeemera ebiragiro by’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda wamu ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu. Ono azziddwayo e Kampala mu maka ge e Magere,” ekiwandiiko kya poliisi bwe kitegeezezza. Kino kiddiridde abantu ab’enjawulo okutandika okwekalakaasa okuggala enguudo n’okwekalakaasa nga bawakanya eky’okumukwata. Ku makya ga leero waliwo ennyonyi y’amagye eyasindikiddwa e Kalangala, nga Bobi Wine agendayo era ng’eno y’egambibwa okweyambisibwa okumuggya ku kizinga kino. Poliisi era ekakasizza nga bwe waliwo abamu ku ba ttiimu ya Kyagulanyi abakwatiddwa olw’okulabikira ku butambi bwa Kkamera nga baggya omupiira mu mmotoka za poliisi, okukuma mu bantu omuliro n’okulemesa abapoliisi okukola emirimu gyabwe. Okusinziira ku ntegeka z’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda, olwaleero Kyagulanyi abadde alina kubeera Kalangala era ku makya e Kidyeri ekyatutte emmotoka za Kyagulanyi era ze zaatutte n’ebimmotoka bya ttiyaggaasi. Bannamawulire ababadde bakwata amawulire nabo poliisi tebatalizza wadde ng’oluvannyuma bano bayimbuddwa. Ab’ebyokwerinda okuli; poliisi ekkakkanya obujagalalo wamu ne bannamagye be bayunguddwa okuyambako poliisi y’omu kitundu kino okukkakkanya embeera ebadde etandise okwonooneka. Mu kulonda okuwedde mu 2016, Pulezidenti Museveni yawangula ekitundu kya Kalangala n’ebitundu 53 ku buli 100 ate nga munne bwe baali ku mbiranye Dr. Kizza Besigye, yafuna ebitundu 42 ku buli 100.

headline: Buganda ekyayaayanira enfuga ya Federo – Minisita Kyewalabye
text: Minisita w’obuwangwa, ennono, olulimi, embirin’ebyobulambuzi mu Bwakabaka, Owek. David Kyewalabye Male ategeezezza nga Buganda bw’ekyayaayanira okufuna enfuga ya Federo, kigiyambe okugabana ku kkeeki y’eggwanga mu bwenkanya. Bino Owek. Kyewalabye abyogeredde mu nsisinkano gy’abaddemu ne Minisita wa gavumenti erindiridde (Alternative Government) avunaanyizibwa ku biyiiye, ebyemizannyo n’ebyobuwangwa; Omubaka Hillary Kiyagaamusanze mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Mmande okwegeyaamu ku nsonga ezitali zimu. Owek. Kyewalabye ategeezezza nti beetaaga Federookukola ku nsonga z’abantu baabwe, olwo gavumenti efune omukisa okwemalira ku nsonga ennene ez’eggwanga lyonna nga ne Buganda mw’eri. “Buganda ekyayaayanira enfuga eya Federo esobole okuwulira nti egabana ku kkeeke ya Uganda kyenkanyi. Waliwo w’olaba obutali bwenkanya; bw’otunuulira ebibuga ebikoleddwa, Kabaka yamala kusaba, eky’e Masaka ne bakituwa! Bw’otunuulira Munisipaali n’ebibuga ebitondeddwawo, ebyaffe bitono nnyo, ababaka abaffe batono nnyo bw’ogeraageranya n’abalala.”Minisita Kyewalabye bw’agambye. Ono asabye ababaka okwegatta ku nsonga za Buganda ng’obubondo bw’ebitundu ebirala bwe bukola era bakomye n’omuze gw’okusooka okubuuza ebibiina byabwe we biyimiridde ku nsonga za Buganda. Owek. Kyewalabye ababaka abasabye bakimanye nti ensonga za Buganda ze nsonga zaabwe awamu n’abantu baabwe, kuba Omutanda ayagala okulaba ng’embeera y’abantu be erongooka buli lukya. Ono alaze nga bwe baliko olukalala lw’ebifo eby’ennono bye baagala Palamenti ekkirize bifuuke eby’obulambuzi mu ggwanga, kuba byankizo ebisobola okuleeta kuno ensimbi. Mu kwogera kwe, Dr. Hillary Kiyaga agambye nti okuva lwe yakwasibwa minisitule eno, asanze okusoomoozebwa kungi mu bavubuka naddala bannabitone abeetaaga oukwasizaako n’okulambikibwa okuva mu Bwakabaka. Kiyaga agambye ntinga Minisita ku ludda oluvuganya agenda kukunga banne okulaba engeri gye basobola okutumbula enteekateeka z’Obwakabaka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula abantu be.

headline: Sipiika Kadaga alagidde ekkomera  ly’e Kitalya linoonyerezebweko
text: Kampala Sipiika wa Palamenti, Rebecca Kadaga, alagidde akakiiko akakola ku ddembe ly’obuntu okugenda e Kitalya okunoonyereza ku bigambibwa nti abasibe bangi batulugunyizibwa mu kkomera lino era baleete alipoota ku basibe abaliyo n’embeera mwe bali. Kino kiddiridde omubaka w’ekibuga kya Mityana, Francis Zzaake, okutegeeza Palamenti nti abamu ku bawagizi b’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform abaggalirwa mu kkomera eryo bali mu mbeera mbi nga bangi ku bano bagaanibwa okulaba abasawo okubekebejja. Bino we bijjidde ng’Omubaka omulonde owa Kawempe North, Muhammad Sseggirinya, yaakamala okuddusibwa e Nairobi mu Kenya nga kigambibwa nti ono yatulugunyizibwa byansusso bwe yali mu kkomera e Kitalya. Omubaka Zaake yannyonnyodde nti bwe yagenyiwaddeko mu kkomera e Kitalya okulaba abasibe baabwe, yabasanze mu mbeera mbi era nga beetaaga obujjanjabi obwamangu. “Oluvannyuma lw’okumala akaseera ng’angaaniddwa  okukyala e Kitalya, banzikirizza naye nasanze abawagizi baffe bali mu mbeera mbi nga balumizibwa mu lubuto, baweebwa akawunga akatayidde ate nga n’ebyobuyonjo biri mu mbeera mbi.” Zaake bwe yategeezezza palamenti ku Mmande. Okusinziira ku Zaake, abasibe bwe balwala baweebwa Panadol nga tebafuddeyo ku kituufu ekibaluma. Wano Sipiika Kadaga we yasinzidde n’alagira akakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu okugendayo badde ne alipoota. “Twagala alipoota mu bwangu. Njagala okulagira akakiiko k’eddembe ly’obuntu okutunula mu nsonga eno.” Sipiika Kadaga bwe yannyonnyodde.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni akungubagidde Pulezidenti wa Chad eyattiddwa
text: Kampala Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni akungubagidde Pulezidenti wa Chad Idriss Deby Itno eyattiddwa abayeekera nabagamba nti Afirika nga Ssemazinga afiiriddwa nnyo.  Deby  yalangiriddwa ku Lwokubiri lwa wiiki eno nti yafudde oluvannyuma lw’okufuna ebisago ebyamaanyi bweyali agenze mu lutalo gyezivugira wakati w’abayeekera n’abajaasi ba gavumenti. Mu bubaka bwe obukubagiza, Museveni atenderezza Deby nga munywanyi we gwagenda okusubwa era nagamba nti kya nnaku okuba nti yafudde mu nfa bwetyo. “Ebizibu ebyagudde e Chad bimenya omutima. Nsaasira bannansi ba Chad, famire ya Pulezidenti Idris Deby Itno wamu naabo abaagaliza Africa ebirungi,” Museveni bw’agambye. Museveni annyonnyodde nti Pulezidenti Deby abadde tadduka kusomoozebwa kwonna naddala okwa bannalukalala era yafudde akikola. Deby  abadde munywanyi wa Museveni era y’omu ku bakulembeze b’amawanga 14 abeetaba mukulayiza Pulezidenti Musevebi mu 2016 ku kisaawe e Kololo. Era ne Deby bweyali alayira mu August wa 2016 ku kisanja kye eky’okutaano Pulezidenti Museveni yaliwo bulungi nnyo mu kibuga ekikulu  N’Djamena. Kinajjukirwa nti amawulire g’okufa kwa Deby gafulumye wakayita ennaku mbale nga alangiriddwa nga omuwanguzi w’akalulu k’obwapulezidenti akakubiddwa ku ntandika y’omwezi guno. Ono abadde amaze mu buyinza emyaka 30, obubonero bwonna bulaga nti mutabani we, Gen Mahamat Idriss,  yalondeddwa dda okukulira akakiiko k’amajje akagenda okukulembera eggwanga eryo okumala emyezi 18.

headline: Bobi Wine alabudde ababaka ba NUP ku butego bwa M7 obwa ssente n’ebifo
text: Kampala Pulezidenti w’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine) alabudde abakaka abagendedde ku kkaadi ya NUP okwewala okugwa mubutego bwapulezidenti Museveni obwokuweebwa ebifo ne ssente nga abasaba okumwegattako. Kyagulanyi n’ababaka mu nsisinkano e Magere  Okulabula kuno Kyagulanyi akukoledde mu makaage e Magere bwabadde asisinkanye ababaka ba NUP abayiseemu mubitundu eby’enjawulo olwaleero ku Lwokubiri. “Gavumenti egenda kubawa ssente era nkakasa mwawulidde Pulezidenti Museveni nga yewera okumalawo ekibiina kyaffe. Bagenda kubalonda ku bwaminisita era singa ogaana bajja kukutiisa okukusiba naye mbasaba tuleme kuyiwa bantu baffe,” Kyagulanyi bw’ agambye. Kyagulanyi guno gwe mulundi ogusoose okwogerako ne bannamawulire okuva ku kulonda kwa January 14 lweyasibira ewaka gyabadde okumala ennaku 11 okutuusa eggulo kkooti lweyalagidde abakuumaddembe okumuviira. Bobi Wine ababaka abakuutidde obuteerabira bizibu bya bantu ababalonze era nabategeeza nti balina okulaba nga eddoboozi ly’abantu liwulirwa era oyo yenna anaava ku bantu kyebamutumye yenenyanga yekka. Ono agambye nti ababaka bano balina okukimanya nti balina omulimu nga abavubuka b’omugigi guno okukomya obukulembeze bwa Pulezidenti Museveni baleme kwemalira ku bifo byebawangudde. “Tulina omulimu nga abavubuka b’omugigi guno era mwebaduumizi, njagala buli omu ku mmwe afuuke Kyagulanyi buli wemuli,” Bobi Wine bw’ annyonnyodde. Bano Kyagulanyi yabategeezezza nga bwalina bingi eby’okubagamba nga bannamawulire tebaliiwo. Ku byalangirirwa omulamuzi Byabakama, Kyagulanyi yafuna ebitundu 34% nawangulwa Museveni nebitundu 58%. Ono agambye nti akalulu kano yakawangula era agenda kukozesa amakubo gonna agalagirwa mu mateeka okununula obuwanguzi bwa bannayuganda.

headline: Akalulu Kazitoye: Kabuleeta alemereddwa okukuba enkung’aana e Kyotera, Rakai ne Lwengo
text: Avuganya ku bwapulezidenti, Joseph Kabuleta, ng’ono talina kibiina kw’ajjidde, olunaku lw’eggulo yalemereddwa okunoonya akalulu mu disitulikiti y’e Kyotera, Rakai ne Lwengo nga bwe yabadde ategese. Avuganya ku bwapulezidenti  Joseph Kabuleta Bannamawulire mu kitundu kino bakedde naye z’agenze okuwera essaawa kkumi (10) ez’olweggulo nga tewali kabonero kalaga nti Kabuleta waakulabikako. Woofiisi ya Kabuleta ekwasaganya kkampeyini ze, yategeezezza nti waabaddewo ensonga ezaabadde tezinnamalirizibwa mu Kampala nga Kabuleeta ze yabadde asoose okukolako. Ate ye omukwanaganya wa kkampeyini ze, Godwin Matsiko, ategeezezezza nti baaluddewo okutegeeza abawagizi baabwe mu kitundu kino naye Kabuleeta yabadde alina leediyo z’alina okubeerako mu Kampala nga kyabadde tekisoboka kukwata budde. Kabuleta si ye yekka eyaakasazaamu enteekateeka z’okukuba kkampeyini mu disitulikiti zino ng’eyasooka yali Willy Mayambala eyalemesebwa olw’obuzibu bw’ebyenfuna wadde ng’ono yaddamu okusaba akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okumukkiriza addemu anoonye akalulu mu kitundu kino. Bino we bijjidde ng’abeesimbyewo naddala ku mutendera gw’Obwapulezidenti bali mu kutalaaga ebitundu by’eggwanga ebyenjawulo nga banoonya akalulu akayinza okubatuusa ku ntebe ennene.

headline: “Ekya aboopozisoni okuzira entuula za Palamenti tekijja kukosa ntambula ya mirimu”
text: Minisita w’ebyamawulire n’okulung’amya eggwanga, Dr. Chris Baryomunsi ategeezezza nga eky’ababaka ku ludda oluvuganya okwekandagga ne bafuluma Palamenti nti, tekirina ngeri yonna gye kigenda kutataaganyaamu mirimu gya Palamenti. Okusinziira ku Baryomunsi, ababaka ba NRM bangi, ekimala okuweza omuwendo gw’essalira ogukkirizibwa Palamenti okugenda mu maaso. Kino kiddiridde ababaka ba Opozisoni okulangirira ku Lwokusatu nga bwe batagenda kuddamu kulinnya kigere mu Palamenti okutuusa nga bannaabwe okuli; Allan Ssewanyana ne Muhammad Ssegirinya, bayimbuddwa mu bwenkanya. Ssewanyana ne Ssegirinya bavunaanwa emisango egyekuusa ku ttemu ly’ebijambiya e Masaka awamu n’obutujju era babadde bakaddamu okukwatibwa oluvannyuma lw’okuyimbulwa ku kakalu ka kkooti. “Aba Opozisoni basobola okwekandaggane bafuluma naye tekisobola kulemesa Palamenti kugenda mu maaso. Batono nnyo mu Palamenti era ne we batali tubadde tutuula.” Baryomunsi bw’ategeezezza bannamawulire. Ono annyonnyodde nti nga gavumenti baakugenda mu maaso n’okukola emirimu gyabwe mu Palamenti okutuusa ng’aba Opozisoni beenyudde ne bakomawo. Baryomunsi agamba nti aba Opozisoni okwekandagga kyabadde tekyetaagisa kuba ababakabano bajja kuyimbulwa mu kaseera akatuufu kuba okunoonyereza ku misango gyabwe kugenda mu maaso. Abakulembeze ab’enjawulo naddala ku ludda oluvuganya batenderezzaekikolwa kya Opozisoni kino eky’okufuluma. Omuloodi wa Kampala era munnamateeka w’ababaka bano, Erias Lukwago yalaze nti kyabadde kigwanidde era baakikoze mu mirembe kuba baabadde balaga obutali bumativu ku ngeri ensonga eno gy’ekwatiddwamu.

headline: 4 bavudde mu lwokaano lwa Lubaga South, balekedde Mukaaku
text: Bya Gladys Nanyombi Lubaga Akalulu katuuse wekanyumira, abeesimbyewo  mu lwokaano lw’omubaka wa Lubaga South mu Palamenti abawera bana, basazeewo okuwagira munnakibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP) Samuel Walter Lubega Mukaaku ku kifo kino. Mukaaku wamu n’abamwegasseeko Bano okuli; Joel Yiga, Masembe Moses, Ssemusu Mugobansonga ne Denis Kiyingi bategeezezza olupapula luno olwa Gambuuze nti, beetunuddemu nebalaba nga Mukaaku abasinza obuwagizi era ajja kusobola okutuusayo ensonga zabwe. “Bwetwabadde mu nteseganya, nze nabadde omukubiriza w’enkiiko zonna era mubwerufu twagenze mu maaso n’okuba akalulu era kawanguddwa Lubega Mukaaku,”Omu ku babadde bavuganya ku kifo kino Denis Kiyingi bweyategeezezza. Wabula bino Aloysious Mukasa ali ku mbiranye ne Mukaaku yabiwakkanyiza nagamba nti, olukiiko olw’engeri eno terunabaawo bano bali mu katemba wabwe, yye akalulu akyakalimu. Ate yye Masembe Moses yagambye nti, Mukaaku bamuwadde omukisa nga bbo abavubuka era namulabula nti singa ava ku bigendererwa bya NUP bakukola kyonna ekisoboka okudda bamwesimbeko. Mukaaku yeebazizza banne era nalaga nti, mwetegefu okukyusa ekitundu kya Lubaga South wamu nokwongera okutunda ekibiina ki NUP mu bantu. “Ndi mwetegeefu okwanganga ekifo ekimpereddwa era singa mba nkwasiddwa Kaadi ya NUP, nkakasa nti benvuganya nabo mu bibiina ebirala njakubawangula,” Mukaaku bweyanyonyodde. Mukaaku yakkiriza nti, ekibiina tekinavaayo mubutongole kulaga gwebagenda kuwa kkaadi naye ye n’abamuvuganya basazeewo bawewule ku mulimu gw’ ekibiina mukukkiriziganya. Mukaaku yakakasizza nti, ku lw’ekibiina nebwabeera tawereddwa kkaadi mwetegefu okuwagira oyo anabeera ayiseemu mu mazima n’obwenkanya era ajja kumunoonyeza akalulu. Abawagizi b’ekibiina ki NUP mu Lubaga basiimye ekikolwa ekyakoleddwa Kiyingi ne banne nebategeeza nti kiraga obuzira n’okwagaliza abalala.

headline: Busiro North: Kkooti egaanye eyavunya owa NUP Paul Nsubuga okwongera ku bujulizi
text: Omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu mu Kampala, Dr. Winfred Nabisinde agaanye okusaba kw’eyavuganya mu kalulu ka Busiro North aka 2021, Edgar Lubadde mwe yali ayagalira okuwaayo obujulizi obupya obwoleka nga munnakibiina kya NUP,Paul Nsubuga bw’atasaanidde kubeera mubaka wa kitundu kino. Kino kiddiridde bannamateeka ba Lubadde okuleeta ensonga empya ezira ng’omubaka omulonde owa Busiro North bwe yajingirira emikono gy’abantu be yakozesa okumusemba, asobole okwesimba ku kifo kino. Bannamateeka bano baategeezezzakkooti nti balina obujulizi obupya omwabadde n’ebbaluwa y’omukugu wa poliisi eyakola okunoonyereza n’akizuula nti emikono gino gyali mijingirire era nga baali baagala kkooti ebakkirize babugatte ku bwe baamala edda okuwa kkooti. Kino kkooti ekigaanye ng’egamba nti ensonga ezibadde zinokoddwayo zibadde zireetawo ensonga empya ezitaali mu mpaaba yaabwe eyasooka. Dr.Nabisinde annyonnyodde nti obudde bw’abadde buweddeyo nga noolwekyo abadde tasobola kukkiriza kusaba kwa bano. Lubadde eyafuna obululu 199 ate Nsubuga n’afuna obululu 21400 ayagala kkooti esazeemu obuwanguzi bwa Nsubuga ng’amulanga okujingirira empapula z’obuyigirize ze yawa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda ng’agenda okwewandiisa. Ono alumirizzanti amannya g’omubaka ono amatuufu ye Mukalazi Peternga mutabani wa Mathias Kibuuka ne Agnes Nabawanuka ab’e Kakooge Ssentema, mu ggombolola y’e Kakiri mu Wakiso so si Paul Nsubuga nga bw’ayagala okulimba ensi.

headline: Sseggirinya ayimbuddwa ku kakalu kkooti
text: Jinja Omulamuzi wa kkooti esookerwako e Jinja, Annie Kyomuhangi, ayimbudde eyeesimbyewo ku bubaka bwa Kawempe North mu Palamenti, Muhammad Sseggirinya ku kakalu ka kkooti.  Sseggirinya yakwatibwa wiiki ewedde e Nalufenya mu Jinja bwe yali aweereza butereevu obubaka ku mukutu gwe ogwa Facebook, ab’obuyinza bwe bagamba nti bwali bukuma mu bantu omuliro. Ono yavunaanibwa okukuma mu bantu omuliro wamu n’okukuba olukung’aana olumenya amateeka era n’asindikibwa mu kkomera e Kirinnya gy’abadde akuumirwa okutuuka olwaleero. Munnamateeka wa Sseggirinya, Shamim Malende, asabye kkooti okukkiriza omuntu we okweyimirirwa kubanga omusango ogumuvunaanibwa gumu ku ejjo egikkirizibwa okweyimirirwa. Omulamuzi alagidde Sseggirinya okuwaayo akakalu ka kakadde kalamba akatali ka buliwo ate abamweyimiridde okuli; Andrew Muwanguzi akulira NUP mu Busoga ne Molson Bizitu Sipiika w’ekibuga ky’e Jinja buli omu okusasula akakadde kamu akatali kabuliwo. Kyomuhangi alagidde Sseggirinya okudda mu kkooti nga 15/ December/2020 okuddamu okuwulira omusango ogumuvunaanwa. Munnamateeka Malembe asabye kkooti eragire poliisi okuddiza Ssegirinya essimu ze zirumamyo ebbiri, paasipooti, endagamuntu wamu n’emmotoka ye ebyatwalibwa poliisi ng’akwatibwa. Malende era ategeezezza kkooti ng’ekiseera Sseggirinya kye yamaze ng’aggaliddwa ku poliisi e Nalufenya, bwe yagaanibwa okulabibwako abooluganda lwe ne bannamateeka be, ekintu ekimenya amateeka.

headline: Gen Otafiire: “Pulezidenti bwe bamulondera mu Palamenti olwo ekyatulwanya tekibeeramu makulu”
text: Minisita w’ensonga z’omunda mu ggwanga, Maj Gen Kahinda Otafiire agamba nti Palamenti singa kagitanda n’ekola enkyukyuka mu Ssemateeka, Pulezidenti n’atandika okulondebwaababaka; olwo emyaka etaano gye bamala nga balwana mu nsiko okuggyako gavumenti eyaliko, olutalo olwo luba teruliimu makulu wadde akatono. Bino Otafiire yabyogedde ku wiikendi bwe yabadde awaayo pulojekiti ez’enjawulo ezakoleddwa eggye lya UPDF nga lijaguza emyaka 41 egy’olunaku lwa Tarehe Sita egyakwatiddwa e Mbale. Otafiire agamba nti buno bubeera bufere bwennyini kuba NRM ekyagitwala mu nsiko kwali kulwanirira demokulaasiya n’okuwa bannayuganda eddembe lyabwe okwerondera omukulembeze gwe baagala nga bayita mu kalulu. “Olwo olutalo teruba na makulu kuba ezimu ku zino ensonga zennyini ze zatutwala mu nsiko.” Minisita Otafiire bwe yagambye. Ono era alabudde ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda okuli amagye ne poliisi okukomya okutulugunya abantu n’okubakuba kuba si nte era n’asaba kino kikome mu bwangu kuba kisiikuula bannansi emitima n’okunafuya gavumenti ya NRM. Okusinziira ku Otafiire, poliisi n’amagye biringa bya nnyanja ebyetaaga amazzi okubeerawo era nga mu nsonga eno bannayuganda ge mazzi agalina okubibeezaawo. Otafiire yagguddewo ekizimbe kya bibiina bisatu ku ssomero lya Manjiya Primary School,ekirala kya bibiina bibiri ku Umayoka Primary Schoolawamu n’ekizimbe okuli kaabuyonjo n’ebinaabiro ebigenda okukozesebwa abakyala abasulirira okuzaala ku Bukigai Health Centre III.

headline: Poliisi etandise omuyiggo gw’ abakoze efujjo mukuziika Jakana Nadduli
text: Poliisi y’eggwanga etandise omuyiggo ku bawagizi ba NRM naba NUP abalwanidde mu maka ga Hajji Abdul Nadduli bwebabadde baziika mutabani we Jakana Nadduli eyafudde olunaku lw’eggulo ku Mmande. Jakana Nadduli yasangiddwa mu makaage nga afiridde mu buliri wabula abantu ab’enjawulo naddala bannabyabufuzi batandise okubaako bebasongamu nga bagamba nti balina kyebamanyi ku nfa ya Jakana. Era wano Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yalagidde wabeewo okunoonyerea ku nfa ya Jakana ensi esobole okutegeera ekituufu. Wabula eggulo mu kumuziika e Kadunda – Kapeeka mu Nakaseke aba NRM nga bakuliddwamu Mpologoma Majjambere balwanaganye naba NUP oluvannyuma lwa Majjambere okubalemesa okwogera era omukolo negusooka gusanyalalamu okumala akaseera. Ekiwandiiko ekifulumiziddwa poliisi ku Lwokubiri, Omwogezi wa poliisi Fred Enanga agamba nti batandise okunoonyereza ku fujjo lino awamu n’akabinja k’abavubuka akamu akeefudde ekirala mu kutabangula emirembe. “ Waliwo aba Opozison abeeyisa mu ngeri etasaana ku mikolo gy’okuziika. Tulabula abantu bano era tubakowoola okwewala embeera eno kuba si ya buntubulamu,” Enanga bw’agambye. Ono alabudde abo bonna ababadde bakola kino okwewala okutabiikiriza eby’obufuzi mu kufa n’ ennyimbe kuba akaseera kano tekasosola era tekasanaamu bukyaayi. Enanga agamba nti bagenda kunoonya buli muntu eyakoze efujjo ekika kino ewa Nadduli asobole okusimbibwa mu mbuga z’amateeka era avunaanibwe. Enanga agamba nti abakugu bapoliisi bamaze dda okugenda mu ddwaliro lye Nakasero ewali abamu ku bakoseddwa nga ebiwundu byebafunya byakuyamba nnyo mukunoonyereza kwebaliko nga Poliisi.

headline: Ssegiriinya ne Ssewanyana bazziddwayo ku alimanda
text: Omulamuzi mu kkooti e Masaka, Christine Nantege azzeemu okusindika ababaka; Muhammed Ssegiriinya owa Kawempe North ne Allan Ssewannyana owa Makindye West ku alimanda okutuusa nga 23 omwezi guno. Omuwaabi wa gavument Richard Birivumbuka ategeezezza kkooti nti okunoonyereza ku misango gy’ababaka tekunnaggwa bw’atyo n’asaba okwongerwako akadde. Kino kitabudde puliida w’ababaka bano Shamim Malende n’ategeeza omulamuzi nti omuwaabi wa gavumenti kati atandise kumalira kkooti budde kuba buli lukya ajjuliza kimu nti okunoonyereza tekunnaba kuggwa wabula naye ekituufu akimanyi nti tebalina bujulizi buluma babaka bano.  Kino kireetedde maama w’omubaka Ssegiriinya ne mukyala we okutema omulanga n’ategeeza nti gavumenti eyitiridde okulemesa mutabani we okufuna obwenkanya kuba ebbanga ly’amaze ku alimanda lisusse obungi. Ababaka bano bamaze ku alimanda emyezi 6 oluvannyuma lw’okukwatibwa ne baggulwako emisango egiwera omuli obutemu, okugezaako okutemula awamu n’okuyambako ku bikolwa by’obutujju nga bino byonna byekuusa ku ttemu ly’ebijambiya ebyali mu kitundu ky’e Masaka omwaka oguwedde. Wabula ababaka bano bombi olunwe balusonze mu gavumenti gye bagamba nti emisango yagibateekako olw’okuba bava mu kibiina kya NUP ng’ettemu lino tebalimanyiko.

headline: AKAMYUFU KA NRM : Muwala wa Kuteesa agaanye ebyavuddemu, agamba baamubbye
text: Abadde avuganya ku bbendera y’ekibiina kya NRM mu Mawogola North era muwala wa Minisita Sam Kuteesa, Shartis Musherure, awakanyizza ebyavudde mu kamyufu k’eggulo ng’alumiriza muganda wa Pulezidenti Museveni, Aine Kaguta Sodo nti, akalulu yakakuttemu.  Godfrey Aine Sodo Kaguta alangiriddwa ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda mu NRM ku buwanguzi n’obululu 17343 munne Musherure yafunye 16104 ate Salim Kisekka n’akung’aanya 4274. Oluvannyuma lw’okulangirira Sodo, Mushereru yalagiriddewo nti abbiddwa era n’agamba nti okwemulugunya kwe agenda kukuteeka mu buwandiike era asuubira abakulu okukutunulamu. “Akalulu kabuzeemu obwerufu era tekabadde ka bwenkanya. Sigenda kukkiriza bivuddemu. Tetuwanguddwa wabula batubbye.” Mushereru bwe yagambye. Ebimu ku bintu Mushereru byawakanya ky’ekyokuba ng’ebyavudde mu byalo mukaaga byalaze nti teyafunyeeyo wadde akalulu akamu ng’obululu bwonna bwatwaliddwa Aine, ky’agamba nti tekisoboka mu kalulu ak’amazima. “Ng’enda kuwaayo okwemulugunya kwange naddala ku byalo bino omukaaga byesaamatidde era nsuubira nti akakiiko k’ebyokulonda kajja kuwa ensala yaako ku nsonga eno.”Mushereru bwe yasuubizza. Ono alumiriza nga bweyafunye obululu 345 ku kyalo ky’e Kikoma kyokka ate Dr. Tanga Odoi n’alagirira baddemu balonde ng’abantu baabadde baamaze okugenda. Okusinziira ku Mushereru kino kyakoleddwa mu byalo ebiwerako kyabagamba nti lyabadde kkobaane. “Kisoboka okufuna abalonzi abatono naye obutafuna wadde akalulu akamu, kitegeeza nti tulinga abataalonze era twetaaga okumanya lwaki. Mushereru. Yagumizza abawagizi be nga eno bweri entandikwa era ng’ajja kulwana masajja okutuuka nga bafunye obuwanguzi bwabwe obwabanyagiddwako.Mushereru bweyabuuziddwa oba ng’anajja mu kalulu kano nga talina kkaadi ya kibiina, yagambye nti obudde bukyali okusalawo ku nsonga eno. Akalulu kano kaalina kubeerawo nga 4/09/2020, naye olw’emivuyo n’okulwanagana wakati w’enjuyi zino zombi, kaayongerwayo okutuuka olunaku lw’eggulo. Kino kyawaliriza abakulira eby’okwerinda okusisinkana enjuyi zombi okusala amagezi akalulu kano kalondebwe mu mirembe. Ku lunaku lw’akalulu, amyuka Ssaabaddumizi wa Poliisi, Sabbiiti Muzeeyi awamu n’akulira bambega Grace Akullo, baasiibye Mawogola okulaba nga batangira ebiyinza okutabula akalulu. Akalulu kano ke kamu kaawaliriza Pulezidenti Museveni okuvaayo n’atangaaza nga bwe yali takaliimu era nga wadde abakalimu bombi ba ng’anda ze naye yabalabula obutakozesa linnya lye.

headline: Abantu 500 bokka be bayitiddwa okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Kampala Enteekateeka z’okuziika Ssaabasumba wa Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kiziito Lwanga nga zigenda mu maaso, Ekereziya Katolika evuddeyo n’etegeeza nti abantu 500 bokka be bagenda okukkirizibwa okuziika era nti bano baamaze dda n’okutegeezebwa ku nteekateeka eno. Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa nkya munda mu Ekereziya ya Lubaga wabula abakulu ba Ekereziya bategeezezza nti okusalawo ku muwendo gw’abantu kyakoleddwa okusobola okutangira ensaasaana ya Ssennyiga kolona.  “Tukimanyi nti buli muntu alina eddembe okukungubaga era tewali asaana kulimuggyako mu buli mbeera wabula waliwo abantu abalondeddwa Ekereziya n’aboobuyinza mu Gavumenti. Abo be bagenda okukiikirira ffe abalala  olw’okuba nti tuli mu biseera bya Ssenyiga Kolona.” Rev.Fr. Nicholas Mulumba omwogezi w’Obusumba bwa Kampala bw’ategeezezza. Rev.Fr Mulumba era ayongedde n’atangaaza ku nsonga eno nti tewali kya njawulo kyesigamiziddwako okulonda abantu abagenda okuziika okuggyako okuba nti bakulisitu ate nga beebo abalina akakwate akaamaanyi ku mugenzi. Ono yeegattidwako omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Oweyesigire, akkaatirizza nti bagenda kubeera bulindaala nnyo ku nsonga y’okutangira  ekirwadde kya Kolona okusaasaana era n’asaba abakungubazi okukakasa nti bambala obukookolo bwabwe. Ono era alabudde nti wagenda kubaawo okutataaganya eby’entambula naddala ku nguudo ezolekera Ekereziya ye Lubaga. Wano agambye nti abavuzi ba boodabooda tebagenda kukkirizibwa ku nguudo zino okuggyako nga balina ebipapula (stickers) ate nga nabo bagenda kulambikibwa enguudo ze banaakozesa.  Ssaabasumba Lwanga yasangibwa mu kisenge kye ng’afudde ku Lwomukaaga kumakya ng’entabwe yava ku kirwadde kya mutima. Ono yafiiridde ku myaka 68, wabula ng’abadde Ssaabasumba okumala emyaka 15.

headline: Abakulu mu poliisi bagenze ewa Bisoopu Kaggwa okumwetondera
text: Masaka Abanene mu poliisi beesitudde nebagenda ew’Omusumba w’essaza ly’e Masaka eyawummula, John Baptist Kaggwa, bamwetondere ku kikolwa kya basajja baayo okukuba ttiyaggaasi mu Mmisa wamu n’okulagira abaabadde bakung’aanye buli omu okulaba eryamuleese. Afande Kasingye ne Ttiimu ye nga beetongera Omusumba Kaggwa Ku bano kubaddeko akwanaganya poliisi n’ebyobufuzi, Asan Kasingye, akulira eby’okuketta mu poliisi, Ddamulira Christopher SSerunjogi, n’akulira eby’obutendekebwa Godfrey Ggoloba. Abapoliisi bamusanze mu maka ge ku ssaza e Kitovu era ng’ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu n’Omusumba wa Masaka aliko mu kiseera kino, Omusumba Serverus Jjumba. Kasingye asoose kwetonda ku ebyo ebyaliwo n’asaba abo bonna abategeka emikolo okusookanga okufuna olukkusa kubanga ekiseera kye tulimu kya Ssennyiga Corona. “Nze nga munnaddini nabasonyiwa dda kuba kiri mu nzikiriza yaffe okusonyiwa.” Omusumba Kaggwa bw’ategezezza nga yaakatandika okwogera. Omusumba Kaggwa agambye nti abapoliisi tebaawa bantu bali Mugulu kwennyonnyolako era ng’embeera y’obunkenke gyebaateekamu abantu yali teyeetaagisa era nga n’ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona byali bikwatiddwa bulungi. Era Omusumba abasabye ab’ebyokwerinda okukolayo ekiwandiiko ekyetondera eggwanga lyonna olwebyo bye bakoze, kisobole okuzza emitima gy’abantu. Kasingye yeebazizza Omusumba Kaggwa olw’okubasonyiwa n’asuubizza nti bagenda kubagawo ekiwandiiko ekyetonda mu butongole eri bannansi era nga kino kkopi bajja kugiweerezaako akulira olukiiko lw’abasumba, Katikkiro wa Buganda wamu n’abeekika ky’Embogo. Ye ate Omusumba w’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, alaze obwennyamivu ku bikolwa bya poliisi era n’abasaba okweddako.

headline: Owek. Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka ku buyiiya n’obumalirivu
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka wonna mu ggwanga okubeera abayiiya, abagumiikiriza, era abeesimbu bwebaba baagala okugenda mu maaso basobole okwekalakaanya. Entanda Katikkiro Mayiga agiwadde bw’abadde asisinkanye abavubuka abakulisitaayo okuva mu matendekero ag’enjawulo abeegattira mu kibiina ki National Christian Association. “Obulamu buli emijiji ena, ogusooka nga tuli mabujje, ogw’okubiri ogw’obuvubuka bwemulimu, Ogw’okusajjakula awamu n’obukadde. Naye omujiji ogusinga okubeera omukulu gwe gw’obuvubuka. Byokola ku myaka gino byebisalawo onaaba otya nga osajjakudde. Mulaba abantu abakulu nga babagamba nti yeeyisa nga omwana omuto ekitegeeza nti alina byatakola,” Owek. Mayiga. Abasabye okulemerako mwebyo byebakola basobole okugenda mu maaso mwebyo byebakola kibayambe okulaakulana. Owek. Mayiga abasabye okuwaayo obudde bweba baagala okulaba ku magoba geebyo byebatandiseewo awatali kufaayo ku kiseera era nabasaba babeere beetegefu okuyiga bulijjo okugatta kwebyo byebamanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga bano abagambye nti buli kyebakola tebalina kwerabira buwangwa bwabwe mwebasibuka kuba kijja kubeera kyangu okusobola okukola emirimu emirala.  Bano Ow’omumbuga abeebazizza olw’okunyweza obumu nga beegattira mu kibiina kyabwe era abawadde entanda esobola okubasomesa mu lugendo lwabwe olwobuvubuka. Ye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe ategeezezza nti ekibiina kino kiri mu nkwatagana naba Buganda Youth Council era nabasaba okukola buli kimu n’obukugu okusobola okuvuganya mu nsi. Akulembeddemu abavubuka bano munnamateeka, Simon Ssenyonga agamba nti ekibiina kino kyatandikibwa mu mwaka gwa 2018 nekigendererwa kyakulaba ng’ abavubuka bwebamaliriza okusoma babaako kyebeekolera wakati nga tebanafuna mirimu.

headline: Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali awummuziddwa olw’ebyekuusa ku bwenzi
text: Kampala Eyali Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stanely Ntagali, awummuziddwa ku bigambibwa nti yaganza omukazi omufumbo.  Okusinziira ku mukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network, kino kyalangiriddwa Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba Mugalu mu bbaluwa eyafulumye nga January 13, 2021. Ebbaluwa eno erumiriza nti Ntagali aliko muka omusajja gw’abadde yaganza era nga’ensonga eno ne Ntagali akkiriza nti aliko ky’agimanyiko. “Obwenzi musango munene ku ddaala lyonna. Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali yalidde mu mukyala we, obufumbo bwe ne Yesu Kristo olukwe ne bannayuganda ababadde bamutunuulira ng’ekyokulabirako.” Ebbaluwa eri abeepisikoopi bwe yagambye. Kaziimba yagasseeko nti Ekkanisa ya Uganda erina abagoberezi abawera obukadde 13 era nga bano bonna bakemeddwa era ne bonoona naye nga Bbayibuli bw’egamba mu kitabo kya Abaroma 2:23, ekkanisa erina okuteeka abakulembeze baayo ku nninga baleme kuva ku mulamwa. Ono yannyonnyodde nti yamaze dda okutegeeza Ntagali ku nsonga eno era nga yayimiriziddwa okukola obuweereza bw’ekkanisa ku mutendera gwonna wadde okugaba amasakaremento oba okukiikirira ekkanisa. Kaziimba yasabye abakkiriza okusigala nga basabira abafumbo ku njuyi zombi basobole okwenenya era basonyiwagane. “Kano akadde si kakuzunza lugambo. Kadde ka kwetonda, kadde ka kusaba era n’okwekubamu ttooci era twenenye era akadde ak’okutereeza obufumbo bwaffe mu maaso ga Katonda,” Kaziimba bwe yagasseeko. Kaziimba agamba nti Ekkanisa tegenda kuttira muntu yenna ku liiso era nga baakunyweza ekirabo ky’obufumbo era nga bakkiriza nti obufumbo bwa kitiibwa era nga bulina kubaawo wakati w’omwami omu n’omukazi omu. “Tewali muntu ali waggulu w’amateeka ga Katonda. Tuyita abo bonna abamenye etteeka lino, mugende mu maaso ga Katonda mwenenye era musabe ekisonyiwo eri abo be musobezza.” Kaziimba bwe yagambye. Kinajjukirwa nti Ntagali, 65, ye Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda ey’omunaana era nga yawaayo yafeesi eri Stephen Kaziimba Mugalu nga 01/ 03/2020 oluvannyuma lw’okutuuka ku myaka egiwummula.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza obumu bwebalina ne Buganda
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza enkolagana n’obumu bwebalina n’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Owek. Mayiga bino yabyogeredde ku mukolo Ssaabasajja Kabaka kwasiibulidde abasiraamu ogwayindidde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokutaano. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima okusiibulula abasiraamu nga ayagala tunyweze obumu n’okutabagana. Mukusiibulula abasiraamu Ssaabasajja Kabaka abeera atugamba nti baganda bammwe abo yonna gyebali mutuule nabo mu mwezi omutukuvu munyweze obwasseruganda,” Katikkiro Mayiga bwe yagambye.   Owek. Mayiga yasinzidde wano nategeeza nti abaami yonna gyebali balina okubeera abasaale okulwanyisa Siriimu kuba bebatandikiriza amakubo Mukenenya mwayita. Ate ye Supreme Mufti Sheik Muhammad Galabuzi yakubirizza abafumbo okwewala okusaabaana akawuka ka Mukenenya naye bafube okuba abeesigwa eri bannabwe kiyambako okulwanyisa akawuka Kano nga omulamwa gw’omwaka guno bweguvuga nti, ‘Abaami tubeere basaale mukulwanyisa Mukenenya.’   Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Hajji Twaha Kawaase Kigongo, amyuka omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Ahmed Lwasa, Owek. Hamis Kakomo, Owek. Hajjat Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago, Mmeeya Ali Mulyanyama n’ abakulembeze abalala mu Buganda ne Uganda. Omukolo gw’okusiibulula abasiraamu gubeerawo buli mwaka n’ekigendererwa ky’okunyweza enkolagana wakati w’Obwakabaka n’abaddu ba Allah nga guvujjirirwa kampuni ya Airtel.

headline: Obwakabaka bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba w’Abasodokisi mu ggwanga, Yonah Lwanga eyafiiridde mu ggwanga lya Buyonaani (Greece) ku Ssande. Katikkiro Mayiga bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Mmande mu Bulange Mmengo, ategeezezza nti ono abadde ddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ayagala ennyo Kabaka we n’ensi ye Buganda. “Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde omukulembeze w’eddiini asoosowaza obulungi bw’abantu. Abadde alwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu, enfuga entambulira ku mateeka, enkulaakulana n’okutabagana.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nga Ssaabasumba Lwanga bw’abadde musajja eyeeyagalira mu nnono n’obuwangwa bwa Buganda kyokka ate nga yeeyagalira bulungi mu nsi Uganda. Mu ngeri yeemu bannabyabufuzi batenderezza abadde Ssaabasumba w’Eklesia y’Abasodokisi mu Uganda, Yonah Lwanga ng’omusajja abadde omumalirivu era eddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ne basaba bannayuganda okumulabirako. Lwanga yafudde ku Ssande ku myaka 76 wabula ng’ebisingawo ku kyavuddeko okufa kwe tekinnategeerekeka. Ayavuganyaako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kizza Besigye amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ateerya ntama era abadde omukulembeze omulungi akadde konna. Okusinziira ku Besigye, Lwanga abadde mumalirivu, eyekkiririzaamu era abadde akola ennyo okulaba nga Uganda ekulaakulana era bw’atyo n’ategeeza nti Uganda efiiriddwa nnyo. Ate Nnampala wa gavumenti, Thomas Tayebwa amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ow’amazima awaddeyo amaanyi ge gonna okuweereza abantu ba Katonda. Omuloodi Erias Lukwago amwogeddeko ng’omusajja awaniridde obwenkanya akadde ke konna. Lwanga yazaalibwa mu 1945 ng’enzikiriza y’Abasodokisi yaakamala okutongozebwa mu Uganda wadde nga yali ebaddewo okuva mu 1900.

headline: Batenderezza emirimu gya Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga
text: Abakungubazi okuva mu nsonda z’eggwanga ez’enjawulo bakedde ku Eklesia y’Omutukuvu Nicolas e Namung’oona, okwetaba mu kuziika abadde Ssaabasumba w’Abasodokisi Yonah Lwanga eyafa ku ntandikwa y’omwezi guno mu kibuga Athens ekya Buyonaani (Greece). Omukolo gw’okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga gwetabiddwakoabanene mu ggwanga nga bano bakulembeddwamuomumyuka w’omukukembeze w’eggwanga, Maj Gen. Jessica Aluponga y’akiikiridde Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga, Katikkiro eyawummula Owek. Joseph Mulwanyammuli Ssemwogerere, akulira ekibiina kya NUP, Kyagulanyi Ssentamu Robert, akuuma entebe ya Ssaabasumbaw’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala, OmusumbaPaul Ssemwogerere, Ssaabalabirizi Steven Kaziimba Mugalu. Abalala kubaddeko; akulira olukiiko lw’abeepisikoopi Bishop Anthony Zziwa, akulira oludda oluwabula gavumenti,Owek. Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba,akulira ekibiina Kya ANT, Gen Mugisha Muntu,ababaka baPalamenti ne bannaddiini okuva mu nzikiriza ez’enjawulo. Kululwe, Katikkiro wa Buganda, CharlesPeter Mayiga atenderezza obuvumu Ssaabasumba YonahLwanga bw’abadde nabwo mu kulwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu. “Mu mirimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka gye yankwasa ntambudde bulungi ne Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga. Buli lwe wabaddewo ensonga yonna ng’ankubira essimu oba ng’ampandiikira.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agasseeko. Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti omugenzi abadde ayogera ku bikyamu mu ddoboozi ery’omwanguka era abadde muntu ayagala ennyo abantu era ng’abalwanirira mu mbeera zonna era abadde omusajja omwesimbu n’asaba abalala okumulabirako. Eyakiikiridde Pulezidenti, Jessica Alupoatenderezza enkolagana ebaddewo wakati w’Ekelesia ne gavumentiera ne yeeyama okugitwala mu maaso. Akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP),Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu BobiWine mukwogera kwe, ageraageranyizza Ssaabasumba Lwanga ku Ssaabalabirizi Janan Luwumu olwobutekkiriranya; ng’ebikyamu ebikolebwa ku bantu abadde avaayo n’abyogerako kkaati era ono ebigambo bye tebyawukanye n’ebyakulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu Palamenti, Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba. Mu ngeri y’emu, Kyagulanyi asabye abantu okwefumiitiriza ku mukululo Ssaabasumba Lwanga gw’alese. Ssaabasumba Lwanga aziikiddwa mu bitiibwa by’eggwanga ebijjuvuku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo era akubiddwa emizinga esatu okusiima emirimu gy’akoledde eggwanga.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga alambudde ku Mutiibwa Kalidinaali Wamala
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga alambudde ku Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamalaera n’abaako n’obubaka bwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka bw’atuusa olw’okufiirwa muto we, Msgr. Henry Kyabukasa. Ensisinkano eno ebaddewo leero ku Mmande mu maka ga Kalidinaali e Nsambya mu Kampala. “Ssebo Omutiibwa Kalidinaali, nsanyuse nnyo okujjako wano mu maka go era Ssaabasajja Kabaka atumye nnyo okukulaba era akusaasidde olw’okufiirwa muto wo Msgr. Henry Kyabukasa era n’antuma okutegeeza nti asiima nnyo essaala z’omuweereza era akakasiza ddala nti zimuyambye.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza Ku lulwe Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti muto wa Kalidinaali Byabukasa yali amumanyi okuva mu buto kuba yakola ne kitaawe Fr. John Musoke nga batendeka abaseminariyo e Bukalasa ate ng’abamu ku abo batendese abadde nabo emyaka mingi. Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti Msgr. Kyabukasa yali mwetowaze olw’okuba yali mugezi era ng’akimanyi ntimuto wa Kalidinaali. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, kyamukisa okuba nti Katonda abawadde ekirabo eky’okulaba Kalidinaali ebbanga lino lyonna naddala abo abamulabako ng’akyali Ffaaza era kibeera kyasanyu buli lwe bamusisinkana. Mu ngeri y’Obuwangwa, Katikkiro Mayiga mu kukubagiza kuno agenze n’ekita ky’omwenge okwongera okulaga okunyolwa. Ye Omutiibwa Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamala asiimye Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okumulambula era n’amusiima olw’emirimu gy’akola okusitula embeera z’abantu mu Buganda. “Onsanyudde kubanga obugenyi bwo buno buziguliddewo ebijjukizo ebyo. Ssebo Kamalabyonna wa Buganda n’obuwombeefu bunginkusaba onamusize Bbaffe Ssaabasajja Kabaka ne maama Nnaabagereka, abaana beng’oma, Abalangira n’Abambejja n’Obuganda bwonna.” Ssaabasumba omuwummuze ow’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala bw’ategeezezezza.

headline: Ssaabasumba Lwanga waakuziikibwa munda mu Lutikko e Lubaga
text: Kampala Akulira essaza Ekkulu ery’e Kampala mu kiseera kino, Msgr . Charles Kasibante, akakasizza nti Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga  agenda kuziikibwa mu Lutikko e Lubaga. Dr. Lwanga y’agenda okubeera Bisoopu owookusatu okuziikibwa mu Lutikko eno. Eyasooka yali Bisoopu  Edouard Michaud, ono yali munnansi wa  Canada era yali omu ku baminsane Ba-White Fathers’ era ye yali Vicar w’Eklezia ya Uganda okuva mu 1933 okutuuka mu 1945 we yafiira. Munda mu Lutikko eno mwe muli n’ebisigalira bya Bisoopu Joseph Kiwanuka eyali omuddugavu eyasooka okufuna ekitiibwa kya Bisoopu era ono yafa mu 1966 nga waakayita emyaka 5 oluvannyuma lw’okufuuka Ssaabasumba w’essaza ly’e Rubaga nga bwe lyali liyitibwa mu kiseera ekyo. Okusinziira  ku Msgr. Kasibante, ababiri bano baaziikibwa ku ludda olwa ddyo olw’Eklezia emabega w’ekifo Kkwaya w’eyimbira. Kasibante agamba nti ku Lwokuna, Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa mu makkati g’abakulu bano ababiri abaasooka okuziikibwayo. Eyali Vicar Genero, Gerald Kalumba annyonnyodde nti yafuuka mpisa okuziika ba Ssaabasumba  mu Lutikko gye bali baweerereza. Ono agambye nti naye kino olumu kisinziira kuba singa Ssaabasumba yenna abaako ekiraamo ky’alese nga kiraga w’ayagala okuziikibwa olwo ekiraamo kye kissibwamu ekitiibwa. Msgr. Kalumba awadde eky’okulabirako kya Kalidinaali Emmanuel Nsubuga eyaleka ekiraamo ng’asaba bamuziike mu maka ga bakateyamba ge yali atandiseewo. Okusinziira ku bimanyiddwa mu Eklezia, Lutikko ez’enjawulo zirina ebifo ebyenjawulo ebyateekebwamu okuziikamu ba Ssaabasumba. Ennono eno yatandikira mu biseera abasomi mwe baali bayiganyizibwa era nga bangi mu budde obwa baaziikibwa mu mpuku gye baali beekukumye era ennono eno n’abaliwo kati bakyagitwala mu maaso. Singa ekifo ekiziikibwamu abakulu bano kijjula, abakulira Lutikko basobole okufuna ekifo ekirala we babaziika naye era nga bagoberera akalombolombo ke kamu. Eky’okulabirako ekirungi, e Masaka ba Bisoopu babiri baaziikibwa munda mu Lutikko y’e Villa Maria eyasooka okuzimbibwa nga tennakyusibwa kuzzibwa Kitovu. Naye Bisoopu Kaggwa bwe yafa emabegako nga tewali we bayinza muziika, bwebatyo ne basalawo okumuzimba mu kkanisa esangibwa mu limbo ya Seminale y’e Bukalasa. Okusinziira ku lupapula lwa Observe, Cansala w’e Masak, Rev. Fr. Edward Ssekabanja, yagamba nti Eklezia eno  baagiteekawo okuziikamu Babisoopu b’e Masaka awamu ne Babisoopu abalala abatali mu Masaka naye nga badyagadde okuziikibwa mu kitundu kino.

headline: Enteekateeka z’olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye, Masaka yeetegeka
text: Enteekateeka z’okujjukira olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye era nga Masaka yeddiziddwa omukisa okuddamu okutegeka okulamaga kw’omulundi guno oluvannyuma lw’emikolo gino obutabeerayo omwaka oguwedde olwa Ssennyiga Corona. Kino kyabikkuddwa Omusumba w’essaza ly’Eklezia erya Masaka mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe yatuuzizza e Kitovu, n’asaba abakkiriza okusabira ewaka ku ttivvi n’emitimbagano okusobola okwewala omujjuzo oguyinza okuvaako ekirwadde kya Corona okweyongera. Mu mwaka gwa 2020, essaza ly’e Masaka lye lyali eryokutegeka emikolo gino era nga kaweefube w’okukung’aanya ensimbi zino yali atandikiddwako. Okulamaga kuno okunaabeerawo nga 3 June omwaka guno okutandika ssaawa ssatu ez’okumakya, abateesiteesi balambuludde ku nteekateeka nga bw’eneebeera ng’abantu wajja kukkirizibwayo bayite bokka. Okusinziira ku musumba Jjumba, abalamazi abava ebweru w’eggwanga n’abo abalamaza ebigere okuva wano mu ggwanga, nabo sibaakukkirizibwa. Omusumba Jjumba alambuludde nti omulundi guno bajja kusinga okusabira emirembe mu ggwanga, okunyweza abakristu wamu n’okuwegayirira ensi esobola okuzuula eddagala lya Ssennyiga Corona. Ku ky’abalamazi ababadde bafuna amazzi g’omukisa e Namugongo, Omusumba abasabye bafune amazzi bagatwalire abasasorodooti baabwe, bagawe omukisa eyo mu bigo byabwe kuba ku lunaku lwennyini abantu tebajja kukkirizibwa kunona mazzi gano. Omuwanika w’enteekateeka eno, Rev. Fr. Anselm Edward Ssemwogerere, yategeezezza nti ku mulundi guno beetaaga obukadde bw’ensimbi 250 okutegeka okulamaga kuno nga ku zino balinako obukadde 151 zokka. Asabye abantu okudduukirira omulimu guno. Kino kitegeeza nti beetagayo obukadde 99 wabula era okwawukanako n’okusolooza ssente okubadde kujja kubeerawo ng’abantu basonda mu kikungo, zino ezibulayo bakunze ebitongole okubakwasizaako. Eyakulembeddemu enteekateeka eno, Fr.George William Lubega, yannyonnyodde nti enkola eno abaviiriddeko okusubwa ebintu bingi omuli n’okutongoza olunaku lw’okulamaga olw’abaana abato nga be baali bagenda okukitandika nga n’amasaza amalala gaali gaakulabira okwo.

headline: Gavumenti egenda kugula ettaka ly’ekkanisa y’e Ndeeba eyamenyebwa
text: Gavumenti emalirizza enteekateeka z’okugulira Abakulisitaayo ba St. Peter’s Church mu Ndeeba, ettaka eryali lituddeko ekkanisa eno era nga likaayanirwa omugagga Dodoviko Mwanje amanyiddwa nga Dodo n’ekkanisa eno. Ekifo ewaali ekkanisa, gavumenti gyeyagala okugulira abakulisitaayo Omugagga Dodovico ne gyebuli eno akyakalambidde ng’agamba nti ettaka lirye era enkaayana zino ze zaavaako okumenya ekkanisa eweza emyaka 40 Ku biragiro by a kkooti, era okusinziira ku biwandiiko lyamuguzibwa ab’enju y’Omumbejja Evelyn Nachwa. Okusinziira ku kkooti ettaka lino lyakyusibwa mu bukyamu okudda mu mannya ga Bisoopu Danistani Nsubuga, Rev. Yuda Kitaka ne Esau Kizito era wano we yasinziira n’eragira ekkanisa okuva ku ttaka lino. Wabula oluvannyuma lw’okugimenya, Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yavumirira ekikolwa kino era n’asuubiza gavumenti ye okuddamu okuzimba ekkanisa eno. Waliwo n’ekiwandiiko era ekyayisibwa mu kyapa kya Uganda Gazette nga 28 Ogwomunaana 2020 nga Minisita w’ebyettaka alabula abantu okwesonyiwa ettaka lino erisangibwa ku bulooko nnamba 7 Poloti 39 kubanga gavumenti yali eryagala era ng’egenda kuddamu okuzimbako ekkanisa eno. Mu mateeka singa Minisita abeera mumativu nti ettaka gavumenti ly’egenda okutwala ligenda kugasiza wamu abantu, ekitundu nnamba 3 mu tteeka erikkiriza gavumenti okutwala ettaka (Land Acquistions Act) limuwa obuyinza okweddiza ettaka eryo. Etteeka lino liragira gavumenti okulaga ky’egenda okulikozesa era eriyirire oyo yenna abadde nannyini lyo era wano ekibeera kiddako ye gavumenti okuleeta omubalirizi waayo n’alaba ssente ezigya mu ttaka lino olwo ne lisasulwa. Ekya gavumenti okugulira ekkanisa ettaka lino kireeseewo ebibuuzo kubanga waliwo omusango oguli mu kkooti ento e Makindye ng’eno abantu 22 okuli omugagga Dodovico n’abapoliisi abawerako bavunaanibwa omusango gw’okubba ettaka lino, okujeemera ebiragiro, okwekobaana bazze omusango awamu n’okwonoona ebintu. Ku nsonga eno, Munnamateeka Max Mutabingwa yategeezezza nti ekikolwa kya Minisita okuyisa ekiragiro ng’ayagala ettaka lino, kiraga nti gavumenti ekkiriza nti ettaka lino lya muntu mulala era nga kkooti yasalawo ku ani nannyini ttaka omutuufu. Ono yasabye kkooti egobe omusango oguvunaanibwa Dodovico ne banne kubanga bano bavunaanibwa omusango ogukwata ku ttaka gavumenti ly’eyagala okugula erikulaakulanye. Omulamuzi wa kkooti ento e Makindye, Prossy Katushabe yasabye abo bonna abawakanya ekya gavumenti okweddiza ettaka lino, okuwaayo okwemulugunya kwabwe eri Ssaabawaabi wa gavumenti.

headline: Ab’e Kyabakadde Ssaabasumba Lwanga bamusiibulidde mu miranga
text: Kyabakadde – Kyaggwe Emiranga, ebiwoobe n’okwazirana bibuutikidde Ekeleziya ya St. Charles Lwanga e Kyabakadde ng’omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba Dr Cyprian Kizito Lwanga gutuusibwa, abatuuze n’abakkiriza basobole okumusiibula. E Kyabakadde wabadde wategekeddwayo ekitambiro ky’emmisa  okuwa abatuuze n’abakkiriza mu kitundu ekyo omukisa okukuba eriiso evannyuma ku mwagalwa waabwe.  Omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga gutwaliddwa mu Namunkanga y’amagye okuva ku kisaawe ky’eggwanga e Kololo gye gwasoose okukungubagirwa n’okumukubira emizinga. Eno gwayaniriziddwa Omusumba w’e Lugazi, Christopher Kakooza ne munne gwe. yaddira mu bigere, Omusumba Matiya Ssekamanya wamu n’eyaliko omumyuka wa Pulezidenti wa Uganda, Dr. Specioza Wandera Kazibwe naye omwana enzaalwa ey’e Kyabakadde. Ekitambiro kya mmisa kikulembeddwamu Omusumba Christopher Kakooza era omuwandiisi w’Abeepisikoopi Ssaabasumba b’abadde akulembera nga ssentebe era n’alaga obwennyamivu olwa ssentebe okubafaako. “Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde ddoboozi ly’abo abalina eddoboozi ettono oba abatalina.” Omusumba Kakooza bw’akkaatirizza. Omusumba Kakooza agambye nti omugenzi abadde munnabyankulaakulana atasangika n’anokolayo ebimu ku by’akoze ng’okutumbula essaza lya Kasana-Luweero gye yaweereza ng’Omusumba waalyo eyasookera ddala, okuyooyoota Lutikko wamu n’ekiggwa ky’abajulizi e Namugongo. Omugenzi yazaalibwa ku kyalo Kyabakadde  nga January 19, 1953. W’afiiridde ng’atumbudde ebyenkulaakulana ku kyalo kino omuli n’okubazimbira essomero St. Cyprian Kizito Secondary School -Kyabakadde. Ssaabasumba Lwanga yatandikawo ekigo ky’e Kyabakadde n’akizimbako ne Ekeleziya era nga muno mwe bamutambiridde emmisa n’okumusiibula. Okusinziira batuuze, Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde atera okugenda Ku kyalo kino n’ayimbirayo emmisa naddala ku nnaku enkulu, ekintu ekibadde kikakasa abantu nti ekyalo Kyabakadde kimusula ku lufuba. Okusaba kwetabiddwamu abasomesa n’abayizi okuva ku ssomero ly’omugenzi, abakungu okuva mu gavumenti eyaawakati n’abakungu ba Ssaabasajja abakulembeddwamu Omutaka Gabunga okulira ekika ky’Emmamba, Omugenzi Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga mw’abadde azaalibwa.

headline: Okulamaga e Namugongo kuyimiriziddwa lwa coronavirus
text: Essaza ly’e Masaka eribadde litegeka okulamaga e Namugongo omwaka guno ligambye olw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus ekigenda mu maaso nga kyeriisa enkuuli mu nsi yonna livudde mu nteekateeka eno. Okusinziira ku bbaluwa eyawandiikiddwa Omusumba w’e Mityana Anthony Zziwa, akulira olukiiko lw’abasumba olumanyiddwa nga Uganda Episcopal Conference, Omusumba w’e Masaka Serverus Jjumba yamutegeezezza nti Uganda nebwekkiriza abantu okuddamu okukungaana, tekikyasoboka kuba na kulamaga omwaka guno kubanga obudde obusigaddeyo tebumala. Jjumba yategeezezza nti okutegeka okulamaga kitwala obudde wamu n’esimbi nnyingi nnyo ddala ng’era kyetaagisa enkiiko ez’enjawulo wakati w’ab’ebyokwerinda wamu n’olukiiko olutegesi. Buli nga June 3, abagoberezi ba Kurisito beeyiwa e Namugongo okujaguza okuttibwa kw’abajuluzi.  Bano battibwa ku biragiro bya Ssekabaka Daniel Mwanga, olw’okumujeemera.  Guno gwegunda okuba omulundi ogusoose obutabaayo kulamaga bukyanga June 3 lukuzibwa ng’olunaku lw’okujjukira abajuluz mu Uganda.

headline: Katikkiro mu bifananyi ng’ali e Gomba
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yeetabye ku mukolo gw’okuggulawo Kelezia empya ey’ekisomesa kye Mawuuki e Gomba, wamu n’okujaguza emyaka 10 egya St. Joan of Ark. Omusumba w’essaza lye Kiyinda Mityana, Anthony Joseph Zziwa, yakulembeddemu okusaba.

headline: Rev. Can. Kagodo alondeddwa ku bulabirizi bwe Mukono
text: Olukiiko lw’ Abalabirizi mu Kkanisa ya Uganda ku Lwokusatu lwalonze Rev Canon Enos Kagodo Kitto nga Omulabirizi omuggya ow’ Obulabirizi bwe Mukono. Kagodo azze mu bigere by’ Omulabirizi James Ssebaggala agenda okuwummula emirimu gy’ Obulabirizi. Rev. Kitto yabadde omuwandiisi w’Obulabirizi bwe Mukono era nga agenda kutuuzibwa nga omulabirizi ow’okutaano mu February w’omwaka guno. Ebitongole n’abantu Ssekinoomu batandise dda okuvaayo n’obubaka obuyozaayoza Kagodo olw’okutuuka ku kkula lino. Kagodo olwokaano alubaddemu ne Rev Godfrey Ssengendo era gyebigweredde nga amuwangudde. Rev. Canon Kagodo yazaalibwa mu 1968 era asuubirwa okutwala mu maaso ebimu ku bintu ebibadde bituukiddwako mu bukulembeze bwa Rt Rev James Ssebaggala. Kagodo mufumbo eri Catherine Namuddu era nga Katonda yabawa ezadde ly’ abaana 7. Mungeri yeemu olukiiko lw’Abalabirizi era lulonze Rev Onesimus Asiimwe ng’ omulabirizi wa North Kigezi era nga nowa Karamoja naye alondedwa olwa leero.

headline: Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba akungubagidde Omulabirizi  Magezi
text: Kampala Ssaabalabirizi Stephen Samuel Kaziimba akungubagidde omulabirizi wa North Kigezi, Rt. Rev Benon Magezi. Magezi yafudde kawungeezi k’eggulo oluvannyuma lwa Ssabbiiti nnamba ng’azuuliddwamu ekirwadde kya COVID-19 n’atwalibwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu e Mbarara gy’abadde ajjanjabirwa. Magezi yatuuzibwa ng’Omulabirizi nga January 8, 2017 ku Lutikko ya Emmanuel Cathedral, Kinyasano, Rukungiri. Okusinziira ku Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba, ono abadde yakatongoza enteekateeka y’okugaziya Lutikko eno okwongera okubunyisa obukulisitaayo mu kitundu kino. Amwogeddeko ng’omusajja eyakuzibwa nga mukulisitaayo era abadde tasubwa kusaba awamu n’abennyumba ye. Magezinga tannalondebwa nga Bisoopu ye yali omuwanika w’Obulabirizi bwa North Kigezi. Bino we bijjidde nga Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yaakamala okukakasa nga bannayuganda abawera 25 baafudde ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ku Ssande nga June 13, 2021. Okusinziira ku Minisitule eno, kati omuwendo gw’abafudde ekirwadde kino okuva mu myezi gwa March omwaka oguwedde ekirwadde kino lwe kyalangirirwa bawera 459. Omugenzi Magezi alese Nnamwandu Gladys Magezi n’abaana bataano.

headline: KITALO! Ssaabasumba Lwanga bamusanze afiiridde mu buliri
text: Essaza ekkulu ery’ e Kampala likakasizza okufa kwa Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga, asangiddwa enkya ya leero.  Kansala w’essaza lya Kampala, Pius Male Ssentumbe ategeezezza nga ayita mu kiwandiiko nti mukama waabwe bamusanze mu buliri nga omuka gwamuweddemu dda. “N’ennaku nnyingi, ntegeeza endiga zonna nti Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga ayitiddwa Omukama,”Ssentumbe bw’ategeezezza. “Ssaabasumba asangiddwa mu makaage nga afudde, tusaba Mukama Katonda omwoyo ggwe agulamuze kisa era tusaba Katonda agumye abakkiriza bonna wamu n’abennyumba ye,” ekiwandiiko ekiriko omukono gwa Ssentumbe bwe kisomye. Okufa kwa Ssaabasumba kuzze nga kwa kibwatukira kuba eggulo ku Lwokutaana yalabiddwako nga akulembeddemu mmisa y’ ekkubo ly’omusaalaba ku lutikko e Lubaga.

headline: Kiikino ekituufu ekyasse Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Ebyafulumiziddwa eddwaliro ekkulu e Mulago ku kyaviiriddeko Ssaabasumba Kizito Lwanga okufa biraga nti ono yafudde mutima oluvannyuma lw’omusuwa okuyingiramu akatole k’omusaayi ne gusirika. Ku Lwomukaaga Ssaabasumba Lwanga yasangiddwa ng’afiiridde mu kisenge kye ekyaleeseewo ebigambo ku kituufu ekyamusse. Ku Mmande akulira eby’obulamu mu ssaza ly’Eklezia erya Kampala, Dr. Andrew Ssekitooleko, yategeezezza abakungubazi nti omugenzi yafunye ekizibu ku mutima. “Okusirika kw’omutima gwe kyavudde ku katole k’omusaayi akayingidde mu gimu ku misuwa ne kalemesa omusaayi okutuuka ku mutima, kino bwekituukawo kitwala eddakiika ssatu ku ttaano ng’omuntu afudde.” Dr. Ssekitooleko bwe yannyonnyodde. Kino kiggyeewo ebigambo n’okuteereza mbi eby’okufa kwa Ssaabasumba birimu omukono gw’omubi. Okusinziira ku Dr. Ssekitooleko, omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba baagukebedde n’abakugu 4 okuva mu ddwaliro e Mulago era nga waabaddewo abooluganda babiri wamu ne badokita abaalondeddwa Eklezia Katolika. Okusinziira ku Dr. Ssekitooleko, Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde n’obulwadde bw’omutima nga bumutawanya. Bino we bijjidde ng’eyavuganya ku bwapulezidenti, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, yavuddeyo ku Lwomukaaga  n’agamba nti enfa ya Ssaabasumba eriko ebibuuzo kuba ku Lwokutaano yalabwako ng’ali bulungi. Alipoota y’abakungu kati okukkakkanyizza emitima gy’abantu ku kiki ekituufu ekyavuddeko okufa kwa Ssaabasumba.

headline: Owek. Mayiga atenderezza obuweereza bw’ Omulabirizi  Ssebaggala
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga atenderezza nnyo obuweereza bw’ Omulabirizi Rt. Rev. William Ssebaggala bwakoze okumala akaseera era nasaba abantu okumulabirako. Bino Kamalabyonna Mayiga abyogeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’ Omulabirizi Ssebaggala agenda okuwummula obuweereza buno mu mwezi gw’okubiri ogwa 2023. Owek. Mayiga ategezezza nti obwakabaka n’ekkanisa ya Uganda waliwo enkwatagana ey’omuggundu era waliwo essuubi nti agenda okumuddira mu bigere waakugikuuma. Ono atendereza omukululo gwalese nti nakakasa nti basanyufu nga Buganda olw’ omukululo gwagenda okuleka emabega. Katikkiro ategezezza nti obwakabaka bwa Buganda n’ekkanisa ya Uganda bukwatagana bulungi nga nabwekityo emirimu gyalese tejinaggwa tewali kuwannaanya agenda okumuddira mu bigere alina watandikira. Omulabirizi Ssebaggala abadde azze kuloopa lutabaalo lwabaddemu emyaka 12 ng’Omulabirizi w’e Mukono oluvannyuma lw’okudda mu bigere bya Rt. Rev. Eria Paul Luzinda mu 2010 nga 10.  Ku bugenyi buno, Omulabirizi ayaniriziddwa omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule ngali ne Ssaabawolereza wa buganda Owek. Christpopher Bwanika abamutembeese okutuuka mu kkakalabizo lya Mukuumaddamula nebeesogga akafubo omutakiriziddwa bannamawulire. Ye Omulabirizi Ssebaggala yeebazizza obwakabaka owlokufuuka ekyokulabirako naddala mu by’obulamu nga Ssaabasajja yakulembeddemu kubanga basobodde okukulaakulanya obulabirizi ngobwakabaka kwebalabira bwatyo neyebaza Katikkiro olwa kawefube gwatadde mu kulima emmwanyi. Omulabirizi William Ssebagala abadde awerekeddwako mukyala we Tezira Ssebagala n’abaana baabwe babiri, yebazizza nnyo Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okukwata omumuli mu kuwandiika Bayibuli y’ Oluganda, omulimu ogwakulemberwamu Omulabirizi Ssebaggala.

headline: Obuganda bufiiriddwa munnaddiini abadde omutabaganya – Kabaka
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II aweerezza obubaka eri Ekelesia olw’okufiirwa Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwangaeyafiira mu ggwanga lya Buyonaani (Greece) gye buvuddeko gyeyali atwaliddwa okujjanjaba oluvannyuma lw’okutawaanyizibwa ekirwadde kya Kkookolo. Omutanda obubaka buno abutisse Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga abadde yeetabye mu kuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga ku Eklesia y’Omutukuvu Nicholas e Namung’oona mu ssaza y’e Kyaddondo. “Obuganda ne Uganda bufiiriddwa munnaddiini abadde omutabaganya w’abannaddiini era ng’assa ekitiibwa mu nzikiriza zonna. Mu buweereza bwe abadde mwetowaze, muvumu era nga mwetegefu ekiseera kyonna okulung’amya n’okuwabula ensonga eziruma oba okunyigiriza abantu ba Katonda.” Obumu ku bubaka bwe busomye. Omutanda ategeezezza nti Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde amwebuuzaako era n’asaasira ab’enzikiriza eno kuba ono abadde abakulembedde okumala emyaka 24 miramba.

headline: KITALO! Bisoopu Kaggwa afudde ekirwadde kya Sennyiga Corona
text: Masaka Omusumba w’essaza lye Masaka eyawummula John Baptist Kaggwa afudde olweggulo lwa leero era nga kigambibwa nti ono ekirwadde kya sennyiga Corona kyekimuggye mu budde.  Amawulire gano gakakasiddwa omukutu gwa lutikko ye Kitovu nga bayitira ku mutimbagano gwabwe ogwa Facebook. “Kitalo Nnyo. Bishop John Baptist Kaggwa, Mukama Amuyise,” obubaka obubadde obumpimpi bwebubadde busoma. Abakungu tebawadde bisingawo ku nfa ya Bisoopu Kaggwa wadde nga amawulire agatali matongole galaga nti ono afudde kirwadde kya sennyiga Corona. Ono abadde ajjanjabwa ekirwadde kya Corona muddwaliro e Mulago Sabiiti ebbiri eziyise.Omusumba Kaggwa yawummula omwaka oguwedde era nga ono Omusumba Serverus Jjumba ye yamuddira mubigere. Gusinze Ayi Beene

headline: Ssaabalabirizi omulonde asisinkanye Katikkiro wa Buganda
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda nga ali wamu ne Ssaabalabirizi omulonde ow’Ekkanisa ya Uganda Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu ku Bulange.  Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda omulonde, Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu asisinkanye Katikkiro wamu ne Kabineeti ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ku Bulange.Ensonga y’ensisinkano eno kwekukomawo ku butaka okulaba nga anyweza enkolagana y’Ekkanisa n’obwakabaka mu buvunaanyizibwa bwe obuggya obwamukwasiddwa nga Ssaabalabirizi wa Kanisa ya Uganda.Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba agamba abadde ateekwa okudda embuga kubanga enjiri gyebasomesa abantu yatandikira ku Ssekabaka Muteesa 1 bweyateeka omukono ku bbaluwaeyakkiriza abaminsane okujja okubuulira enjiri yaabwe. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga munsisinkano eno yebaziza nnyo Ssaabalabirizi olw’obuteerabira nsibuko ye era nagamba nti kisanyusa era kiwa essuubi okulaba nga eddiini n’obwakabaka gyebikoma okutambulira awamu gyebijja okukoma okudda ku ntiko.Katikkiro agasseeko nti Ssaabalabirizi Kazimba ye mukuristo atuukiridde kuba nga alina okwagala eri abantu, ayagala Ekika kye ekye Mpindi, era yenyingira mu nteekateeka z’obwakabaka. Ensisinkano eno yetabiddwamu ba minisita ba Kabaka okuli Omumyuka wa Katikkiro ow’okubiri era Minisita w’ebyensimbi Owek Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa, Omukubiriza w’olukiiko lwa Buganda Owek Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule, Minisita w’amawulire, Lukiiko, Kabineeti,Abagenyi Era Omwogezi w’obwakabaka Owek Noah Kiyimba, Minisita w’abavubuka emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu Owek Henry Sekabembe Kiberu, Minisita omubeezi ow’ebyobulimi n’obwegassi Owek Hajji Amis Kakomo Ssaabalabirizi awerekeddwako, Omuwandiisi wobulabirizi Rev. Canon Rocky James Ssendegeya, Omukubiriza wabakuristaayo mu bulabirizi Norah Mbabazi, n’omukungu John Fred Kiyimba Freeman.  kinajjukirwa nti nga 28th August 2019, Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu yalondebwa ku bwa Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekanisa ya Uganda ow’omwenda (9) era nga agenda kuddira Ssaabalabirizi Stanley Ntagali mu bigere. Rt. Rev.Dr. Stephen Kazimba Mugalu abadde Bishop owa Mityana Diocese era asuubirwa okutuuzibwa nga Ssaabalabirizi omujjuvu nga 1st March 2020.

headline: Owek. Kawuki asabye bannaddiini obutadibya nnono na buwangwa
text: Minisita Omubezi owa gavumenti ezeebitundu mu Buganda era avunaanyizibwa ku nsonga z’abantu ba Kabaka ab’ebweru wa Buganda, Owek Joseph Kawuki akuutidde bannaddiini obuteesamba buweereza mu Bwakabaka nga beekwasa eddiini. Owek Joseph Kawuki okwogera bino yabadde yeetabye mu kusaba okw’enjawuloku Lutikko e Kasaka mu disitulikiti y’e Gomba okwakulembeddwamu Rev Canon David Kalebunga batikkira abaweereza ba Katonda abaafunye Obwawule n’Obudyankoni. “Katonda akuyita nga bw’oli naye abantu bangi bwe batandika okuweereza bwa Mukama, oluusi baseesetuka ne bava ku mbeera gye balimu. Mu Bwakabaka tulina abantu bangi bannaddiini abaweereza Katonda. Temutya kuweereza buwangwa bwammwe, temutya kuweereza Kabaka wammwe.” Minisita Kawuki bwe yagambye. Minisita Kawuki alambise abazadde ku nkuza y’abaana naddala ab’obulenzi mu kiseera kino eky’omuggalo kuba essira balitadde ku baana abawala ne beerabira abalenzi. Mu kwogera kwe Omulabirizi wa Central Buganda, Micheal Lubowa yasabye gavumenti okwongera amaanyi mu kulwanyisa ebikolwa eby’ettemu ebiri mu bitundu by’eggwanga ebitali bimu.

headline: Abalyowa emyoyo basabye Kyagulanyi ayimbulwe
text: Bya Musaso Waffe Kampala Bannaddiini abeegattira mu kibiina ekitaba enzikiriza ekya Inter-Religious Council of Uganda (IRCU), basabye gavumenti eyimbule Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu n’abalala abakwatiddwa olw’okumenya ebiragiro ebitangira Ssennyiga Corona.  Ssentebe w’ekibiina kino, Mufti Sheikh Shaban Ramathan Mubajje, agambye nti Bobi Wine ne Patrick Oboi Amuriat bwe baba nga bazzizza omusango gwonna, batwalibwe mu kkooti ebavunaane era amateeka galekebwe okukola ogwago. Basabye akakiiko k’ebyokulonda wamu n’ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda, okussa ekitiibwa mu ddembe ly’obuntu nga bwe birambikibwa mu Ssemateeka w’eggwanga. Bagamba nti Uganda Police Force nayo yamenye ebiragiro (SOPs) ebya COVID-19 ebiri mu kawayiro aka 21(3) akagamba nti, Poliisi ejja kulumirirwa eggwanga, bajja kukozesa obukugu n’ebirala. Bakubirizza abasirikale okugoberera Ssemateeka wa Yuganda nga bakola emirimu gyabwe era bakozese obwenkanya nga balamula Bannayuganda, nga tebafuddeyo ku kibiina kye bawagira. Bino we bijjidde nga Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, yaakamala okulabula ebitongole by’ebyokwerinda ku kutulugunya bannansi n’abeesimbyewo ku bifo ebyenjawulo, nga beekwesa mu Ssenyiga Corona, era n’abasaba okussa ekitiibwa mu ddembe ly’obuntu.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga yeebazizza Ssaabasumba  Muzeeyi olw’okutunda Uganda ebunaayira
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga yeebazizza emirimu egikoleddwa Ssaabasumba w’ Ekeresiya yaba Orthodox, Metropolitan Leronymos Muzeeyi olw’okutunda erinnya lya Uganda ebweru awamu n’okutumbula embeera z’abantu munda mu ggwanga. Okwebaza kuno Katikkiro akukoze akyazizza Ssaabasumba, Metropolitan Leronymos Muzeeyi, mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokusatu. “Weebale kutuweesa linnya ddungi e Tanzania kubanga omukulu ono yamala emyaka 25 nga asumba abantu erudda lwe Mwanza , Bukoba. Uganda emirundi mingi bwojogerako bakujuriza bintu bitali birungi, naye bwetufuna omuntu agenze okukola omuli ogw’ekitiibwa ate nagukola nagunoza, eryo erinnya lisukka kuba Orthodox nofuuka omubaka waffe,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Kamalabyonna Mayiga amusabye okukuuma enkolagana y’Obwakabaka n’Ekeresiya kuba yava dda ku mulembe gwa Spartas Ssebanja Mukasa era Ssekabaka Daudi Chwa II n’abawa ne liizi etaalimu bukwakkulizo ku ttaka ly’e Namungoona namusba okukuuma obwasseruganda obwo. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga kyamuwendo okulaba nti abantu ab’emirembe egy’enjawulo okuviira ddala emabega nga eddiini zijja kuno baliko abantu abakyatwala obuvunaanyizibwa buno mu maaso okusobola okunyweza n’okukuuma ebyafaayo mu mbala yabyo.  Owek. Mayiga yeebazizza Ekeresiya olw’okutumbula enkulaakulana naddala mu by’omwoyo, ebyenjigiriza n’ebyobulamu kuba bazimbye amalwaliro n’amasomero agawerako. Ono amusabye obuteerabira kulwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu naddala abo abanyigirizibwa nga abamusooka okuli Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga ne Ssaabasumba Nankyama bwebaakolanga. Ye Ssaabasumba Muzeeyi ategeezezza nti obukulembeze bwa Katikkiro Mayiga babulaba nga olutindo wakati wabwe ne Buganda era nasaba enkolagana eno egende mu maaso bulijjo.  Ono annyonnyodde nti balina enteekateeka y’okutumbula ebyenjigiriza ebyeddiini n’ensi eri abantu be ggwanga, okwongera obunyisa enjiri awamu n’okutumbula eby’obulamu okuyamba ku bantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga mu kino bagenda kuzimba eddwaliro ly’ abaana era bakwenyigiramu butereevu okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya. Ssaabasumba Muzeeyi agamba bakukola nnyo okukubiriza abantu okulima n’okulunda era bagabane obuvunaanyizibwa mukutumbula n’okusomesa obweggasi wonna mu Buganda ne Uganda. Ekeresiya eno ewagidde emirimu gy’Obwakabaka nga bagula satifikeeti ya kakadde kamu era nebawera okutwala enkolagana eno mu maaso.

headline: Ssekiboobo alagidde abasenze ku ttaka lya Buganda lye yawa ekkanisa okwewandiisa
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga  Omwami w’essaza lya Ssaabasajja Kabaka ery’e Kyaggwe, Ssekiboobi Elijah Bogere Mulembya, alagidde abatuuze ku ttaka ly’Obwakabaka ery’e Nakanyonyi mu Mukono  okuwandiika bannanyini bibanja okusobola okumalawo embiranye wakati w’Obulabirizi bw’e Mukono n’abatuuze.  Ssekiboobo okwogera bino abadde ku kyalo Nakanyonyi ekisangibwa mu ggombolola y’e Nabbaale mu disitulikiti y’e Mukono, okulaba ng’atabaganya abatuuze n’ekkanisa oluvannyuma lw’omulabirizi we, Mukono James Williams Ssebagala okwekubira enduulu ewa Katikkiro. Kino kiddiridde abatuuze ku kyalo Nakanyonyi okukkakkana ku mmere ya babuulizi gye babadde baasimba neb agisaawa nga bawakanya ekkanisa okutwala ebibanja byabwe nga tennaba kubasasula. Okusinziira ku batuuze ettaka lino Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwe bwaliwa Ekkanisa y’e Mukono nga kati Obulabirizi bw’e Mukono okutwala ebibanja byabwe ku mpaka, si kya bwenkanya. Mu lukiiko olutudde ku kyalo kino,  abatuuze bategeezezza Ssekiboobo nti Ekkanisa ye yabasangako nga bo ba bibanja wabula tebasobola kugikkiriza okubasindiikiriza nga temaze kubasasula. Abatuuze balumiriza Ekkanisa okukozesa poliisi y’e Naggalama ne babasiba oluvannyuma yo n’etandika okusaawa ebintu byabwe nga bali mu makomera.  Ssentebe w’ekyalo kino, Peter Kaweesa agamba nti kituufu ettaka lya Kkanisa naye ate Ekkanisa ye yasangako abatuuze  era eky’okuwamba ebibanja byabwe n’okusaanyaawo emmere yaabwe, tekikola makulu.  Wabula ye omwogezi w’Obulabirizi bw’e Mukono, Derrick Kaddu, abiwakanyizza n’ategeeza nti  ku ttaka lino tekwaliko muntu yenna wabula bajja beesenzaako era n’akakasa nti ng’ekkanisa tebagenda kukkiriza kufiirwa ttaka lyabwe. Ettaka lino kigambibwa lituddeko abantu abasoba mu 300 nga likunukkiriza yiika 400.

headline: Omusomesa w’eddiini bamusse mu bukambwe
text: Ekikangabwa kibuutikidde abatuuze ku kyalo Kyabbogo mu muluka gwe Nkoni muggombolola ye Kkingo mu disitulikiti ye Lwengo, Omusomesa w’eddiini ow’emyaka 61 bwakubiddwa omuyini ku mutwe nafiirawo. Eyatiddwa ye Richard Mbaziira myaka 61 ng’abadde musomesa wa Ddiini mu kisomesa Kya Kkingo mu Lwengo. Kigambibwa nti ono yatemuddwa mu kiro ekyakeesezza ku Lwokubiri era abatuuze bagamba nti okusinziira ku kyebalabye, abatemu olwamaze okumutta nebamusuula mu lusuku era nga bamuziiseeko ekitundu ekya waggulu. Ssentebe wa ggombolola ye Kkingo, Aloysious Kibira agamba nti basula kutebuukye kuba ettemu lizzeemu mu kitundu kyabwe nasaba poliisi ekole okunnoonyereza ku bikolwa bino ebyeyongera buli lukya. Ate ye Ssentebe w’ekyalo Kyabbogo, Kabi Ssenkatuuka, yategeezezza nti omugenzi tabadde muntu w’amasanyu era ng’okufa kwe kubakubye wala bwatyo nakuutira abantu okwongera okwekuuma.
