Wabula adduumira poliisi mu bendo-bendo lye Masaka Paul Nkore yasabye abantu okwewala okugenda mu mabaala ekiro era nabakunga okukwatagana ne poliisi okumalawo obutemu buno. Ye adduumira poliisi ye Lwengo Francis Okongo yasabye abatuuze okwewala okunywa ennyo omwenge. Oluvannyuma poliisi etutte omulambo gwa Mbaziira mu ddwaliro e Masaka okwongera okugwekebejja.

headline: Museveni alagidde ekkanisa y’omu Ndeeba eddemu ezimbibwe
text: Pulezidenti Museveni alagidde ekkanisa ya St. Peter’s mu Ndeeba eyamenyeddwa okuddamu okuzimbibwa mu bwangu ddala era nawera nga bweyegasse ku lutalo lw’okunnunula ekkanisa eno. Museveni yabyogedde ku nkya ya leero bweyabadde alambula ekkanisa eno eyakoneddwa wali mu Ndeeba. “Ngenda kukubira Bisoopu Kityo Luwalira era ettaka lijja kusigala nga lya kkanisa, negasse mu lutalo luno era tugenda kuzimba ekkanisa empya,” Museveni bweyagambye. Ekkanisa ya St. Peter’s yasendeddwa mu kiro kya Ssande bawanyondo ba kkooti abafunye olukusa okuva mu Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA). Museveni yasabye akakiiko ka ‘ State House Anti Corruption Unit’ akakulirwa Edith Nakalema okunoonyereza ensonga eno. Akakiiko kano kabadde kamaze dda okukwarta abapoliisi wamu n’omukungu wa KCCA bakayambeko mu kunoonyerezza Omugagga Dodovico yagambibwa okubeera emabega w’okusenda ekkanisa eno nga alumirizza nti ekkanisa yiye. Museveni yasuubizza ‘Vicar General’ Augustine Kayemba nga bwamaze okuyingira mu nsonga eno agigonjoole. “Ndi mwenyamivu ku kyatuusewo ku kkanisa eno naye tugenda kubonereza buli yenyigiddemu,” Museveni bweyalambise. Museveni yategeezezza nti n’ ekkanisa naye yabadde mu nsobi, naye banditudde nebagonjoola ensonga eno nga tebamenye kkanisa. “Abantu bammwe nga abalamuzi balina okubaako ekkomo, mulabe kyebakoze. Wadde ekkanisa eyinza okuba nga yabadde mu nsobi naye banditudde neboogera mukifo ky’okumenya ekkanisa,” Museveni bweyagambye. Ono yawakkanyizza ebigambibwa nti gavumenti yabaddemu mu lukwe nategeeza nti ye mukulisitaayo atasobola kukkiriza kino.

headline: Oguvunaanibwa  Mufti Mubajje  okutunda ettaka ly’e Ssembabule gutandise okuwulirwa
text: Masaka – Buddu Omusango oguvunaanibwa Mufti Shiekh Shaban Mubajje ne banne  ku by’okutunda ettaka ly’Obuyisiraamu e Ssembabule, gwatandise okuwulirwa olunaku lw’eggulo mu kkooti e Masaka. Ettaka eryogerwako liweza mayiro 2 nga lisangibwa ku block 31A ku kyalo Bukiragyi mu disitulikiti y’e Ssembabule. Abayisiraamu nga bakulembeddwamu Hajji Yasin Lubowa, Sheikh Mutazindwa , Sheikh Juma Mukiibi ne bannaabwe abalala be baatwala Mufti Ramathan Mubajje, Mugalu Ramathan, Kayanja Arthur eyagula ettaka lino awamu ne Uganda Muslim Supreme Council mu kkooti nga babavunaana okutunda ettaka ly’Obusiraamu mu makwetu. Mubajje ne banne bwe bavunaanibwa wadde baabadde basuubira mu kkooti eno naye tebaalabiseeko era ekyaddiridde be bapuliida okusaba omulamuzi abakkirize ensonga bazimalire wabweru wa kkooti. Munnamateeka w’oludda oluwaabi, Lukawa Bashir, yategeezezza kkooti nti abawawaabirwa bonna baaweebwa empapula ezibayita mu kkooti awatali kwe bulankanya. Lukawa yayongedde n’asaba omulamuzi asooke alambule ettaka lino eryogerwako era alagire n’abawawaabirwa baweeyo ekyapa ky’ettaka lino mu kkooti. Ono yagambye nti bakkiriziganyizza okuteekawo omwaganya beegeyeemu ku nsonga zino wabweru wa kkooti. Wabula munnamateeka w’abawawaabirwa, Sam Ssekyewa, wadde yakkiriza eky’okutabagana wabweru wa kkooti naye yagaanye eky’okuwaayo ekyapa mu kkooti. Wano Omuwandiisi wa kkooti enkulu, Agnes Nkonge, we yategeerezza nti kkooti egenda kutegeka fayiro y’omusango guno egiwe omutabaganya era singa bano banaalemwa okukkaanya ku kuwaayo ekyapa n’okulambula ettaka omulamuzi ajja kusalawo eky’enkomeredde ku nsonga eno. Abayisiraamu ab’enjawulo nga bakulembeddwamu Sheikh Siraje Mudde akulira akakiiko akakola kukunulula emmaali y’Obuyisiraamu, boogedde ku nsonga eno ne bategeeza nti bo ekigendererwa kyabwe si kyakuwaabira Mubajje wabula baagala kunnunula bintu bya Busiraamu ebyatundibwa mu mancooro kye bavudde bawagira enteeseganya. Bano beewuunyizza engeri ettaka lino gye lyatundibwa nga ate baali balinako omupangisa nga n’ekiseera kye kyali kikyaliko. Kati bagamba nti kye kiseera bannunule ettaka lyabwe basobole okulyekulaakulanyiza. Omulamuzi omusango yagwongeddeyo okutuuka nga  10/6/2021.

headline: Obuganda bukungubagidde Fr. Joseph Tamale
text: Kalungu-Buddu Abakkiriza wamu n’abantu ab’enjawulo beeyiye e Bukalakasa mu Kalungu olunaku lw’eggulo okuziika Fr. Joseph Tamale, 29 eyafudde wiiki ewedde ekirwadde kya Puleesa n’ensigo. Omukolo gw’okuziika gwatandise n’ekitambiro ky’emmisa ekyakulembeddwamu Omusumba w’essaza lya Eklezia ery’e Masaka, Serverus Jjumba. Omusumba Jjumba yasinzidde wano n’agamba nti okufa kwa Fr. Tamale kutadde EKlezia mu muyaga, bw’atyo n’asaba abakrisitu okwongera okwewonga eri omutonzi abataase ku ndwadde ez’enjawulo. Mu ngeri y’emu yennyamidde olw’ekizibu ekiri mu Bannayuganda ng’abantu tebakyesiga bannaabwe nga buli omu aba mu kweraliikirira munne era nga kye kivuddeko n’abantu okubuusabuusa eddagala erigema Corona. “Kati abantu batuuse n’okulowooza nti buli muntu alwala abeera  aweereddwa butwa. Nsaba kino kive mu mitima gy’abantu nti kubanga bwe banaagenda n’embeera eno mu maaso, obunkenke bwakweyongera,” Omusumba Jjumba bwe yategeezeza. Mu bubaka bwe bwe yatisse Ppookino Jude Muleke, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yatenderezza nnyo emirimu egikoleddwa omugenzi kubanga abadde Father ayagala ennyo Obwakabaka n’eddini ye. Owek. Mayiga yagambye nti Fr. Tamale akoze kinene nnyo mu kutumbula olulimi Oluganda ng’ayita mu kuyimba n’okukumaakuma abavubuka kyasabye abantu abalala bakitwale nga kikulu.  Ye Omubaka wa Kalungu West, Joseph Gonzaga Ssewungu,  yeekokkodde embeera y’ebyobulamu eri mu ggwanga tematiza era nga bangi bafa bagezaako kutwalibwa bweru. Ye Bwannamukulu w’ekigo ky’e Villa Maria mu disitulikiti y’e Kalungu, Omugenzi Fr  Joseph Tamale, gy’amaze omwaka gumu ng’aweereza, Fr Michael Ssewakiryanga, yayunguse amaziga n’ategeezezza nti  Fr. Tamale  ekirwadde ky’ensigo kye kyamusse nti kyokka yagenze okukibategeezaako ng’obudde buyise. Fr.  Joseph Tamale yafuna Obwafaaza mu mwaka gwa 2012 ng’abadde abumazeemu emyaka 9 era abadde ayimba ennyimba  z’eddiini n’okutendeka abayimbi.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga akungubagidde Paasita Yiga
text: Kawaala Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, ayogedde ku Paasita Augustine Yiga eyakazibwako erya Abizaayo ng’omusajja abadde omukozi ennyo era omumalirivu mu byabadde akola. Katikkiro Mayiga ne mutabani wa Paasita Yiga Okwogera bino Owek. Mayiga, abadde agumya abagoberezi b’ ekkanisa ya Christian Revival Centre e Kawaala wamu n’abooluganda lwa Paasita Yiga leero ku Lwokuna, bwabadde agenzeyo okubakubagiza. “Singa Paasita Yiga yali yenyooma oba singa yali yeekubagiza teyandisobodde kutuuka kwebyo byeyatuukako mu bulamu, bwogerageranya gyeva eyo e Mawogola. Mu ngeri eyo ebyo byeyasobola okukola tugambe ekkanisa eno mwetuli, essomero, ttivi bibeere essomo eri fenna nti bwomalirira osobola okutuuka ku birungi nkumo,” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye Mayiga agambye nti wadde okufa kutuuka ku buli muntu naye tekumanyirika era nga wadde abagoberezi be babadde bakimanyi nti mulwadde naye amawulire g’okufa kwe gabakubye wala. Ono ajjukiza abakungubazi nga Omusumba Yiga bweyali omu ku bantu abavaayo okwanukula omulanga gw’ettofaali mu kaweefube w’okunoonya ssente ez’okuzimba buggwe ku masiro era nasiima abagoberezi b’ekkanisa eno olw’omutima omugabi gwebalaga. Mayiga alabudde abasumba okukomya okwelumbagana kubanga ebigambo by’enzirikiriza buli omu abitaputa bubwe, abasabye bawangane ebitiibwa mwebyo byebakiririzaamu. Kamalabyonna awerekeddwako Minisita w’amawulire Noah Kiyimba era nayanirizibwa Kaggo Agnes Nakibirige Ssempa n’abakulu b’ekkanisa.

headline: Kabaka ayagalizza Abasiraamu Idd ennungi
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II,  ayagalizza Abasiraamu Eid el Fitri ey’essanyu, n’abeebaza n’okusiiba kubanga ekisiibo kino kiraze nti abantu bonna benkanankana mu maaso ga Katonda. Era nga kibadde ekiseera ekya basiraamu okwefumiitiriza ku nsonga z’omwoyo awamu n’obulamu bwabwe obwabulijjo Obubaka bwa Kabaka eri Abasiraamu yabutadde mu kiwandiiko eky’enjawulo ekifulumiziddwa olunaku lwaleero ku Lwokubiri n’agamba nti okusiiba kuyamba abantu okwezza obuggya wamu n’okulongoosa ku nkolagana yaabwe ne bantu bannaabwe. Omutanda era abeebazizza olw’okusabira abakulembeze ab’enjawulo okusobola okuyisa obulungi abantu be bakulembera. Era abasabye okugenda mu maaso n’okwegayirira Katonda  era basabire ebisoomooza eggwanga omuli; endwadde,  obutabanguko mu maka, n’abantu abasibirwa obwereere awatali kuwozesebwa. Omuteregga asabye abasiraamu okusabira abo bonna abeeyagaliza, abeekkusa bokka awamu n’abavulubanira ebitali byabwe. Abasiraamu wonna mu ggwanga basuubira okujaguza  olunaku olumalako ekisiibo kya ‘Ramadhan’ esuubirwa okubaawo olunaku lw’enkya ku Lwokusatu oba Olwokuna singa omwezi gunaabera gulabise.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka ayozaayozezza Ssaabasumba Ssemogerere
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II ayozaayozezza musajja we, Paul Ssemogerere olw’okutuuzibwa nga Ssaabasumba bw’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala. Obubaka buno Beene abutisse Omulangira David Kintu Wasajja abusomeddeSsaabasumba n’abakkiriza mu Lutikko e Lubaga leero ku Lwokubiri. “Ssaabasumba Paul Ssemogerere e Lubaga, tukulamusizza n’essanyu ku mukolo ogwekitiibwa ogw’okutuuzibwako nga Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala. Tukuyozaayoza nnyo nnyini okulondebwa ku bukulu obwo. Twebaza Omukama eyakuwa ebitone ebyenjawulo omuli obwetoowaze, obukozi n’obumalirivu obwakusobozesa okubeera munnaddiini omulungi. Mu ngeri yeemu twebaza, bazadde bo abagenzi omuli Aipiyo Mivule ne Angelina Namutebi abaakukuza obulungi n’okugunjula. Tukimanyi bulungi nti amaka amalungi n’entendeka ennungi mwe muva obukulembeze obulungi. Ng’otandika omulimu omunene ogw’okulembera essaza ekkulu nga Ssaabasumba, tujja kwongera okukusabira, tetulina kubuusabuusa nti ojja kutuukiriza bulungi obutume olw’amaanyi g’Omukama n’ekisinde ekyateekebwateekebwa bassabasumaba abaakusooka. Tusaba Mukama akwongere omukisa gwe bulijjo.” Obubaka bwa Kabaka bwe busomye. Ate Ku lwa Gavumenti ya Ssaabasajja Kabaka, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ategeezezza nti enkolagana Buganda gy’ebabadde ne Ssaabasumba w’abeeredde mu Busumba bwa Kasana- Luweero, yaakugenda mu maaso. Asabye Obwakabaka okunyweza enkolagana ne Ekereziya, kiyambe okutumbula ebyenjigiriza, okutumbula ebyobulamu, obulimi n’obulunzi, okufunira abavubuka emirimu awamu n’okuzza obuntubulamu mu bantu, kiyambe okuzza Buganda ku ntikko kuba singa bakwatira wamu zijja kutuukirira. “Ssebo Ssaabasumba nkusuubiza okukwasizaako mu ngeri Mukama gy’anaaba atusobozesezza ng’okola omulimu guno ye yennyini Katonda gw’akugwanyizza.” Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, enteekateeka zonna ez’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko, Ssaabasumba Ssemogerere azimanyi bulungi era balina esuubi nti baakuzitwala mu maaso nga batambulira wamu naye embeera y’abantu ba Kabaka esobole okukyuka. Katikkiro Mayiga era yeeyamye okwongera okusabira Ssaabasumba omuggya, Omukama amuwe omukisa era amukulembere mu bukulembeze bwe buno.

headline: Ssaabalabirizi Mugalu akubirizza abantu okwagalana
text: Katikkiro ng’ali n’omusumba Mugalu Ssaabalabirizi w’ekkanisa ya Uganda omulonde Dr Steven Kazimba Mugalu, agambye Bannayuganda balina okwagalana n’ewankubadde nga baawukanya endowooza mu by’obufuzi n’amawanga. Bweyabadde ku mukolo gw’okuggulawo ekkanisa y’omutukuvu Lukka e Bulera Ssingo eyazimbiddwa munna Rotary era omukungu wa Kabaka Emmanuel Katongole, Kazimba yagambye nti eggwanga terisobola kugenda mumaaso nga abantu tebaagalana.“Uganda erimu abantu abalabika nti baagalana yadde babibiina byanjawulo. Abeesimbyewo mwagalane, abantu bebajja okuwa obululu bagambe nti ono yasinze nga naye mwe temwevumye. Nga Ssaabalabirizi omulonde, nsaba mwe abalonzi obutavuma bakulembeze.  Katikkiro nga aweebwa ekirabo Omulabirizi Kazimba Tulina ekizibu mu ggwanga lino nga n’abaana abato bavuma. Ensi bweggwamu ekitiibwa ng’eggwanga lifudde. Oba by’abufuzi oba by’amawanga tubisse kubbali okwagala kwa Katonda kukulembere byonna,” Kazimba bweyategeezezza. Yagasseeko nti Katonda yatonda abantu mu mawanga, mukikula, ne mu madiini ag’enjawulo basobole okwagalana. “Abantu tebakyayagala ggwanga lyabwe, bwolaba ebintu ebikolebwa, engeri abantu gyebalyamu enguzi biraga nti tebakyayagala ggwanga lyabwe. Omuntu yeefaako yekka nebamuwa ssente ezikola ku ddwaliro n’azeebulizaamu nga ne jjajjawe ajja kulwala.”  Omukungu Emmanuel Katongole ng’asimba omuti Omukolo guno era gwetabiddwamu Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga eyabadde omugenyi omukulu. Mu bubakabwe, Mayiga yasabye abantu batwale ekyokulabirako kya Katongole obuteerabira gyebaava. “Nkulisa Banna Bulera olw’okufuna ekkanisa eno ewundiddwa obulungi. Sikyabulijjo okufuna essinzizo nga lino mu bitundu ebye kyalo nga eno n’olwekyo muli baamukisa nti ekitundu kyammwe kivaamu abantu ab’obuvunanyizibwa ate abajjukira,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Wabula yabasabye omulimu guno bagutwale mumaaso baleme gulekera Katongole ne banne. “Yadde mufunye ababayambyeko okuzimba ekkanisa eno, musaana okumanya nti guno omulimu ggwammwe sigwa Katongole. Musaana okulabirira n’okukuza ekitundu kyammwe. Twafuna omuze mu Uganda ogwa Gavumenti etuyambe, n’omuntu kyasobola okwekolera alinda bamuyambe,” Mayiga bweyagambye. Omukolo gwetabiddwako; Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu Owek Joseph Kawuki, abaami ba Kabaka ku mitendera egy’enjawulo, bannabyabufuzi, n’abantu abalala bangi.

headline: Obwakabaka busanyukidde eky’Omusumba Ssemogerere okufuuka Ssaabasumba
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bw’ozaayozezza omusumba w’e Kasana -Luweero, Paul Ssemogerere olwokulondedwa Ku bwa Ssaabasumba bw’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala. Obubaka buno buweeereddwa, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire leero ku Lwokutaano e Bulange- Mmengo. Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza Obwakabaka bwetegefu okukolagana ne Ssaabasumba Paul Ssemogerere okulaba ng’atambuza bulungi emirimu gye. Kino kiddiridde Ppaapa Francis okulonda abadde Omusumba w’essaza lya Kasana- Luweero, Omusumba Paul Ssemogerere ku bwa Ssaabasumba bw’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala n’adda mu bigere by’eyali Ssaabasumba w’essaza lino, Dr.Cyprian Kizito Lwanga nga yalangiriddwa. Kino kyalangiriddwaomubaka wa Ppaapamu Uganda, Ssaabasumba Luigi Bianco eggulo ku Lwokuna. Katikkiro akakasizza Ssaabasumba omuggya nti Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bwakukola naye okulaba ng’emirimu gye gitambula bulungi. Kamalabyona mu ngeri y’emu atenderezza emirimu egikoleddwa eyaliko minisita wa gavumenti ez’ebitundu kati omugezi, Owek. Jolly Lutaaya gy’agambye nti gitumbudde nnyo Obwakabaka. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti Owek. Jolly Lutaaya y’omu ku bantu abaatandikawo ebimu ku bitongole by’Obwakabaka okuli leediyo CBS n’ebirala era asitudde nnyo ebyemizannyo mu ggwanga.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe asabye abazadde okuliza abaana mu ddiini
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Buikwe – Kyaggwe Minisita w’abavubuka, okwewummuzamu n’okwesanyusa mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda, Owekitiibwa Henry Moses Sekabembe Kiberu, asabye abazadde bulijjo okukuliza abaana baabwe mu mpisa n’eddiini, basobole okuba okubeera aboomugaso. Bino Owek. Ssekabembe asinzidde ku kyalo  Kimera mu ggombolola y’e Ssi Bukunja mu disitulikiti y’e Buikwe mu ssaza ly’e Kyaggwe ku mukolo gw’okugatta Kipala Fred  n’omwagala we, Nakintu, mu bufumbo obutukuvu.  Nga bano be bazadde ba Namboowa Morine ssentebe w’ekibiina kya Akeezimbira era akiikirira abaana abawala abaamasomero ku lukiiko lwa Buganda Youth Council. Minisita Ssekabembe akuutidde abantu okweyisa obulungi basobole okukola n’okukuuma amannya g’abantu baabwe. Owek. Ssekabembe mu ngeri y’emu abawadde obukodyo butaano mwe basobola okukuliza abaana ne bafuuka abensonga mu ggwanga omuli okubasomesa n’okubakuliza mu ddiini n’endala. Omwami wa Kabaka  atwala eggombolola ya Ssaabagabo Ngogwe, Livingstone Kisekka, amuloopedde ng’abantu b’eno wabali abawulize eri Nnamulondo nga n’omwaka oguwedde be baasinga okutwala aAmakula mu Buganda.

headline: Abakulembeze ba Balokole mu Uganda bakyaliddeko Katikkiro wa Buganda.
text: Abakulembeze b’ekibiina Kya National Fellowship Of Born Again Pentecostal Churches in Uganda bakyaliddeko Katikkiro ku Bulange nebabaako byeboogera. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga nga ali n’Abakulembeze ba Balokole nga basoma essaala. Bamwanjulidde enteekateeka zaabwe omuli, okutumbula empisa n’obuntubulamu mu bavubuka, okuwuliziganya ne bannabyabufuzi, (National Dialogue), era bawaddeyo entereeza yabwe ng’abalokole.Katikkiro abeebazizza okujja nebawa enteekateeka yabwe, abasabye okutambulira wamu n’enteekateeka z’obwakabaka.

headline: Muve mu kusiiba mu masinzizo  mbu musaba bugagga- Katikkiro
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abavubuka okukola ennyo bave mu kusiiba mu masinzizo mbu basaba bugagga. Okwogera bino Mayiga abadde ku Keleziya ya Our Lady of Mount Carmel e Kansanga nga Derrick Muganga, mutabani wa Leonard Mukasa agattibwa ne Janet Atuheire. “Mulina okukola ennyo, temusulanga mu keleziya nga musaba obugagga. Abavubuka baagala kwonooneka nti basiiba basaba Katonda abagaggawaze. Ekyo kyabulabe, mubanga abakema Katonda. Mu musabe abawe ebirowoozo ebireeta enkulaakulana abawe n’obulamu obulungi,” Mayiga bwagambye. Asabye abafumbo okukola ebyo ebireeta essanyu mu maka nti olwo lwebajja okusobola okweyagalira mu bufumbo. Annyonnyodde nti obufumbo bulinga ebintu ebirala byonna munsi, nga bwobiwa obudde osobola okubiwangula. “Omusuubuzi bwasuubula engoye, enkya nazivaako n’asuubula kasooli, ate enkya n’asubuula ebyamasannyalaze, ekivaamu nga agamba nti bandoga, nga n’obusuubuzi bumulema kubanga talina kyawadde budde,” Mayiga bwagambye. Derrick Muganga ne Janet Atheire nga bamaze okugattibwa Asabye n’abafumbo okuba abayonjo kubanga teri muntu ayagala muntu mukyafu. “Ekisikiriza abantu okudda eka sirwakubanga ennyumba nenne nnyo oba erimu ebibajje ebirungi ennyo. Temujja kwagala kubeera mu maka ago singa gabeera majama ate bwemutaayagale kugabeeramu mwembi, ng’obufumbo bugenze,” Katikkiro bwagambye. Yeebazizza nnyo abavubuka abettanira obufumbo n’agamba nti teri muntu ayinza ku kulaakulana singa takola ebyo ebisoomooza.

headline: Nnaabagereka Nagginda abaagala obufumbo abasabye okubwetegekera
text: Maama Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda asabye abo bonna abaagala okuyingira obufumbo okuwaayo ebiseera babutegeere era babwetegekere kiyambe ekitiibwa ky’obufumbo okuddawo era n’abaana abakulira mu maka gabwe okubaamu empeke. Bino Nnaabagereka abyogeredde Bulange e Mmengo bw’abadde atongoza enteekateeka y’abakulembeze b’ekibiina ky’abakyala ba ‘Mother’s Union’ mu Buganda ey’okusomesa abafumbo ku ngeri gyebalina okutambuzaamu amaka. “Ffe aba Mother’s Union kitukakatako okulaba nti enteekateeka y’okubuulira abaana abagenda mu bufumbo tugiteekamu amaanyi mangi ddala abaana basobole okutegeera, okwetegereza era n’okweteekerateekera ekyo kyebagendamu,. ” Nnaabagereka Nagginda bw’annyonnyodde. Nnaabagereka agamba nti ensangi zino abaagalana bangi bagenda mu bufumbo nga tebamaze kweteekateeka bulungi nga balowooza nti omukwano gwebalina gumala nebeerabira ensonga enkulu ezitambulirako obufumbo n’amaka. Maama Nnaabagereka Nagginda alaze okutya ku budde obusomesebwamu abafumbo mu kkanisa nagamba nti akadde katono nasaba kongezebweko okusobozesa abeetegekera obufumbo okwefumintiriza era baggumire mwekyo kyebagendamu kiyambe okunyweza ekitiibwa ky’obufumbo. Nnaabagereka Nagginda era simusanyufu olw’amaka agatabanguka buli lukya olw’abazadde ne bannaddiini okulemererwa okubuulirira abaana abalenzi n’abawala nga tebanaba kuyingira bufumbo kyagamba nti kyekivuddeko ekitiibwa ky’obufumbo okufa. Nnaabagereka abakyala abasibiridde entanda bulijjo okwekwata ku ssaala nga baliko okusomoozebwa kwebasanze nasanyukira enkola y’okuzza obuggya okubuulirira abafumbo ababeera bagenda okufumbirigana. Ye Owek. Nankindu agambye nti abakyala bano aba Mother’s Union bakoze emirimu egigasa ensi naddala bwekituuka ku ntambuza y’amaka wakati mu bugumiikiriza obutagambika ekiyambye okutwala eggwanga mu maaso. Minisita Nankindu agasseeko nti obwegendereza n’okwagala ebiri mu bakyala ba Mother’s Union bukoze kinene okunyweza amaka muggwanga nga balambika bannabwe ku ngeri gyebasaanye okukwatamu obufumbo ekitadde ettofaali mu nteekateeka za Buganda ez’enjawulo nga okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya. Okusinziira ku Minisita Nankindu waliwo Ttabamiruka w’ Abakyala ng’ennaku z’omwezi 13/ 05/2022 nga wakuyindira ku Imperial Royale era Nnaabagereka Sylvia Nagginda yagenda okubeera omugenyi omukulu. Omukolo guno gwatandise nakubuulira okwakulembeddwamu Faith Nakitende Luwalira ng’ono asabye abakyala okusitukiramu bakole buli kisoboka bazze eggwanga ku mulamwa kuba buli kimu kirabika nga kisobye. Nakitende era abasabye okutumbula ennono n’obuwangwa kuba bino bikola kinene okunyweza amaka n’obufumbo ebiyita mukugezesebwa akaseera kano. Akulira ekibiina kya Mother’s Union mu Buganda, Josephine Nakijoba Kasaato agamba nti baliwamu ne Nnaabagereka era bakukola buli kimu okutumbula embeera z’abakyala n’abaana okulaba nga batumbula amaka.

headline: Bannaddiini basabye Pulezidenti aggule amasinzizo
text: Bannaddiini mu kibuga ky’e Ntebe basabye omukulembeze w’eggwanga aggulewo amasinzizo okusobola okukendeeza ebikolobero ebyeyongedde muggwanga. Bano bagamba nti abantu baweddemu omutima ogutya Katonda olw’akaseera amasinzizo ke gamaze nga maggale ne basaba Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni agaggule basobole okubalyowa emyoyo, badde eri omutonzi. Okusinziira ku Rev. Nathan Mulondo ng’ono y’asumba ekkanisa y’Omutukuvu Apollo esangibwa e Nkumba, ategeezezza nti abantu bangi beenyigidde mu bikolwa ebyettima n’obukaba olwokubulwa entiisa ya Katonda. Onoagambanti amasinzizo tegakoma ku kulyowa myoyo wabula galina n’enkolaebudaabuda abantu awamu n’okwenenyaeyamba ennyo abantu ne bagumira embeera y’okusoomoozebwamwe babeera bayita. Ate ye Omusumba w’ekkanisa ya Kingdom FaithChurch, Charles Kayisali Kiwanuka nayeagambanti ekkanisa ky’ekifo ekiyamba ennyo abantu okweggyako ebirowoozo ebyekko era n’ategeeza nti ekkanisa erina enkola egoberera amateeka agaatekebwawo ministule y’ebyobulamu ekyasinze okubeera ennung’amu, nabwekityo asabye gavumenti eggulewo amasinzizo mu bwangu. Kati ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba oba Pulezidenti Museveni anaggula amasinzizo gano ekiro kya leero, bw’anaaba ayogerako eri eggwanga ku biragiro ebiggya eby’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: Omusumba Paul Ssemwogerere alondeddwa ku bwa Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala
text: Kampala Omusumba w’essaza ly’e Kasana – Luweero, Paul Ssemwogerere alondeddwa Ppaapa Francis XVI ku bwa Ssaabasumba bw’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala okudda mu bigere bya Ssaabasumba Cyprian Kizito Lwanga eyafa gyebuvuddeko. Kino kirangiriddwa mu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire olutudde ku Lutikko e Lubaga ku Lwokuna. Oluvannyuma lw’okufa kwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga, Omusumba Ssemwogerere yalondebwa okubeera omukuumi w’essaza lino okutuusa lw’alondeddwa okumuddira mu bigere. Omusumba Ssemwogerere y’ani Paul Ssemwogerere yazaalibwa ngaJune 30, 1956 e Kisubi,ku luguudo oludda e Ntebe. Emisomo yagitandikira ku ssomero lya Kigero Primary School nga tannatwalibwa ku Kisubi Boys. Oluvannyuma yeegatta ku ssomero lya St. Maria Gorreti Senior Secondary School- Katende, gye yamalira ssiniya eyookuna. Mu 1976, Ssemwogerere n’abalala 7 be bayizi abaasooka okusomera mu St. Mbaaga Seminarye Ggaba. Eryatandikibwawo okubangula abasajja mu bwa Faaza. Mu mwaka gwa 1978, Kalidinaali Emmanuel Kiwanuka Nsubuga yaweereza Ssemwogerereku Ssettendekero waSaint Francis de Sales Seminary e Milwaukee, Wisconsin, mu Amerika n’atikkirwa ddiguli y’eddiini mu 1982. Ng’ennaku z’omwezi 21 Novemba, 1981 ono yaweebwa obuseminariyo Ssaabasumba Rembert George Weakland,eyali akulira essaza lya Milwaukee. YafuukaFaaza nga June 3, 1983 e Kampala nga buno bwamuweebwa Kalidinaali Nsubuga. Ono yatandika okuweereza nga Faaza e Kampala okutuusa mu 2008 lwe yalondebwa okubeera Omusumba w’essaza lya Kasana – Luweero. E Luweero, Ssemwogerere yatuuzibwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga eyaliayambibwako Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamala, Ssaabasumba w’e Sant’Ugo, Paul Tschang In-Nam, Titular Archbishop ow’e Amantian’omubaka wa Ppaapa eyali mu ggwanga ekiseera ekyo.

headline: Biibino by’obadde tomanyi ku Ssaabasumba Jeronymos Muzeeyi ow’Abasodokisi
text: Ssaabasumba omuggya ow’Eklesia y’Abasodokisi, His Eminence Metropolitan Jeronymos Muzeeyi, yatikkiddwa olunaku lw’eggulo ku Ssande era bino bye bimu ku bitonotono ebimukwatako. Ssaabasumba Jeronymos Muzeeyi yazaalibwa nga 18 March 1962 ku kyalo Bulopa mu disitulikiti y’e Kamuli mu maka g’Omwami Augustinos Kakombe n’Omukyala Agnes Biribawa era nga ye mwana omuberyeberye mu baana 4. Ono okusoma kwe yakutandikira ku Kisaka Primary School gye yava ne yeeyunga ku Chwa II Memorial College e Kololo ng’eno gye yamalira secondary wakati w’omwaka 1969 ne 1984. Mu 1985 yagenda ku ssomero lya Seminario yaba Orthodox mu ggwanga lya Kenya era ng’eno yakolako ng’omutegesi w’ebitabo. Mu 1986 yagenda mu ssetendekero wa Anthens mu Buyonani n’akuguka mu by’eddiini era n’abikonolamu ddiguli mu 1995. Ng’avuddeyo yatikkirwa Obudyankoni era wakati w’omwaka 1996 ne 1997 n’alondebwa okubera Vicar General w’essaza ly’Ekeresia ery’e Kampala ne Uganda yonna era oluvannyuma lw’omwaka gumu n’alondebwa okubeera Vicar General wa Bukoba e Tanzania. Nga 24 November 1999 yalondebwa ku kifo ky’obwabisopu era n’atikkirwa nga 11 December 1999 okuweereza mu ssaza ly’Eklesia erya Bukobamu Tanzania okutuusa mu 2007. Eno gye yalinnyisibwa okutuuka ku kifo ky’obwa Metropolitan okuweerezae Mwanza n’obugwanjuba bwa Tanzania ng’eno gye yalondeddwa olukiiko lwa Holy Synod ya Alexandria ne Africa yonna okubeera Ssaabasumba w’essaza ly’Eklesia eya Kampala nga 12 January 2022. Mu buweereza bwe e Tanzania, Ssaabasumba Muzeeyi alina by’atuuseeko omuli okuggulawo Eklesia empya, okubatiza abakkiriza abapya abasoba mu mitwalo 3, okutikkira abasumba, okuzimba Eklesia ezisoba mu 100 ssaako okulabirira abali mu bwetaavu omuli bamulekwa, bannamwandu n’abakadde. Ono era asobodde okuzimba amalwaliro e Bukoba, okuzimba amasomero n’okuweerera abaana, okuzimba amazzi ag’omulembe ssaako okuzimba ekkakkalabizo ly’emirimu eriweza obugazi bwa ssikweya mmita 2000. Metopolitan Jeronymos Muzeeyi era mukugu mu nnimi eziwerera ddala 5 okuli; Oluyonani, Oluzungu, oOluswayiri, Olugandan’Olusoga.

headline: Omulamuzi Bamugemereirwe asabye abazadde okwagazisa abaana ennyimba z’amaloboozi
text: Omulamuzi wa kkooti ejulirwamu, Catherine Bamugemereire asabye abazadde okwagazisa abaana abalina ekitone ky’okuyimba okwettanira ennyimba z’amaloboozi kuba zirimu eby’okuyiga bingi okusinga ez’ensi. Bino abyogeredde mu kibbiitu ky’omwaka eky’ennyimba z’amaloboozi aba Gospel Crescendo Elite Choir kyebategese mu kisaawe kya Mengo Senior School akawungeezi k’eggulo gyeyabadde omugenyi omukulu. Omulamuzi Bamugemereirwe agamba nti kino kijja kubayamba okukuza ebitone byabwe ate basigale nga bampisa era banguyire obulamu kuba bajja kukula nga balina ekigendererwa.  Ono bwatyo asabye abantu obutagwamu ssuubi mu mbeera eno enyigiriza omutali nsimbi endwadde ezisomooza nebizibu ebirala bwatyo nasaba abantu okwegendereza ngabayingira omwaka 2023. Akulira ebyenjiri mu bulabirizi bwe Namirembe, Rev. Samuel Muwonge yeebazizza abategesi olwokutegeka ekivvulu ekitaliimu byesitaza wakati mukuzza abantu eri katonda n’okubawa essanyu ly’ ebikujjuko bya Sekukkulu. Ye Pulezidenti wa ‘Gospel Crescendo Elite Choir’, Ronald Keeya Ssenabulya ategeezezza nti Choir eno kati eri mu myaka 20 ngasinga tebayingiza bavubuka yandisanaawo kyokka ng’enjiri y’Omutonzi erina okubuulirirwa mu nnyimba. Ekibbiitu kino kigenda kuberangawo buli mwaka choir ezenjawulo mwezegattira ku Gospel Cresecendo Elite Choir okukoloobya enyimba ezitendereza Omutonzi.

headline: Okufa kwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga ddibu ddene eri Buganda – Katikkiro Mayiga
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga, akungubagidde Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga, eyasangiddwa ng’afiiridde mu maka ge enkya ya leero.Owek. Mayiga asinzidde mu maka ge e Lweza ku leero Lwomukaaga n’agamba nti Ssaabasumba abadde ayagala nnyo ekika kye ne Kabaka we. Katikkiro Mayiga nga ayogerako eri Obuganda gyebuvuddeko. Ekif: Bamulanzeki “Mbadde mpuliziganya naye ku nsonga enkulu ez’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda naye era tubadde twogerezeganya nnyo ku nsonga ezikwata ku Uganda eyaawamu. Kale kufiirwa ku nnene nnyo.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agambye. Mayiga ategeezezza nti by’akoze abikoze naddala mu ssaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala naye akabonero akalabika kwe kukyusa ekifaananyi kya Namugongo n’amutuusa ku ddaala ly’ ensi yonna.Katikkiro Mayiga ayogedde ku Ssaabasumba ng’omuntu abadde omumalirivu era ayagala ennyo Kabaka we n’ekika kye eky’emmamba. “Nzijjukira ab’Emmamba lwe baasooka okutongoza SACCO yaabwe era Ssaabasumba yaliwo nnyo, omukolo twagukolera awo ku Pope II. Kiwa nnyo essuubi abakulembeze b’eddiini bwe balaga nti bategeera ensonga z’obuwangwa n’eddiini.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Owek. Mayiga akkaatirizza nti Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde teyeekweka ku nsonga z’Obwakabaka era ng’ajjukiza gavumenti egabane obuyinza mu nkola ya Federo kireetewo obwenkanya eri ebitundu ebyenjawulo.“Abadde yeenyumiriza nnyo mu Ssekabaka Muteesa I, Ssekabaka Muteesa I ye yayita Abamisane, oyinza n’okugamba nti Uganda nga bw’ogiraba olwaleero etandikira ku Ssekabaka I.” Owek. Mayiga bw’annyonnyodde. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde yatandika ekkadiyizo ly’Eklezia n’alibbulamu erinnya lya Ssekabaka I okulaga okusiima kwe eri Obwakabaka mu kuleeta kuno eddiini.Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nti Ssaabasumba abadde alina enteekateeka ey’okutambula n’ebitongole bya Buganda nga BUCADEF okuyamba okukulaakulanya abantu n’okubagobako obwavu kuba abadde akubiriza abantu okwegayirira Katonda nga bwe bakola.Katikkiro Mayiga asaasidde Obuganda, Eklezia n’abenganda, olw’okufa kwa Ssaabasumba. Asaba Omukama Katonda abagumye.

headline: Owek.  Nsibirwa asiimiddwa ekkanisa olw’okugiyamba okulaakulana
text: Abakulembeze b’ekkanisa ya Uganda mu bulabirizi bwe Namirembe basiimye omumyuka ow’okubiri owa KatikkiroOwek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa olw’okugiyambako mu nteekateeka z’okutumbula eby’obulimi awamu n’okutumbula ekirime ky’ Emmwanyi. Bano okusiima basinzidde ku mukolo gwa Rev. Can. Henry Ssegawa ne mukyala weChristine Ssegawa gwebategese okwebalizaako Katonda olw’okuweza emyaka32 ngabali mu buwereza. Kinajjukirwa ntiRev. Can. Henry Segawa ye muwandiisi w’obulabirizi owenkalakkalira era akwasiddwa ennyumba ey’enkalakkalira ey’omuwandiisi w’obulabirizi buno okusobola okutambuza obulungi emirimu. Omulabirizi we Namirembe Rt. Rev. Bp. Wilberforce Kityo Luwaliraabadde omubuulizi w’olunaku asinzidde wano nasiima Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa olwokuvujirira enteekateeka zekkanisa nokubayamba okubafunira endokwa zemmwanyi nga ayita mu kitongole kya BUCADEF. Mu kwogera kwe,Owek.Robert Waggwa ategeezezza nti obukulembeze eri abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka buli ku mitendera egy’enjawulo era Omulabirizi Kityo Luwalira ne Canon Ssegawa beetaba butereevu mu nteekateeka y’ Emmwanyi Terimba okusobola okutumbula enkulaakulana n’abantu okubalabirako.  “Tukoze ebintu bingi nnyo mu Bwakabaka okulaba nti abantu baffe bagezaako okubeera mu mbeera esaanidde era tulabawo enjawulo. Enteekateeka eno Katikkiro gyeyawomamu omutwe eya Emmwanyi Terimba wamu nokusimba ebitooke etambulidde ddala bulungi era tukirabye nti mu myaka 5 obungi bw’emmwanyi n’amatooke mu Buganda wamu n’enfuna byeyongeddeko,” Owek. Waggwa bw’ategeezezza. Ono agumizza abantu mu Buganda ne Uganda nti akatale k’emmwanyi wekali era nabasaba okwongera amaanyi mu kuzirima basobole okufuna ensimbi bakyuuse embeera yabwe. Owek Nsibirwa ayagaliza Canon Ssegawa n’omukyala Christine obulamu obulungi basobole okwongera okuweereza Omukama awamu n’Obwakabaka. Omujaguza w’olunaku Rev. Can. Henry Segawayebaziiza Katonda olw’okumusobozesa okuwereza ekkanisa emyaka 32 era naasiima ennyumba emuweereddwa kyokka nalaga obwetaavu okufunira abaweereza abalala webasula. Omukolo gunogwetabiddwako abalabirizi okuli omubeezi wa Ssaabalabirizi Dr. Rt. Rev. Hannighton Mutebi, Bp. Jackson Matovu, Bp. George Ssenabulya ne Jackson Matovu abasatu abaawummula, bassaabadinkoni mu bulabirizi buno obwe Namirembe, abasumba nababuulizi abalala.

headline: Omusumba w’e Masaka alabudde abalemedde mu kweraguza
text: Omusumba w’essaza ly’Eklezia Katolika ery’e Masaka, Serverus Jjumba, atabukidde abantu abakyaleddemu ebikolwa eby’okweraguza ssaako okusamira mu kifo ky’okweyuna amasinzizo ne batendereza omutonzi. Omusumba Jjumba okwogera bino yasinzidde mu kigo ky’e Buyaga mu Disitulikiti y’e Masaka ku mukolo gw’okutema evvuunike okuzimba enju y’abasoserodooti esookedde ddala ku kigo kino ekikyali ekipya era nga ku mukolo guno kwabaddeko n’okusonda ssente ez’okudduukirira enteekateeka eno. Emikolo gino gyatandise n’ekitambiro ky’emmisa era Omusumba Jjumba yasinzidde wano n’asaba abakristu okudda eri Katonda kuba kino kye kibalemesezza okukulaakulana. Ono yasabye abazadde n’abaana okunnyikiza enkola y’okusoma Sappule nga beesingira ku Bikira Maria omuwolereza w’ekigo kino. Omusumba Jjumba era yawabudde abakrisitu okunyweza enkolagana ssaako n’okuyambagana kubanga kino kyokka kye kigenda okuyamba okusobola okunnyikiza obumu ssaako n’okukulaakulanya abantu ba Katonda Ye Ssaabakristu w’essaza ly’e Masaka, Regina Kitaka, yasabye abavubuka obuteesamba Klezia w’Omukama wamu n’okusaba abatuuze okukozesa ekigo kino obulungi. Rev. Fr. Nestus Mugisha bwannamukulu w’ekigo ky’e Buyaga yategeezezza nti abasoserodooti tebalina we basula, era nga batandise omulimo gw’okubazimbira ennyumba ku kigo kino kibasobozese okwanguyirwa obuweereza bw’Omukama. Ennyumba eno yaakuwemmenta obukadde 430 era nga ya kkalina myaliiro 2. Obukadde 24 bwe busondeddwa mu mpeke ssaako n’abasuubizza era ngomulimu guno nga guwedde baakutandika obuzimba Eklezia.

headline: Abamenye ekkanisa mu Ndeeba  mutukoze bubi -Omulabirizi Luwalira
text: Ekkanisa ya St. Peter’s mu Ndeeba Ndeeba Omulabirizi we Namirembe . Rt. Rev. Wilberforce Kityo Luwalira alaze okunnyolwa olw’okumenyebwa kw’ekkanisa ya St. Peter’s mu Ndeeba. Ekkanisa eno ebadde emazeewo emyaka egiwera 40 yamenyeddwa mukiro ekyakeesezza olwaleero, nga erudde nga ekayanirwa omugagga amanyiddwako erya Dobovico era nga ebadde ekuumibwa poliisi. “Leero tukeeredde mukunyolwa olw’ekkanisa eyamenyeddwa mu Ndeeba, kyenyamiza okulaba nga ensonga eno ebadde egobererwa okuva mu 1981 bweti byebasazeewo ogikomekerezza. Ffenna tuli mu bulumi naye okusingira ddala abakulisitaayo b’ ekkanisa ya St. Peter’s”, Omulabirizi Luwalira bweyategezezza. Luwalira yagasseeko nti endabika y’ekkanisa eno ebadde eraga bulungi amaanyi abakulisitaayo b’omukitundu kino gebassaamu okugizimba kyokka nga gonna gasanyiziddwawo mu ddakiika entono. Yasabye abakulisitaayo okunywerera ku Katonda naye era beegendereze akaseera kano abantu mwebasaliddewo okukola ebya Sitaani. Luwalira yasabye abantu bonna abeetabye mu kubba ettaka wonna mu ggwanga okweddamu era nategeeza nga ebikoleddwa mu Ndeeba bwebitasobola kuziyiza kusaasaana kwa njiri. Ate ye omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emirilaano Patrick Onyango yategezezza nga abadduumizi bapoliisi mukitundu kino 3, bwebamaze okukwatibwa olw’okulagajalira emirimu gyabwe Abakwate kuliko; akulira poliisi y’e Katwe David Epedu, akulira poliisi ya Ndeeba Yeko Kato ne Isabirye Kaloli nga naye muddumizi mu poliisi mu Kampala n’emirilaano. URN

headline: Obubaka bwa Kabaka obw’ Amazuukira
text: Twegatta ku bantu ba Katonda mwenna okujaguza Amazuukira ga Mukama waffe Yesu Kristu ag’omwaka 2021. Omwaka oguwedde, tetwasobola kwetaba ffena mu masinzizo, olw’embeera y’obulwadde bwa covid-19, obwasaanyalaza eggwanga lyonna mu bintu ebitali bimu. Tusaasira bannaffe abalwadde n’abafiiriddwa abantu baabwe olw’obulwadde bwa covid-19. Tubasaba okugondera endagiriro z’abasawo ezituyamba obutakwatibwa bulwadde buno. Tubakulisa okulonda kw’abakulembeze baffe okubaddewo ku ntandikwa y’omwaka guno. Tusaba Katonda okukkakkanya abo bonna abakyalina obusungu, obuswavu n’obulumi okwekuba mu kifuba era bamanye nti, eddembe lya ssekinnoomu okulonda omuntu gw’oyagadde. Tusaba obwenkanya mu misango gyonna egyekuusa ku by’okulonda okuwedde n’okuteebwa kwabo bonna abali mu makomera nga balangibwa endowooza zaabwe ez’ebyobufuzi. Amazuukira gatujjukiza okuyiika kw’omusaayi, okubonyaabonyezebwa, okwewaayo n’amaziga ebyavaamu okununula kw’ensi. Kitukakatako naffe okwewaayo bulijjo mu bwesimbu okubonaabonera abalala mu bye tukola. Kyokka twewuunya nnyo okulaba ng’ebikolebwa mu ggwanga lyaffe, naddala ensangi zino, tebyesigamizibwa ku babonaabona olw’abalala. Kitukwasa ennaku okulaba ngabakulembeze bakyalemedde mu bikolwa eby’obunnanfuusi, obwennakyemalira, amaddu, obukuusa, okwekkusa n’okwekuza ku bitali byabwe. Tubakubiriza obutasaabulula omulamwa gw’okuzuukira ng’abantu bamalibwako eddembe lyabwe. Tubaagaliza Amazuukira ag’Essanyu n’Emirembe.

headline: Eggwanga lyetaaga okutabagana mu bwangu – Bannaddiini
text: Bannaddiini abeegattira mu kibiina kya IRCU  Kampala Akakiiko akataba enzikiriza mu ggwanga aka ‘Inter-Religious Council of Uganda (IRCU)’ basabye wategekebwewo okutabagana ng’eggwanga kuba embeera eriwo mu ggwanga naddala mu by’obufuzi yeetaaga kusonyiwagana. Bino babyogeredde mu nsisinkano mwe basiibulidde abadde akulira oludda oluvuganya mu Palamenti. Ye ssentebe wa IRCU, Sheikh Shaban Ramadhan Mubajje ategeezezza nti waliwo ensonga enkulu ezeetaaga okwogerwako era wabeewo okukkaanya. “Ng’embeera ya Ssennyiga Corona bw’etereera, waliwo obwetaavu tutuule nga bannayuganda, tewali kubuusabuusa nti ebintu ebiriwo mu ggwanga byetaaga okwogerako kuba we twaviiridde mu kalulu nga tweyawudde ng’eggwanga.” Mubajje bw’annyonnyodde. Ye Ochan asabye bannaddiini okukulemberamu ensonga kuba ensonga ezirina okwogerako tezirina kulekerwa bannabyabufuzi bokka. “Tuwagira enteesegenya eziri ku mulamwa nga bwe mulaze era zibeere za mugaso kuba waliwo enteeseganya eziriwo naye ate ne zitavaamu makulu.” Ochan bw’agambye Bino we bijjidde ng’ekibiina Ochan mw’ava kyakamala okuzira okwetaba olukung’aana lwa IPOD olugenda okukubirizibwa ssentebe wa NRM era Pulezidenti Museveni ku Lwokutaano lwa wiiki eno. Bwe yabadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire, omwogezi wa FDC, Omubaka Ibrahim Ssemujju (FDC, Kira Municipality), yategeezezza nti ensisinkano ya IPOD terina kya makulu kigenda givaamu. Ochan ategeezezza bannaddiini nti ensonga ezirina okuteesebwako bwe bukambwe obususse mu b’ebyokwerinda, emivuyo egyali mu kalulu awamu n’ensonga endala enkulu. “Ettemu, ttiyaggaasi, obukambwe ku bannansi byonna tebyetaagisa, ekigambo akakiiko k’ebyokulonda aketengeredde tekirina kukoma mu bigambo.” Ochan bw’agasseeko. Ye omubaka Emmanuel Ongiertho (FDC, Jonam) alabudde bannabyabufuzi okulekayo okwemanya essajja nga bajja muteeseganya zino bwe ziba zaakuvaamu akalungi. Akulira enzikiriza ya abasodokisi mu ggwanga, Omusumba Jonah Lwanga, ategeezezza nti eggwanga ligezaako okudduka n’okwewala amazima nga walina okubaawo ekikolebwa kati. “Tetusobola kutambula ng’eggwanga nga tetufuddeyo ku mazima, tulina okutandika okwogerezeganya nga tusookera ku kumanya ekituufu.” Lwanga bw’annyonnyodde. Ochan yabadde awerekeddwako omubaka Santa Alum (UPC, Oyam) ne Betty Bamukwatsa (FDC, Rukungiri).

headline: Katikkiro n’omukyala nabo bawandiise ennyiriri mu Bayibuli
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga n’omukyala Margret Mayiga begasse ku Ssabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II ne Maama Nnabagereka Sylvia Nagginda mukuwandiika ennyiriri mu Bayibuli empandiike n’engalo esoose mu Uganda. Aba Bible Society of Uganda, nga bakulembeddwamu omulabirizi we Mukono Rev William James Ssebaggala bakedde ku Butikkiro, amaka amatongole ag’obwakatikkiro okusobozesa Mayiga, omukyala wamu ne Ssabawolereza wa Buganda Oweek. Christopher Bwanika okuwandiika ennyiriri zaabwe. Kabaka yeyasookera ddala okuwandiika ennyiriri ttaano mu suula y’okubikkulirwa [Genesis] munteekateeka eno. Katikkiro awandiise ennyiriri ssatu naye mu ssuula y’okubikkulirwa, ate ye Oweek. Bwanika nawandiika ennyiriri bbiri. Mayiga ategeezezza nti kyetaagisa okuddaabiriza ebintu byaffe ebiba byonoonese tuddemu okubikozesa.   “Ssekabaka Muteesa 1, bweyawandiikira Nnabakyala wa Bungereza ebbaluwa, yalina Katikkiro ne Kabaka aliwo ng’omulimu guno gugenda mumaaso naye alina Katikkiro n’endowooza nti amakage amatongole gaba malungi okukolebwamu omulimu ogwo,” Mayiga bwagambye. Omulabirizi Ssebaggala agambye nti beebaza Katonda olw’okubawa omwaganya okuteekawo ebyafaayo mu Uganda. “Nga tujjukira Muteesa I, waaliwo okwolesebwa eri aba Bible Society abaagamba oluvanyuma lw’emyaka 50 nga bazze mu Uganda batekewo ekyafaayo eky’okuwandiika Bayibuli ng’ewandiikiddwa mumikono gya Bannayuganda, ensi ntono nnyo ezisobodde okukola ekintu kino,” Ssebaggala bwategeezezza. Asiimye nnyo Ssabasajja Kabaka olw’okukkiriza okubeera omuntu eyasooka okuwandiika ennyiriri ezisooka mu Bayibuli okuva ku lusooka okutuuka ku lw’okutaano. Yayongeddeko nti baagala abantu ba Buganda be baba bawandiika essuula y’okubikkulirwa yonna. Buli ayagala, alina eddembe okuwandiika oluvanyuma lw’okuwaayo emitwalo kkumi nga zino zigenda kweyambisibwa mukuzimba ekitebe ekiggya kya Bible Society mu Uganda.

headline: Obwakabaka bulonze olukiiko olugenda okwekenneenya amateeka g’omupiira gw’amasaza
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda, nga buyita mu minisitule y’abavubuka, ebyemizaanyo n’okwewummuza, bulonze olukiiko lw’abantu 8, okukola ennongoosereza mu mateeka agagenda okuddukanya empaka z’amasaza. Olukiiko olulondeddwa lukulirwa Bainamani Bernard, Omuwandiisi Festus Kirumira ate bammemba kuliko; Frank Kyazze, Haruna Kyobe, Ruth Nalwanga, Mwanje Dan, Richard Kirabira ne Simon Nsubuga “Tubasuubira okutuggyirayo amateeka agasobola okutuyamba okuzimba empaka zino nga mu kino balina okulaba nga ttiimu y’essaza esobola okweyimirizaawo, okufuba okulaba nti wabeerawo obwerufu mu kukung’aanya ensimbi n’okuzisaasaanya n’empuliziganya ku nsonga y’ensimbi. Tulowooza nti amateeka gano gajja kusikiriza bamusigansimbi ne bannamikago abasobola okuteeka ssente mu muzannyo gw’omupiira.” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti ttiimu zino zibadde zisanga obuzibu bunene okweyimirizaawo wakati ng’abawagizi tebaliiyo mu bisaawe olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kyokka nga waliyo abavugirizi ne bannamikago abasobola okuzikwasizaako. Okusinziira ku ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo guno gugenda kubeera mulundi gwakubiri nga bategeka empaka zino mu muggalo, era ku luno essira bagenda kuliteeka ku kugema abazannyi era olukiiko olulondeddwa lugenda kulung’amya ku kirina okukolebwa. Agenda okukulira olukiiko luno, Bernard Bainamani ategeezezza nti omulimu ogwabwe omukulu gwakukola nnongoosereza mu mateeka agaliwo naye ate si be balina obuyinza obusembayo ku nsonga eno. “Ogwaffe gwakukung’aanya birowoozo naffe tugattemu ebyaffe tubisindike eri akakiiko akateesiteesi ak’empaka z’amasaza. Batuwadde ebbanga lwa wiiki 2 okuva olwaleero era tutandikiddewo emirimu gyaffe era tetulowooza kusukka bbanga lituweereddwa.” Bainamani bw’ategeezezza. Kinajjukirwa nti empaka z’amasaza ze zimu ku zisinga obuganzi mu ggwanga lino wabula emyaka egiyise zibadde zitawaanyizibwa nnyo ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyateeka eggwanga ku muggalo.

headline: ‘Quarter Final’ z’ekikopo ky’Amasaza ya Ssande eno – Omuk. Ssejjengo
text: Olukiiko oluddukanya emipiira gy’ Amasaza mu Buganda, lutegeezezza nga oluzannya lwa ‘Quarter Finals’ olwali luyimiriziddwa, lugenda luzannyibwa ku Ssande eno. Kino kirangiriddwa Ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Sulaiman Ssejjengo mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire ku Lwokubiri e Bulange Mmengo.  “Twetegereza embeera eno era twebuzizza ku bakugu ab’enjawulo okuva mu bitongole ebikwatibwako netusalawo ‘Quarter’ fayinolo zizanyizibwa ku Ssande nga 2/10/2022 mu masaza Busiro nga Mawokota ekyaza Buddu, Busiro ekyaza Gomba, Ssingo ekyaza Kyaggwe ne Buweekula ejja kuba ekyaza Bulemeezi,” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Omuk. Ssejjengo agamba nti bakukozesa amakubo gonna abakugu gebabalambise okusobola okutangira ensaasaana y’ekirwadde kino. Ono akubiriza ttiimu n’abawagizi okuteekawo ebifo abawagizi webanaanaabira engalo awamu n’okwambala masiki era banywerere ku biragiro ebinabaweebwa okusobola okuziyiza ekirwadde kino. Omuk. Ssejjengo bannabyamizannyo abasabye okubeera obulindaala basobole okukuuma obulamu bwabwe obulungi.

headline: Bannayuganda bakuutiddwa okwetegeka bwebaba baakuwangula mu by’emizannyo
text: Minisita wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka avunanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo, abavubuka n’okwewummuza, Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu agambye singa Uganda yeteekateeka bulungi, esobola okuwangula engule nnyingi nnyo mu by’emizannyo. Okwogera bino Sekabembe abadde mu Bulange e Mmengo mu kuggalawo omusomo gw’ebyemizannyo ogumanyiddwa nga sports administration and management training, ogumaze ennkau ssatu nga guyinda.  “Uganda nga tweteeseteese bulungi, netukola byetuteekeddwa okukola nga bwetuteekeddwa okubikola, mu butonde bwetulina, mu mmere gyetulya, ne mubaamu obuntu bulamu, ku ddaala lyonna mu nsi yonna tuteekeddwa okusobola okuvuganya n’okuwangula. Omukisa gusanga yeeteeseteese,” Sekabembe bwagambye. Omusomo guno ogwaggulwawo nga Gattonnya 11, gwawagiddwa ekibiina ekikola ku by’emizannyo mu ggwanga ekya Uganda Olympics Committee. Abamu ku beetabye mu musomo  Okusinziira ku Oweek. Hassan Kiyemba, omusomo guno gugendereddwamu okuwa obukugu obw’enjawulo munzirirukanya y’ebyemizannyo  “Tujja kufuba nnyo okulaba nga abantu abaddukanya eby’emizannyo balina obukugu obw’enjawulo tusobola okutunda n’okusikiriza abantu bangi mu masaza gonna okulaba nga bawagira eby’emizannyo,” Kiyemba bwagambye.  Omusomo gwetabiddwamu abatendesi b’omupiira mu masaza, mu bika, mu masomero, obukiiko obukulembera eby’emizannyo mu Bwakabaka nga kwekuli akakiiko akakulembera omupiira gw’amasaza, akakulembera omupiira gw’ebika, omupiira gw’okubaka ogwe’bika, akakiiko akakulembera omupiira gw’amasomero n’ekikopo kya Nnaabagereka n’abamu ku bategesi b’emisinde. Omusomo guno gwagulwawo Oweek. Ssekabembe ng’ali wamu ne pulezidenti wa Uganda Olympics Committee William Blick. Gwetabiddwamu abantu abawera 150.

headline: Golola aweze okuyimusa omutindo gwa Tooro United FC
text: Omutendesi wa kiraabu ya Tooro United omuggya Edward Golola, yeeyamye okukyusa ttiimu eno efuuke eky’okulabirako esobole okuzzaawo ettutumu lyaayo. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri akakiiko ak’ekikugu oluvanyuma lw’okumwanjula  ku Tavern Woods e Kabuusu ku Lwokusatu, Golola yasuubizza okuzzaayo ttiimu eno mu Uganda Premier League. “Twagala okufuula Tooro United FC eky’okulabirako naddala mu kuzuula ebitone ebipya era nga nkakasa nti ttiimu eno ejja kutuwa ekyo kyenyini kyetwagala, nze ndi muwanguzi era nkakasa tujja kuwangula buli mupiira, “ Golola bweyategeezezza. Abalala abagenda okuyambako Golola kuliko; Simon Ddungu amyuka omutendesi, Moses Oloya atendeka bakwasi ba ggoolo, Jamada Magaasi ne Fred Kasendeke owa ttiimu y’abato. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako omubaka wa Fort Portal mu palamenti Alex Ruhunda, ssenkulu wa ttiimu eno Richard Epieru ne pulezidenti waayo Alice Namatovu.

headline: Basengese ttiimu z’ Amasaza ga Buganda ezinaazannya semi fayinolo
text: Olukiiko oluteekateeka empaka z’amasaza ga Buganda ez’omupiira ogw’ebigere, lukakasizza ensengeka y’emipiira egy’oluzannya lwa semifinal ezigenda okuzannyibwa nga 9 ne 16 omwezi guno ogwa October, 2022. Ku mutendera guno, Buddu egenda kuttunka ne Bulemeezi, Ssingo ettunke ne Busiro. Ensengeka zino zikakasiddwa mu lukiiko olutudde olwaleero ku Bulange e Mengo, lubadde lukubirizibwa ssentebe we mpaka zino Sulaiman Ssejjengo. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu ttiimu zonna ezatuuse ku luzannya oluddirira olw’akamalirizo. Minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’Abavubuka n’okwewummuzaamu mu bwakabaka Owek Henry Moses Ssekabembe Kiberu, akubiriza ttiimu ezituuse ku mutendera guno okwongera okunyweza empisa ate n’okukulembeza obuntubulamu. Akulira eby’ekikugu mu lukiiko oluddukanya emipiira gy’ Amasaza , Festus Kirumira agambye nti emipiira ku mutendera gw’oluzannya olusooka gigenda kutandika ku ssaawa 10. Emipiira egy’okuddingana gyakutandika ku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo

headline: Gomba esitukidde mu kikopo ky’Amasaza ekya 2020, ekubye Buddu 3-1
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Gomba ey’omupiira emanyiddwa nga Gomba Lions ekoze ebyafaayo bw’esitukidde mu kikopo ky’omwaka 2020 oluvannyuma lw’okukuba ttiimu ya Buddu ku mutendera gwa fayinolo ggoolo 3-1 wali ku kisaawe kya St. Mary’s Stadium ekisangibwa e Kitende. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga nga akwasa Kapiteeni wa Gomba ekikopo Gomba ekikopo kino ekiwangudde mulundi gwakutaano bw’etyo n’ewangula ekikopo, emidaali gya zzaabu awamu ne ssente obukadde 12. Omupiira guno ogunyumidde abalabi nga gubadde gulagibwa butereevu ku BBS Terefayina, gwatandikidde mu ggiya era ggoolo ya Gomba eyasoose yagifunye mu ddakiika eyookubiri mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekyasoose ng’eno yateebeddwa Bbaale Charles. Omusambi Ezra Namasa y’asobodde okufunira Buddu ggoolo ey’ekyenkanyi ne gubeera 1-1 wabula tewayise ddakiika ziwera, Gomba n’eteeba eyookubiri ng’eyita mu musambi George Kaddu. Mu kitundu kye kimu ekisooka nga Buddu ekyanoonya ey’ekyenkanyi, muzannyi Gift Fred yafunidde Gomba ggoolo eyookusatu olwo embeera n’etabukira bannabuddu. Ekitundu ekyokubiri kyagenze mu maaso naye nga temuli nnumba z’amaanyi era bw’egutyo omupiira ne guggwa nga guli 3-1. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asiimye Gomba olw’okwolesa omutindo omulungi era ne yeebaza ne Buddu olw’okulwana okutuuka ku mpaka zino. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka yeebazizza abategesi b’empaka zino okuli abavujjirizi okuli; Airtel, Centenary Bbanka, FUFA awamu n’abalala. Gomba eweereddwa obukadde bwa Ssiringi 12 ate Buddu n’efuna obukadde 9, ttiimu ya Busiro ekutte ekyokusatu efunye obukadde 7 olwo yo Bulemeezi ekutte ekyokuna n’efuna obukadde 5.

headline: Aba Manchester United Bafunye Amawulire Amabi Oluvannyuma Lwa Chelsea  Okumegga Norwich City
text: Empaka z’ekikopo ekya English Premier League zisemberedde okukomekkerezebwa era nga wasigadde empiira esatu gyokka oluvannyuma lw’okujiwumuza olwa covid-19 mu Bungereza. Mungeri y’emu n’olutalo olw’okulwanira ekifo ekyokuna abasooka nga Chelsea, Leicester city ne Manchester United bakyalwana okufunako ababari abasigadde oluvannyuma lwa Manchester city ne Liverpool okubeera nga bbo baayitawo dda okwegatta mumpaka eza UEFA champions League ezigenda okuzannyibwa season ejja. Wabula oluvannyuma lwa team ya Chelsea okukubibwa Sheffield goolo 3-0 ku nkomerero ya wiiki ewedde olunaku lwajjo yazze engulu neyanukula essala zabawagizi ng’ekuba Norwich city goolo 1-0 nga yateebeddwa Olivia Giroud. Ono goolo eno yagitebesezza mutwe mu ddakiika essatu ezaayongeddwamu. Goolo ya Olivia Giroud newankubadde nga yabadde yakikeerezi naye yeyabadde yetaagisa okuwa tiimu ya Chelsea omukisa okubeera nga yenywereza mukifo eky’okusatu wamu ne mu bana abasooka. Abawagizi ba Manchester United wamu ne Leicester city baawulidde obujja olwa Chelsea okufuna obuwanguzi. Ekimeeza kiyimiridde bwekiti: Liverpool 93 Manchester city 72 Chelsea 63 Leicester city 59 Manchester United 59 Wolver Hampton 55 Era bw’otunura ku kimeeza ekyo olowooza Manchester United wamu ne Leicester city balina omukisa gwonna okwegatta ku bana abasooka.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda nga aggulawo  emipiira gy’Amasaza 2021
text: Omumyuka owookubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda ku Lwomukaaga luno era aggulewo emipiira gy’Amasaza egy’omwaka guno 2021. Bino Owek. Nsibirwa abyogeredde mu Bulange bw’abadde atongoza empaka zino ku lwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga n’asaba abantu okwaniriza Nnamunswa ku lunaku olwo era bayambeko ne ttiimu zaabwe okweteekateeka. “Mbategeeza mwenna abali wano wamu n’abatulaba ku Terefayinanti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye alabikeko eri Obuganda nga 20 ku Lwomukaaga luno n’omupiira ogugenda okutandikirwako wakati wa Kyaddondo ne Gomba.” Owek. Nsibirwa bw’agambye. Owek.Waggwa ategeezezza nti empaka zino zimanyiddwa okuleetawo okutabagana wakati w’abantu ba Kabaka kuba zizannyibwa abantu abali mu bitundu ebyo nga si nsonga baganda oba nedda. Okusinziira ku Owek. Waggwa, okweteekateeka mu masaza ag’enjawulo kubadde mu masaza agatali gamu ng’abakwatibwako obutereevu babanguddwa era waliwo n’ebitone ebizuuliddwa awamu n’okufuna emirimu nga byonna bibala by’amasaza. Owek. Nsibirwa agambye nti ku mulundiguno balina bye bagenda okwesibako nga mwe muli okunyweza obumu mu bantu ba Kabaka nga bakulembeza ebibagatta ng’emipiira gy’Amasaza awamu n’okusaba abaami okukola buli ekisoboka okutaasa abaana aboobuwala ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya. Ku nsonga y’obutebenkevu mu ggwanga,Owek. Nsibirwa asabye bannayuganda okumanya nti tebalina ndowooza yeemu era beewale obutujju era bakkakkanye ku busungu era beekengere n’okutebuka abalabe bonna abasobola okubatuusaako obulabe wabula basigale nga bavumu basobole okutambuza emirimu. Owek.Waggwa Nsibirwa agamba nti ekiseera kituuse gavumenti ya Uganda ku bigambo ebingi byeyogera egatteko amaanyi kisobole okukomya omuze gw’abatujju abamalawo obulamu bwa bannayuganda. AteMinisita Ssekabembe asabye abazannyi mu ttiimu z’Amasaza ez’enjawulo okukozesa omukisa guno ogubaweereddwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka okutumbula ebitone byabwe mu kusamba omupiira basobole okwekulaakulanya.  Minisita w’abavubuka n’ebyemizannyo, Owek. Ssekabembe asiimye bannamikago olw’obuwagizi bwe bawadde Obwakabaka mu kikopo ky’Amasaza ebbanga lyonna ne mu kiseera ng’ekirwadde kya Corona kizing’amizza ebyenfuna naye ne basigala ku mulamwa okukyusa embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Owek. Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti omuwanguzi w’ekikopo ky’Amasaza agenda kwewangulira obukadde bwa ssente 12, owookubiri afune obukadde 9 ate owookusatu aweebwe obukadde 7 ate anaasinga banne okulengera obutimba aweebwe emitwalo gya ssiringi 30.

headline: Katikkiro ayanjudde olukiiko olunabbulula emipiira gy’Ebika
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga, ayanjulidde Obuganda olukiiko olugenda okuzza endasi mu mipiira gy’Ebika. Katikkiro Mayiga n’Olukiiko olutongozeddwa Owek. Mayiga asinzidde wano n’ategeeza nti nga tuyita mu kusamba omupiira nga omuzannyo gusobola bulungi okugatta abantu ba Kabaka n’okunyweza obumu kiyambe okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. “Ffe wano mu Buganda ekituyunga ku Kabaka by’Ebika kubanga ayitibwa Ssaabataka era yakulembera abataka ab’obusolya. N’olwekyo mu kusamba omupiira kiba kyangu nnyo okugatta Abaganda, okubaagazisa Ennono n’obuwangwa bwabwe,” bwatyo Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Owek. Mayiga era agasseeko nti kino kijja kubayamba okwenyigiramu butereevu ku nsonga z’Eggwanga lyabwe. Ono agambye nti amaanyi gabadde gakendedde mu mipiira gy’Ebika wadde nga obuwagizi bw’emipiira gyebuli era nti akizudde nga abantu baagala okuwagira emipiira egitegekeddwa obulungi. Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nti bafunye abakugu bano basobole okwekenneenya ensonga eno naddala ku ngeri gyegutegekebwamu, obukugu, ensonga z’ensimbi n’ abawagizi era akakasa nti bano omulimu bajja kugukola bulungi ddala. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, olukiiko era lugenda kutunuulira n’omuzannyo gw’abawala ogw’okubaka kubanga nagwo gwalina abawagizi bangi naye gugenze guggwamu amaanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga alaze nti ttiimu z’Ebika zisobola bulungi okuliikiriza ttiimu ya She Cranes ssinga gubeera gutereezeddwa bulungi. Ono asabye abantu bonna abanatuukirirwa olukiiko oluno okuluwa obuwagizi kuba kyeluliko tekiyamba mizannyo mu Buganda mwokka naye ne Uganda nga batumbula ebitone buli omu afunemu. Olukiiko luno lukulemberwa Mw. Raymond Kabugo namyukibwa Sam Mpima. Abalala kuliko; Sulaiman Ssejjengo, David Katabira, Sam Mpoza, Omutaka Robert Mujabi, Hassan Badru Zziwa n’omukyala Rose Kaala.

headline: Omuwuwuttanyi Nunda yegasse ku URA F.C
text: Kiraabu y’omupiira eya URA F.C eyanjudde omuwuwuttanyi Jackson Nunda ng’ omusambi waayo era nga awereddwa endagaano y’emyaka esatu nga ali ku ttiimu eno. Nunda abadde talina ttiimu mukadde kano oluvanyuma lw’endagaano ye ne ttiimu ya KCCA F.C okugwako sizoni ewedde. Oluvanyuma lw’okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano Nunda yagambye nti yasazeewo okugenda mu URA kubanga kiraabu eno erimu okuvuganya okwamanyi nga naye kijja kumuyamba okwezimba nga omusambi. “Ndi wano okuwangulira ttiimu yange empya eya URA ebikopo wadde nga kimanyi nti tebigenda kubeera byangu.” Nunda bweyategezezza Ono ye musambi URA gwesoose okwanjula ku katale k’abazannyi ak’omurundi guno era nga ono ennamba wakugirwanira n’abasambi Saidi Kyeyune ne Shafik Kagimu.

headline: South Sudan ewangudde Uganda 1-0
text: Ttiimu ya South Sudan ey’omupiira gw’ebigere eya Bright Stars, ewangudde Uganda Cranes, ggoolo 1-0 mu mupiira oguyindidde mu kisaawe kya Nyayo Stadium mu kibuga kya Kenya -Nairobi.  Uganda Cranes yayingidde omupiira guno ng’eyagala buwanguzi okusobola okukiika mu mpaka za AFCON, wabula peneti ekubiddwa Tito Okello ewadde South Sudan obuwanguzi obusookedde ddala mu mpaka zino. Wiiki eweddde Uganda Cranes yakubye South Sudan mu kisaawe kya St. Marys Stadium e Kitende, naye nga Uganda okukubwa South Sudan olwaleero ku Mmande, kigitadde mu mbeera enzibu. Mu mupiira gwa leero, omusambi Khalid Aucho aweereddwa kkaadi emyufu mu ddakiika ya 32 oluvannyuma lw’okusika omusambi wa South Sudan. Mu ddakiika endala 5 wabaddewo ekisobyo ekikoleddwa era ne kivaamu penati eteebeddwa Okello. Wadde Uganda Cranes yakoze enkyukakyuka bw’eggyeeyo Emmanuel Okwi n’ereeta Farouk Miya naye abasudani baggyeeyo n’agomu buto. Mu ddakiika ye 80, Omusambi wa Sudan, Abdallah Asad Musa, afunye kkaadi emyufu, bw’etyo Uganda Cranes n’ekozesa omukisa guno okunoonya ggoolo naye nebigaana. Emipiira emirala egisambiddwa mu kibinja B, Burkina Faso eremaganye ne Malawi nga tewali alabye katimba ka munne. Burkina Faso y’ekulembedde ekibinja n’obubonero 8, Uganda Cranes erina 7, Malawi 4 ne South Sudan 3. Uganda yeetaaga okufuna obubonero 4 mu mipiira 2 egisigaddewo bw’eba yaakukiika mu AFCON, Uganda ezzaako Burkina Faso ekulembedde ekibinja mu Gwokuatu nga 22 omwaka ogujja ate era esembyeyo Malawi nga 30 Gwokusatu.

headline: Masaza Cup 2021: Gomba egudde maliri ne Buluuli, Ssingo eremaganye ne Kabula
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Ssingo eyongedde okuvumbeera mu mpaka z’emupiira gy’amasaza ez’omwaka guno bw’egudde amaliri ne ttiimu ya Kabula ku ggoolo 2-2 mu mipiira egizannyiddwa olwaleero ku FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru. Ggoolo za Kabula ziteebeddwa omuzannyi Valentino Odoi mu ddakiika eya 31 ne 38 ate nga eza Ssingo ziteebeddwa Bright Adoa ne Joseph Ssewaali. Mu ngeri yeemu Gomba nayo egudde maliri ne Buluuli mu kikopo kinonga guwedde buli ttiimu ebala ggoolo emu. Gomba eyawangula empaka z’omwaka oguwedde y’esooseewo, era ggoolo yaayo eteebeddwa omusambi Brian Aniku mu kitunduekisooka ate nga Abdul Malik y’ateebye ggoolo ya Buluuli mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekyokubiri. Mu mpaka zino, omuzannyi wa Buluuli, Derrick Kaija, Ddifiri HenryMusisi amuwadde kkaadi emyufu oluvannyuma lw’okuweebwa kkaadi za kyenvu ebbiri olw’okukola ebisobyo. Empaka zino zigenda kuddamu okuzannyibwa ku Lwomukaaga lwa ssabbiiti eno n’emipiira 2 wakati wa Buluuli ne Ssingo n’ogwa Kabula ng’ettunka ne Kyaddondo.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asisinkanye akulira ebikonde mu nsi yonna, asabye ebifo ebitendekebwamu ebikonde biddewo
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga alaze obwetaavu bw’okuzzaawo ebifo ebyo ebyatendekebwangamu abakubi b’ebikonde ebyali bitadde Uganda ku mutindo n’okumanyibwa munsi yonna. Obubaka buno, Owek. Mayiga abuweeredde mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu nakulira ekibiina ekitwala omuzannyo gw’ebikonde munsi yonna ki International Boxing Federation, Umar Kremlev amukyalidde mu Bulange e Mengo ku Lwokuna nga awerekeddwako akulira ebikonde mu Uganda, Moses Muhangi.  Mu bubaka bwe, Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti Buganda yawaddeyo yiika 10 ez’ettaka eriri e Gombe – Matugga, Kremlev asobole okuteekako essomero eritendeka ebikonde awamu n’ebintu ebirala. Owomumbuga agamba nti Uganda emu ku nsi mu Africa ezaafulumyanga abakubi b’ebikonde abalungi kyokka entalo zaayonoona ebifo bano byebatendekebwangamu naalaga obwetaavu bwokubizzaawo. Kamalabyonna asuubizza enkolagana ennungi wakati wa Buganda ne IBA nga bakwataganye ne UBA okutumbula ebitone byabavubuka kyokka nasaba buli kimu okukolebwa mu budde mu nteekateeka yokukulaakulanya ettaka lino. Akulira ekibiina ki IBA, Umar Kremlev ategezezza nti kimuwadde essanyu okubanga agenda kukwatagana n’ Obwakabaka neyebaza olwa kaweefube Uganda ne Africa okutwalira awamu gwebatadde mu byemizannyo naddala ebikonde.  Ate atwala ebikonde mu Uganda, Moses Muhangi yebazizza Obwakabaka obwabawa omukisa bwebaabutuukirira nga baagala ettaka Kremlev kwayinza okussa enkulaakulana ebalirwamu obutitimbe bwensimbi. Kino kiddiridde abakulembeze b’ebikonde okuva mu mawanga Nigeria, Cameroon ne Kenya okuwaayo obukadde bwa ddoola butaano mu pulojekiti eno omuli ekisaawe ky’ essaza, woteeri gaggadde, ettendekero lyebikonde n’ebirala. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule, minisitaw’ebyemizannyo mu Buganda akiikiriddwa Owek. Noah Kiyimba, asuubizza enkolagana ennungi n’ebibiina byebikonde mu Uganda n’ensi yonna.

headline: Kabaka asiimye omutindo gw’empaka z’amasaza
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye nnyo minisitule y’ebyemizannyo e Mmengo olw’omutindo ogwa waggulu gwetegekerako empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza. Bwabadde ku mukolo ogw’okuyozaayoza tiimu y’essaza lye Bulemeezi olw’okuwangula ekikopo ky’emipiira gy’amasaza egya 2019, e Bamunaanika ku kisaawe, Omutanda agambye nti emipiira gino gigenda kukozesebwa ng’erimu ku makubo ag’okugatta abantu.  Kabaka ng’alamusa ku bantu  “Twebaza ekitongole ky’e Mmengo ekivunanyizibwa ku mizannyo olw’entegeka y’emipiira ennungi. Twebaza abazannyi, abakulembeze ba tiimu, abakulembeze b’essaza n’abo bonna abaakwatira ku tiimu y’essaza. Obuwanguzi bwemwatuukako fenna tubwenyumirizaamu era tusanyuka nnyo okulaba nga buli mwaka omutindo gw’empaka zino gweyongera bweyongezi,” Kabaka bwagambye.  Katikkiro ng’abuuza ku Bannadiini Agasseeko nti empaka zino bazitunuulira ng’erimu ku makubo ag’okugatta abantu, n’olwekyo n’asaba abazannyi ettutumu lye bafuna balikozese okutuusa obubaka ku nsonga enkulu ez’obulamu bw’abantu omuli n’okulwanyisa obulwadde bwa siriimu mu bavubuka. Kabaka era ayozaayozezza amassaza gonna agaavuganya mu mpaka za 2019. Yeebazizza nnyo eb’eBulemeezi olw’okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu mpaka zayayogeddeko nti zaalimu okuvuganya okwamannyi.  Kabaka ng’alamusa ku bazannyi ba tiimi ya Bulemeezi Ku mukolo gwegumu, Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga, asiimye nnyo Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okukkiriza n’agabula banna Bulemeezi ekijjulo olw’okuwangula ekikopo. “Okuva empaka lwezaatandika mu 1964, ate n’okuva lwe zazzibwawo mu 2004, wabadde tewannabaawo mulundi Omuteregga lweyagabula essaza eriba liwangudde muyogeeyoge,” Mayiga bwagambye. Asabye ab’eBulemeezi okukuuma ennyo Namulondo kubanga mu ssaza lyabwe Kabaka alinamu Olubiri wamu n’ettaka. “Aba Nkuluze bwebabayita nti muggye mutereeze obusenze bwammwe ku ttaka nga musitukiramu kubanga Kabaka mubeera naye, ye Nnamunswa,” Mayiga bwagambye. Ayongeddeko nti newankubadde banna Bulemeezi bawanguzi era babasanyukirako, wabula balina okulaga nti bbo Kabaka baasiimye mungeri ey’enjawulo si baakuzannya. “Kijja kuba kya kitiibwa nga muzzeemu okusitukira mukikopo kino 2020, era bwetunaategeera nti okuwangula mu 2019 terwali lukisakisa,” Mayiga bwagambye. Katikkiro era ategeezezza nti obuwanguzi mu mizannyo bwetaaga empisa mu bazannyi, abatendesi n’abakugu, abalamuzi, wamu n’abaguddukanya. “Bwemunaabinyweza osanga ne kuluno mu naawangula.”  Kabaka ngatuuka ku kisaawe e Bamunaanika Atwala essaza lino Kkangaawo, Ronald Mulondo yebazizza nnyo Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okusiima Bulemeezi okubeera essaza erisoose mu byafaayo okusiimibwa olw’okuwangula ekikopo ekya masaza. “Tukusuubiza Beene nti abamasaza amalala enaaba ntaanya okututwalako ekikopo. Tukusuubiza okukikuuma ebbanga lyonna,” Mulondo bwagambye. Bulemeezi yakuba Busiro ggoolo 1:0 mumpaka ez’akamalirizo ezaali mu kisaawe maasogalikwoleka, e Namboole.

headline: Cheptegei anoonya akawumbi 1.7 okumaliriza webatendekera abaddusi
text: Munnayuganda eyawangulidde Uganda emidaali okuli ogwa zzaabu awamu ne ffeeza mu mpaka za Olympics eza 2020, Joshua Cheptegi, atongozza kaweefube w’okunoonya ssente eziwera akawumbi kamu n’obukadde 700 ( 1.7b) asobole okumaliriza ekifo ewatendekerwa abaddusi e Kapchorwa. Okuzimba ekifo kino kwatandika mu 2018, oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula ezimu ku mpaka z’emisinde gy’amawanga agaliko mu luse olumu ne Bungereza. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Hotel Serena mu Kampala ku Lwona, Cheptegei agambye nti ekifo kino kigenda kukozesebwa ng’ekaddiyizo ly’abaddusi awamu n’ekifo abaddusi we batendekerwa. “Ekifo kino kigenda kuleeta abalambuzi abanyumirwa eby’emizannyo, tutongozza kaweefube agenda okumala ennaku 100 nga tusonda ssente akawumbi 1.7 okumaliriza omulimu guno.” Cheptegei bw’agambye. Okusinziira ku Cheptegei, abaddusi beetaaga ekifo ekituufu we balina okutendekerwa okusobola okuvuganya obulungi era n’asaba bannayuganda okuwagira ekirooto. “Bannayuganda bannange, Olympics atulaze nti omuddusi yenna asobola okubeera owaamaanyi naye okutuukiriza kino kyetaaga embeera ennungi ne w’atendekerwa awatuukana n’omutindo.” Cheptegei bw’annyonnyodde. Enteekateeka eno etuumiddwa“Run with Cheptegei” era abazirakisa bajja kuwaayo ssente nga bayita ku nkola ya Momo Pay awamu ne akawunta ng’okugyetabako omuntu anyiga *165 * 3 olwo n’anyigamu ennamba 319325. Ono era abawadde ennamba ya kawunti 9030016912866 okusonderako ssente nga eri mu mannya gaCheptegei Joshya Kiprui. Cheptegeiasiimye bannayuganda ne Pulezidenti Museveni olw’obuwagizi bwe baabawadde mu mpaka za Tokyo Olympics 2020.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe agamba beetaaga ssente nnyingi okutegeka emizannyo
text: Minisita w’abavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuza mu Bwakabaka, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, ategeezezza nga bwe beetaaga ssente empitirivu okutegeka emizannyo mu Buganda ate ezitaliiwo. Ssekabembe yagambye nti buli mwaka Obwakabaka butegeka emizannyo egiwerako nga ku gino kubaako, emipiira gy’amasaza, ‘Volleyball’, emisinde, amaato n’emirala wabula nga ku murundi guno embeera y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ezibuwazizza ebintu era nga bagenda kutegekako mitono. Minisita Ssekabambe yannyonnyodde nti olw’obuzibu bw’ensimbi ku mulundi guno bagenda kunokolayo emizannyo esatu gyokka nga gye bagenda okukola. Bino Minisita yabyogeredde mu woofiisi ye ku Bulange e Mmengo bwe yabadde awayaamu n’olupapula lwa Gambuuze. “Teebereza okutegeka omupira e Kabula nga tewagenda kubeera bawagizi mu kisaawe, weetaaga obukuumi obunaatangira abantu obutawaguza kuyingira kisaawe ekijja okwetaagisa ssente ennyingi ate ezitaliiwo.” Ssekabembe bwe yakkaatirizza. Omukulembeze w’eggwanga bwe yabadde akkiriza eby’emizannyo ebizannyirwa mu bifo ng’ebisaawe yategeezezza nti  basobola okuddamu okuzannya naye mu bisaawe temulina kubaamu bawagizi.  Era nga n’abazannyi balina okukeberwa Ssennyiga Corona buli luvannyuma lwa nnaku 14 ekintu bannabyamizannyo kye bagamba nti kya bbeeyi. Minisita yalagidde abazannyi bonna abeetaba mu mizannyo egy’enjawulo egitegekebwa Obwakabaka okutandika okutendekebwa nga bwe basala amagezi okulumba engeri empaka zino nga ez’amasaza bwe zinaatambula. “Tukyali mu kuteesa ku mpaka ezinaazanyibwa omwaka guno, osanga wiiki ejja tunaavaayo n’enteekateeka ku misinde mubunabyalo era mu bwangu akakiiko akavunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo mu Bwakabaka kajja kutuula okulaba bwe tunaagoberera ebiragiro bya COVID-19,” Ssekabembe bwe yagasseeko. Gibadde giweze emyezi mukaaga miramba bukya Pulezidenti Museveni aggala eby’emizannyo ng’aziyiza abantu okukung’aana kibayambe okwetaasa ku Ssennyiga Corona.

headline: Chemutai awangulidde Uganda omudaali gwa zaabu ogusoose
text: Munnayuganda omuddusi w’emisinde, Peruth Chemutai 22, awangulidde Uganda omudaali gwa Zaabu ogusookedde ddala mu mpaka za Olympics 2020 eziyindira mu kibuga Tokyo ekya Japan. Ku Lwokusatu Chemutai yataddewo okuvuganya okwamaanyi ku mulundi ogwabadde gusembayo n’asobola okuwangula omuddusi w’Amerika, Frerichs Courtney, eyabadde akulembeddemuemisinde egyasoose. Chemutai yaddukidde eddakiika9:01:45 n’ateekayo likodi y’eggwanga empya. Ono era ye munnayuganda omukazi asoose okuwangula omudaali mu mpakaza Olympics. Uganda yaakawangula emidaali esatu mu mpaka zino nga emirala gyawanguddwa Joshua Chetegei (Silver) ne Jocob Kiplimo (Bronze) mu mpaka z’abasajja eza mmita 10000.

headline: Bulemeezi awuumye nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka aggulawo empaka z’Ebika 2022
text: Essaza lya Beene ery’e Bulemeezi liwuumye, Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi bw’abadde alabiseeko eri Obuganda nga aggulawo empaka z’emipiira gy’Ebika bya Buganda ez’omwaka 2022 mu kisaawe kya Kasana Luweero mu Bulemeezi. Obwedda buli Omutanda wayita nga abantu bakwatiridde ku makubo era obwedda Empologoma ewalirizibwa okuvaamu natambuza ku bigere nga bwababuuzaako n’okubawuubira, olwo essanyu nerijula okubatta. Beene bwatuuse ku kisaawe e Kasana ayaniriziddwa Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo ne Minisita Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu awamu n’abakungu abalala.  Ssaabasajja Kabaka awandiise ku mupiira ng’akabonero akakaga nti atongozza empaka zino era bwezityo empaka naziggulawo. Oluvannyuma omupiira oguggulawo empaka zino, gutandise ku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo wakati wa bazzukulu ba Muteesaasira ab’eddira Engo nab’eddira Engo wakati mu bawagizi ababaddewo okubugiriza Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka. Wasooseewo omupiira gw’okubaka wakati w’Engo n’ Embwa nga guno guwanguddwa bazzukulu ba Mutasingwa ab’eddira Embwa ku ggoolo.  Empaka zino zibadde zimaze emyaka 2 nga tezizanyibwa olw’omuggalo gwa Covid-19, zaasemba okuzannyibwa mu 2019 zaawangulwa Embogo, ate Ennyonyi Ennyange n’ewangula engabo y’okubaka. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako bajjajja abataka abakulu ab’Obusolya, baminisita mu Bwakabaka bwa Buganda , abakungu n’abantu ab’enjawulo .

headline: Lwesibawa yesunga kuwangulira Express FC bikopo
text: Ttiimu ya Express FC yefunze akatale k’abazannyi ku murundi guno nga egula abasambi abawerako esobole okuvuganya obulungi mu Liigi y’eggwanga sizoni ejja. Omusambi Godfrey Lwesibawa Ku Lwokubiri yaguze omusambi Godfrey Lwesibawa, oluvanyuma lw’endagaano ye ne ttiimu ya Tooro United okuggwako. Ono kati awezezza omuwendo gw’abasimbi abaguliddwa ku basambi Mukaaga. Lwesibawa yaliko mu ttiimu eno, ku luno awereddwa endagaano ya myaka 2 okutuuka mu mwaka gwa 2022. Omuwuwuttanyi Lwesibawa yalaze nga bwesunze okuwangulira ttiimu ya Express ebikopo naddala ekya liigi. Lwesibawa tazzeemu kwegatta ku Express kyokka wabula asanze omutendesi Wasswa Bbosa gwaludde nga asambira mu ttiimu ez’enjawulo okuli; SC Villa ne Tooro United. Weyabeerera mu Express mu 2014 ne 2016, Lwesibawa yateeba ggoolo munaana (8) ate nayambako ggoolo endala 25 okunywa. Lwesibawa yeyunze ku basambi ; Cryspus Kusiima , Denis Otim ,Richard Bbosa, Abel Eturude ne Kiragga Mustafa. Sizoni ewedde, Express yamalira mukifo kya Mwenda (9) n’obubonero 31 okuva mu nzannya 25.

headline: Vipers ereese Omucongo Manzoki Cesar aginyeenyeze obutimba
text: Ttiimu y’omupiira eya Vipers SC ereese Omucongo Manzoki Cesar Loki agiyambeko okuginyeenyeza obutimba esobole okutwala liigi ya sizoni ejja eya 2020/2021. Manzoki nga ayanjulwa eri abawagizi Manzoki olwakkiriziddwa FIFA okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano y’emyaka ebiri ku Lwokuna akawungeezi, n’awera nti waakukozesa omukisa guno okwongera okutumbula ekitone kye. “Ndi musanyufu okubeera wano,” Bw’atyo Manzoki bwe yategeezezza omutimbagano gwa Vipers. Manzoki yagambye nti agenda kusinziira ku Vipers okutuukiriza ebirooto bye era ng’asuubira nti ajja kuweebwa omukisa okutandikirawo asobole okuyambako ttiimu eno okuwangula ebikopo nga agiteebera ggoolo. Manzoki ow’emyaka 24, omupiira yagutandikira kkiraabu ya Dauphin Noir de Goma mu ggwanga lya Congo mu mwaka 2012, yeegatta ku TP Mazembe mu 2016 era nga bano yabazannyira sizoni ttaano nnamba. Oluvannyuma yeegatta ku AS Vita Club eya Congo, n’abateebera ggoolo 38 mu mipiira 58. Manzoki ye muzannyi owoomukaaga eyeggase ku Vipers ng’abalala kuliko; Joseph Dhata, David Bagoole, Ibrahim Orit, Disan Galiwango ne Jamil Kaliisa.

headline: Express eguze Omusambi ow’ekumi
text: Ttiimu ya Express FC sizoni eno tegenda kubeera nnyangu kubibwa oluvanyuma lw’okugula omusambi ow’ekumi nga beetegekera okusamba Liigi ya Uganda Premier League ey’omwaka 2020/2021 Omusambi Musige eyagguliddwa Omuwuwuttanyi Charles Musige, yaleeteddwa okwongera okunyweza ttiimu eno nga kino kyalangiriddwa leero ku Lwokutaano. Ono aleeteddwa okuva mu Tooro United eyakirira mu Big League kati era nga yegasse ku basambi abalala okuli; Godfrey Lwesibawa me Cryspus Kusiima abamala edda okwegatta ku ttiimu eno. Musige yategeezezza nti okwegatta ku Ttiimu eno kigenda kugiyamba okusobola okuzzaawo ekitibwa kyayo kyeyalina mu kusamba omupiira. “ Ndi musanyufu okwegatta ku Red Eagle, era abo bokka abamanyi kyebakola bebasobola okwegatta ku ttiimu eno ey’ebyafaayo,” Musige bwagasseeko. Musige yalina sizoni ennungi ku ttiimu ya Tooro United omwaka oguwedde wadde nga ttiimu eno byagigendera bubi nesindikibwa mu Liigi ya wansi. Ono yateeba ggoolo ttaano nayambako emirundi mukaaga mu mipiira 20 wadde nga omutindo gwe omulungi tegwataasa ttiimu ya Tooro. Okugenda mu Tooro United, Nyamityobora FC era nga yabasambira emipiira egiwerako. Ono afuuse omutebi ow’okubiri okwegatta ku ttiimu eno oluvanyuma lwa Mustafa Kiragga eyavudde mu ttiimu ya Alexandria FC. Kinajjukirwa nti, Express yasooka kwejjako abasambi 15 era eno y’ensonga lwaki ttiimu eno eguze abasambi abangi ku murundi guno. Express sizoni ewedde yamalira mukifo kya Mwenda okuva mu mipiira 25.

headline: Munnayuganda  Cheptegei awangudde  zzaabu mu z’abasajja eza mmita 5000
text: Munnayuganda omuddusi w’emisinde emiwanvu,Joshua Cheptegei, awangulidde Uganda omudaali gwa zzaabumu misinde gya mmita 5000 egibadde mu Olympic Stadium e Japan ku Lwokuna. Cheptegeieyasooka okulemererwa okuwangula zzaabu mu misinde gya mmita 10000 bwe yatuuka ku kaguwa muddakiika 12:58:15 n’akwata ekyokubiri. Bannayuganda okuli; Jacob Kiplimo ne Oscar Chelimo, bakutte kyakutaano n’ekya 16. Guno gwe mudaali gwa zzaabu ogwokubiri, Uganda gw’efunye nga ogwasoose gwawanguddwa Peruth Chemutai mu mpaka z’abakyala eza mmita 3000 eza Steeplechase. Kati Uganda ewezezza emidaali 4 mu mpaka z’omwaka guno okuli; ffeeza eyawanguddwa Cheptegei n’ogwekikomo ogwawanguddwa Kiplimo.

headline: Muwada Mawejje agenze mu Police F.C
text: Oluvanyuma  lwa Ttiimu ya Police F.C okuwonera ku kaguwa okusalwako mu Uganda Premier League mu sizoni ya 2019/2020, kati ekola buli kimu okulaba nga yenywezza. Ttiimu eno efunye omusambi omuggya Muwada Mawejje agiyambeko okunyweza amakati gaayo. Mawejje yayanjuddwa ku Lwokutaano era naweebwa endagaano ya myaka 2 okusambira Police F.C. Ono Police F.C agyegattideko ku bwerere era nga kinajjukirwa nti ekitundu kya sizoni ewedde akisambidde mu Bright Stars FC gyeyasindikibwa aba Wakiso Giants ku bbanja. Mawejje okugenda mu Wakiso Giants yava mu KCCA, Muwada yasambirako ne ttiimu ya SC Villa wamu ne Victoria University etakyaliwo.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako ku Fayinolo y’Amasaza
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka wa Buganda, Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II, asiimye okulabikako eri obuganda ng’aggalawo empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza ez’omwaka guno. Minisita Ssekabembe nga atongoza fayinolo y’Amasaza Minisita w’abavubuka, ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, ategeezezza nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okubaawo ku ntandikwa y’omwezi gw’Ogwokusatu, ttiimu y’essaza Buddu ng’ettunka ne Ggomba, okulondako omuwanguzi waazo. Bino Owek. Ssekabembe abyogeredde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokubiri bw’abadde atongoza fayinolo y’empaka z’omwaka guno.  “Njagala okutegeeza Obuganda bwonna nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye omupiira ogw’akamalirizo ogw’omwaka guno wakati wa bannaffe bannagomba nga basamba ne bannabuddu, gubeerewo ng’ennaku z’omwezi 6 March, 2021 ku ssaawa 9 zennyini ez’akawungeezi.” Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, omupiira guno gujja kuzannyirwa mu kisaawe kya St. Marys Stadiium e Kitende era wajja kusookawo okulwanira ekifo ekyokusatu wakati wa Bulemeezi ne Busiro.  Minisita Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti bali mu kwogerezeganya ne Fufa awamu ne Minisitule y’ebyobulamu, basobole okukkirizaayo abantu abasaamusaamu era mu bwangu bajja kutegeeza Obuganda kye banaggyayo. Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti ensonga lwaki baasalawo okwongezaayo fayinolo y’empaka zino kyali lwakuba abazannyi baafuna obuvune obuwerako kuba emipiira gyali gya kumukumu, kwe kusaba akadde okusobola okujjanjaba abazannyi baabwe. Owek. Ssekabembe asiimye obumalirivu n’omukwano ogwoleseddwa mu kutegeka empaka zino mu kadde ng’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kifunze ekyonga mu ggwanga.  Agasseeko nti byonna bisobose olw’okwesigama ku kkampuni ezivugirira empaka zino okuli; Airtel, Centenary Bbanka, UNAIDS ne Kkampuni z’amawulire. Ate ye Omuk. Remmy Kisakye okuva mu Airtel agambye nti kye baayagala okukola kwe kuddiza abantu nga bayitira mu mizannyo era ku luno baasalawo okwekwata amasaza kuba gakung’aanya abantu okuva mu nsonda ez’enjawulo. Ono annyonnyodde nti amasaza gasobodde okukuza n’okuzuula ebitone ebipya ku mutendera gwa ttiimu y’eggwanga awamu n’abasambi okufuna ttiimu ennene mu nsi ez’enjawulo.Asiimye Obwakabaka bwa Buganda olw’enkolagana ennungi n’okutuukiriza obweyamo bwabwo obw’enjawulo. Akulira akakiiko akategesi ak’amasaza, Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo, agambye nti okusobola okukuuma abantu nga balamu mu mpaka zino, bakebedde abantu abawerera ddala 540 omuli abazannyi n’abakungu ba ttiimu ez’enjawulo era abo be basanze nga balwadde babadde tebakkirizibwa kwetaba na balala. Ye Ssenkulu wa Majestic Brand, Omuk. Ronald Kawaddwa, yeebazizza abavujjirizi ab’enjawulo okuli; Airtel, Centenary bbanka, UNAIDS, UNDP ne Nnaabagereka Development Foundation n’olw’okukwatizaako Obwakabaka okulaba ng’empaka zino zitambula bulungi. Kinajjukirwa nti awangula empaka zino asitukira mu kikopo n’obukadde 12 n’emidaali egya Zzaabu, akwata ekyokubiri afuna obukadde 9 n’emidaali egya siliva ate owookusatu n’afuna obukadde 7 n’emiddaali egya Bronze olwo ate owookuna afuna obukadde 5.

headline: Kyaddondo ekubye Kkooki 2- 1  n’egiggya mu kibalo
text: Olwaleero mu mpaka z’ekikopo ky’amasaza eziyindira e Njeru, kyaddondo ekubye Kkooki ggoolo 2 ku 1 n’egiwandula mu kibinja Masengere. Amasaza gombi gayingidde ensiike nga buli limu linoonya buwanguzi bwalyo obusooka. Aba Kyaddondo nga bajaganya oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Kkooki Ggoolo za Kyaddondo zombi ziteebeddwa Emayu Calvin Peter ne yeegatta ku bakyasinze okulengera akatimba mu mpaka z’omulundi guno ate ggoolo ya Kkooki eteebeddwa Ssekidde Anthony. Kkooki esigazzaayo omupiira gw’egenda okuttunkiramu ne Bugerere wabula nga tegulina kigenderwa kyonna ne bw’eguwangula. Bugerere tewangulangako ku mpaka zino wabula nga y’ekulembedde ekibinja kino n’omuwendo gwa ggoolo. Bugerere ettunka ne Mawokota ku ssaawa mwenda ez’olweggulo lwalweero era awangula yeesogga “Kwota fayinolo” ne yeegatte ku Busujju ne Busiro abattunka ku bbalaza.

headline: Minisita Ssekabembe akunze abantu okwongera okugula emijoozi
text: Minisita w’ebyemizannyo, okwewummuza n’abavubuka, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, akunze abantu ba Ssaabasajja Kabaka okugula emijoozi gy’emisinde gya Kabaka Birthday Run egy’omwaka guno kisobozese kaweefube w’okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya okutambula obulungi. Minisita Ssekabembe nga akwasa ab’e Bulemeezi emijoozi Owek.
