Ssekabembe agambye nti wadde ensi yonna essira eritadde ku kulwanyisa ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona, naye olugendo lw’okulwanyisa akawuka ka Mukenenya lukyali lunene. Bino Ssekabembe abyogedde akwasa ab’eggombolola ya Ssaabawaali Kalagala -Masiki okuva e Bulemeezi, emijoozi gy’emisinde gy’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka gya mitwalo 70 ku Bulange olwaleero. “Njagala okukunga Obuganda bwonna, amagombolola gonna gakole kye mukoze, amasaza gonna, ebitongole ebisoboka naddala ebyo ebiri mu lwokaano luno okulwanyisa Mukenenya, bannabyabufuzi n’abantu Ssekinnoomu, okuwagira kaweefube w’okutaasa abaana b’eggwanga.” Owek. Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Ono abajjukiza omulamwa gw’emisinde gino ogw’abasajja okukulemberamu olutabaalo okutaasa abaana abawala okukwatibwa ekirwadde kya Mukenenya, nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka bwe yasiima. Owek. Ssekabembe asiimye ab’eggombolola n’essomero lya Bulemeezi Senior Secondary School olw’okuvaayo nebagula emijoozi gino, okusobola okuyambako okunnyikiza kaweefube ono. Omwami w’eggombolola ya Ssaabawaali Kalagala -Masiki mu Ssaza ly’e Bulemeezi, Rev. Fr. George Abraham Kaleebu, ategeezezza nti basazeewo okwenyigiramu olw’omukwano gwe balina eri Obuganda wadde ng’embeera y’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ebakosezza nnyo. Nannyini ssomero lya Bulemeezi SSS, annyonnyodde nti omusingi gw’essomero lyabwe gwa Buganda nga n’abayizi babaggya mu Buganda ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki bakwatibwako butereevu. Emisinde gino gigenda kuddukibwa mu nkola ya Sayansi, nga 29/ November/ 2020 era nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okugisimbula n’abantu batonotono mu Lubiri e Mmengo.

headline: Masaza Cup 2022  | Buddu, Ssingo, Buweekula n’abalala bayiseewo  okuzannya ‘Quarter Finals’
text: Nnantameggwa w’empaka z’ekikopo ky’ Amasaza eky’omwaka 2021 erya Buddu, liyiseewo okugenda ku luzannya lwa ‘Quarter Finals’, abalala kuliko Buweekula, Gomba Mawokota, Ssingo, Busiro awamu ne Kyaggwe. Ttiimu zino eziwera omunaana zayiseewo oluvannyuma lw’okumala ennaku 10 namba nga zizannya mu bibinja n’ebisaawe eby’enjawulo. Ekibinja Bulange Mu kibinja kya Bulange; Buweekula yekikulembedde n’obubonero 22 oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula Butambala ggoolo 2-1. Butambala ye yasoose okuteeba ggoolo yaayo ng’eyita mu Hassan Mubiru era wano omutendesi wa Buwekula Frank Mulindwa, yaleese Shaifik Kakande okukyuusa omuzannyo. Sharafah Mukiibi yasobodde okuteeba ggoolo 2 Buwekula newangula. Ate ku kisaawe kya Kabulasoke PTC Core, aba Gomba bawangudde Kabula ggoolo 2-0 nebafuna obubonero 21 olwo nebayitawo nga bakutte kyakubiri emabega wa Buweekula. Sam Lukoye yeyateebedde Gomba Lions etendekebwa Emuron Recoba. Mu kikopo kino Kooki yawanguddwa Mawokota ggoolo 2-0. Zino zaateebeddwa Abubaker Mayanja ne Stuart Kezaala. Ekibinja Muganzirwazza  Muno mwavuddemu Busiro, Bulemeezi ne Kyaggwe okusobola okugenda ku luzannya oluddako. Busiro yasoose kuwangula Bulemeezi ggoolo 1-0 mu mupiira ogwayindidde ku kisaawe e Ssentema. Ate yo Bugerere yawanguddwa Kyaggwe 1-0 mu mupiira ogwayindidde e Luweero nga Anthony Male yeyateebedde Kyaggwe. Wabula omupiira wakati wa Busujju ne Ssese tegwazanyiddwa oluvannyuma lwa Busujju obutalabikako. Ekibinja Masengere Mu kibinja kino , Mawogola eyabadde ewaka yakubiddwa ggoolo 0-3 bannantameggwa b’ekikopo kino aba Buddu. Abateebedde Buddu kuliko Bruno Bunyaga, Ibrahim Kirya me Reagan Kirumira. Kyaddondo yalemeddwa okugenda ku mutendera oguddako oluvannyuma lw’okukubwa Ssingo ggoolo 2-1. Abateebedde Ssingo kuliko Amuli Mukasa ne Godfrey Ssemanda. E Nakasongola , Buluuli ne Buvuma bagudde maliri ggoolo 1-1. Obululu bw’ omutendera oguddako ogwa ‘Quarter Finals’ bugenda kukwatibwa nga September 7, 2022 e Bulange Mmengo.

headline: Obululu bw’empiira gy’Ebika bukwatiddwa
text: Obululu bw’ekikopo ky’ omupiira gw’ebika bya Buganda bukwatiddwa era nga ttiimu ez’enjawulo zaawuddwamu ebibinja 8 era minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu alaze obukulu bw’empaka zino. “Ekisinga ddala obukulu kwekuba nti abantu ba Buganda bamanya era nebakkiriza nti olutabaalo lw’okuzza emipiira gy’Ebika luli ku ggwe, mu makaago, mu nnyumba mwova, mu lunyiriri lwo, mu mutuba gwo, okutuukira ddala mu kasolya ko,” Owek. Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Ono asabye abantu ba Kabaka okukomya okubuuliza ewaka emipiira bwegiwedde naye bafeeyo okudda mu kisaawe okusobola okuzza ekitiibwa ky’empaka zino. EKIBINJA A  Mpindi Butiko Musu Kasimba Kiwere Lukato   EKIBINJA B  Nkima Balangira Ntalaganya Kakoboza Kinyomo Nvuma  EKIBINJA Ç  Ffumbe Nkerebwe Musagi Nkula Ndiisa Ndiga  EKIBINJA D  Nsenene Gabunga Ngonge Nsambya Kisasi Kasanke   EKIBINJA E  Mbogo Njovu Njobe Nvubu Nkejje Nyunga  EKIBINJAF  Nakinsige Mpeewo Lugave Ngali Kibe Muyanja  EKIBINJA G  Nte Nkusu Njaza Nsuma Mbwa Nyange   EKIBINJA H  Kkobe Ngo Ngeye Namungona Mpologoma Kayozi

headline: Ssaabaduumizi Ochola alagidde Cheptegei ne Chemutai okukuzibwa mu poliisi
text: Kampala Ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi, John Martins Okoth Ochola, alagidde akakiiko akakola ku by’okulinnyisa abapoliisi amadaala okutunula mu ky’okukuza abaddusi b’emisinde; Joshua Cheptegei ne Peruth Chemutai, olw’okukola ennyo ne bawanika bbendera y’eggwanga mu misinde gy’ensi yonna egya Olympics egya 2020, egyayindidde mu kibuga Tokyo ekya Japan. Kino kiddiridde Cheptegei ne Chemutai okuwangulira Uganda emidaali gya zzaabu mu mpaka za mmita 3000 ez’abakyala awamu ne mmita 5000 mu baami ne basobozesa Uganda okukwata ekifo kya 24 ku mawanga 54 agasangibwa mu Africa ate n’ekwata kya 35 mu nsi yonna mu mawanga 206 ageetabye mu mpaka zino. Okusinziira ku Ochola, abaddusi bano tebakoma ku kuwanika bbendera ya Uganda kyokka n’eya poliisi ne bagikuumira waggulu. “Ndi musanyufu n’enkola y’abaddusi baffe. Emidaali gya tuyambye okusinga amawanga amalala nga; South Africa, Nigeria, Botswana, Ethiopia n’amawanga amalala.” Ochola bw’agambye. Ochola yakakasizza nti ebiseera by’eggwanga eby’emisinde bitangaavu era poliisi ejja kwongeramu amaanyi okusiima abo bonna ababeera bataddewo omutindo mu mpaka ez’enjawulo. “Ng’enda kugoberera okukuzibwa kw’abazannyi bano n’akakiiko ka poliisi akakola ku kwongeza amadaala.” Ochola bw’annyonnyodde. Ochola era asiimye Gen. Kale Kayihura olw’omusiguzi gwe yateekawo mu by’emizannyo mu poliisi ogusobozesezza abalina ebitone okuyitimuka. Kinajjukirwa nti okwaka oguwedde, Cheptegi yakuzibwa mu poliisi n’atuuka ku ddaala lya ‘Assistant Inspector of Police’ ng’ava ku lya ‘Inspector of Police’ oluvannyuma lw’okumenyawo likodi mu misinde gya mmita 10,000 egyali e Valencia mu Spain wabula lino tannalifuna olwa fayiro ye okubaako ebikyabulako. Kino kitegeeza nti amannya ga bano gagenda kuweerezebwa eri omukulembeze w’eggwanga basobole okulinnyisibwa amadaala.

headline: Ppookino asibiridde ttiimu ya Buddu entanda nga yeetegekera Gomba
text: Omwami wa Kabaka atwala essaza lya Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke asinzidde mu nsisinkano n’akuutira abazannyi be okunyweza empisa era boolese omutindo nga bwe bazze bakola basobole okuwangula ekikopo ky’omwaka guno. Ppookino Jude Muleke nga atongoza omujoozi gwa ttiimu ya Buddu Entanda eno Owek. Muleke yagiwadde abazannyi wamu n’abawagizi ba ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu wakati nga beetegekera okuttunka ne Gomba ku fayinolo y’ekikopo ky’amasaza enkya ku Lwomukaaga ku St. Mary’s stadium Kitende, bwe baabadde ku ky’eggulo eky’okusonderako ssente  ku Maple Leaf Hotel mu Masaka. “Emabega eri wabaddewo enkalu ng’abazannyi batufuukira ekirala, ng’abazannyi beefuula ab’ekitalo. Temuli ba kitalo. Njagala okubasaba bavubuka mwe empisa ze mwolesezza omulundi guno muzitwalire ddala mu maaso.” Bw’atyo Ppookino Jude Muleke bw’asabye. Ppookino Muleke yasabye bannamasaka okwekwatakwata basonde ssente, ttiimu eno esobole okugulirwa emmotoka enaagitambuza n’okugidduukirira kuba ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kyakosa nnyo ebyenfuna ku mitendera gyonna. Muleke yakirambise ng’essaza bwe litalina nnyigiza olwebintu byayo ebyandivuddemu ssente okuba nga tebinnabadizibwa era ng’okuyimirizaawo essaza liyambibwako bannabuddu. Ku mukolo guno Ppookino atongozza omujoozi gwe banaazannyiramu era nga bannakyotera nga bakulembeddwamu ssentebe Kintu Kisekulo ne bannamasaka nga bakuliddwamu omubaka omukyala Juliet Nakabuye Kakande, basonze ssente eziweze obukadde 6.

headline: FUFA egobye omutendesi wa Cranes  McKinstry
text: Kampala Ekibiina ekitwala omupiira mu Uganda ekya  Federation of Uganda Football Association (FUFA), kigobye omutendesi wa ttiimu y’eggwanga,  Johnathan McKinstry. Okusinziira ku kiwandiiko ekifulumizibwa FUFA, kinnyonnyola nti baatuuse ku nzikiriziganya ne McKinstry okusazaamu endagaano ye gy’abadde atambuddeko emyezi  18 mw’awangulidde emipiira egiwera 12.  Ono we bamukwatidde ku nkoona ng’emipiira 2 ku 3 egizannyiddwa agiwangudde era nga kitegeeza nti alese likodi ya buwanguzi bwa bitundu 67%. Mu mipiira  18 egizannyiddwa, awanguddeko 12, 3 gabadde maliri ate n’akubwa emipiira 3 gyokka. McKinstry  ajja kujjukirwa olw’okuyamba ttiimu ya Cranes n’ewangula  CECAFA Challenge Cup eya 2019, era mu mpaka zino Uganda yawangula emipiira gyonna era nga guno gwali mulundi gwakubiri mu byafaayo. FUFA esiimye McKinstry olw’obukugu bw’atadde mu Uganda Cranes mu kiseera w’abeeredde mu mitambo bya ttiimu eno. Endagaano ya McKinstry ey’emyaka 3, yatandika mu 2019 era ebadde ebulako emyezi 17.  Okumugoba kitegeeza nti FUFA erina okumuliyirira n’obukadde 900 okusinziira ku ndagaano gye baakola.

headline: Cheptegei  amenye likodi y’ensi yonna, awangudde Zzaabu
text: Omuddusi w’emisinde Joshua Kiprui Cheptegei, ekiro ky’eggulo yamenyewo likodi y’ensi yonna mu misinde gya mmita 5000 bwatyo nawangulira Uganda omuddaali gwa Zzaabu mu mpaka za 2020 Diamond League ezibadde e Monaco mu Bufalansa. Emisinde gino Cheptegei yagiddukidde eddakiika 12:35.36 naggyawo likodi ya munnansi wa Ethiopia Kenenisa Bekele ey’eddakiika 12:37.35 gyeyateekawo mu 2004 bweyali e Hengelo ekya Netherlands mu 2004. Cheptegei okusooka yasanze okuvuganya okwamanyi okuva eri munnakenya Nicholas Kimeli Kipkorir, ono mukusooka yamubadde ku lyanda,  okukkakana nga amalidde mu kifo kya kubiri ate munnakenya omulala Jacob Krop  namalira mu nnamba ssatu. Munnayuganda omulala eyabadde mu misinde gino ye Stephen Kissa, ono  yabadde omu ku bataddewo okuvuganya okusooka naye gyebyagweredde nga awanduse era teyamazeeko. Pulezident Yoweri Kaguta Museveni yavuddeyo nayozaayoza Cheptegei nga ayita ku kibanja kye ekya Twitter, nategeeza nga ono bwayongedde okutumbula Uganda n’okuleetera bannansi esanyu ely’omujjirano. Abaddusi abalala okuli Halimah Nakaayi ne Winnie Nanyondo ebintu tebyabatambulidde bulungi era okukkakana nga bakutte ekifo eky’okutaano n’ ekyomunaana. Kinajjukirwa nti, ku Lwomukaaga lwa wiiki  Cheptegei ne banne basimbulwa minisita w’ebyenjigiriza n’emizannyo  okugenda e Bufalansa bayambibwako pulezidenti Museveni.

headline: Masaza Cup 2021 : Butambala ekubye Buweekula 1-0, Busujju ne Mawogola bagudde maliri 1-1
text: Empaka z’amasaza ga Buganda zizzeemu okutojjera ku kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru nga Butambala ebadde ezannya ne Buweekula ate Mawogola ng’etunka ne Busujju okutangaaza emikisa gyabwe egy’okuva mu kibinja kya Muganzirwazza.  Ogusoosewo gubadde wakati wa Mawogola ne Busujju era nga gugweredde mu maliri ga ggoolo 1-1.  Ttiimu ya Mawogola yesoose okuteeba ng’eyita mu muzannyi Umar Luswabi mu ddaakiika ey’omunaana (8) ng’ ate ggoolo ya Busujju eteebeddwa Akram Kasaga mu ddaakiika ya 47.  Omutendesi wa Mawogola Jamad Magasi agamba omupiira guno tegubadde mwangu wabula wakuzimbira ku kabonero kano kafunye okuwangula omupiira oguddako.  Ate  owa Busujju,  Timothy Onyango ategeezezza nti  ekibalemeseza okuwangula omupiira guno basubiddwa emikisa mingi.  Mu mupiira ogw’okubiri oguzannyiddwa gubadde wakati wa  Butambala ne Buweekula era gugenze okuggwa nga Butambala eguwangudde ggoolo 1-0.  Ggoolo ya Butambala eteebeddwa Faizo Wabyoona mu ddakika 76  era yeewadde Butambala obuwanguzi netangaaza ku mikisa gyaayo okuyitawo.  Empaka zino kati zigenda kuddamu okuzannyibwa ku Lw’okusatu lwa sabiti eno n’emipiira egyisembayo mu kibinja era Buddu yegenda okusookawo ne Mawogola olwo Butambala esambe Busujju.

headline: Bannabuddu banjulidde Katikkiro Mayiga ekikopo kyebawangula mu Masaza Cup 2021
text: Abakulembera ttiimu y’essaza lya Buddu nga bakulembeddwamu Pookino Jude Muleke banjulidde Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga ekikopo kyebawangula mu mpaka z’omupiira gw’ Amasaza ez’omwaka oguwedde bwebakuba Buweekula 2-0 mu kisaawe kya St. Mary’s e Kitende. Omukolo guno guyindidde mu Butikkiro e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri era Kamalabyonna Mayiga asinzidde wano nabasiima olw’ekikolwa ky’obuzira kuba ekikopo kyebawangula kya muwendo nga emirundi egiwera babadde batuuka ku fayinolo naye nebalemererwa okukiwangula. “Abasambi mwatukola bulungi era mwebale ekikopo kyatuwa essanyu. Nkulisa nnyo Ppookino ne Bannabuddu mwenna, n’olukiiko lwonna n’omutendesi simuleseeyo naye n’abazannyi. Ekikopo ky’Amasaza kya kitiibwa nnyo era kyekisinga okuyaayaanirwa mukitundu ky’ Obuvanjuba nga oggyeeko e Congo,” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye.  Owek. Mayiga ategeezezza nti ebitone ebyayolesebwa byonna biraga obukulu n’amaanyi g’omuzannyo guno. Katikkiro Mayiga alaze obukulu bw’ensimbi mu muzannyo gw’omupiira okusobola okuwaayo ebikozesebwa n’ensako y’abazannyi nasiima abavujjirizi abayimirira wamu ne Buddu nesobola okutwala ekikopo. Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo n’okwewummuza mu Bwakabaka, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu ayozaayozezza Buddu olw’ okutuuka ku buwanguzi buno. Yeebazizza obuwagizi obwayolesebwa Bannabuddu n’obumalirivu obwayolesebwa e Kitende wakati mu ttiimu eyali ennungi n’obukulembeze obumaliridde okuwangula. Owek. Ssekabembe agamba nti ekiseera kituuse Buganda efune ekisaawe eky’ obwannannyini okusobola okulaakulanya omuzannyo guno mu Buganda ne Uganda era nalaga nga Buganda bwegenda okukola ekikopo ky’Amasaza nga kyefaanana kyokka mu nsi yonna okusobola okwolesa amaanyi n’obukulu bwa Buganda.   Omwami w’essaza Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke ategeezezza nti emipiira gino gyongedde okubagatta n’okubakuumira awamu era nasaba ebitaataaganya omuzannyo guno okugyibwamu omuzannyo gusobole okugenda mu maaso. Ye Muleke asiimye abasuubuzi bannamasaka abawangaalira e Kampala ne Masaka olw’omulimu amakula gwebakoze okulaba nga bavujjirira ttiimu y’essaza lino nesobola okusitukira mu kikopo kino. Avunaanyizibwa ku ttiimu eno, Nalubowa yeebazizza Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okwagala Buddu nokugiwa obuwangizi mu buli ngeri yonna esoboka.

headline: Yiino alipooota ku mpaka z’ Amasaza, n’ebigenda okukolebwa
text: Akakiiko akateekebwa Obwakabaka okunoonyereza ku mivuyo egiri mu mipiira gy’ Amasaza kanjudde alipoota ku byekazudde awamu nekyo ekirina okukolebwa okukuuma empaka zino ku lukalu lw’ Afirika n’ensi yonna. Akakiiko kano akakulirwa Sabiiti Muwanga kaalondebwa mu April 2020,nga besigama ku mivuyo egyaliwo mu mpaka za 2019 omwafiira n’omuwagizi mulamba. Kinajjukirwa nti mu 2019 nga Buddu esamba Mawokota ku kisaawe e Mpigi gwalimu emivuyo era gyebyagwera ng’ omuwagizi aluguzeemu obulamu, era wano akakiiko akakulembera omuzannyo guno kateekawo akakiiko ak’enjawulo okunoonyereza ku mivuyo egilabikira mu mpaka zino nekiyinza okukolebwa okutaasa ekifaananyi kyazo. Mu byanjuddwa mu alipoota eno ng’ebisoomooza kwekuli; ennamula y’omupiira ey’ekiboggwe, okubulankanya ssente mu masaza ag’enjawulo. Okuyingiza eby’obufuzi ebyawula mu nzirukanya ya ttiimu z’amasaza, abazannyi okugulirirwa, abakulembeze obuteewa kitiibwa awamu n’ebirala. Alipoota erumiriza abamu ku baweereza b’ebitongole mu Bwakabaka okweyisa mu ngeri etasaanidde nga kino kituukira ddala wansi ku masaza ag’enjawulo. Wabula ssentebe w’ akakiiko kano Muwanga ategeezezza nti ensonga zonna nga bwezivuddeyo zisobola bulungi okufunirwa eddagala okusobola okutaasa omuzannyo guno n’okukuza ebitone. Bw’abadde ayaniriza alipoota eno Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo n’okwewummuza Mu Buganda, Owek Henry Moses Ssekabembe Kiberu, yeebaziza olukiiko ku kunoonyereza kuno n’omulimu gwonna kuba gwakolebwa mu budde bwa COVID-19. Owek. Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti ensonga zino zigenda kwongera okulondoolwa era zakukwatibwa n’obwegendereza okusobola okukuuma omutindo gw’ empaka zino.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye bannabyamizannyo okunyweza empisa
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga akubiriza bannabyamizannyo okunyweza empisa bweba baagala okutwala ebitone byabwe mu maaso. Owek. Mayiga bino abyogeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo bw’abadde asisinkanye Omukulembeze wa FUFA, Omw. Eng. Moses Magogo, ng’ono abadde azze okwanjulira Katikkiro tiimu z’omupiira eziva mu kitundu kya Buganda, ezigenda okwetaba mu mpaka za FUFA DRUM. Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti awatali mpisa kijja kubeera kizibu okuganyulwa mu muzanyo gwo mupiira nabasaba bulijjo okukola obutaweera nga batumbula omupiira wano n’ebweru.  Owek. Mayiga abajjukizza nti omuzanyo gw’omupiira ssi muzanyo buzannyo wabula kintu ekisobola okubayamba okwongera okutumbula ebitone byabwe n’okubayimirizaawo mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. Ono asabye abaddukanya omupiira okuggya eby’obufuzi mu mupiira bweba baagala okugutwala mu maaso n’okwongera okugwagazisa abalala. Minisita w’Abavubuka n’Emizannyo mu Bwakabaka Oweek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, atenderezza eby’emizannyo by’agambye nti bitumbula empisa ate binyweza n’obumu. Owek. Ssekabembe agambye nti Buganda egenda kusindikayo abantu 90 basome ebikwata ku muzannyo gw’omupiira bafune obumanyirivu mu kuddukanya empaka z’Amasaza.  Akulira ekibiina ekitwala omupiira mu ggwanga, Eng Moses Magogo ategezezza katikkiro nti ekikopo kya Drum kyali kirooto bulooto nga kati musanyufu okulaba nga kyamala nekituukirira. Magogo yeebazizza Obwakabaka okubawa ettaka e Lugazi okugenda okuzimbibwako ekisaawe. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwako Minisita Ssekabembe Kiberu, akulira FUFA, Moses Magogo, omumyuka we Rogers Byamukama, omubaka wa Palamenti Patrick Nsanja, Andeleya Kaweesa, Diriisa Kasalirwe n’abalala.

headline: Ticket z’omupiira gw’Amasaza ogw’akamalirizo zituuse ku katale.
text: Ticket z’omupiira gw’akamalirizo zituuse ku katale era nga zino zitongozeddwa minisita w’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda ow’ebyemizannyo Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu.  Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu nga alaga ekikopo ekigenda okukwasibwa omuwanguzi mu mpaka z’amasaza. Ticket abazagala muzigule okuva mu bifo bino ebitongole; Amaduuka ga Airtel gona okwetolola eggwanga; Kampala road, Kikuubo, Kiseka market, Lugogo, Masaka, Luwero, Bulenga, Kajjansi. Ku masundiro g’amafuta aga Total Shops mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo; Nateete, Masaka-Nyendo, Entebbe, Kasana, Kyengera, Namasuba, Luwero, Kasangati, Bweyogerere, Mukono. Ku Centenary Bank; Masaka, Mukono, Luwero, Mapeera. Ebifo ebirala; Hardware world, Namboole, Bulange, Wakiso Giants shop. Omupiira gw’Amasaza  ogw’akamalirizo gwakuberayo nga 26/10/2019 mu kisaawe e Namboole era nga Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima okuguggalawo wakati wa Bulemeezi ne Busiro. Ku lunaku lwelumu wagenda kusookawo omupira wakati wa Buddu ne Kyaddondo nga kuno anawangula yaggya okukwata ekifo eky’okusatu era nga guno Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yagenda okuba omugenyi omukulu.

headline: Mawokota ne Bugerere zeesozze ‘Kwota fayinolo’
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Mawokota ey’omupiira ogw’ebigere awamu n’eya Bugerere, ziyiseewo okwesogga oluzannya lwa ‘Quarter Finals’ Mawokota ewangudde omupiira gwayo bw’ekubye Kyaddondo ggoolo 2-0 ate Bugerere n’eremagana ne Kkooki ng’emipiira gyombi gibadde ku kisaawe kya Fufa Technical Centre Njeru.  Omuzannyi Mike Kintu y’ateebye ggoolo zino zombi, bw’atyo n’ayamba ttiimu ya Mawokota okugenda ku mutendera oguddako. Omupiira guno Kyaddondo ebadde erina kuguwangula okusobola okugenda ku mutendera oguddako wabula nga nabyo bibadde byakusookera mu bibalo.Ate mu mupiira ogwa Bugerere ne Kkooki guwedde maliri nga tewali alengedde katimba ka munne era nga wano Kkooki ebadde terina ky’ezza.Olwaleero ekibinja Masengere lwe kifundikiddwa nga Mawokota y’ekikulembedde n’obubonero 9, Bugerere eri mu kifo kyakubiri, Kyaddondo eri mu kyakusatu ate Kkooki y’ekoobedde. Kati Mawokota erinze okubbinkana n’anaakwata ekyokubiri mu kibinja kya Muganzirwaza ate Bugerere ettunke n’anaakulembera ekibinja kino.

headline: Empaka z’omuzannyo gwa volleyball ez’amazaalibwa ga Kabaka zitongozeddwa
text: Oweek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule sipiika w’olukiiko  Empaka z’omuzannyo gwa Volleyball okujaguza amazaalibwa ga Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II olwaleero zitongozeddwa mu Bulange e Mmengo.  Omukolo guno gukoleddwa Oweek. Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule, sipiika w’Olukiiko lwa Buganda ng’ono yakiikiridde Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga abadde alina emirimu emirala emitongole gy’agenzeeko.  Okuva kuddyo, Abeebitiibwa, Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, Patrick Luwaga Mugumbule, Daudi Mpanga, ne Noah Kiyimba Oweek. Mugumbule agambye nti omuzannyo gwa volleyball mulungi kubanga gwetaaga amaanyi mangi era oyo yenna aguzannya abeera mulamu bulungi. “Omuzannyo guno kizzaamu amaanyi nti gukula era tusuubira nti gujja kuba gw’amaanyi nnyo. Nkubiriza abantu bonna okwenyigira mumuzannyo guno era kisanyusa nti kati gutwaliddwa mumasomero abaana baffe abato baguzanye,” Mugumbule bweyagambye.  Yayongeddeko nti bwegugenda mu masomero kitegeeza gugenda kubeerawo ebbanga lyonna.  “Twebaza nnyo abo bonna abagawagira mu ngeri ez’enjawulo,” Mugumbule bweyagambye.  Ate Oweek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu, minisita akola ku nsonga z’abavubuka, emizannyo, n’okwewumuza, yagambye nti alina essuubi nti mu bbanga eritali ddene, volleyball gugenda kuba ogumu ku mizannyo egy’ogerwako.  “Tetwetaaga kulinda kuba banene okusobola okutandika, kijja kusoboka okuzimba omuzannyo guno okugutuusa kuddaala ly’emizannyo emirala gyonna. Sirina kubuusabuusa nti guno gw’emuzannyo ogukyasinga okukulira ku sipiidi ennene mumizannyo gyonna gyetulina,” Ssekabembe bweyagambye.   Ku lulwe, Eddi Okira, ssentebe w’empaka za Kabaka birthday tournament, yagambye nti balina essanyu Kabaka okusiima emizannyo gino gibeere egimu kwegyo egigenda okuzannyibwa nga akuza amaaalibwage.  “Twagala okumanya gyetuvudde ng’abantu era tusuubira nti abantu baffe bajja kwemanya nga bayita mu mizannyo gino. Twagala emirembe mu ggwanga lyaffe nga tetufudde ku bulyomu ggwanga lyavaamu,” Okira bweyagambye.  Ku lulwe, Oweek. Daudi Mpanga minisita akola kunsonga ez’enkizo era nga ye ssentebe w’akakiiko akateekateeka amazaalibwa ga Kabaka yagambye nti omuzannyo gwa volleyball mulungi era guweesezza ddala Obwakabak ekitiibwa.  “Nina essanyu lyansusso okulaba nga n’omulundi guno empaka zino zigenda kubaawo,” Mpanga bweyagambye.  Empaka zino zigenda kubaawo omwezi g’okusatu okuva nga 27 okutuuka nga 29.

headline: Enteekateeka z’empiira gy’Ebika ziwedde, Omutanda asiimye okulabikako
text: Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo n’Okwewummuzaamu mu Buganda, Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu ategeezezza nti enteekateeka zonna eziggulawo emipiira gy’Ebika bya Buganda ziwedde era Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okuziggulawo ku Lwomukaaga luno e Kasana Luweero mu Bulemeezi. “Twogera okutegeeza abantu ba Kabaka mwenna nti wasigadde ssaawa busaawa ku nsonga y’okuggulawo emipiira gy’Ebika. Nga bwetwakakasiddwa olunaku lw’eggulo ku ssaawa 7, Katikkiro ajja kutuuka ku kisaawe e Kasana ate ku ssaawa 8 n’eddakiika 20, Ssaabasajja asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda e Kasana Luweero,” Owek. Ssekabembe bw’ategeezezza. Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe mu lutabaalo lwe balimu olw’okuzza Buganda ku ntikko, telugenda kubeera lwangu era tewajja kubeerawo bugobe kutaasa mbeera bwatyo nasaba abantu bonna okuwaayo obudde basobole okwaniriza Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka era bafube okubeera mu bisaawe. Olunaku lw’ eggulo, Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Twaha Kaawaase Kigongo yakiggumiza ng’ Empologoma bwegenda okuggulawo empaka zino ng’ekika ky’Embwa kivuganya n’Engo era nategeeza nti gino gibadde gimaze emyaka 2 nga tegizannyibwa olw’ekirwadde ki COVID-19. Owek. Kaawaase yannyonnyodde nti wakusookawo omupiira gw’okubaka ku ssaawa 7 ez’emisana wakati w’Embwa n’Engo ate olwo ku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo ogw’abasajja gusambibwe. Ono ategeezezza nti emiryango gigenda kuggulwawo ku ssaawa 4 ez’okumakya nabasaba okukuuma ebiragiro by’abateesiteesi n’ab’ebyokwerinda okusobola okutambuza obulungi enteekateeka eno. Ye Ssentebe w’olukiiko olutegeka empaka zino, Hajji Sulaiman Magala yeebazizza Bannabulemeezi olw’enteekateeka ennungi gyebakoze era nakunga Abaganda bonna buli omu okugenda awagire ekika kye era babugirize Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka.

headline: Abakungu ba FUFA balambudde ekisaawe omunaazannyirwa amasaza
text: Abakungu b’ekibiina ekifuga omupiira mu ggwanga ekya Uganda Football Association awamu n’akakiiko akategesi ak’empaka z’amasaza ez’omwaka guno, balambudde ekisaawe kya FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru, ne bakakasa omutindo gwakyon’obusobozi bw’okukyaza empaka zino. “Enteekateeka ku kisaawe buli kimu kiri bulungi era ekisaawe kyeyongeddeko ku mutindo okusinga bwe kyali omwaka oguwedde. Era buli kimu kikwatagana bulungi nnyo n’enteekateeka yaffe ey’omwaka guno okulaba nti tubeera n’empaka eziri ku mutindo okusingako omwaka oguwedde.”Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’ategeezezza. Okusinziira ku Ssejjengo, baalabye abazannyi, abakungu awamu ne badiifiri we bagenda okusula era ne bakakasa enteekateeka y’omupiira ogunaggulawo empaka zinoogwa nga 20 Novemba nga Gomba, esamba Kyaddondo era Beene y’agenda okugiggulawo. Ono annyonnyodde nti tebagenda kukkiriza bawagizi mu kisaawe olw’ekirwadde kya Corona naye n’akakasa nti enteekateeka y’okugulaga ku ntimbe za TV yaakoleddwako era nga buli kimu kigenda kuba kya mutindo n’abasaba okusigala nga bagumiikiriza. Amyuka atwala omupiira mu FUFA, Decolas Kizza ategeezezza nti tebagenda kutaataaganya ttiimu zibadde zikozesa kisaawe okuli; Busoga United ne SC Villa bajja kusigala nga bazannya kuba enteekateeka ekoleddwa bulungi. Bannantameggwa b’empaka zino ab’omwaka oguwedde aba Gomba baakuzannya Ssingo ate Kyaddondo ekwatagane ne Kabula awamu ne Buluuli mu kibinja kya Masengere. Buddu Mawogola, Busujju, Buweekula ne Butambala bali mu kibinja kya Muganzirwazza. Mu kibinja Bulange; Busiro, Bugerere, Kyaggwe ne Buvumaate Butikkiro mulimu; Bulemeezi, Kkooki, Mawokota ne Ssese.

headline: Balonze ebisaawe omunaazannyirwa egy’Amasaza
text: Olukiiko oluddukanya empaka z’omupiira gw’amasaza lutegeezezza nti lulonze ebisaawe emipiira mwe gigenda okusambibwa wakati mu kwekuuma ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona. Akulira akakiiko Sulaiman Ssejjengo Okusinziira ku ssentebe w’olukiiko luno, Sulaiman Ssejjengo, olukalala lw’ebisaawe ebigenda okukozesebwa sizoni eno bamaze okubiweereza mu kibiina ekiddukanya omupiira mu ggwanga ekya FUFA era nga basuubira nti mu bwangu bigenda kulambulwa. “ Ebisaawe twabironze nga tutunuulira ebyo ebizimbe ebisobola okubeera nti tetukozesa maanyi mangi okuziyiza abawagizi obutayingira mu bisaawe,” Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Ono agasseeko nti ekirala kye baataddeko essira by’ebitundu ebirina ebisulo ebiriraanye ekisaawe okulaba ng’abazannyi bakuumirwa mu bifo eby’okumpi okusobola okubatangira ekirwadde kino. Ssejjengo annyonnyodde nga bwe bafuddeyo ennyo ku by’okwerinda n’obujjanjabi nga balonze ebisaawe ebiriraanye amalwaliro amanene we basobola okuggya obujjanjabi obwamangu nga waliwo ekyetaagisizza. Ono agambye nti kati balinze FUFA okukakasa ebisaawe bino n’oluvannyuma bateese n’abakulembera ttiimu wansi mu Masaza babawe amagezi ku ngeri gye banaasengeka ebibinja eby’enjawulo. Empaka z’amasaza ze zimu ku mpaka ezisinga obuganzi era ezisinga okubeerako abawagizi naye olw’ekirwadde kya COVID-19 abategesi babadde bakyanoonya engeri gye giyinza okuzannyibwamu nga temuli bantu bangi. Kati ekirindiriddwa lwe lukalala lw’ebisaawe olugenda okufulumizibwa oluvannyuma lw’okukakasibwa ekibiina kya FUFA.

headline: Tuteekamu kitono mu byemizannyo naye tuwangula emidaali – Pulezidenti Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveni awolerezza eky’ebyemizannyo mu ggwanga okuweebwa ssente entono wadde bannabyamizannyo abeetabye mu Olympics e Tokyo basobodde okuwangulira Uganda emidaali era ne bateekawo okuvuganya okwamaanyi. Bino Museveni abyogeredde mu kusiima abaddusi abeetabye mu mpaka za Olympics ez’omwaka 2020 e Kololo ku Lwokusatu n’asaba bannayuganda okujjumbira ebyemizannyo. “Omuntu omu abadde agamba nti kyabadde kyamagero Uganda okukola obulungi nga eteekamu obuwumbi 18 bwokka mu by’emizannyo n’esobola okukola obulungi okusinga amawanga agateeramu ddala ssente.” Museveni bw’ategeezezza. Museveni annyonnyodde nti Yuganda erina ebitone ebitasangika naye ekizibu abantu abasinga kino tebakiraba era bamaliriza ebimu ku bintu babisaanyizzaawo era buli kitundu kirina obusobozi obwenjawulo era y’ensonga lwaki ekola bulungi mu by’emizannyo. Ono agambye nti wadde Kenya ne South Africa bateeramu ddala ssente naye Uganda ebakubira wala mu by’emizannyo. Museveni agasseeko nti Yuganda teyandisobodde kukola bulungi nga terina Mirembe nga bwekyali ku gavumenti eziyise era ng’okunyweza eby’okwerinda, kiyamba eby’emizannyo okukulaakulana. “Nali nagamb nti omuntu yenna alina ekitone bamuyingize butereevu mu bitongole bya gavumenti. Noolwekyo si kya magero nti abatuwangulidde zzaabu bali mu byakwerinda kuba y’engeri gye tusobola okutumbula ebitone nga tukozesa ssente ntono.” Museveni bw’akiggumizza. Uganda yakutte kifo kya 37 ku mawanga 206 okuva mu nsi yonna ate nga mu Africa yakutte kyakubiri wansi wa Kenya ku mawanga 54 agali mu Africa. Kino kiddiriddePeruth Chemutaiokuwangula zzaabu mu misinde gya mmita3000 steeplechase,Joshua Cheptegein’awangula zzaabu mu mpaka za mmita 5000. Mu ngeri yeemu Cheptegei yawangudde omudaali gw’ekikomo ateJacob Kiplimon’awangula ekikomo mu misinde egya mmita 10,000.

headline: Aba Masaka Union badduukiridde ttiimu y’essaza
text: Ebula ennaku mbale empaka z’ekikopo z’amasaza ga Buganda zikomekerezebwe mu kisaawe kya St. Mary’s Kitende ng’essaza Buddu ne Gomba be batuuka kufayinolo. Ppookino nga akwasibwa ettu okuva mu Masaka Union Bannabuddu bangi beesunga buwanguzi era nga bongedde ebbugumu mu kuvujjirira ttiimu yaabwe mu nnaku zino ezisembayo, esobole okuwangula ttiimu ya Gomba.  Ekibiina ky’obwegassi ekya Masaka Union ekirima endokwa z’emiti ez’ebika ebyenjawulo ate n’okutunda eddagala ly’ebirime ery’omutindo ssaako okuwola ssente n’okugula emmwanyi, kivuddeyo ne kikwasa Ppookino Jude Muleke ensimbi emitwalo 50 ne bbokisi z’amazzi 20 okudduukirira ttiimu y’essaza mu nkambi. Aba Masaka Union obuyambi buno babututte ku mbuga y’essaza Buddu nga babukwasizza Omwami wa Kabaka atwala essaza Buddu, Ppookino Jude Muleke awamu n’olukiiko era ng’aba Masaka Union baakulembeddwamu Hillary Kasozi.  Mu kwogera kwe, Hillary Kasozi ategeezezza nti nga bannabuddu era abakolera emirimu gyabwe mu ssaza lino, kibakwatako nnyo n’asaba Ppookino okukola ekisoboka okuwangula Gomba. Ppookino Jude Muleke asinzidde wano ne yeebaza aba Masaka Union okuvaayo ne bakwatizaako okusobola okulaba nga ttiimu yaabwe tejula n’abasaba beeteeketeeke okutandika okussa ssente mu ttiimu eno nga be bavujjirizi abakulu.  Ono era akunze bannabuddu kuwagira aba Masaka Union olw’okuba baagala nnyo ebintu by’Obwakabaka era n’akakana bannabuddu nti bagenda kuleeta obuwanguzi.

headline: MASAZA CUP 2021 | Butambala ewangudde Busujju  6-3 n’evaamu
text: Batabani ba Katambala bakoze kumpi buli kimu okuwangula omupiira gwe babadde bazannya ne Busujjumu kikopo ky’amasaza eky’omwaka guno, nga baagala okuyitawo mu kibinja kya Muganzirwazza bagende ku mutendera oguddako. Omupiira guno ogubaddeko n’obugombe, gubadde ku kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Center e Njeruakawungeezi ka leero ku Olwokusatu. Ekitundu ekisooka eky’omuzannyo kigenze okuggwa nga guli ggoolo 4-2 nga zino ziteebeddwa abasambi okuli Raymond Lusajje eyateebye ggoolo 2 mu ddakiika ye 18 ne 30, Blancher Mulambane Edrine Owachigu ate eza Busujju ne ziteebebwa Micheal Ssimbwa mu ddakiika ya 28 ne Akram Kasagga. Mu ddakiika ya 55 Butambalaefunye ggoolo eyookutaano ng’eyita mu muzannyi Raymond Lusajje ng’eno ebadde ggoolo ye eyookutaano mu muzannyo guno. Ate eyoomukaaga n’eteebwa Wabyona Faisal okutangaaza emikisa gya Butambala okuyita ku Buweekula. Wabula mu ddakiika ye 89, Busujju efunye Penati eteebeddwa omusambi Akram Kasagga, bw’etyo n’ewandula Butambulamu balina okuyitawo okugenda ku mutendera oguddako. Oluvannyuma lw’okuwangula omupiira guno, Butambala ebadde tekyasobola kuyitawo kuba Buweekula ebasinzeeko ggoolo emu wadde nga bombi babadde n’obubonero 7. Kati kitegeeza nti Buddu y’ekulembedde ekibinja kya Muganzirwazza olwo Buweekula n’egendera mu kifo ekyokubiri ku luzannya oluddako.

headline: Kabaka aggaddewo empaka z’emipiira gy’ebika by’abaganda e Buddu.
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga abuuza ku bazannyi b’omupiira gw’ebika by’aBaganda e Kkobe ne Mbogo mu kisaawe e Masaka mu Buddu.  Omupiira guno gubadde wakati w’ekika ky’Embogo n’e Kkobe wali e Masaka mu Recration Ground.  Omupiira gugenze okugwa nga Embogo ewangudde empaka z’omupiira gw’ebika by’abaganda bw’ekubye e Kkobe goolo 1-0, eteebeddwa Nelson Ssenkatuuka. Ate mu bakyala e Nnyonyi e Nnyange ekubye e Mmamba.Ssaabasajja akwasizza abawanguzi engabo wamu n’emidaali.  Ssaabasajja Kabaka nga akwaasa ab’ekika kye Mbogo e Ngabo oluvanyuma lw’oluwangula e mipiira gy’ebikaTiimu y’ekika kye Mbogo nga bajaganya oluvanyuma lw’okukwasibwa engabo wali e Masaka mu Buddu.Ssaabasajja Kabaka, omumyuka wa Pulezidenti Edward Kiwanuka Ssekandi, Katikkiro wa Buganda ne Minisita w’ebyemizannyo mu Bwakabaka Owek. Henry Sekabembe nga bambaza tiimu y’abawala emidaali wali e Masaka mu Buddu.

headline: WORLD CUP | Senegal  yeesoose okuva mukibinja mu z’Afirika
text: Ttiimu y’eggwanga lya Senegal emanyiddwa nga ‘The Lions of Teranga’ bakoze ebyafaayo bwebafuuse ttiimu y’ Africa esoose okuva mu kibinja mu mpaka z’omupiira eza World Cup 2022 eziyindira e Qatar. Senegal mu kibinja evuddemu nga ttiimu ekutte eky’okubiri mu kibinja A ekikulembeddwa Netherlands, eno yakubye omutegesi Qatar ne Equador mu mupiira ogubaddeko n’obugombe. Ggoolo za Senegal ezisoose ziteebeddwa omusambi Ismaila Sarr ate nga eya Equador eteebeddwa Moises Caicedo. Equador eyongedde okutaama nga eyita mu muzannyi Felix Torres olwo negubeera ggoolo 2-2 wakati ku njuyi zombi okunyigiriza ebitagambika. Senegal bwetyo esobodde okufuna ggoolo ey’okusatu nga eyita mu muzannyi Kalidou Koulibaly era omukwasi wa ggoolo Galindez tasobodde kulaba mupiira weguyise. Wadde Equador ekoze buli kimu naye emikisa omuva ggoolo gyonna gigaanye bwetyo Senegal neyitawo okugenda ku luzannya lwa ttiimu 16 ezibeera zivudde mu bibinja era nga guno gwe mulundi ogusookedde ddala bukya batandika kwetaba mu World Cup mu 2002.

headline: Ttiimu y’Obwakabaka yakuzannya Uganda Cranes
text: Ttiimu y’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda eyalondeddwa okuva mu Masaza ag’enjawulo egenda kuttunka ne ttiimu y’eggwanga eya Uganda Cranes ku kisaawe kya Wakisha ku Lwokutaano ng’ennaku z’omwezi 15/04/2022 okwongera okutumbula omuzannyo gw’omupiira mu Ggwanga. Kino kirangiriddwa Minisita w’Ebyemizannyo n’Okwewummuzaamu mu Bwakabaka Owek. Henry Ssekabembe Kiberu bwabadde atongoza ttiimu eno mu Bulange e Mmengo ku Lwokubiri. “Waliwo enteekateeka y’okulaba nti Obwakabaka buvaayo ne ttiimu yaabwo entongole. waliwo ekibuuzo ekigamba nti bwemumala empaka z’amasaza ez’akamalirizo kiki ekiddako? Mu nteekateeka eno tukolagana n’atwala omupiira mu Ggwanga obutavuganya nabo naye okuyambako okujjuliriza amaanyi gebateekamu,” Minisita Ssekabembe bw’agambye. Mu nteekateeka eno Obwakabaka bugenda kuleeta ttiimu ya bantu 25, abatendesi 2, ne Maneja wa ttiimu omu esobole okufuna omukisa oguzannya omupiira ogw’omukwano ne ttiimu y’Eggwanga eya Uganda Cranes. Okusinziira ku Minisita Ssekabembe, omupiira guno gugenda guzannyibwa ku Lwokutaano ku ssaawa 10 ez’olweggulo ku Kisaawe kya Wakisha. Ono annyonnyodde nti ttiimu ya Buganda yamala dda okulondebwa era eteekeddwateekeddwa bulungi nga yaakuyingira enkambi olunaku lw’enkya. Owek. Ssekabembe agamba nti abawagizi baweereddwa omukisa ogw’enjawulo okulaba omupiira guno ku bwerere okusobola okuzza obuganzi bwa ttiimu y’Eggwanga n’asaba abantu okuvaayo mu bungi okugiwagira. Ono alaze nti waliwo n’enteekateeka endala ey’okusamba ttiimu z’obukulembeze bw’ennono obulala okusobola okuggyayo ebitone. Eyalondeddwa okubeera Maneja wa ttiimu eno, Sulaiman Kiwanuka ategeezezza nti guno omukisa gwa maanyi ogumuweereddwa,era ajja kukola kyonna ekisoboka okulaba nti abazannyi bano 25 bakomawo n’obuwanguzi era basuubira okusula mu nkambi okumala ennaku 3 nnamba. Ate omutendesi omukulu owa ttiimu eno, Richard Malinga agamba ebikolwa bye n’obukambwe bye biri nnyo mu mupiira era wakukola kyonna okulaba nti ttiimu y’Omutanda ewangula. Abamu ku bazannyi abali mu ttiimu eno kuliko; abakwasi ba Ggoolo okuli Isaac Kwizera okuva e Buweekula, Mike Lutaaya okuva e Buddu, Tonny Atugonza owa Bulemeezi. Abazibizi kuliko Gideon Odong, Harunah Lukwago, Abdallah Ssentongo nga bonna b’e Buddu. Abalala ye Kenneth Sekkoolya owa Bugerere, Godfrey Anjole ow’e Bulemeezi n’abazannyi abalala okuva e Kyaggwe, Mawokota ne Busiro.

headline: MASAZA CUP 2021 | Ssese ekubye Kkooki 6-1, Bulemeezi ewangudde  Mawokota
text: Ttiimu y’essaza ly’e Ssese egudde ekiyiifuyiifu ku Kkooki n’egikuba ggoolo 6-1 n’etangaaza emikisa gyayo okuva mu kibinja kya Butikkiro ate Bulemeezi n’ekuba Mawokota ggoolo 1-0 mu mupiira oguyindidde ku kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Center Njeru ku Lwokuna. Ggoolo za Ssese ziteebeddwa abazannyi; Andrew Mukasa, Christopher Bwambale ne Abubaker Mayanja ateebye ggoolo 4, ate nga Issa Mugoya y’ateebye eya Kkooki. Omutendesi wa Ssese Edrisa Walusimbi agamba nti ekibaleetedde okuwangula omupiira guno kwe kuba ng’abazannyi be baguzannye nga fayinolo. Ye Kapiteeni wa Ssese, Allan Bukenya ategeezezza nti bagenda kuzimbira ku buwanguzi bwe bafunye olwaleero okuwangula omupiira gwayo oguddako, basobole okuyitamu okwesogga omutendera oguddako. Ggoolo ya Bulemeezi emu yokka eteebeddwa Shafiq Hakiramu mu ddakiika ey’ekkumi n’ettaano mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekisooka Ekibinja kino kati kigenda kukomekerezebwa olunaku olw’enkya n’emipiira ebiri wakati wa Bulemeezi ng’ettunka ne Ssese n’ogwa Mawokota ng’ezannya Kkooki.

headline: Kabaka agguddewo empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza eza 2021
text: Ssaaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye n’aggulawo empaka z’emipiira gy’amasaza ez’omwaka 2021 eziyindidde mu kisaawe kya FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru mu Kyaggwe. Omutanda ayaniriziddwa omumyuka asooka owa Katikkiro, Owek. Twaha Kigongo Kaawaase, Minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’okwewummuza, Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe awamu n’abakulira olukiiko olutegesi olw’empaka zino.  Omupiira ogugguddewo gubadde wakati wa ttiimu y’essaza lya Gomba nga lizannya ne Kyaddondo era gye biggweeredde ngaKyaddondo ewangudde ku ggoolo 2-0 nga zombi ziteebeddwa Omusambi Ssenyunja Isaac mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekisoose. Kino kitegeeza nti Kyaddondo y’ekulembedde ekibinja kya Masengere n’obubonero busatu era oluzannya luno lugenda kuddirirwa emipiira mu bibinja ebyenjawulo; Butikkiro, Muganzirwazza ne Bulange era gigenda kusambibwa mu ngeri ya ssaayansi olw’ekirwadde ya Ssennyiga Corona. Gomba ye Nnantameggwa w’ekikopo kino nga yakuba Busiro ggoolo 3-1 okusitukira mu kikopo.
